description.hltext_display: Ask the Incredible Inman | House of Something
description.content:
Mr. Inman: Several years ago, I saw a movie about scammers and con artists. I believe the title was “House of Cards” or “House of Mirrors,” but I have not been able to locate this film under those titles. I hope you can help. — S.B., Indianapolis
Dear S.B.: The movie you're thinking of is “House of Games,” a 1987 film directed and co-written by David Mamet. It stars Lindsay Crouse, Joe Mantegna and Lilia Skala.
Freelance writer David Inman's column appears daily. E-mail him at incredibleinman@yahoo.com. Please include your hometown. Questions of general interest will be answered; personal replies are not possible.

description.hltext_display: बांग्लादेश में 4 पत्नियों ने पति की पीट-पीटकर हत्या की
description.content:
ढाका।। बांग्लादेश में एक आदमी की उसकी 4 पत्नियों ने कथित तौर पर पीट-पीटकर हत्या कर दी। दरअसल इस आदमी की पत्नियों को नहीं पता था कि उनके पति ने इतने विवाह किए हैं।
ऑटो रिक्शा चालक 46 वर्षीय यूनुस बेपारी पिछले सोमवार को अपनी 2 पत्नियों के साथ गांव के एक मेले में पहुंचा था, जहां उसका सामना उसकी तीसरी पत्नी से हो गया। जब ये तीनों महिलाएं आपस में बातचीत कर रही थीं, तो उन्हें पता चला कि उसकी चौथी पत्नी भी है।
न्यूज पेपर 'न्यू एज' के मुताबिक तीनों महिलाओं को पता चला कि यूनुस की चौथी पत्नी किसी अन्य गांव में रहती है। तीनों महिलाएं यूनुस को कबीरपुर गांव में उसकी चौथी पत्नी के घर ले गईं, जहां चारों महिलाओं ने निर्दयता से उसकी पिटाई की।
यूनुस को गंभीर अवस्था में फरीदपुर मेडीकल कॉलेज अस्पताल ले जाया गया, जहां उसकी मौत हो गई।
गौरतलब है कि इस्लामिक शरीया कानून एक आदमी को 4 पत्नियां रखने की इजाजत देता है, लेकिन इसमें उसकी पहले से मौजूद पत्नियों की सहमति जरूरी है।

description.hltext_display: El Ibex 35 continúa el rally: sube un 0,3% y consolida los 10.200 puntos
description.content:
El Ibex 35, desde que visitara el pasado viernes los 9.800 puntos, no ha dejado de subir, en la jornada de ayer, un 2% arriba, y en esta suma un 0,4% y consolida los 10.200 puntos, con lo que terminó en la sesión anterior.
No obstante, los repuntes no son tan espectaculares. Encabezando las ganancias se sitúan Abengoa , Sacyr y BME , que se anotan más de un punto porcentual. Los 'blue chips' empujan también al alza.
En la parte negativa se encuentran sólo tres valores, Banco Popular , Acciona y Banesto , con descensos que no superan el 1%.
Por otro lado, la prima de riesgo se mantiene estable pero continúa alta. El bono español a diez años ofrece una rentabilidad del 5,56% frente al 2,99% del bono alemán a diez años. Así el diferencial entre los dos intereses alcanza los 257 puntos básicos.
En cuanto al euro-dólar, el cruce se encuentra en el 1,413. El oro, por su parte, sube hasta los 1.388 dólares por onza. El petróleo, por otro lado, cotiza en los 93,5 dólares.

description.hltext_display: Оппозиционные грузинские журналисты ушли с работы в знак протеста
description.content: Оппозиционные грузинские журналисты, которые в массовом порядке покинули работу, опасаясь изменения курса при новом руководстве на популярных порталах ITV и Pressa.ge, решили основать новое СМИ - PressaTV.ge, сообщили корреспонденту газеты ВЗГЛЯД источники в журналистских кругах Грузии. Источники рассказали , что после назначения в холдинг нового руководителя журналисты данных СМИ, которые отличались критикой президента Михаила Саакашвили и его правительства, заявили о возможной смене информационной политики. В связи с этим журналисты покинули рабочие места, чтобы объединиться и основать новое совместное СМИ. Журналисты объясняют это тем, что новое руководство ранее высказывало проправительственные взгляды, в частности, обвиняя грузинскую оппозицию в финансировании из России. Руководство холдинга отвергает претензии экс-сотрудников. Закладки:

description.hltext_display: Fantômas contre scotland yard
description.content:
Film d'André Hunebelle
avec Jean Marais (Fandor / Fantômas), Louis de Funès (Commissaire Juve), Mylène Demongeot (Hélène) et Jacques Dynam (l'inspecteur Bertrand). Doublage de Raymond Pellegrin (Fantômas) 105'
Fantômas met au point un impôt sur le droit de vivre des riches. Ses contribuables se groupent alors dans un château écossais pour lui tendre un piège. Mais Fantômas, tantôt gangster, tantôt Lord, change d'apparence à un tel rythme, que le commissaire Juve, Fandor et Hélène ne savent plus qui est qui.

description.hltext_display: How to fix doors and drawers that stick
description.author: Silva Payne
description.content:
A common issue in areas where the weather is damp or wet for a good portion of the year is doors and drawers that stick. How to fix the problem effectively without leaving a gaping hole at other times of the year can be a problem. Knowing a few tips and basic DIY should help you solve this problem wherever it occurs.
Doors and drawers are usually made from wood, along with their surrounds. Wood is a natural substance, and as such it expands and contracts in response to changes in atmospheric conditions. This expansion and contraction is constant though can be of minute proportions, depending on the type of wood and the amount of heat or moisture present. This should always be born in mind when attempting to fix any doors, windows or drawers that stick.
A simple remedy for sticking doors and drawers that does not involved reducing the actual plane of contact between surfaces at all is to administer wax as a lubricant. Take a wax candle and rub both of the surfaces to coat them in the wax. If the sticking is only slight, this should reduce the traction and thus decrease the sticking. The wax also acts as a protector for the wood, and the friction caused by opening and closing the drawer or door will eventually cause the wax to melt so you may need to reapply the wax every few months.
If the sticking problem cannot be fixed by application of wax, you may need to remove a small portion of one of the surfaces to allow the door or drawer to move more easily. This must be carried out with great care, so as not to remove too much of the wood and leave a gap that creates a draft at other times of the year. The first step is to remove the drawer or open the door wide and put down either a dust sheet or some old newspaper. Then take some very fine grade sandpaper and gently rub the surface of both the door or drawer and the frame in the area that appears to be sticking. Rub for just a few seconds, and then replace the drawer or close the door and see if the problem persists. Continue this process until you can open and close the door or drawer with ease, but a little resistance should be allowed to remain for when the wood contracts again.
If the problem appears to be a serious one with a door, and you feel that sandpaper will take a long time to achieve the results you want, you can remove the door completely and use a plane. Again, care should be take to not remove too much of the wood. Shave off a few millimeters of the surface of the door, and then use sandpaper to take off any rough edges. Re-hang the door and see how close to a perfect fit you are. It is likely that any more planning will remove too much wood at this point, so using sand paper is a better option.
However, if the door has warped, or the supporting wall and frame have settled out of shape, it may be a case of having to remove the door, rebuild the frame and then re-fit the door afterwards. If this is the situation, you may wish to consult a builder before taking any further action.

description.hltext_display: اکرمی: نمایندگان جرات سؤال از احمدی‌نژاد را ندارند
美国加州遭罕见暴雨 州长宣布进入紧急状态
description.author: www.stnn.cc
description.content:
星岛环球网消息：美国加州南部地区连日来遭遇数十年罕见的暴雨袭击，加州州长施瓦辛格22日宣布大洛杉矶地区的六个县进入紧急状态。
中新社消息，自上周四开始，来自太平洋的暴风雨侵袭加州南部，至今豪雨已经持续六天，多个地区的雨量刷新数十年来的历史纪录。据气象部门统计，洛杉矶市中心20日的降雨量刷新了1921年的纪录；位于橙县阿纳海姆的迪士尼乐园三天的雨量就达到4英寸（约100毫米），好莱坞的雨量超过5英寸（约125毫米），均创下80多年来的最高纪录。
受暴雨影响，加州南部部分山区发生小规模泥石流和塌方，加州一号公路马力布路段因塌方被迫中断。恶劣天气也影响到圣诞前夕的空中交通，洛杉矶地区部分航班延误。
当地气象局今天再次发布暴雨警报称，21日晚上到22日凌晨洛杉矶地区很可能迎来更大规模的降雨，洛杉矶累计降雨量将达3至6英寸（75至150毫米）。今天下午，洛杉矶县下令紧急疏散拉卡纳达岭和拉克里山塔市的232户居民，该地区去年曾发生山林大火，由于植被受到破坏，当局警告很可能发生泥石流灾害。
为因应暴雨带来的影响，加州州长施瓦辛格今天下午宣布，加州南部的橙县、河滨县、圣伯纳蒂诺县等六县进入紧急状态。

description.hltext_display: New Apple TV sales expected to top one million by Xmas
description.author: digitalhome
description.content:
Apple said today that it expects to have sold one million units of its second generation Apple TV (ATV) by the end of this week. Apple began selling the devices on the company website on September 1st.
The revamped device, which sells for $119 in Canada, gives users in Canada the ability to rent HD movies from the iTunes store or the ability to stream music, photos and videos from a Windows PC or Apple Mac. Apple never released unit sales for the first generation of Apple TV, however one financial analyst, Gene Munster of Piper Jafray last year predicted sales of 6.6 million units in 2009, up from about 2.1 million units in 2008.
Features of the new Apple TV include an Apple A4 processor ? the same processor inside the iPad and iPhone 4 ? built-in HDMI, Wi-Fi, Ethernet and a tiny 6-watt universal power supply, all inside an enclosure that’s about four inches square, some 80 percent smaller than the previous generation.
Discuss the new Apple TV in .

description.hltext_display: Zapatero ha apostado poco este año y Rajoy espera que el 'Gordo' termine en 6
description.content:
El jefe del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero , ha asegurado hoy que ha apostado "poco" para el sorteo de la Lotería de Navidad de hoy, mientras que el líder del PP, Mariano Rajoy , ha comprado décimos en Galicia y Madrid , y ha confiado en que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, el número que lleva.
A la misma hora que comenzaba el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad , los miembros del Gobierno y los diputados comenzaban en el Congreso el último pleno del año, en el que Zapatero va a explicar las conclusiones del Consejo Europeo celebrado la pasada semana.
Zapatero ha dicho al entrar en el hemiciclo que no sabe exactamente cuántos décimos de lotería ha comprado este año y se ha limitado a decir que "pocos".
Tampoco la ministra de Asuntos Exteriores, Trinidad Jiménez , ha gastado mucho, ya que sólo ha comprado el número del ministerio.
Por su parte, Rajoy ha afirmado que tiene décimos comprados en Madrid y en Galicia, y ha apostado por que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, antes de desear suerte a los informadores que se encontraban en el pasillo del Congreso .

description.hltext_display: How to prepare for flash floods and waterlogging
description.author: Sangeeta Deogawanka
description.content:
Heavy rains have paralyzed many cities all over, caused untold deaths, shaken up the average citizen's confidence, and left in its wake destruction and diseases.
"Water, water, everywhere, but not a drop to drink". It is indeed easy to empathize with the ancient mariner in Samuel Taylor Coleridge's famous poem. Therein he was in the open ocean, the water salty and unfit for consumption. Herein in a 21st century scenario, being in the heart of a city, residents are surrounded by knee-high water containing the filth of the city, but with no water to drink.
This is the price we are paying for development. Global warming has upset the nature's balancing forces. Heavy rains, flash flooding and water logging have assumed synonymous connotations. Yet we have to learn to live with this, cope with the consequences of intense and sporadic rain conditions. Of course, as responsible citizens we can devise means of averting such disastrous fallouts.
While evolving a pro-active plan to prepare for flash floods and water-logging, it is best to take lessons from previous years.
Take precautionary measures at the onset of monsoons, when you are on the threshold of another cycle of high-intensity rains, Share and learn from the rain-savvy experiences of your community, and research how to limit the consequences. For irrespective of location, we are today prone to the disasters of flash floods and water-logging.
So if perchance you happen to reside in downtown or the low-lying areas of a city, devising a plan is definitely a must-do. Storage of potable water, for both drinking and household is to be accorded first priority. Not to forget, batteries by the dozens; for those torches, radio sets and all battery-powered gizmos. Welcome to the world of domestic water logging management!
Stocking up with ready-to-make meals, juice and milk cartons, is next on the list. I suggest you use them up within a month, then re-stock immediately. Perishable supplies, batteries and candles come next. Then, of course, disinfectants and water-purifying tablets. For when the power goes directly after flash-floods, it is your portable Radio that comes in handy for news and of course, entertainment. Harvest rainwater if it is still raining and you have an open terrace, balcony or window.While inside the house, disconnecting electrical appliances is a precautionary measure.

event_or_fact.property: caused untold deaths, shaken up the average citizen's confidence, and left in its wake destruction and diseases

One also gets so many interesting free gifts and services, and as we know, we all love gifts especially when they cost nothing. So why wait, when mobile phone contracts have so much to offer and give, then why simply not make the most of it. Hence, you better hurry rather than cursing yourself in the months to come.

description.hltext_display: پخش شبکه‌ای یک ایمیل بین داوطلبان کنکور دکتری
description.content:
نامه‌ای الکترونیکی با محور اعتراض به منابع آزمون دکتری سال 90 بر روی یک وب‌سایت قرار گرفته که به جمع‌آوری امضاء الکترونیکی اقدام می‌کند و به طور گسترده برای دانشجویان کارشناسی ارشد برخی رشته‌های دانشگاه تهران ارسال شده است.
آفتاب: نامه‌ای الکترونیکی با محور اعتراض به منابع آزمون دکتری سال 90 بر روی یک وب‌سایت قرار گرفته که به جمع‌آوری امضاء الکترونیکی اقدام می‌کند و به طور گسترده برای دانشجویان کارشناسی ارشد برخی رشته‌های دانشگاه تهران ارسال شده است.
در این نامه الکترونیکی آمده است: "اینجانبان، جمعی از شرکت کنندگان آزمون دکتری سال ۹۰ با توجه به : ۱. تاخیر در اعلام منابع آزمون دکتری سال ۹۰، ۲. غیر تخصصی بودن منابع اعلام شده و ۳. تغییرات بسیار زیادی که منابع اعلام شده نسبت به سالهای گذشته داشته است از مسئولین وزارت علوم، تحقیقات و فناوری و سازمان سنجش درخواست رسیدگی به این موضوع را داریم."
این نامه الکترونیکی به طور گسترده ای به طور شبکه ای برای دانشجویان مقطع کارشناسی ارشد دانشگاه تهران ارسال شده است.
یکی از دانشجویان کارشناسی ارشد دانشگاه تهران که این پست الکترونیکی برایش ارسال شده است در گفتگو با مهر پیش بینی کرد منشأ ایجاد این وب سایت از سوی گروهی از دانشجویان دانشگاه تهران است چرا که این پست الکترونیکی به صورت شبکه ای در بین دانشجویان کارشناسی ارشد برخی رشته های دانشگاه تهران ارسال شده است.
پذیرش در دوره دکتری در جهت عدالت در پذیرش دانشجو به دستور وزیر علوم، تحقیقات و فناوری مورد بازنگری قرار گرفت و پس از مدتها بررسی و کار کارشناسی از سوی مسئولان این وزارتخانه به ویژه معاونت آموزشی، تصمیم گرفته شد این آزمون به صورت نیمه متمرکز برگزار شود. در این راستا برگزاری یک کنکور سراسری در نظر گرفته شد. منابع این آزمون چندی پیش پس از نهایی شدن از سوی سازمان سنجش اعلام شد.
ابوالفضل حسنی مدیر کل دفتر گسترش آموزش عالی پیش از این درباره آزمون دکتری به مهر گفته بود: در ماه های گذشته دفتر گسترش به همراه سازمان سنجش و هماهنگی دانشگاهها معتبر و رتبه اول جلسات گسترده ای را برگزار کرد که روسا و معاونان آموزشی دانشگاهها جلساتی را در این زمینه برگزار کردند. در نهایت بر روی آزمون نیمه متمرکز که تلفیقی از آزمون GRE و تخصصی و دروس پیشنهادی جمع بندی صورت گرفت.
حسنی یادآور شده بود: 26 رشته در گروه فنی و مهندسی، 18 رشته در منابع طبیعی و کشاورزی، 19 رشته در علوم انسانی، 16 رشته در علوم پایه، 6 رشته در گروه هنر، 6 رشته در گروه دامپزشکی، یک رشته در گروه تربیت بدنی و 7 رشته در گروه زبان برای آزمون تعریف شده‌اند.
وی افزوده بود: در آزمون دکتری تمامی داوطلبان باید به سئوالات زبان و استعداد تحصیلی پاسخ دهند و در هر رشته نیز داوطلبان باید به سئوالات 3 درس تخصصی مربوط به رشته‌ای که در آن شرکت کرده‌اند، پاسخ دهند.
مدیر کل دفتر گسترش آموزش عالی درباره نحوه طراحی سئوالات آزمون دکتری به مهر گفته بود: سئوالات این آزمون به شیوه پاسخ کوتاه طراحی می شود و داوطلبان آزمون نیمه متمرکز دکتری می توانند جهت اطلاع از عناوین دروس دکتری به سایت سازمان سنجش به نشانی www.sanjesh.org مراجعه کنند.
حسنی یادآور شده بود: ثبت نام آزمون در بهمن ماه انجام می‌شود و آزمون نیز در 25 فروردین ماه سال 90 برگزار می‌شود.

description.hltext_display: Neutralidad en la Red EE.UU
description.author: Juan Ranchal
description.content: La Comisión Federal de Comunicaciones de Estados Unidos (FCC) ha aprobado un texto impulsado desde la administración Obama denominado ‘Ley de Neutralidad’. Aunque el texto debe pasar ahora a la Cámara de representantes para su aprobación con la mayoría republicana en contra y por otro lado únicamente afecta principalmente a las redes fijas y no a las móviles, la norma debe proteger la transparencia y la neutralidad de la Red sobre el intento de discriminar el tráfico de las operadoras. El regulador estadounidense . Votación política que se salda con los tres votos a favor de los delegados demócratas por los dos votos contrarios de los republicanos. Es sólo un primer paso ya que el camino para su aprobación es todavía complejo con la mayoría de la Cámara de representantes a manos de los republicanos. Aún así, importante avance para lograr la ‘neutralidad en Internet’ o lo que es lo mismo, impedir que los operadores de telecomunicaciones bloqueen, censuren o prioricen determinados portales, contenidos y tráfico en general. "Por primera vez tenemos reglas para garantizar la libertad y acceso de internet, que de momento no existen", indicó el presidente de la FCC, Julius Genachowski que describió la normativa como un "acuerdo marco flexible, basado en el sentido común que permitan que internet siga jugando un papel fundamental en el crecimiento y la innovación". Por su parte Obama, tras conocer el cantado resultado de la votación felicitó a la FCC por aprobar unas normas impulsadas po su administración y que "preservan la naturaleza libre y abierta de Internet, estimulan la innovación, protegen el derecho del consumidor a poder elegir sus servicios y defienden la libertad de expresión".

description.hltext_display: ACS ya posee el 27,26% de los derechos de voto de Hochtief
description.content: ACS dijo el miércoles que a 21 de diciembre tenía el 27,26 por ciento de los derechos de voto de Hochtief. Asimismo, informó que hasta esa fecha habían acudido 5.825 acciones a la opa sobre la empresa alemana.

description.hltext_display: Italia: Isae, aumenta fiducia consumatori dicembre a 109,1 punti
description.author: news@borse.it
description.content: Aumenta la fiducia dei consumatori italiani a dicembre, superando le attese. L'indice formulato dall'Isae è salito per il quarto mese consecutivo, da 108,5 a 109,1 punti, tornando in prossimità dei livelli raggiunti lo scorso gennaio (gli analisti si aspettavano una fiducia in calo a 108,3 punti). Migliorano in particolare le valutazioni sul quadro economico generale (da 80,7 a 82,2). A livello territoriale la fiducia aumenta nel Nord Ovest e nel Mezzogiorno del paese, ma scende nel Nord Ovest e nel Centro.

description.hltext_display: Online Only Recipe: Brownie's Bean Blossom Inn's Butterscotch Pie
description.content:
Patty Hatchett, manager of Brownie’s Bean Blossom Inn, said that owners Ed and Shirley Brown have been operating the restaurant, year-round, for eight years.
Crust:
2 cups flour
½ teaspoon salt
½ cup oil
1/3 cup water
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Mix together all ingredients. (I found a food processor with the steel knife worked very well.) Roll out dough and fit into a 9-inch pie dish. Cover dough with a sheet of aluminum foil, and weigh down with dried beans or pie weights. Bake 15 minutes. Remove foil and weights, and prick bottom with a fork. Continue to bake until lightly browned, 8-10 minutes longer. Remove from oven and cool.
Filling:
2½ cups milk
4 egg yolks
1½ cups brown sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla
3 tablespoon flour
3 tablespoon cornstarch
1 cup (2 sticks) butter
Combine milk, egg yolks, brown sugar, vanilla, flour and cornstarch in a saucepan, and cook, stirring, over medium heat until beginning to thicken. Whisk in the butter a piece at a time, waiting until the piece melts before adding another. When all butter is incorporated, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for a minute. Pour into the prepared pie shell. Let cool.
Meringue:
4 egg whites
¼ cup sugar
Beat egg whites until foamy. Add sugar, and continue to beat until stiff and glossy. Spread meringue over butterscotch filling, and swirl attractively. Return to oven at 350 degrees for 10 minutes or more, until meringue is attractively browned.

event_or_fact.property: owners Ed and Shirley Brown have been operating the restaurant, year-round, for eight years.

description.hltext_display: How to choose insulation for your home
description.author: Ravi Mikkelsen
description.content:
Heating and cooling make up between 40 and 70% of a homes annual energy bills. Stopping air movement is the first step you need to take to create a more even temperature in your home. Once youve sealed up the holes in the outside of your home, adding insulation will greatly increase the comfort and savings on your heating & cooling bills. Insulation does slow/stop airflow through the material which is itself a great insulator, but it does not stop air flow at the edges. So again, let me stress that you should seal the cracks and holes first BEFORE adding insulation.
The type and level of insulation you use will mostly depend upon on your local climate and whether or not you can easily reach the cavities where the insulation will go.
Research/Buying Criteria
Here are the things I think about when looking for insulation.
0) Local climate: The temperature (degree days) and moisture content of where you live will determine how much and what materials will provide the best insulation for your home. The amount you need is given as an R-Value, which is the resistance to heat flow via conduction, convection and radiation. The higher the R-value of a material, the more it insulates. The R-value depends upon the material, its thickness and its density. To see how much insulation you need for your home click here.
1) New or existing construction: If you are building your house from the ground up, it is much easier to access all of the spaces for the insulation. New building codes also require thicker walls and joists than before allowing for more insulation to fit in to those spaces. If you are working with an existing home you'll need to decide whether or not you will remove/remodel the walls to install the insulation or if you will only add insulation where you can easily reach (attic, crawl space, etc.).

description.hltext_display: Europe airports battling backlog
description.content:
European airports are struggling to help thousands of passengers stranded after severe wintry weather paralysed parts of Europe's transport network.
Freezing temperatures, snow and ice has grounded flights, trapping travellers returning home for Christmas.
Airport operators defended their handling of the crisis amid criticism from the European Commission.
Officials at the worst-affected airport, London's Heathrow, rebuffed offers to bring in the UK Army to help.
Since Saturday, when 12.7cm (five inches) of snow fell in just one hour, Heathrow airport - the world's busiest - has cancelled hundreds of flights.
The airport said it planned to operate two-thirds of its scheduled flights on Wednesday.
Delays at Heathrow also had a knock-on effect on other northern European airports.
In Ireland, the Dublin Airport Authority said the airport would be closed until at least 0800GMT on Wednesday, the The Irish Times reports.
'Unacceptable disruption'
In Germany, Frankfurt airport cancelled 550 of almost 1,300 flights on Tuesday because of the bad weather.
Air France said that some 5,000 people spent the night at Paris' Charles de Gaulle airport on Tuesday - 4,000 of whom were trying to fly into London, according to Le Monde.
While in Sweden, Scandinavian airline SAS said flights to London's Heathrow were the most problematic.
"It is the absolute worst there," SAS spokeswoman Elisabeth Manzi told The Local.
"From Frankfurt and Paris, things are running smoothly and we are getting passengers out. In London, we currently have about 5,000 to 6,000 SAS customers."
Many passengers sought to travel by rail instead of plane, causing Eurostar to recommend that passengers trying to leave from London should cancel their tickets and stay at home.
But rail expert Christian Wolmar said the real problem was not bad weather but bad management.
"Eurostar ought to be ashamed of themselves," he told Associated Press.
"It would seem possible to put on extra trains, but they can't get the crews or they can't get the trains in place. It's inexplicable."
The European Commission said it was "extremely concerned" about the level of disruption caused by the severe snow, saying that it was "unacceptable and [...] should not happen again".
But Airports Council International (ACI), the professional association of European airport operators, said 88% of flights to and from European airports had been operating.
It said airports in northern Europe found it easier to cope with severe weather because the temperatures there remained largely below freezing, so the condition of the runways did not change, whereas the fluctuating temperatures in western Europe had caused problems. Continued

description.hltext_display: Agreement reached on aircraft export credits: source
description.content:
Leading passenger aircraft manufacturing countries have reached agreement on reforming the contested system of export credits to boost sales, a source close to the negotiations said on Wednesday.
"An agreement was reached yesterday evening. It concerns Europe, the United States, Brazil and Canada. And the governments should approve it by February 1," the source told AFP.
Major aircraft manufacturing countries have been holding talks for months at the Paris headquarters of the the Organisation of Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) on reforming the so-called export credits.
European manufacturer Airbus and Boeing of the United States have defended the current system, under which foreign buyers get government loan guarantees to help them to buy aircraft, saying it helps many foreign airlines to finance their aircraft purchases.
Big airlines in Europe and the United States oppose the current system, complaining that it unfairly supports their competitors in the Gulf.
A reform was also necessary to take into account new competitors in the passenger aircraft market such as the Brazilian company Embraer and Canadian Bombardier.
The French business daily Les Echos said on Monday that a compromise had been found that would extend the system to benefit US and European airlines.
A source told AFP on Tuesday that the negotiators were still trying to reach an agreement on how many of the Airbus and Boeing contracts made before 2007 could still benefit from the current credits system.

description.hltext_display: Detienen a un joven por agredir a una chica de 16 años
description.content:
SANTA CRUZ DE TENERIFE. - EUROPA PRESS
Compartir:
A la menor le robaron material escolar y unas gafas.
La Guardia Civil del Puesto de Tacoronte, en Tenerife, ha detenido a un joven de 19 años por agredir, junto a otra persona, a una chica de 16 años, a la que sustrajeron el bolso que contenía material escolar y unas gafas graduadas.
Los hechos ocurrieron entre las 17.00 y las 17.30 horas del pasado día 16 de diciembre, cuando el ahora detenido y otra persona agredieron en la vía pública a una joven, a quien causaron lesiones de carácter leve.
El arrestado ha sido imputado por un presunto delito contra el patrimonio (robo con violencia e intimidación), según informó la Benemérita en un comunicado.

description.hltext_display: Tanzania: CBA Plans Branch Expansion Strategy
description.content:
COMMERCIAL Bank of Africa (CBA) plans to have a branch in every region in the next four years.
CBA acting Chief Executive Officer, Mr Nurdin Semnangwa, said early this week that the plan is part of long term strategies to bring their service closer to their customers.
However, he could not reveal the amount to be spent on the project. "The project starts officially early next year with the opening of a new branch in Arusha and later in Kariakoo area," Mr Semnangwa who is the bank's Head of IT, said.
The bank's expansion has been pushed by its recent positive growth of 200 per cent after it was nationalized 35 years ago.
Currently, CBA which re-opened shop in Tanzania in 2002 operates in three regions on Tanzania Mainland. On his part, acting Head of Retail Banking, Ms Hyasinta Mwimanzi said the bank loan portfolio grew from a mere 10bn/- in 2005 to 70bn/- this month.
"Out of the total loans, 18 per cent was for housing and assets," Ms Mwimanzi said. CBA currently has branches in Dar es Salaam, Mbeya and Mwanza.
CBA originally commenced business as a subsidiary of Societe Financiere pour les pays D'Outre Mer (SFOM), a Swiss-based consortium bank with interests in financial institutions throughout Africa.
Original consortium members included Bank of America, Commerz Bank (later on sold to Dresdner Bank), Bank Bruxelles Lambert and Banque National de Paris.
In 1980, Bank of America acquired all the shares of the other SFOM partners and CBA became a subsidiary of Bank of America, with 16 per cent of shares held by Kenyan investors.
However, in 1984 Bank of America eventually sold the remainder of its shares. CBA is now wholly Kenyan owned bank.

description.hltext_display: Zanetti Bros. reaches deal with United States Department of Justice
description.content:
OSBURN - After two-and-a-half years of litigation, six figures and many sleepless nights, the second and third generation owners of Zanetti Bros. Inc. announced Tuesday they reached a settlement with the United Sates Department of Justice.
In 1997 Zanetti Bros. received notice that the United States Environmental Protection Agency intended to add the company to a suit filed by the United States against major mining companies for past mining activities seeking $1 billion in cleanup costs.
The EPA claimed Zanetti Bros. was also liable for mining and milling work done by four Zanetti Brothers that operated a family partnership working from the early 1930s through the late 1940s.
The EPA sued in 2008, seeking damages for the cleanup cost of the Coeur d'Alene Basin.
Zanetti Bros. disputed the claim.
"With the enactment by Congress of Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Act in December of 1980, our nation's environmental laws changed, thus putting/making many companies like the Zanetti Family Partnership - which started back in the early 1930s with four brothers, a couple of mules and a mine car - liable for paying a portion of the EPA's cleanup of the basin," the release said.
Terms of the settlement were not available, but according to the release, "the mining companies' loyalties to the Zanetti Family and Zanetti Bros., Inc. have allowed us to stay in business in the Silver Valley for many years."
The company could not have survived, otherwise, officials said.
"Had it not been for their support, we and many other businesses would not have been able to continue operations," the release said. "We have all endured the never-ending stigma of having the largest and most expensive Superfund site in the nation hanging over our heads."
More about Zanetti
ARTICLE: A novel to sink your teeth into
More about Mining

description.hltext_display: Seoul eyes crackdown on North Korean Internet propaganda
description.content:
The South Korean government plans to further restrict its citizens from accessing and relaying information on the Internet that is sympathetic to North Korea.
Outlining its plans for 2011, the country's Justice Ministry said it will "try to block North Korea's propaganda activity through social-networking services, such as Twitter."
The plans build on South Korea's existing Internet filtering and come at a time of increased tensions between the two neighbors.
Websites judged to be sympathetic to Pyongyang have been blocked by the South Korean government for several years. The sites are largely those of organizations based in China or Japan with links to North Korea. South Korean Internet users attempting to access the sites are redirected to a National Police Agency page indicating that the site is forbidden in South Korea.
Until recently, North Korean propaganda on social media networks wasn't much of a problem, but that changed in July when Uriminzokkiri, a China-based site with close ties to Pyongyang, . The Twitter feed carried headlines and links to news stories on the organization's website. It was followed by a Facebook group and accounts on Flickr and YouTube. The Facebook page was quickly closed but the other accounts remain active.
Within a few weeks of its appearance, South Korean authorities but the result was symbolic at best. While the account page is blocked, Twitter messages from the account can still be seen when the site is accessed via a secure HTTPS connection or via any of the hundreds of applications that use Twitter's API (application programming interface.)
The Twitter feed currently has 10,545 followers including some that appear to be in South Korea.
Under existing legislation, it is already illegal for South Koreans to take part in exchanges with North Korea without first getting permission from the South Korean government. The "Inter-Korea Exchange and Cooperation Act" provides for up to three years in prison or fines of up to 10 million won (US$8,660) for doing so.
The Justice Ministry hasn't detailed how it plans to limit the spread of North Korean propaganda in cyberspace, but this existing law could be part of its plans. Lawmakers said earlier this year that any attempts to communicate with North Korean social media accounts could be considered a violation.
The ministry also said it plans to crackdown on those circulating false reports on the Internet that could affect national security.
Earlier this month it indicted 19 people for spreading rumors in the wake of North Korea's shelling of Yeonpyeong Island. The 19 sent text messages saying or implying the government was calling up reserve military forces, but the government never did.
(Hyuna Kim in Seoul contributed to this report.)
Martyn Williams covers Japan and general technology breaking news for The . Follow Martyn on Twitter at @martyn_williams. Martyn's e-mail address is martyn_williams@idg.com

description.hltext_display: Gerard Piqué, un Papá Noel que repartirá 'felicidad'
description.content:
'No me arrepiento [del gesto de la 'manita' al Real Madrid]', declara el defensa del Barça a la revista 'Don Balón'
Stella Alonso
Madrid.- Gerard Piqué se ha enfundado el traje de Papá Noel para la revista ‘Don Balón’ en su tradicional portada navideña. Él es el futbolista 24 que realiza esta divertida sesión, sucediendo a su compañero en el Barça y en la selección Andrés Iniesta.
Preguntado por su gesto de la 'manita' en el 5-0 del Barça-Real Madrid, afirma: “No me arrepiento ni mucho menos. Era una acción para celebrar la victoria con el aficionado ‘culé’ y en ningún momento fue un gesto de provocación hacia nadie. Respeto mucho al Real Madrid como entidad, una de las mas grandes del mundo por su historia y por lo que significa, y en ningún momento quise ofender”. “Desde atrás al final se ve todo y vi una superioridad tan grande contra un equipo tan grande que me di cuenta que juego al lado de los mejores”, dice sobre la goleada.
Piqué ha sido elegido por los periodistas de la revista por su papel tanto en el Barça como en la selección, su atractivo al alza y por su carácter dicharachero y alegre, algo que agradecen los periodistas en los futbolistas que se atreven a ser sinceros saliéndose del guión de los jefes de prensa. “Disfruto muchísimo escribiendo [en la red social Twitter] y que la gente siga en contacto conmigo”, explica.
Cada día más acostumbrado a los ‘flashes’, la popularidad de Piqué va creciendo como lo hizo en su día la de su pueblo, Sant Guim de Freixenet (Lérida), famoso por su cava. No es de extrañar que Piqué adore estas fechas e incluso en la localidad ilerdense hizo de Rey Baltasar: “Con toda la cara pintada, la corona... Lo pasé bastante mal”. “La Navidad es la fiesta grande en casa. Un placer poder pasarla con mi familia”, añade.
Si fuese Papá Noel por un momento, Gerard Piqué no duda de que regalaría algo que no fuese material, concretamente que cada persona fuese un poco más feliz. “Es cuestión de conseguirlo, no tanto de regalarlo, pero ése sería mi regalo como Papá Noel”. Él tiene claro que ha tenido el suyo antes de tiempo, ser campeón del mundo con la selección española en el Mundial de Sudáfrica 2010. “Recuerdos como un Mundial permanecen en la memoria de la gente mucho más tiempo que algo material”, valora.

description.hltext_display: How to choose a home alarm system
description.author: Suzanne Rose
description.content:
A home alarm system can go a long way in helping you feel safe and secure in your own home. The systems can vary significantly in both price and offering. There is no one system that is right for everyone it will depend on what you are looking for and the money you wish to spend. The following are some tips to help you choose a home alarm system.
What is the price?
The price of a home alarm system will come in two major parts. The first is the price to actually install the system. This can be great or cost very little if you are getting a service that is monitored and the company will be making money that way. These can range a lot and can cost hundreds or thousands of dollars depending on what you get, the size of your home and the company that you go with. Some places might offer payment plans to make it more affordable.
Do you want a monitored system or one that is not monitored?
A non-monitored system is simply going to make a loud alarm if it gets triggered. No one will automatically call you or the police, however. This can be good in that it is usually the more economical of the two types of alarms. Although you may pay a lot to set up the system, you will not have a constant monthly fee. Also, it is still very valuable. If someone is breaking into your house, and all of a sudden a loud alarm goes off, they are likely not to want to stick around. Also, since so many of the systems are monitored, there is no way for them to know that yours isnt being monitored and so they may leave because of that. In addition, when neighbors hear a house alarm going off, there is a decent chance that someone will call the police if it does not stop.
A monitored system has its own advantages. You might feel safer knowing that someone is going to automatically call the police if there is a problem and they cannot confirm with you that things are okay. For this, you may not pay as much to set it up, but you will always have a monthly fee. One bonus is that some of these tie in other safety systems such as smoke alarms. Most of these also have a loud alarm, so you will get the same benefits from that.
How is the alarm triggered?
Different systems have different triggers. A lot of them will trigger if a door gets opened or a window gets broken. Some of them will have motion sensors, although if you are home, this may not be useable. You will want to look at the different companies and see what they offer for the price.

description.hltext_display: Temperaturas superiores a las normales este invierno
description.content:
Península y Baleares registrarán temperaturas inferiones a las habituales.
El jefe de predicción de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología, Fermín Elizaga, ha previsto que el trimestre invernal de enero a marzo, tenga unas temperaturas inferiores a los valores normales en la Península y Baleares, que será más acusada en la regiones del este peninsular, mientras que en Canarias, por el contrario" se prevé una tendencia a temperaturas superiores a las normales.
Asimismo, ha indicado que los españoles recibirán la Nochebuena con lluvia y nieve y disfrutarán de sol y frío durante el día de Navidad. Así, ha explicado que las precipitaciones serán generalizadas en toda España este martes y miércoles y que serán "persistentes y fuertes" en Andalucía y sobre todo en el Estrecho, aunque éstas cesarán y el jueves se espera un descenso "significativo" de los termómetros y nieve en la mitad norte peninsular por encima de los 400 metros de altura.
Además, ha apuntado que el día de Nochebuena será "frío en casi toda España". No obstante, aunque el viernes será un día de "más claros que nubes", es decir, de sol y frío en casi todo el país, por la tarde, se espera la llegada de una nueva masa fría de origen atlántico que afectará "sobre todo" a la mitad oeste y podría llegar al este peninsular.
En todo caso, ha apuntado que el día de Navidad, el tiempo volverá a ser "más tranquilo" y "estable", pero ha advertido de que las nevadas previstas para este jueves serán significativas en el Cantábrico y extremo norte peninsular y que, debido al frío, la nieve se mantendrá también el día 24.
Asimismo, Elizaga ha añadido que el día 24 se las nevadas serán "importantes" en buena parte del continente Europeo, que está padeciendo una "anomalía fría".
Finalmente, ha señalado que también de acuerdo al modelo de predicción estacional del Centro Europeo de Predicción a Medio Plazo, se espera una tendencia a precipitaciones inferiores a lo normal en el noroeste peninsular y a precipitaciones "ligeramente" superiores a las normales en Levante. En todo caso, ha puntualizado que la fiabilidad de estas predicciones en latitudes medias, como España, es menor que en otras latitudes, por ejemplo en las zonas tropicales.

description.hltext_display: Dodik - Čović u Mostaru: Srpsko-hrvatski sastanak kao "pucanj u prazno"
description.content:
24SI - Srpsko-hrvatski blok sastavljen od SNSD-a i SDS-a sa jedne i dva HDZ-a sa druge strane trebali bi se sastati danas u Mostaru kako bi dali odgovor na SDP-ovu platformu i moguće formiranje vlasti bar na državnom nivou.
Ipak iz HDZ-a 1990. i SNSD-a kazali su kako od sastanka ne očekuju nita te da će se razgovarati o formiranju vlasti na državnom nivou i cjelokupnoj političkoj situaciji u zemlji.
Lider HDZ-a BiH Dragan Čović ovih dana je kazao da kao odgovor na koaliciju SDP-a, SDA, HSP-a BiH i Narodne stranke Radom za boljitak sprema sastanak stranaka iz reda sva tri naroda koje su dobile većinsku podrku na izborima, a sve sa ciljem da bi se iskazao jasan stav i inicijativa o formiranju vlasti i implementaciji rezultata. Blokovsko okrupnjavanje Srba i Hrvata u vie navrata prezreli su u SDP-u i SDA, no ovo je jedini način, smatraju mnogi, da se HDZ BiH vrati u igru o formiranju vlasti bar na državnom nivou. Iz SNSD-a i HDZ-a 1990. su za "Dnevni list" potvrdili da dolaze na sastanak u centralu HDZ-a BiH u 11 sati. Iako je prethodno bilo najavljeno da bi blokovski sastanak trebao biti otkazan ukoliko danas bude održan nastavak konstituirajuće sjednice Zastupničkog doma BiH do kasnih poslijepodnevnih sati, sastanak u HDZ-u BiH nije otkazan.
Iz HDZ-a 1990. su bili suzdržani i nisu previe željeli komentarisati SDP-ovu platformu i Čovićevu izjavu da je zakazani sastanak protuudarac Zlatku Lagumdžiji. Poručili su da će lider stranke Božo Ljubić biti na sastanku sa SNSD-om. Glasnogovornik HDZ-a 1990. Veso Vegar kazao je za "Dnevni list" da samo žele čuti miljenje iz RS-a. "Mi nikakav protuudarac nećemo i ne možemo praviti na SDP-ovu platformu. Mi želimo čuti miljenje najjačih stranaka iz RS-a i vidjeti da li je moguć neki dogovor sa njima, ali da organizujemo sastanak protiv nekog drugog, to nema smisla", poručio je Vegar. Kada je u pitanju sjednica Zastupničkog doma PSBiH, Vegar je kazao da ne vidi svrhu u sjednici na kojoj bi trebalo biti odabran Kolegij doma i komisija za izbor Vijeća ministara kada parlamentarna većina nije dogovorena.
Glavni sekretar SNSD-a Rajko Vasić kazao je za "Dnevni list" jučer da oni dolaze u Mostar jer su "dužni doći" nakon HDZ-ovih posjeta Banjoj Luci. Naglaava da je ovaj sastanak ranije dogovoren, a da su naknadno iz HDZ-a predložili da se na njemu nađu i SDS i HDZ 1990.
"Nemamo neke posebne teme. Mi smo upoznati sa papirom SDP-a i nita kod toga nije novo i svi smo se oko toga već usuglasili. Moguće je da se neka od ideja formulie, ali ne znam da li je moguće da četiri stranke prave zajedničku platformu, papir ili odgovor", kazao je Vasić komentariući moguće teme sastanka.
Igor Radojičić, potpredsjednik SNSD-a, ocijenio je kako je potpisivanje platforme SDP-a, SDA, HSP-a BiH i Narodne stranke Radom za boljitak zakomplikovalo ukupne odnose na nivou BiH, jer postoje druga dva bloka političkih stranaka.
"Ako navedene četiri stranke u FBiH imaju većinu, potpisivanje platforme je njihov izbor, iako je vidljivo da zbog toga dolazi do podizanja političkih tenzija novoformiranog bloka i dva HDZ-a", smatra Radojičić. Dodao je i kako će na dananjem sastanku predstavnika SNSD-a, SDS-a, HDZ-a BiH i HDZ-a 1990. u Mostaru, sazvanom upravo u svjetlu rečenog, SNSD predvoditi predsjednik stranke Milorad Dodik.

description.hltext_display: Koffer packen: Nix wie weg – Deutsche sind Weihnachtsflüchter
description.content:
Fast jeder zweite Bundesbürger (44 Prozent) würde sofort seine Koffer packen, gäbe es ein tolles Angebot“. Ob toll“ gleich preiswert bedeutet, geht aus der Umfrage von Travelzoo Aber die Zahlen sprechen eine deutliche Sprache, dass Weihnachten als Fest der Familie offenbar immer mehr an Wert verliert. Waren es vor zehn Jahren erst elf Prozent, die über die Feiertage verreisten, stieg die Zahl in den letzten fünf Jahren auf 27 Prozent.
Ein Grund dafür scheint zu sein, dass das Fest der Liebe“ nicht selten im Unfrieden endet. So gaben 39 Prozent der Teilnehmer an, sich zu Weihnachten schon einmal mit den Schwiegereltern gestritten zu haben, weitere 23 Prozent stritten über die Frage, bei welchem Familienmitglied gefeiert werden soll, und bei 13 Prozent sorgte die Entscheidung über das Festmahl für Unmut.
Was die Geschenke betrifft: 56 Prozent würden sich am meisten über eine Reise freuen ein Spitzenwert. Das erklärt vielleicht auch, warum 45 Prozent erst am 24. Dezember den Baum schmücken. Die Hoffnung auf eine Überraschungsreise stirbt offenbar zuletzt.bes.Weihnachten daheim? Von wegen: Es ist offenbar eine Mär, dass die Deutschen Heiligabend am liebsten zu Hause sind.

description.hltext_display: В мире процветает "рабство по-африкански"
description.content:
Рабство по-прежнему остается одним из позорных явлений в жизни современного человечества. Так, 20 декабря в африканской стране Габон Интерпол освободил 140 детей-рабов, которых преступники заставляли работать чернорабочими на рынках, а также использовали как носильщиков. Бросается в глаза то, что некоторым из них не более шести лет.
Известно, что преступники похищали их или покупали у родителей в соседних бедных странах, после чего отвозили в столицу Габона Либревилль. Освобожденные дети уже отправлены в приюты.
Почему именно Габон стал местом сосредоточения рабов? Дело в том, что эта страна является одной из самых стабильных и богатых на континенте благодаря богатым месторождениям нефти, газа, а также марганцевой и урановой руд. Так, по доходу на душу населения (13,9 тысяч долларов в 2009 году) она уступает лишь Экваториальной Гвинее и Сейшельским островам.
Как свидетельствуют неофициальные источники, рабство процветает также в тех странах, где его недавно отменили. Например, в Мавритании это произошло в 1980 году. Однако по сути многое там осталось в прежнем виде. Формально рабов освободили. Но идти им некуда, и они остались у хозяев на прежнем положении.
Или взять такую страну, как Нигер. Рабство здесь официально было отменено в 1995 году. Но, по данным организации Timidria, борющейся против рабства, в 2003 году в этой стране в рабстве находилось 870 тысяч человек. Также по ее данным, главными посредниками в работорговле являются вожди туарегских племенных группировок.
И хотя правительство страны отрицает, что сегодня в Нигере есть рабство, по данным Timidria, на положении рабов по-прежнему находятся по меньшей мере 43 тысячи человек. Значительную часть из них составляют так называемые "садако", или женщины-невольницы, являющиеся сексуальными рабынями. Timidria борется с рабством, опираясь на широкую сеть своих офисов по всей стране, где беглым рабам дают помощь и приют. По данным ООН и правозащитных структур, тяжелое положение также наблюдается в Судане, Сомали и Анголе.
Ситуацию для "Правды.Ру" прокомментировал африканист Сергей Карамаев:
"Несмотря на то что официально ни в одной стране сегодня рабства не существует, тем не менее это соблюдается только на бумаге. И особенно оно процветает там, где идут конфликты, вроде той же войны в Конго или Съерра-Леоне.
И практически все враждующие стороны не брезгуют пользоваться услугами рабов. Например, во время Родезийской войны их активно использовали даже партизаны знаменитого СВАПО.
Причем следует разделять рабов по категориям. Возьмем комбатантов, то есть участников боевых действий. Они не только носят оружие, но даже и сражаются на стороне тех, кто их когда-то похитил. Характерный пример — "Армия спасения Господня", орудующая, в том числе, на территории Уганды.
Еще одна категория — "обслуживающий" персонал, занятый готовкой еды, стиркой, выполнением секс-услуг и т.д.
Другая категория — рабочие. Особенно часто их можно встретить в отдаленных местностях, на специально огороженных территориях, на шахтах и приисках, в том числе принадлежащих западным бизнесменам, где они добывают то или иное сырье.
Впрочем, немало рабов можно встретить также в других странах третьего мира. Рабство во всех видах процветает в Юго-Восточной Азии (Пакистане, Индии, Шри-Ланке, Непале, Бирме. — Ред.), на Ближнем Востоке. Есть оно и в Латинской Америке.
Читайте также: 300 изнасилованных жертв африканской войны
Да и чему можно тут удивляться, глядя на Африку, если и в нашей стране то тут, то там всплывают факты использования рабского труда? И даже если не затрагивать Россию, то можно с уверенностью говорить о том, что рабство существует на всех населенных континентах. Нет его только в Антарктиде".
О серьезности положения говорит и тот факт, что 2 декабря официально отмечается Международный день борьбы за отмену рабства. Причем генсек ООН Пан Ги Мун открыто признает тот факт, что человечеству пока не удается избавиться от этого позорного явления.
По его словам, глобализация лишь оживила его. И прежде всего жертвами рабовладельцев становятся "бедные и социально отверженные группы населения, такие как меньшинства и мигранты".
В борьбе с рабством участвуют такие неправительственные организации, как Association for Community Development (Бангладеш), Bonded Liberation Front (Индия) и Anti-Slavery International (США).
В той же Европе численность рабов составляет от 400 тысяч до одного миллиона. В первую очередь речь идет о сексуальных рабынях, которых заманивают в свои сети преступные группировки. Немало невольниц также работают в США, Израиле, Турции и Гонконге.
Малолетних девочек нередко покупают у работорговцев или у родителей, взрослых заманивают через модельные и рекрутинговые агентства либо похищают силой.
Таким образом, ситуация по-прежнему далека от прогресса. Сегодня, по данным международных правозащитных организаций, в мире насчитывается до 30 миллионов рабов.
Одна из главных причин, почему процветает рабство, — снижение стоимости раба при повышении доходов, которые он приносит. По оценке ООН, доходы только от перепродажи рабов составляют семь миллиардов долларов в год. А в среднем одна проститутка-рабыня ежемесячно дает своим хозяевам семь тысяч долларов.

description.hltext_display: 75.869: el premio más madrugador
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. 58.697 es el número de un quinto premio, el más madrugador, que se ha cantado a las 9.33 de la mañana. Dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: Notebook: Richt has no comment on King's status for bowl
description.content: A day after Caleb King was seen practicing as the fourth-string tailback, Georgia coach Mark Richt would not shed any light on the Bulldogs' second-leading rusher's status for the Liberty Bowl.

description.hltext_display: Lože navike: Zbog cigareta i brze hrane izgledamo četiri godine starije
description.content:
24SI - Da starosna dob postaje sve relativniji pojam, napokon je i naučno dokazano. Užurbani život, alkohol i cigarete u svijetu su uzrokovale epidemiju starenja među mladim ženama, zbog čega stanje njihovog tijela ne odgovara starosnoj dobi.
Zbog preranog starenja brojne moderne žene izgledaju u prosjeku četiri godine starije od svoje stvarne dobi, a najvie primjera tog trenda primjećeno je na sjeverozapadu Evrope.Prema istraživanju u kome je učestvovalo vie od osam hiljada žena, za stariji izgled najzaslužnije su cigarete, konzumiranje alkohola, nezdrava hrana, solariji i nebriga za kožu. Neka od zanimljivijih saznanja o navikama savremene žene su da jedna na pet ispitanica uopte ne koristi kreme za kožu, njih četvrtina dva do tri puta sedmično jede brzu hranu, a u prosjeku svaka ispitanica godinje popui 894 cigareta, pie Tportal.Isto je istraživanje pokazalo da u prosjeku 10 minuta dnevno, odnosno dva i pol dana svake godine brinemo o starenju.

description.hltext_display: Plácido Domingo feiert 3500. Opern-Vorstellung
description.content:
Wien (dpa) - Ein Blumenregen, eine riesige Torte und Glückwünsche an den «Weltmeister der Oper»: Startenor Plácido Domingo hat am Dienstagabend in Wien seine 3500. Opern-Vorstellung gefeiert.
«Ich bin glücklich, stolz und dankbar, dass ich dieses Ereignis hier feiern kann», sagte der Künstler bei einem Fest im Anschluss an die letzte Vorstellung der Oper «Il Postino» im Theater an der Wien. Der 69-Jährige, der im Frühjahr eine Krebsoperation überstanden hat, kündigte an: «Ich werde wiederkommen und alle meine Pläne verwirklichen».
Zahlreiche Künstlerkollegen, Fans und Freunde feierten mit dem spanischen Musiker. «Nach meiner 700. Vorstellung, das war 'La Traviata' in New York, habe ich beschlossen, immer nach 100 Aufführungen eine Party zu feiern», erzählte Domingo. «Mittlerweile habe ich überall auf der Welt gefeiert». Mitarbeiter des Theaters an der Wien überreichten dem Sänger eine große Torte, auf der ein stilisierter Bühnenvorhang zu sehen war. In schwarzen Buchstaben stand darauf: «3500 Vorstellungen - Der Weltmeister der Oper».

description.hltext_display: Opinión: La obsesión de Soria con la jueza Rosell / Rafael González Morera
description.content:
La petición de Soria a la dirección nacional del Partido Popular de que presente una queja por la supuesta actuación de la jueza Rosell en el caso salmón revela de entrada la perturbación anímica que sufre el presidente canario de los “populares”, con una idea que con tenaz persistencia asalta su mente. Me viene a la memoria unas palabras de Woody Allen: “El mago hizo un gesto y desapareció el hambre, hizo otro gesto y desapareció la injusticia, hizo otro gesto y se acabo la guerra. El político hizo un gesto y desapareció el mago”. La exmagistrada Manuela Carmena, de gran prestigio entre todos los jueces@s, escribió recientemente un artículo con motivo de su pre-jubilación titulado “Reinventar la justicia”, en el cual en un párrafo final decía que “la justicia ha sido, y sigue siendo, lo suficientemente importante para que podamos renunciar a cuestionarla. El pasado verano se publicó un libro de Amartya Sen sobre la justicia, en el que nos dice “no podemos confiar la tarea de la justicia a situaciones y reglas sociales que estimamos correctas para detenernos ahí. Preguntar cómo van las cosas y si pueden mejorar es una parte ineludible de la búsqueda de la justicia”.
Para José Manuel Soria la justicia es una forma difusa y hasta confusa de contribuir a sus intereses políticos. Pero lo que me parece claro y diáfano es que se equivoca constantemente cuando trata de poner la justicia a su favor. Porque una cosa es que pueda eludir un caso concreto, y otra muy distinta que pueda superar a todo el tsunami que se le viene encima. Dijo Reveillere que lo que consideramos justicia es, con mucha frecuencia, una injusticia cometida en nuestro favor. En eso en muchos sumarios en donde ha estado metido este bandido político es lo que realmente ha ocurrido, que se ha cometido muchas injusticias en su favor. Lo que para mi está claro es que Soria cuando no le gusta un fallo de un juez@ pone el grito en el cielo, y recientemente ha llegado a decir que tanto de aquí a las elecciones de mayo de 2011 los ataques de policías y jueces se van a multiplicar.
Ahora Soria se mete en otro berenjenal acusando a la jueza Victoria Rosell, en un patinazo incomprensible que sólo ha hecho activar de nuevo, de momento periodísticamente, el caso salmón. En lo que a mi se refiere no estoy de acuerdo en absoluto con la jueza Margarita Varona y su veredicto en el caso salmón, pero evidentemente tengo que acatar el fallo, y lo que me repatea es que Soria aprovechándose que es un político aforado, y también desaforado, juega a su favor incluso a nivel de opinión con tantos sumarios que tiene abiertos y en los que está implicado hasta el cuello a nivel político, desde Eolo, Faycan, Góndola, Grupo Europa, etc, y los últimos de la Consejería de Sanidad, por los cuales está muy nervioso y trata de confundir con esta denuncia a la jueza Victoria Rosell. Pero todo se va clarificando, y al final espero que se haga luz en el oscuro túnel de las maniobras sorianas.

description.hltext_display: It all adds up
description.content:
COEUR d'ALENE - In 2006 Brian Tenney moved back to Coeur d'Alene and began doing tax returns for family and a few friends.
In July of 2009, Tenney was out of town at a training class when two different business clients called him on his cell phone in a panic.
Their outside bookkeepers had caused some problems with the IRS, and then quit responding to their voicemails and e-mails. They both asked Tenney to take over the payroll and bookkeeping for their businesses, and get them "straightened out."
He did, and so launched his business, "CORE Accounting and Consulting," from primarily tax return preparation into a full-service accounting firm. It turned out to be a great move for both Tenney and his clients. His customer base has grown in leaps and bounds each year since and there's no end in sight.
Tenney graduated from the University of Idaho in 1998 with a degree in accounting. He started his career by working for the Spokane office of Price Waterhouse Coopers, the largest accounting firm in the world, where he primarily worked on audits of large publicly traded companies.
In 2000, he moved back to Moscow to work for a regional firm, Presnell Gage Accounting & Consulting. There he specialized in small business accounting, tax and consulting. In 2006 he moved to Coeur d'Alene and worked as assistant controller of Great Floors, a locally owned retail chain.
That was when he started his own CPA practice as a side business, which has since grown into a full-time endeavor with four part-time employees.
Tenney said that starting a business from scratch is not for the faint of heart. It's a multi-year investment of time, effort and money, and you most likely will not reap the rewards for several years.
Keeping your eye on the long-term goal will help you overcome the day-to-day frustrations and disappointments.
Working alone, Tenney had kept everything he needed to remember in his head. Unfortunately, employees aren't great mind-readers, which makes communication and training very important.
"Unfortunately, we accountants too often focus on the numbers and not enough on the people we are serving," he said. "I've worked hard to overcome that in my business. I have a great relationship with all my clients."
Tenney attended classes at the Idaho Small Business Development Center looking for guidance on his business strategy, growth strategy, and to learn how to run a business more effectively. He learned how to identify which types of services he should focus his attention on developing and growing the most aggressively.
CORE Accounting and Consulting is at 105 S. Sixth St., Coeur d'Alene, 83814, (208) 676-8900, www.corecpa.net.

description.hltext_display: Littwin: Segregation impossible to forget
description.content:
I'm a little younger than Haley Barbour, the governor of Mississippi who's considering a run for president.
So maybe my memory is slightly better.
In Barbour's memory, as you've probably heard, the Mississippi of his youth at the height of the civil rights movement was apparently idyllic. I guess he didn't read the papers. In any case, he must have missed Mississippian William Faulkner's famous line "The past is not dead. It's not even past."
What we do know is that in a warmly lit profile in The Weekly Standard, Barbour was asked about his youth in Yazoo City, Miss., during civil rights days.
"I just don't remember it as being that bad," he said. As if to make the point, he cited a visit that he recalls Martin Luther King Jr. making to Yazoo City in 1962.
"He spoke out at the old fairground," Barbour said, "and it was full of people black and white." Maybe it happened that way, blacks and whites coming together in 1962 Mississippi. Barbour said he was there, but that he was too busy checking out girls to recall much.
He was a little older in 1970 when Yazoo City schools were finally integrated by court order. When asked why there was no violence then, Barbour credited his local Citizens Council, which he said kept the Klan away. Unfortunately, he forgot to mention that these councils were pro-segregationist and blocked racial progress at every turn.
Barbour, seeing the political damage, has issued a clarification, noting that the councils and segregation were "indefensible." In today's world, people like Newt Gingrich and Tom Tancredo like to toss around the word "racist" to describe people like Sonia Sotomayor. Barbour knows what real racism is. He was born in Mississippi in 1947.
He grew up during the Jim Crow era, when blacks couldn't sit in the front of the bus or, in some states, legally play checkers with a white person in a public square. He grew up when violence against peaceful protest was commonplace, when governors stood on school steps to block integration, when little girls were blown up by terrorists.
And Mississippi was at the center of it.
In 1962, James Meredith's integration of Ole Miss led to riots, in which two were killed and scores injured. Federal troops and the National Guard were called in. There are still bullet holes in some school buildings.
In 1963, Medgar Evers, the Mississippi field secretary for the NAACP, was gunned down in his driveway. Evers was getting out of his car when he was shot, carrying T-shirts that said "Jim Crow Must Go."
In 1964, the Freedom Summer, there was a massive attempt to register black voters in Mississippi. At that point, black registration in the state was 6.2 percent. Beatings were routine. Churches were routinely burned down. And three civil rights workers James Chaney, Michael Schwerner and Andrew Goodman were investigating a church burning when they were shot and killed near Philadelphia, Miss.
This was apartheid, and no issue was too small. In 1963, Mississippi State was invited to play in the NCAA basketball tournament, but couldn't because it might have to play an integrated team. But despite a court order, the team snuck out of town to play integrated Loyola of Chicago. Yes, it was just that bad. And I'll bet Barbour, all these years later, can recall every detail.
In 1962, I lived in Newport News, Va. as a Yankee somehow deposited in the South. I was in eighth grade and on the debate team. Our topic: Should public schools be integrated? This wasn't the Deep South, but we had one black student. He played halfback.
The state legislature had tried to close public schools rather than integrate. The courts forced them open, but segregation separate but equal was everywhere. There were separate sports leagues. There were separate band competitions. There were separate debate tournaments.
My father, who had worked at the local newspaper, put me in touch with an editorial writer there who showed me, in the pre-Google days, how to use microfilm. When I finished, a woman was there in his office. She asked what I was doing, and I told her I was researching a debate on integration.
When she asked which side I was taking, I said, innocently, "I'm pro-integration."
"How would your mother like it," she said, and I find it stunning even today, "if you brought home a little colored girl?"
It would be years before I would bring home a girl of any color, but I summoned up a reply: "I don't know, but I'm sure my dad would think it's fine."
When I got home, my parents were bent over laughing. They told me I had been talking to the owner of the newspaper.
The next day, my debate coach asked what I'd done. The newspaper owner had called the superintendent of schools, who called my high school principal, who called in the debate coach, who was told there would be no debate on integration. And there wasn't.
The world would change. Years later, Virginia would elect the country's first black governor since Reconstruction. I had long since moved away. But when I wrote a column about the governor and about the non- debate, it would run in my hometown paper.
I'll never forget it. Not even Haley Barbour could forget it.
Mike Littwin writes Sundays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Reach him at 303-954-5428 or mlittwin@denverpost.com.

description.hltext_display: Lindsay Lohan droht schon wieder Haft
description.content:
Los Angeles/New York (dpa) - Ein handgreiflicher Streit könnte Lindsay Lohan schon wieder ins Gefängnis bringen. Die Schauspielerin soll vor mehr als einer Woche mit einer Betreuerin in der Betty-Ford- Klinik aneinandergeraten sein, in der sie als Teil einer Verurteilung ihre Drogensucht auskurieren soll.
Nach Angaben des Internetdienstes «TMZ» vom Dienstag stritt die 24-Jährige mit der Frau, letztlich habe es eine «physische Auseinandersetzung» gegeben. Die Betreuerin hat nun gegen Lohan Anzeige erstattet - und das könnte für die Schauspielerin mit einem halben Jahr Gefängnis enden. Denn Lohan steht immer noch unter Bewährung. Vor fast vier Jahren war sie gleich zweimal mit Kokain in der Tasche und Alkohol am Steuer erwischt worden. Die Strafe: einige Stunden Gefängnis, drei Jahre auf Bewährung und Entziehungskuren. Wegen ständiger Vor- und Rückfälle steht sie immer noch unter der Bewährung.

description.hltext_display: Consumi: Isae, a dicembre fiducia migliora per quarto mese di fila
description.content: Roma, 22 dic. - (Adnkronos) - I consumatori italiani si mostrano sempre piu' ottimisti sul lato dei consumi con pareri favorevoli sull'evoluzione del paese, del mercato del lavoro e sulla convenienza di acquisto di beni durevoli. E' quanto emerge dall'indagine congiunturale svolta dall'Isae a dicembre che segnala un aumento della fiducia rispetto al mese precedente (l'indice passa da18,5 punti a 109,1, miglior risultato dallo scorso gennaio) e in crescita per il quarto mese consecutivo.

description.hltext_display: Farfan: Zeer tevreden
description.content: AUGSBURG - "Het was een zware wedstrijd, met aan het einde godzijdank een gunstig resultaat", concludeerde Jefferson Farfan opgelucht, nadat hij Schalke 04 dinsdagavond naar de kwartfinales had geschoten ten koste van FC Augsburg (0-1). De voormalige PSV'er en ploeggenoot van Klaas-Jan Huntelaar scoorde tot nog toe drie van de vier doelpunten voor Schalke in de beker. "Daarover ben ik natuurlijk zeer tevreden, maar het belangrijkste is dat het elftal weer goed speelt", bleef de Peruaanse aanvaller in Augsberg bescheiden.

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks protesters gather in Sydney
description.content: THE fight for free speech has only just begun, a Sydney rally in support of whistleblower website WikiLeaks and its founder Julian Assange has been told.

description.hltext_display: Nike: nel II trimestre Eps salito oltre le attese a 0,94 dollari
description.author: news@borse.it
description.content:
Le notizie di Borse.it via SMS: abbonati a Borse.it Club Gold e acquista i pacchetti di SMS - Info e costi
Nike batte le stime degli analisti, ma gli ordini futuri non centrano le attese. Nel secondo trimestre dell'esercizio fiscale 2011 il gruppo Usa dell'abbigliamento sportivo ha registrato un utile netto di 457 milioni di dollari, ossia 0,94 dollari per azione, contro i 375,4 milioni di dollari, ossia 0,77 dollari per azione, dell'analogo periodo dell'esercizio precedente. Le attese degli analisti erano ferme a un utile per azione (Eps) di 0,88 dollari. A deludere invece è stata la stima sugli ordini futuri tra dicembre e aprile che dovrebbero salire dell'11% a 7,7 miliardi di dollari, contro le previsioni degli analisti pari a un +11,6%.

description.hltext_display: Product reviews: Petzl Tikka Plus 4-LED Headlamp E47P
description.author: Lindsay Grahaem
description.content:
Whether you're planning a camping trip, or just have your mind set on some outdoor pursuits, a head lamp such as the Petzl 4-LED Headlamp Tikka Plus is a crucial bit of equipment. Although standard handheld torches are very useful, for many people a headtorch is preferable as it enables you to use both hands and go about your jobs as normal, without one hand being automatically taken up by holding the torch.
Petzl are a well known brand in camping circles, famous for their outdoor activity equipment and their products are widely available both online and in camping and outdoor activity shops, usually retailing around $50 US. Although this could sound expensive when compared to standard torches, this is infact very good value as Petzl products are known to be extremely reliable and durable.
Now, no one wearing a headtorch is ever going to look like a fashion icon, it's not possible. In terms of looks though, the Petzl 4-LED Headlamp Tikka Plus tries it's best, with it's camo-esque design being as pleasant to look at as possible and being quite unisex in appearance. In terms of wearing the headtorch, the item is very comfortable and lightweight, and it's quite easy to forget you're wearing it. The wide band of the strap reduces the pressure on your head, so despite it being elasticated, it doesn't dig in or cause headaches, even when wearing for prolonged periods of time. The headtorch lamp is also waterproof, meaning that you can use the Tikka Plus in wet weather conditions without worrying that the electrics are going to suffer.
The Tikka Plus features four powerful LEDs which pack quite a punch, and are flexible in their use thanks to a range of 4 unique settings. The first three light settings range from a spot-light like effect, where the immediate area in front of the torch is very brightly lit, to an effect where the light is cast up to 32 metres in front on maximum setting - obviously the light diminishes over this distance, but it's good for illuminating a large area and is good for travelling in low light conditions.
The 4th setting is also very valuable in a torch that's clearly going to be used for outdoor activities, and is an excellent safety feature; when on this setting the LED lights flash on and off, attracting attention to the torch and its wearer. The flashing light is very noticeable and could prove to be a life saver, although hopefully you'll never be in a position to need this setting! In terms of the bulbs in the LEDs themselves, Petzl assure the buyer that they will last a lifetime's worth of use. Battery wise, the torch uses 3 triple A batteries to power the lights, and a set is included with the torch when you buy it. Even on the maximum setting, the batteries are stated as lasting 100 hours of continuous use.
On camping trips and in power cuts alike, the Petzl LED Headlamp Tikka Plus serves its users well. This very durable, useful device is an invaluable piece of outdoor equipment.

description.hltext_display: Caamaño muestra respeto ante la decisión del CGPJ
description.content:
LAS PALMAS DE GRAN CANARIA. - ACN PRESS
Compartir:
El ministro de Justicia, Francisco Caamaño, ha explicado este lunes que tiene conocimiento de la denuncia que el presidente del Partido Popular (PP) de Canarias, José Manuel Soria, presentó este lunes ante el Consejo General del Poder Judicial (CGPJ) contra la juez Victoria Rosell.
Caamaño, que ofreció una conferencia en Las Palmas de Gran Canaria sobre la reforma del Código Penal que entrará en vigor el próximo 23 de diciembre, precisó sin embargo que respetará “las decisiones que pueda adoptar ese órgano”, el de máxima representación y gobierno de la judicatura.
Soria registró este lunes en Madrid, acompañado de la secretaria general de los populares, María Dolores de Cospedal y del secretario de Justicia del partido, Federico Trillo, una denuncia contra la jueza, a la que acusan haber tomado parte en la elaboración de la querella presentada contra el máximo representante del PP en Canarias y abrió el conocido como caso Salmón, finalmente archivado.
