description.hltext_display: 73.684: segundo quinto premio del día
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. 58.697 es el número de un quinto premio, el más madrugador, que se ha cantado a las 9.33 de la mañana. Dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: 37,000 tickets sold for Little Caesar's Pizza Bowl Dec. 26
description.content:
Despite one of the game's participating schools having trouble selling tickets, approximately 37,000 tickets have been sold so far for the Little Caesar's Pizza Bowl on Dec. 26 at Ford Field.
That's according to Ken Hoffman, the bowl's chairman and executive director.
The game, known as the Motor City Bowl until the Detroit-based pizza chain picked up the naming rights last year, will pit the University of Toledo (8-4) against Florida International University (6-6).
Kickoff is at 8:30 p.m. and the game will be televised live on ESPN.
The Sun Belt Conference gave Florida International — appearing in its first bowl game — a $300,000 bowl appearance prize to offset the fact that the school has sold less than 1,000 tickets to game, the Miami Herald reported on Dec. 16.
The past 13 bowls have averaged 46,000 in announced attendance. The biggest crowd was 60,624 for Purdue University's 51-48 thriller over Central Michigan University in 2007.
The smallest was last year's 30,331 to see Marshall University beat Ohio University 21-17.
The money given to FIU will be used to help offset the team's travel expenses.
Florida Atlantic and Toledo will each get $750,000 for appearing in the bowl, but that amount is based on how many tickets the school sells, the newspaper reported.
Without the stipend from the conference, the Golden Panthers may have taken a considerable financial loss on the game.
The Sun Belt reportedly gave Conference co-champion Troy University $250,000 for its 48-21 victory over Ohio University in the New Orleans Bowl on Dec. 18. The conference also gave Middle Tennessee State for its Jan. 6 game against Miami University in the GoDaddy.com Bowl (formerly the GMAC Bowl).

description.hltext_display: Sports Briefs December 21, 2010
description.content:
Ralph Friedgen was fired as Maryland's football coach Monday, effective after the Military Bowl on Dec. 29.
Friedgen received $2 million to cover the final year of his contract in 2011. Athletic director Kevin Anderson intended to immediately form a search committee to find Friedgen's replacement, and acknowledged that former Texas Tech coach Mike Leach is on his preliminary list.
During his 10 years at his alma mater, Friedgen went 74-50.
• Former NFL quarterback Ryan Leaf is planning to will write three books about his life, football career and addiction to painkillers.
The first book will focus on Leaf's career at Washington State, including the team's 1998 Rose Bowl appearance. Another book will be a broader biography covering his youth in Montana and troubled NFL career. A third book will be about his addiction to prescription painkillers, which resulted in a 2009 indictment while he was coaching quarterbacks at West Texas A&M.
In April, Leaf pleaded guilty to eight felony drug charges and received 10 years of probation.
Baseball
A person familiar with the deal said reliever Luis Vizcaino agreed to a minor league contract with the New York Yankees.
• Outfielder Rick Ankiel and the Washington Nationals agreed to a $1.5 million, one-year contract.
Mavericks 98, Heat 96: Dirk Nowitzki scored 26 points and visiting Dallas ended Miami's 12-game winning streak.
Dwyane Wade scored 22 points, while LeBron James and Chris Bosh each scored 19 for Miami.
Hawks 91, Magic 81: Al Horford scored 24 points and host Atlanta beat Orlando.
Jazz 101, Cavaliers 90: CJ Miles scored 22 points and visiting Utah beat Cleveland.
Pacers 94, Hornets 93: At Indianapolis, Mike Dunleavy's tip-in at the buzzer gave Indiana a win over New Orleans.
Spurs 118, Suns 110: Tim Duncan had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and host San Antonio beat undermanned Phoenix for its ninth win in a row.
Wizards 108, Bobcats 75: Nick Young scored 21 points in host Washington's win over Charlotte.
Trail Blazers 106, Bucks 80: LaMarcus Aldridge had 29 points and a career-high 19 rebounds, and host Portland beat Milwaukee.
Rockets 121, Warriors 112: At Oakland, Calif., Kevin Martin scored 30 points to lead Houston past Golden State.
Clippers 113, Timberwolves 90: Michael Beasley score 20 points and host Los Angeles beat Minnesota.
Penguins 6, Coyotes 1: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with five points and host Pittsburgh beat Phoenix.
Panthers 5, Flyers 0: Tomas Vokoun earned his fourth shutout of the season to lead visiting Florida past Philadelphia.
Thrashers 6, Maple Leafs 3: Tobias Enstrom had two goals and two assists and visiting Atlanta beat Toronto.
Ducks 3, Bruins 0: Jonas Hiller stopped 45 shots to lead visiting Anaheim over Boston.
Lightning 5, Hurricanes 1: Steven Stamkos scored his 26th goal, leading host Tampa Bay past Carolina.
Canucks 3, Blues 1: Aaron Volpatti scored his first career goal as visiting Vancouver beat St. Louis.
Wild 4, Flames 1: At St. Paul, Minn., Martin Havlat had a goal and an assist to help Minnesota defeat Calgary.
- The Associated Press

description.hltext_display: STX OSV takes full control of subsidiary at $6.6m
description.content:
Recently listed STX OSV Holdings says it will buy 30 percent of the shares in STX OSV Singapore from Amanda Shipyards for S$6.6 million.
This raises its shareholding to 100 percent, giving the company full control of the subsidiary.
The shipbuilder says that the acquisition will help in developing its businesses in Singapore and Vietnam.
Currently it operates a shipyard in Vietnam with 650 employees with an orderbook of six vessels scheduled for delivery.
In the company’s IPO prospectus, it says about $14.6 million out of the estimated $131.6 million raised from its initial public offering will be used for investments in emerging markets.
It expects the transaction to be completed by the end of this year.

description.hltext_display: Giappone: Boj vede una pausa nella ripresa economica
description.author: news@borse.it
description.content: "L'economia giapponese mostra ancora segnali di recupero, ma la ripresa sembra essersi fermata momentaneamente". Questa la fotografia odierna scattata dalla Bank of Japan (Boj), secondo cui le esportazioni rimangono poco mosse, gli utili societari crescono ma a ritmo lento e la situazione sul mercato del lavoro è piuttosto severa. "L'economia del Giappone dovrebbe crescere a un ritmo più lento per un certo periodo, ma poi dovrebbe tornare sulla strada di una ripresa moderata".

description.hltext_display: Three useful items you should always keep around the house
description.author: Angie Pollock
description.content:
Around your home are dozens of useful items that some throw away. Some items we purchase for a specific use not thinking they can be used for other household tasks. These common items usually found in every home can come in handy when the unexpected happens.
Duct Tape
Sometimes referred to the handymans cure-all, duct tape has many uses besides holding something together. Duct tape is typically used for temporary fixes like patching a hose or covering a hole in a window screen but this sticky wonder has many other uses. Not just a handyman tool, duct tape can be used for a variety of other tasks. Temporary clothes hem If the hem of your pants, skirt, or dress is coming undone, use duct tape to help hold the hem in place until it can be mended. Remove lint Are you spending $4 for a lint roller brush? Duct tape works just as well (if not better) than a lint roller and will last longer than those small lint roller brushes thus saving you some money. Fly catchers Those long hanging fly catchers are not cheap. A strip of duct tape placed where flies like to congregate will work at catching those pesky pests.
Fabric Softener Sheets Over the years, weve learned about the many uses for fabric softener sheets. The uses for these scented sheets go beyond clothing and can be used all around the house. Dusting The cling action that dryer sheets have are perfect for dusting especially plastic surfaces. Deodorizer Add dryer sheets to your dresser drawers or even your car. The scent can help remove musty odors and add a fresh smell to your clothing and vehicle. You can also place dryer sheets to the bottom of hampers and trash cans to help eliminate bad odors. Air freshener Expecting company and want to freshen the room? Place dryer sheets inconspicuously like under chairs and cushions to add a fresh scent to the area. Storage Before storing away suitcases, place a fabric softener sheet inside to help reduce musty smells. You can also place dryer sheets between bed linens prior to storing so that they smell fresh the next time you change the sheets.
Carpet Scraps
Typically considered as useless, carpet scraps can be one of the most useful items for around the house. Small squares of carpet scraps or remnants are perfect for padding and protection. Padding Use carpet scraps for protecting your knees when you are scrubbing floors or while weeding the flowerbeds. Anytime you need to protect your knees, use a piece of carpeting your knees will thank you! If you have large enough piece of carpet, you can make a nifty exercise mat. The carpet can easily be rolled up and stored away when you are done. And a great tip is to keep a piece of carpet scrap with your spare tire. If you should have a flat, you have some protection for your knees against the hard ground. Protection Use carpet scraps to protect wood floors from furniture scratches or as instant car mats. You can also make a cat-scratching post to keep your pet from scratching your furniture. Just attach the carpet scraps to a board and lean against a wall or attach a base and make a freestanding scratch post.
There are many items that we have around the house that we take for granted and even dispose of before giving them a new life. So the next time you have a task at hand, think outside the box. Use some of those typical items hiding under the kitchen sink for a new purpose you might just save yourself some time and money.

description.hltext_display: En el PP ''están dispuestos absolutamente a todo''
description.content:
LAS PALMAS DE GRAN CANARIA. - CANARIAS AHORA
Compartir:
José Luis Ramírez de Jueces para la Democracia lamenta que algunas formaciones políticas ataquen "al jugador, y no al balón".
''La campaña contra la juez Rosell continúa''
Caamaño muestra respeto ante la decisión del CGPJ
El PP presenta la queja contra la juez Rosell
Los fiscales censuran las campañas contra los jueces
El TSJC remite al CGPJ el escrito de la juez Rosell
Ruano dice que ''hay dos temas mezclados''
''Correcta'' custodia del disco duro de Rosell
Rosell resalta la coincidencia de la campaña de 'El Mundo' con la declaración de Palop
Opinión: José Miguel Ruano ''asegura'' el Atlante / Rafael González Morera
Opinión: La obsesión de Soria con la jueza Rosell / Rafael González Morera
Pdf: Comunicado de Jueces para la Democracia
Pdf: Escrito del TSJC
Audio: José Luis Ramírez, en 'El Correíllo'
José Luis Ramírez, portavoz nacional de la asociación Jueces para la Democracia, ha asegurado que el "problema" de algunas formaciones políticas es que, en términos futbolísticos, atacan "al jugador, y no al balón" cuando deberían "limitarse" a defenderse en el ámbito de las causas judicales.
Se refería así, en declaraciones al programa El Correíllo de CANARIAS AHORA RADIO, a la decisión del Partido Popular de elevar una queja ante el Consejo General del Poder Judicial (CGPJ) en contra de la juez Victoria Rosell. Dijo Ramírez que los populares deberían "dar solución a los graves problemas de corrupción en sus filas" antes que ver "la paja en el ojo ajeno".
"Están dispuestos absolutamente a todo", concluyó José Luis Ramírez respecto al PP, lamentando este "ataque" a la portavoz de Jueces para la Democracia en Canarias.

description.hltext_display: 光の街へ３０００ｋｍ【東京→香港】 Ｌｉｋｅ ａ Ｓｙｍｐｈｏｎｙ〜海外第２弾★香港・マカオの旅〜１
Blaze pushes on despite depleted team
description.content:
BLAZE superstar Mark Worthington has ended the injury talk and implored his troops to remember there are no bonus points for losing with a depleted team.
The Gold Coast will fly to Wollongong today with just eight fit players, from a potential 10-man squad, but Worthington said he had had enough of injury talk and declared the squad still had the firepower to win matches."We still have the quality players," he said. "We can make excuses as much as we like, but you don't get an asterix next to the losses you have with players missing." Much has been made of the club's youthful squad, but Worthington pointed out only one of the eight men heading south is genuinely inexperienced."I still think the young guys, minus Brendan Teys, have been around a while; we have high expectations of them."The championship-winning player has a point. Worthington is a genuine superstar of the game, co-captain Adam Gibson was a starting five player at the World Championships, Ira Clark is a strong import.
Chris Goulding is in career best form and coach Joey Wright yesterday hinted the 22-year-old had carried the side at stages.
American Darryl Hudson had his best game for the Blaze last week."We have the players there," Worthington said.The Australian Boomer acknowledged Stephen Hoare's loss was still a blow."Unfortunately the guy we have lost is our best rebounder," he said.Big man Pero Vasiljevic trained strongly yesterday, but is not expected to be ready for the Hawks clash.
The Blaze need to be with the Hawks at three-quarter time, something the club has done in their past three matches.
The Gold Coast has worked hard on their starts and has led or been within five points at the final break every match in the past month."It's been a decent turnaround. We were down by 15, 20 points at stages early in the season, we've been giving ourselves an opportunity recently," Worthington said.The Hawks' 15-game winning streak at home came crashing down at the hands of New Zealand on Friday night and the Blaze will look to capitalise on any mental scars which linger after their fortress cracked.

description.hltext_display: Zapatero: El ataque de los mercados no responde a fundamentos
description.content:
Los ataques de los mercados financieros que afectan a España no se justifican por los rasgos fundamentales de la economía doméstica, dijo el miércoles el presidente del Gobierno español.
"No cabe duda de que la reacción actual de los mercados financieros está afectando a España, una reacción que, en nuestra opinión, no responde a los fundamentos actuales de nuestra economía", dijo José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero en el Congreso.
Zapatero señaló que la petición de ayuda por parte de Irlanda al fondo europeo de rescate y las dudas sobre las pruebas de resistencia a la banca europea son los factores fundamentales que han generado las renovadas tensiones financieras, aumentando los diferenciales de la deuda soberana en los países de la periferia de la zona euro, entre ellos España.
A las 09:34 horas, el diferencial de la deuda española a 10 años respecto a su equivalente alemán se situaba en torno a los 259 puntos básicos.

description.hltext_display: 360安全卫士修复微软Outlook问题补丁
description.content:
近日，微软官方网站发布公告指出，12月漏洞修复中存在一个可能导致Outlook 2007出现故障的补丁程序，并建议已安装该补丁的用户尽快将其卸载，并通过官方产品博客向受影响的用户郑重道歉。12月22日，360安全中心宣布针对微软召回的补丁提供“一键自动修复”服务，帮助360用户快速、安全地卸载此补丁。据悉，大约有数百万中国电脑用户受到了微软召回补丁事件的影响。
根据微软公告，用户电脑在安装编号为KB2412171的补丁后，可能导致Outlook 2007出现文件夹之间切换缓慢、自动存档功能故障，以及发送或接收邮件时出错等问题。另据360安全中心验证，该补丁也可能导致Outlook 2007无法收取Gmail邮件。
鉴于此次Outlook 2007的补丁存在较为严重的质量缺陷，微软公司迅速停止了该补丁的下载服务，并在其官方网站分别针对Windows 7/Vista和Windows XP用户提供了如何卸载补丁的说明。凡是已经安装该补丁的电脑，用户可以参考微软官方说明手工卸载，也可以通过360安全卫士自动检测并进行卸载，以便解决该补丁可能导致的软件故障。
图：360安全卫士可自动修复微软召回的Outlook 2007问题
360安全专家石晓虹博士表示：“任何程序都可能出现错误，召回补丁的事件也早有先例。按照以往经验，微软公司很快会发布更新的补丁解决问题。对360安全卫士来说，我们不光为用户打补丁，还要对用户的电脑负责任，帮用户卸载掉存在问题的补丁。”
石晓虹透露说，除了此次配合微软召回问题补丁之外，360安全卫士最新的7.6Beta版还推出一项“360补丁智能恢复功能”：一旦用户在安装微软补丁后出现蓝屏或系统无法启动等严重故障，该功能可以帮助用户把系统快速恢复到正常状态，有了这项灾备预防措施，就可以放心安装任何补丁，而不用再担心电脑打补丁后出现问题。
附：微软官方网站关于KB2412171补丁程序的说明
http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2485531

description.hltext_display: 海尔全系列PC机预装360安全所有产品
description.content:
一个是全球白色家电第一品牌，一个是国内最大的安全厂商，海尔与360近日在京宣布结成战略合作伙伴，将于12月30日起在海尔全系列PC机中预装包括360安全卫士、360杀毒、360安全浏览器和360保险箱在内的全线产品。这也是距上周360宣布在联想扬天系列电脑中首次预装定制版360软件后，与硬件厂商达成的第二次深度合作。
海尔电脑作为世界白色家电第一品牌海尔集团下属的核心产品之一，担负着海尔品牌年轻化、时尚化、科技化的历史使命，是海尔集团适应未来3C融合和移动互联网时代到来的重要武器。在经过不间断的产品技术开发与创新后，从2009年开始，海尔电脑更是抓住了家电下乡、“以旧换新”等历史性机会，取得了令人瞩目的业绩。
根据商务部最新家电下乡销售数据，从2009年3月进入电脑下乡市场至今，海尔电脑已经连续17个月处于“电脑下乡”品牌的领先位置。今年第一轮家电下乡至今，海尔更是稳居销售榜前两位。
“实践证明，在产品硬件和市场营销上，我们都经受住了考验。下一步，我们将把目光转向电脑的软件安全。众所周知，电脑安全包括硬件安全和软件安全两方面，安全软件已经是电脑中不可或缺的必备软件了。360是目前国内最大的安全厂商，发展的非常好，技术上无可挑剔，更难得是完全免费，在老百姓中的口碑和人气都很旺，所以这次与360的合作也是民心所向。”海尔电脑市场部负责人说。
360市场负责人则表示：“我们经过研究发现，二、三线城市尤其是农村电脑‘裸奔’的现象非常严重，或是使用安全性和可靠性都不足的盗版杀毒软件，结果这些电脑全成了‘毒窝’，农村的孩子一上网，最先接触到的却是木马和病毒。海尔是中国家电下乡的第一品牌，和海尔的合作能把360带到需要它的地方去。让人人都用得起杀毒软件，让农村的孩子上网也安全，这是我们的理想，也是我们的责任。非常感谢海尔，给我们这个机会实现我们的理想。”
据了解，就在一周前，360刚刚宣布逐步开放软件平台，并与联想旗下扬天系列达成了首家定制版软件的预装合作。预计未来一段时间，与360展开深度合作的硬件厂商会越来越多，更多硬件厂商将从中受益。

description.hltext_display: Japão: alerta de tsunami reduzido
description.content:
Sismo de 7,4 registou-se a 130 quilómetros a nordeste da ilha de Chichijima
Vota
Resultado
PUB
Em actualização
O alerta de tsunami emitido nas ilhas Ogasawara, no Sul do Japão, após um sismo de magnitude 7,4 no Oceano Pacífico, foi reduzido a um aviso de ondas que não alcançarão os 50 centímetros, avança a agência «France Press».
Segundo uma mensagem da Agência Meteorológica do Japão, transmitida pelo canal público de televisão NHK, a primeira vaga de ondas deu-se às 03:11 (18:11 GMT), ao largo da costa da ilha de Chichishima, que faz parte das Ogasawara, localizada a cerca de mil quilómetros a sul de Tóquio, a capital japonesa.
Menos de uma hora depois, às 03:58, a Agência Meteorológica baixou o nível de alerta para um aviso simples.
Um sismo de magnitude de 7.4 na escala de Richter abalou esta terça-feira ilhas japonesas no sudeste do Pacífico. Abalo registou-se a 130 quilómetros a nordeste da ilha de Chichijima, a uma profundidade de 10 quilómetros.
Até ao momento não há registo de vítimas ou de danos materiais, de acordo com o canal NHK.

description.hltext_display: Aparece el cadáver de un hombre en un barranco de La Graciosa
description.content:
ARRECIFE. - ACN PRESS
Compartir:
El personal médico únicamente pudo confirmar el fallecimiento.
El cuerpo de un hombre sin vida de unos 75 años de edad ha aparecido este martes en el barranco de Los Conejos de la isla de La Graciosa.
A las 16:04 horas el Centro Coordinador de Emergencias y Seguridad (Cecoes)112 recibió una alerta que comunicaba que había aparecido el cuerpo sin vida de una persona en el citado barranco. El 112 activó de inmediato los recursos de emergencias necesarios.
Hasta el lugar se desplazó el médico del centro de salud, que únicamente pudo confirmar el fallecimiento del afectado. La Guardia Civil instruyó las diligencias correspondientes.

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: Attic fan: Improve attic ventilation for lower heating costs
description.author: Paradoxx Attic
description.content:
Attic fans are an cost effective way of cooling the attic, and thereby the whole house, with only minimum routine maintenance. They conveniently fit between rafters and can save you hundreds of dollars a year . Attic fans can be lifesavers during the summer months and help reduce premature deterioration of your roofs shingles. And are very simple to install in a couple of hours with a nominal level of skill.
Proper venting cools your roof, extending the material life and reduces the load on your air conditioning system. Passive roof vents installed in the gables of a house, are sadly insufficient at dissipating the heat build up in a house. The attic acts like a giant radiator, passing excess heat back into house and driving temperatures and cooling costs literally through the roof. If a damp smell is coming from the attic, there are probably some other hidden problems there, such as a roof leak or excessive moisture due to improper venting. A good sign of moisture problem is rusty roof nails sticking through the roof deck. Reduce your cooling costs and protect the integrity of your roof by using a properly installed attic fan to vent your attic, even during power outages.
Attic ventilation is not often at the top of a homeowner's to do list, but it should be. The amount of ventilation an attic needs is determined by many factors, but in general the more the ventilation your attic has, the better off you will be. During the hot summer months, attic temperatures can reach up to 200 degrees, and even though passive cooling systems, such as gable vents, can help disperse the heat, more efficient ventilation can be gained through the use of attic fans. A properly installed attic fans can increase the air flow by pulling in air outside of your home and pushing it out through attic vents. Since most attic fans are located high up on a roof, this design allows for excellent cross ventilation of the entire attic space. Better cooling performance means the potential for more energy savings for your home or business.

description.hltext_display: Detenidos once traficantes de heroína y cocaína en Canarias
description.content:
LAS PALMAS DE GRAN CANARIA. - EUROPA PRESS
Compartir:
La Policía se ha incautado de 10 kilogramos de cocaína, 100 gramos de heroína y 131.000 euros en metálico.
La UDYCO de la Brigada Provincial de Policía Judicial de Las Palmas, en colaboración con el Grupo de Estupefacientes de la Comisaría Local de Móstoles ha finalizado la fase de investigación de la Operación Volta, que se ha saldado con un total de 14 detenidos -10 en Gran Canaria, 3 en Madrid y 1 en Fuerteventura- por un presunto delito de tráfico de heroína y cocaína.
En un comunicado, la Jefatura Superior de Policía de Canarias informó que la investigación, iniciada en julio de 2010, se llevó a cabo en el entorno de una organización de nacionales de Ghana y Nigeria, con vínculos internacionales, que importaba heroína y cocaína utilizando correos humanos y distribuyéndola luego en el mercado a través de traficantes locales.
Así, en dicha operación se han detenido catorce encartados (diez en Gran Canaria, tres en Madrid y uno en Fuerteventura) e incautado a la organización en total, aproximadamente, 10 kilogramos de cocaína y 100 gramos de heroína, así como 131.000 euros en metálico.
El modus operandi que utilizaban era que una vez llegaba a España la droga procedente de Sudamérica y Holanda, la misma se almacenaba en la ciudad de Móstoles (Madrid) para la posterior remisión a Gran Canaria, donde la red delincuencial contaría con su principal línea de distribución.
En este sentido, desde el inicio de la investigación se pudo constatar que los principales investigados, una pareja de ghaneses de 50 y 54 años con numerosos antecedentes por tráfico de drogas, ubicados en esta capital, contactarían con dos personas diferentes que les proveían de la sustancia que precisaban para ser finalmente distribuida en Gran Canaria a los traficantes locales.
Mujeres y menores como correos
Por su parte, los principales suministradores, que mantenían la línea de suministro con Sudamérica y los Países Bajos, fueron identificados como C.I.A. y B.J.U., nigerianos de 28 y 34 años, quienes mantenían una infraestructura en la localidad madrileña de Móstoles para recibir y preparar la droga que más tarde remitían al archipiélago canario utilizando para ello a mujeres "correo" como transportistas tanto para los trayectos internacionales como domésticos.
Asimismo, destaca el hecho de que utilizaban incluso de forma consciente a menores de edad para realizar los transportes delicados.
Durante el mes de agosto se detectó que el Grupo enviaba a Colombia a una menor de edad para hacerse cargo del transporte de una maleta con sustancia estupefaciente. Con este modus operandi fueron detenidas cuatro de las "correos", dos en Barajas, que portaban unos siete kilos de cocaína en maletas con doble fondo, y dos en Gran Canaria, con unos ochocientos gramos de cocaína ingerida en cápsulas.
Almacenaban la droga en pisos
La droga remitida a las Islas Canarias era almacenada en pisos de seguridad donde la organización contaba con los colaboradores de nacionalidad nigeriana A.C.T., de 40 años y en libertad condicional por hechos similares, y C.M.Z., de 31 años, que se encargarían de custodiar y proveer a las personas con las que previamente la organización había gestionado la compra de la sustancia.
Se han practicado siete registros domiciliarios en la localidad de Móstoles y Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, en los cuales se incautaron cantidades cercanas a los tres kilos de cocaína, sustancia de corte, balanzas de precisión y diferente material utilizado para el tráfico de drogas, así como 131.000 euros en efectivo.
Finalmente, los detenidos pasaron a disposición del Juzgado de Instrucción seis de Las Palmas, que decretó el ingreso en prisión de diez de ellos.

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content:
Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne.
Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer.
"I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.
The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.
Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.
Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer.
"Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added.
"I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."
Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know.
"You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."
Copyright PA Sport 2010, All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: Galaxy's Donovan staying home during offseason
description.content:
CARSON - The Galaxy's Landon Donovan is staying put and forgoing the chance to be loaned to a European club for the third consecutive winter.
Donovan scored two goals in 13 matches during a loan to Everton from last January to March, and Everton manager David Moyes appeared open to having the 28-year-old return.
"While I enjoyed my time at Everton last season and still appreciate all the support their fans have given me, I feel that it is important to continue to rest and recover this offseason as opposed to going on loan," Donovan said in a statement Tuesday.
"I never considered being loaned to a club other than Everton, but I have been playing nearly nonstop for the past two years and I believe that this decision will allow me to perform at my best for the Galaxy and the national team throughout the upcoming year."
Donovan said during last month's MLS playoffs that overcoming mental fatigue was more challenging than dealing with the physical. Despite missing time for the World Cup, Donovan scored seven goals for the Galaxy and led MLS with 16 assists.
Also ...
Galaxy defenders A.J. DeLaGarza, Sean Franklin and Omar Gonzalez were selected for a U.S. national team training camp ahead of the Americans' exhibition against Chile. Six of the 24 players on the roster announced for the
Jan. 22 game in Carson have played just one game for the national team. Orebro midfielder Alejandro Bedoya is the senior player
on the roster with six international appearances. ... Houston Dynamo goalkeeper Pat Onstad, 42, retired to take an assistant coaching job at D.C United. He was the league's all-time leader in goals against average (1.12) among goalkeepers with at least 10,000 minutes and third overall.

description.hltext_display: The Parent 'Hood: Thank-you notes vs. true gratitude
description.content:
Every year, your kids complain about writing holiday thank-you notes. Are you really teaching them gratitude, or should you throw in the towel?
Parent advice:
Did you know that forcing yourself to smile actually makes you happier? I think the same thing applies to practicing gratitude. Even though your kids may not want to take the time to write out a note of thanks, it's important to teach them the value of expressing thanks to those who have been kind to them.
-Mary Rayis
I am forever indebted to my mother for making us write what seemed like endless thank-you notes. It established a habit for me that I still follow to this day. I have found that my own children may put off writing the notes, but once they get started, they are reminded of the pleasure of the gift they received and their relationship with the giver.
-Jennifer Polizzi
Stand firm on this one, or when they get married, you will be hearing from all the ticked-off relatives that they have not acknowledged the expensive candlesticks! But make it fun by letting them decorate the notes with stickers or choosing a photo of themselves that you include with their note.
-Dawn Lantero
Expert advice:
Meet your kids halfway on this one, says Mary O'Donohue, author of "When You Say 'Thank You,' Mean It ... And 11 Other Lessons for Instilling Lifelong Values in Your Children" (Adams Media, $16.95). Insist on the thank you, but not necessarily the note. But before you go insisting on anything, make sure your kids know what it's like to be on the receiving end of gratitude.
"When someone really appreciates something you've done, you feel so great," says O'Donohue. "If kids can relate to that feeling, they can understand why people love to feel appreciated."
Try stepping up your own gratitude expressing - sincerely, of course.
"Write a note in their lunchbox. Call home when they're with a baby sitter just to say thank you for something they did," says O'Donohue. "Give them a hug and say, 'I noticed you did that, and it made me feel so good. Thank you.'
"Then when it's time for thank-you notes for Hanukkah, Christmas, birthdays, I don't think you say, 'All right, you can't play with that toy until you write a note to Aunt Martha.' I think you say, 'Remember how good you felt when Dad gave you a big hug and said thank you for helping around the house? I want the person who gave you these wonderful gifts to feel that great.'"
Here's where compromising comes in.
"Say to your child, 'You got this great gift. What do you feel in your heart and how can you let the person know in a way that's personal to you? A thank-you note is one option, but I trust you can do this in a way that works for you,'" says O'Donohue. "The whole point is to really instill meaning in these values. When we tell our children, 'say thank you' or 'tell your friend you're sorry' or 'say please,' we're not teaching them to be thankful or remorseful or respectful. We're training them to appear that way. We don't want our kids to just say something and not mean it."
O'Donohue, a mom of two, speaks from experience.
"Forcing our kids and standing over them to write thank-you notes - believe me, I did this," she says. "I would feel so good when my son would say thank you, that it made me look like a good mom. But that's not ultimately what it's about.
"It's about our children and teaching them to say thank you because we want them to be grateful. But if we have to tell them 500 times, clearly it's not working."
Find "The Parent 'Hood" page on

description.hltext_display: Wall Street chiude in rialzo
description.author: news@borse.it
description.content: Seduta positiva a Wall Street. Gli indici a stelle e strisce hanno terminato gli scambi di ieri in rialzo, sostenuti dai risultati trimestrali positivi di alcune società e da alcune operazioni di M&A. L'indice Dow Jones ha guadagnato lo 0,48% a 11.533,16 punti, mentre l'S&P500 è avanzato dello 0,60% attestandosi a quota 1.254,60 e il Nasdaq ha incassato lo 0,68% a 2.667,61 punti.

description.hltext_display: Öcalan'dan Baydemir'e operasyon
description.content:
Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Osman Baydemir'in 'Silahlar miadını doldurdu' açıklamasının ardından Diyarbakır Belediyesi'nde eş başkanlık dönemi başladı.
Diyarbakır Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Osman Baydemir'in 'Silahlar miadını doldurdu' açıklaması Diyarbakır Belediyesi'nde eş başkanlık dönemini başlattı.Terörist Abdullah Öcalan'ın büyük tepkisine neden olan açıklamadan sonra "eş başkanlık" sistemi gündeme geldi. Büyükşehir Belediye Meclis Üyesi Hafize İpek, Osman Baydemir'e 'Başkan vekili' oldu.
Bazı çevreler tarafından 'Baydemir'in yetkilerinin tırpanlanması' olarak değerlendirilen operasyon ile daha önce 'Başkan vekili' olarak görev yapan avukat Metin Kılavuz görevden ayrıldı. Önceki gün göreve başlayan ve Baydemir ile 11 köye su verilmesi ile ilgili temel atma törenine katılan Hafize İpek, Diyarbakır Büyükşehir Belediye'sinin ilk kadın başkan vekili oldu.
DEMİRTAŞ'TAN AÇIKLAMA
BDP Genel Başkanı Selahattin Demirtaş, belediyelerdeki 'eş başkanlık sisteminin' Diyarbakır Belediyesi ve Baydemir'e özgü olmadığını belirterek,
"Bu sistem, birçok belediyede hayata geçilmeye başlanmıştır. Son tartışmalardan bağımsız, daha önce alınmış bir karardır. Uygulanması çok önceden başlamıştır. Dolayısıyla bu kesinlikle iddia edildiği şekilde belediye başkanımıza yönelik, partimizin bir yaptırımından öte ilkesel bir tutumuz gereğidir. Kadın belediye başkanı olan yerlerde erkek, erkek belediye başkanı olan yerler de de kadın vekil sistemiyle eş başkanlık sistemini oturtuyoruz. Genel merkezimizde il ve ilçe teşkilatlarımızda her yerde eş başkanlık sistemini oturtuyoruz. Bu da bu şekilde anlaşılmalıdır." dedi.
Hapisanede cezasını çeken Öcalan'ın rutin olarak yaptığı açıklamalar ve verdiği talimatlar bu nasıl mahkum sorusunu akıllar getiriyor.

description.hltext_display: Food safety comeback
description.author: Post
description.content:
The repeal of "don't ask, don't tell" wasn't the only landmark legislation to rise like a phoenix to passage during the lame-duck session. The long-stalled Food Safety Modernization Act finally received congressional approval on Tuesday. Once the bill is signed into law by President Obama, the Food and Drug Administration will better be able to head off outbreaks of food-borne illness outbreaks.
The House passed the bill last year. But the Senate wasn't able to move on it until a filibuster threat was broken late last month. The first changes in food-safety laws in 72 years seemed assured. But then a glitch in the bill-writing process forced the measure back to the House. With time running short in the lame-duck session, the food-safety bill was given up for dead. But Congress roused itself to action once more.
Under the legislation, companies will be required to develop and implement written food safety plans that will be subject to inspection by the FDA. The secretary of health and human services will be required to establish a system to track and trace the origins of fruits, vegetables and processed foods to make it easier for the government to pinpoint sources of contamination. Instead of relying on voluntary actions of companies, the FDA will have the authority to order product recalls.
There's a long list of foods that have sickened or killed consumers over the past four years, including tomatoes, peppers, spinach and cookie dough, contaminated with salmonella or E. coli. Each episode resulted in nationwide recalls and demands for action to update the nation's antiquated food-safety system. The 2009 outbreak of salmonella in peanuts demonstrated once again the limitations on the FDA's powers to protect the public. You might recall that the now-defunct Peanut Corp. of America allegedly shopped around for good test results for its products and then knowingly shipped out tainted goods to market. This year's salmonella outbreak in eggs, which are governed by separate rules that were overhauled after more than 1,200 people were sickened in 22 states, served as a reminder of the broader work that was left undone.

description.hltext_display: Bank to put New Center's Hotel St. Regis up for auction Jan. 13
description.content:
After being in receivership since 2009, the Hotel St. Regis in Detroit's New Center may have a new owner by next month.
The hotel is being put up for auction on Jan. 13 by the bank that owns the hotel after its original owners defaulted.
Metro Detroit's hotel industry has been rocked by the local and national slowdown in business travel, a trend which has pushed sale prices to record lows.
That's why Barry Lefkowitz, receiver for the 225-room hotel, said he's not sure what kind of offers are going to come in or what price point the hotel will sell for.
"We're just going to see what interest is out there," he said. "There's no opening bid, but the bank has the right to refuse any offer."
Photo courtesy of The CoStar Group
The hotel was re-opened to much fanfare in 2007 after the once-posh location was re-developed by a group of local investors led by real estate developer Herb Strather.
In February, 2009 the hotel went into default with its original lender, Chicago-based ShoreBank Corp.
ShoreBank, however, was shut down in August, with much of its $2.2 billion assets and $1.5 billion in deposits bought by a new entity, Urban Partnership Bank. Urban Partnership, through that deal, acquired the hotel, and is now attempting to sell it.
During its time in receivership, the St. Regis has been a steal for overnight stays in Detroit. The hotel's stated rate is $89, though rooms have gone for $30 to $40 on discount hotel websites.
Lefkowitz, managing director of Southfield-based turnaround firm BBK, said the Jan. 13 auction will be held at 10 a.m. in the BBK offices. A $50,000 deposit is required and must either be wired to him prior to the auction or be in-hand with a cashier's check prior to the auction.
So far, there are three parties that have expressed interest, Lefkowitz said.
But if recent sales are any indication, a high sale price may be hard to come by.
The $11.8 million in local hotel sales in 2010 involved the sale of 625 hotel rooms, or $18,800 per room, compared with 2003, when 772 rooms sold for $65 million, or $84,200 per room, according to data from the hotel group with Chicago-based Jones Lang LaSalle.
The Omni Hotel on Detroit's riverfront was put up for sale for more than a year and was forced to close when no buyer could be found. The former Pontchartrain hotel has been closed for more than a year without a new use.
Well known for setting the bar low on hotel sales is the sale of the former Ritz-Carlton in Dearborn (since renamed The Henry), which went for $3 million. Estimated replacement cost is $100 million.
Lefkowtiz said that given the market, an auction was the best way to go.
"That seems to be the best way to shake out any interest," he said. "But if we can't sell it, we can't sell it."

description.hltext_display: Sembcorp Marine wins US$400m contracts
description.content:
Mainboard-listed Sembcorp Marine says its Jurong Shipyard unit has secured two contracts worth US$400 million to build two rigs for oil and gas drilling contractor Noble Corporation.
Sembcorp adds that the new rigs will be suitable for operations in challenging environments, including high temperature areas in the Middle East and the North Sea.
Sembcorp Marine says it also has an option to build an additional 4 rigs for New York-listed Noble Corp.
That could potentially bring the value of all 6 contracts to US$1.2 billion.
The 2 new rigs are scheduled to be delivered in the fourth quarter of 2012 and second quarter of 2013.

description.hltext_display: 今、恋愛成就祈願のお勧めNo1「伊豆山神社」
description.content:
»RSS配信とは？
縁結びの神社といえば、出雲神社や東京大神宮といった有名な神社が多数ありますよね？以前マイスピでも縁結びの神社のご紹介がありました。でも、どの神社も参拝客で賑わっていて、ゆっくりできないと思いませんか？
「ゆっくり静かに恋愛成就を願いたい」と思われている方に、私の今、1番お勧めの神社「伊豆山神社」をご紹介します！
静岡県熱海市にあるこの神社、実は恋愛成就には最強のパワースポットなんですよ!!
その昔、豪族の娘であった北条政子と流人であった源頼朝が周囲からの猛反対を押し切り、ひっそり逢瀬していた場所が、なんとこの伊豆山神社なのです。
逢瀬の際には、境内にある腰掛け石という2人掛けのサイズの石に仲良く座っていたという話もあります。
まるで『ロミオとジュリエット』のバルコニーのような役割の場所だったんですね。しかし、悲恋で終わる『ロミオとジュリエット』と違ったのは、逢瀬の場所が単なるバルコニーではなく、夫婦神イザナギとイザナミが奉られている縁結びの神社であったということ。
結局、政略結婚目前に政子は全てを投げ捨て頼朝の元へと走り、晴れて頼朝の正室となったのです。
まさに悲恋さえもハッピーエンドにしてしまうという、パワースポットの力を感じませんか？
そして神社の境内にはご神木である雌雄の梛の木があります。
梛の木には人の悪意や嫉妬や災いをはねのける浄化作用があり、悩みや迷いを解消してくれるといわれ、古くからお守りとして身につけられてきたそうです。しかし、こちらの梛の木はそれだけに留まらず、男女の縁結びにもご利益があるといわれています。
この椰の葉を政子が鏡の下に敷き頼朝との愛を祈ったと伝えられることから、葉を鏡の下又はコンパクトの中に入れておくと、良縁が結ばれるともいわれています。
男性がめ梛、女性がお梛の葉を持つのがお勧めだとか。「霊符 梛（なぎ）の葉守」という名前のお守りも売っています。
更に、伊豆山神社には境内に行く途中に末社「結明神社」もあります。
この小さな神社も日精（男）と月精（女）が結ばれ結明神と呼ばれるようになったという、縁結びの神社でもあります。
見晴らしも素晴らしく、実は個人的にはここが1番のお勧めだったりもします。
そして恋愛成就に興味のない方にはこちら、境内にある「光り石」がお勧め。
道祖神とともに来た神様が降り立つと言われている「光り石」。
「良きことがありますように、光のパワーを沢山たくさん賜って光り石にさわったり、座ったりして楽しくお参り下さい」
との看板があったので、調子に乗って座ったり寝そべったりしていたら、パワー酔いしてしまいました。
更に伊豆山神社でもっとも強いと思われるパワースポットが、本殿の奥にある「白山神社」です。こちらは急な山道を20分ほどかけて登った場所にあります。 とにかく清らかで強いエネルギーです。是非訪れてみてください。
実は伊豆山神社は境内に行くまでに、800段の石段を登らないとたどり着けません。はじめに階段を見た時は多少の不安を感じるかもしれませんが、「この上には見所が沢山あるパワースポットがある」と思うと、800段なんてあっという間に登れちゃいます。
ということで、恋愛成就に興味のある方もない方も、まだ行かれたことのないという方は、是非1度訪れてみてくださいね。

description.hltext_display: 中國掌付股份合并及股本削減
description.content: 股份合并及股本削減董事建議進行(a)股份合并，方式為將本公司已發行股本中每五(5)股每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一()股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份；及(b)股本削減，方式為透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元。股份合并及股本削減須待股東於股東特別大會上通過特別決議案後，方可作實。預期時間表載於本公布下文。一般事項本公司將於實際可行情況下盡快向股東寄發通函，當中載有（其中包括）股份合并及股本削減以及授權之進一步資料以及股東特別大會通告。股份合并及股本削減董事建議按下列方式重組本公司股本︰(a)將本公司已發行股本中每五(5)股每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一(1)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份；及(b)透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元。股本削減所產生之進賬款項為107,449,565.72港元，將計入本公司之繳入盈余賬內。根據百慕達法例，繳入盈余賬之進賬款項為可供分派儲備，而本公司可以公司法及本公司細則許可之任何方式運用繳入盈余。董事會亦建議尋求股東批準授權，即授權董事以彼等認為合適之方式運用本公司繳入盈余賬內之全部進賬款項，包括但不限於抵銷本公司不時之累計虧損。於本公布日期，本公司之法定股本為200,000,000港元，拆分為4,000,000,000股股份，當中2,686,239,143股股份經已發行及繳足或入賬列作繳足股款。假設本公司已發行股本自本公布日期起至股份合并及股本削減生效當日止并無變動，本公司之股本架構將如下︰緊接股份合并及緊隨股份合并及股本削減前股本削減後法定股本200,000,000港元200,000,000港元面值每股股份0.05港元每股新股份0.05港元法定股份數目4,000,000,000股股份4,000,000,000股新股份已發行股本金額134,311,957.15港元26,862,391.43港元已發行股份數目2,686,239,143股股份537,247,828股新股份未發行股本金額65,688,042.85港元173,137,608.57港元未發行股份數目1,313,760,857股股份3,462,752,171股新股份股份合并及股本削減之條件股份合并及股本削減須待下列所有條件達成後，方告完成︰(a)股東於本公司股東特別大會上通過必要特別決議案批準股份合并及股本削減；(b)進行股份合并及股本削減時遵守百慕達法例及創業板上市規則之相關程序及規定；及(c)聯交所創業板上市委員會批準因股份合并及股本削減而產生之新股份上市及買賣。進行股份合并及股本削減之理由及對本公司及股東之影響股份合并及股本削減旨在令本公司日後在進行集資時享有更大靈活性。股本削減所產生之進賬款項將計入本公司之繳入盈余賬內，有利董事於日後認為合適時派發股息。董事（包括獨立非執行董事）認為，股份合并及股本削減不會對本集團之財務狀況構成重大財務影響。除就股份合并及股本削減產生之開支外，實行股份合并及股本削減不會改變本公司之相關資產、業務營運、管理或財務狀況，亦不會改變股東之權益或權利。新股份上市申請本公司將向聯交所申請批準因股份合并及股本削減而產生之新股份上市及買賣，并將辦理一切所需安排，令新股份獲準納入由香港中央結算有限公司設立及營運之中央結算及交收系統。預期時間表二零一零年寄發有關股份合并及股本削減之通函......................一月五日刊發股東特別大會通告...........................一月五日遞交股東特別大會代表委任表格之最後限期.............一月二十六日上午十一時正股東特別大會........................一月二十八日上午十一時正公布股東特別大會之結果........................一月二十八日下列事項須待實行股份合并及股本削減之條件達成後方可作實，故所列日期僅屬暫時性質：股份合并及股本削減之生效日期................一月三十一日上午九時三十分新股份開始買賣............................一月三十一日以每手5,000股股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣股份之原有柜位關閉...............一月三十一日上午九時三十分以每手1,000股新股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之臨時柜位開放..............一月三十一日上午九時三十分以現有股票免費換領新股票首日.....................一月三十一日碎股買賣安排運作首日.........................二月十六日以每手5,000股新股份（以新股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之原有柜位重開..............二月十六日上午九時三十分并行買賣并行買賣新股份（以新股票及現有股票形式）開始.....................二月十六日上午九時三十分以每手1,000股新股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之臨時柜位關閉.................三月八日下午四時正并行買賣新股份（以新股票及現有股票形式）結束............三月八日下午四時正碎股買賣安排運作之最後日期.......................三月八日以現有股票免費換領新股票之最後日期...............三月十日下午四時正本公布內所有均指香港本地日期及時間。上述預期時間表所示之日期或限期取決於股東特別大會之結果，故僅屬參考性質。預期時間表如有任何變動，本公司將適時刊發公布。換領股票待股份合并及股本削減預期於二零一一年一月三十一日（星期一）生效後，現有股票於二零一一年三月八日（星期二）下午四時後將不再有效作買賣用途。股東可於二零一一年一月三十一日（星期一）起直至二零一一年三月十日（星期四）止期間（首尾兩日包括在內），將名下現有股票（黃色）呈交股份過戶登記分處卓佳登捷時有限公司（地址為香港灣仔皇后大道東28號金鐘匯中心26樓），以換領新股票（基準為每五(5)股股份換一(1)股合并股份），費用由本公司承擔。預期合并股份之新股票（綠色）將於向股份過戶登記分處遞交現有股票作換領後10個營業日內可供領取。其後，現有股票仍為法定所有權之有效憑證，但換領新股票時，須按每份已發出或注銷之股票（以涉及數目較高者為準）支付2.5港元（或聯交所不時允許之其他較高金額），方獲受理，費用由股東支付予股份過戶登記分處。將予發行之新股票為綠色，有別於黃色之現有股票。碎股買賣安排為方便買賣零碎新股份（如有），本公司將委聘一家證券公司，以盡最大努力基準，為欲購入零碎新股份以湊合完整買賣單位，或欲出售所持零碎新股份之股東提供對盤服務。碎股對盤安排之詳情將載入就股份合并及股本削減而寄發予股東之通函。警告股東及有意投資者務須注意，股份合并及股本削減須待「股份合并及股本削減」一節「股份合并及股本削減之條件」一段所載先決條件達成後，方可作實。因此，股份合并及股本削減未必會進行。股東及有意投資者於買賣股份時務請審慎行事，倘對彼等之狀況有任何疑問，應諮詢彼等之專業顧問。一般事項本公司將舉行股東特別大會，以考慮及酌情批準有關股份合并及股本削減以及授權之特別決議案。據董事經作出一切合理查詢後所知、所悉及所信，概無股東須就股東特別大會上提呈之決議案放棄投票。本公司將於實際可行情況下盡快向股東寄發通函，當中載有（其中包括）股份合并及股本削減以及授權之進一步資料以及股東特別大會通告。釋義除文義另有所指外，本公布內所用詞匯具有以下涵義：「授權」指建議授權董事不時以彼等認為合適之方式運用本公司繳入盈余賬內之全部進賬款項，包括但不限於抵銷本公司不時之累計虧損「百慕達注冊處處長」指百慕達公司注冊處處長「董事會」指本公司不時之董事會「股本削減」指建議透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元「公司法」指百慕達一九八一年公司法「本公司」指中國掌付（集團）有限公司，一間於百慕達注冊成立之有限公司，其股份於創業板上市「合并股份」指股份合并生效後本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之股份「董事」指本公司不時之董事「現有股份」指本公司每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份「現有股票」指現有股份之黃色股票「創業板」指聯交所創業板「創業板上市規則」指聯交所創業板證券上市規則「法律顧問」指Conyers,Dill&Pearman，本公司就百慕達法例之法律顧問「新股份」指股份合并及股本削減生效後本公司股本中每股面值0.05港元之股份「新股票」指新股份之綠色股票「股東特別大會」指本公司即將舉行之股東特別大會，以考慮及酌情批準股份合并及股本削減以及授權「股份」指本公司股本中每股面值0.05港元之現有股份「股份合并」指建議將每五(5)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一(1)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份「股東」指股份持有人「聯交所」指香港聯合交易所有限公司「港元」指港元，中華人民共和國香港特別行政區法定貨幣

description.hltext_display: DS-5 Supports Boot Code, Kernel, Driver and Application Development for ARM Linux-Based Products
description.content:
—ARM announced today the release of the ARM Development Studio 5 (DS-5™) v5.3, and the commercial availability of DS-5 Linux Edition.
DS-5 accelerates Linux and Android™ native code development by providing a powerful and intuitive development environment, including source editing, compilation, debug and performance analysis tools.
DS-5 is now available in two packages:
DS-5 Application Edition targets application development using a low cost Ethernet or USB connection to the target
DS-5 Linux Edition extends this functionality with support for platform bring-up, kernel and driver development. The debug connection to the target is provided by a DSTREAM debug and trace unit.
The DS-5 device configuration database contains implementation details for supported ARM processor-based ASSPs, including JTAG interface, resets, peripheral registers and trace architecture. The current list of supported platforms includes Atmel, Freescale, Marvell, NXP, ST, and TI catalog devices. All the user needs to do is select the target device from a pull-down list and connect to it. More devices will be added in future DS-5 releases.
DS-5 speeds up platform bring-up by providing access to coprocessor registers and enabling the use of hardware breakpoints and data access watchpoints. DS-5 also supports instruction trace to simplify the debug of timing-related software bugs and analyse performance-critical code.
When debugging kernel-space code, DS-5 provides information on kernel threads, processes and loadable modules. This is complemented by the display of memory-mapped peripheral registers as they appear in the ASSP’s documentation, which removes the need to continuously check device datasheets when doing driver development.
For DS-5 Application Edition users this release adds new functionality in the Streamline Performance Analyzer:
Android native application and library profiling
Support for Cortex™-A9 processor targets running Linux SMP. Streamline shows core allocation for each thread over time, which simplifies code balancing and enables more efficient use of the target’s resources
Availability:
DS-5 v5.3 is available now for Windows and Linux host platforms, and can be evaluated for 30 days free of charge by downloading it from http://www.arm.com/ds5
About ARM
ARM designs the technology that lies at the heart of advanced digital products, from wireless, networking and consumer entertainment solutions to imaging, automotive, security and storage devices. ARM’s comprehensive product offering includes 32-bit RISC microprocessors, graphics processors, video engines, enabling software, cell libraries, embedded memories, high-speed connectivity products, peripherals and development tools. Combined with comprehensive design services, training, support and maintenance, and the company’s broad Partner community, they provide a total system solution that offers a fast, reliable path to market for leading electronics companies.
Find out more about ARM by following these links:

description.hltext_display: Latest Phones : At best prices with the deals of networks
description.content:
The increasing demand for latest mobile phones have kept motivated, the top manufacturers to always come up with the most sophisticated of handsets. Gone are the days when mobile phone was considered a luxury. Today, it is one of the most unavoidable part of our lives. Also, it is no longer a mere medium of communication as well as the latest phones come loaded with the most advanced technologies.
Some of the leading names in the mobile phone industry are Nokia, Sony Ericsson, Samsung, BlackBerry, etc. All these manufacturers are constantly striving to be at the top and as a result, we have a practically unlimited range of smartphones. Few basic features every Latest Phones is expected to have are camera, music player and internet connectivity. Apart from these, the recent smartphones work on 3G networks, which help us to enjoy video calling.
Also other applications like document viewer, MP4 players, social networking sites' accessibility are very essential these days. The best feature of all latest mobile phones are their storage capacity. With advancing technologies, you now have handsets with internal memory up to 32 GB. If not, there is the provision of expandable memory with the help of memory card slots.
If you are looking for cheaper ways to get the latest mobile phone launched in the market, or have your eyes set upon a handset that is expected to be out in the markets, soon, then with the Mobile Phone Deals, you can get these at pocket – friendly rates. With the contract deals of top networks like Vodafone, O2, T mobile, Talk mobile, etc.
you can even win many exciting schemes like FREE connection, reduced line rentals, unlimited calling minutes, texts and data usage, etc. There are cheap Pay as you go and SIM free deals also available on all latest as well as upcoming phones. These deals are more flexible as compared to the contract deals. Compare all deals on latest mobile phones on our website and get the best bargains.

description.hltext_display: Vierde gsm-speler op komst in België
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? BRUSSEL (AFN) - In België komt er binnenkort meer concurrentie op de markt voor mobiele telefonie. In april of mei is er een veiling die beslist wie de vierde mobiele operator wordt naast Proximus, Mobistar en BASE. Dinsdag hebben de bevoegde regeringen hun handtekeningen gezet om dit mogelijk te maken. Dat heeft de Belgische zakenkrant De Tijd woensdag gemeld.
De bedoeling is dat de komst van de nieuwe speler voor meer concurrentie en innovatie zal zorgen. ,,In penetratie van mobiel internet is ons land de op drie na zwakste van de 27 Europese landen en in prijs zijn we het duurste land'', aldus de Belgische minister van Telecom Vincent Van Quikenborne.
Er wordt een zogenoemde 3G-licentie geveild waarop ook mobiel internet mogelijk is. Officieel is er nog geen enkele partij die gezegd heeft dat ze zal bieden op de licentie. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.
Stuur uw nieuws of aanvulling (commentaar, foto, video) naar de BNR Nieuwsradio redactie
Hier kunt u inloggen op 'Mijn BNR'. Indien u nog niet geregistreerd bent, kunt u zich hier registreren. .

description.hltext_display: Morati škrt na rečima: Benitez je i dalje trener Intera, za sada
description.content:
Predsednik Intera o šefu stručnog štaba
Iako su britanski mediji u utorak uveče saopštili da je Rafa Benitez sada već bivši trener Intera, predsednik aktuelnog prvaka Italije i Evrope Masimo Morati je, pažljivo biranim rečima, “demantovao” tu informaciju.
“Benitez je i dalje naš trener. U ovom trenutku, on to stvarno jeste. Jedino ako ja nisam nešto pogrešio”, rekao je predsednik “nero-azura”, svestan da bi bilo koja prevremena javna priča o raskidu saradnje mogla prilično da se oseti i u stanju klupske kase.
Ogromno obeštećenje koje bi Benitez mogao da dobije ukoliko se ispostavi da Inter pregovara sa drugim trenerima dok je on još uvek zvanično šef stručnog štaba dodatni je razlog što je Morati bio škrt na rečima kada je upitan da li se upustio u potragu za novim strategom.
“Ne, nema nikog drugog. Čuo sam i čitao o navodnim kontaktima koje smo imali sa drugim trenerima, ali klub nije nikoga kontaktirao niti će to da čini dok se sadašnja situacija ne raščisti”, rekao je Masimo Morati koji je na pitanje da li to znači da nije pričao sa Leonardom pre nekolimo meseci samo odbrusio “Ma dajte, molim vas”.

description.hltext_display: Elodie Gossuin : Gérard Holtz assure qu'elle ne sera pas consultante sur le Paris-Dakar
description.author: News de stars
description.content:
Si Elodie Gossuin tente de défendre sa légitimité au sein de l'équipe qui commentera en janvier prochain le Paris-Dakar sur France 4, Gérard Holtz tient à mettre les choses au clair. L'ancienne Miss France ne sera pas consultante sportive dans son émission, assure-t-il. C'est une toute autre mission qui lui sera confiée. Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées Elodie Gossuin : Gérard Holtz assure qu'elle ne sera pas consultante sur le Plus Agrandir la photo Le journaliste sportif de France Télévisions a accordé une interview à Télé 2 Semaines, dans laquelle il évoque la polémique engendrée par la présence d' dans l'émission quotidienne qui suivra le Paris-Dakar sur France 4. Rappelons que le bureau de la Société des journalistes (SDJ) du Service des Sports aurait présenté sa démission pour exprimer son désaccord avec ce recrutement."C'est n'importe quoi, il n'y a pas d'affaire " assure Gérard Holtz. "Elle a été désignée par France 4 qui nous offre une heure d'antenne en direct, alors que le Dakar n'était plus assez familial pour France 2. Elle ne sera pas consultante. C'est ce qu'elle vous a dit hier ? Ce n'est pas vrai. Je vais la cadrer. Elle vient pour découvrir les à côté du Dakar. Élodie ira passer une journée avec les médecins, avec les cuisiniers, avec le camion balai" explique-t-il. n'a toutefois jamais prétendu être consultante pour France 4. A Télé 2 Semaines elle a en effet expliqué : "Je serai là pour tenter de répondre aux questions que beaucoup se posent, avec un regard neuf, je ne vais pas intégrer l'équipe en tant que spécialiste, je n'en suis pas une".L'ancienne Miss France devrait donc conserver son poste au sein de l'émission sur le Paris-Dakar, qui aura lieu en janvier prochain. "Elle n'a pas de compétence pour parler de la course, mais elle adore ça. Elle a d'ailleurs participé à plusieurs Trophées Andros" rappelle Gérard Holtz, qui, comme Daniel Bilalian, patron des sports de France Télévisions, semble avoir tout à fait confiance en et le plus qu'elle apportera au programme sportif.
Donnez votre avis, découvrez les photos et toute l'actualité people sur News de starsKim Kardashian, Jennifer Lopez, Beyoncé : les plus belles fesses de l'année sont à elles !

description.hltext_display: Sankt Peterburge siūloma įvesti mokestį turistams (Verslas)
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Antradienį vykusio vyriausybės posėdžio metu Sankt Peterburgo gubernatorė Valentina Matvijenko pasiūlė įvesti specialų 1 euro mokestį į miestą atvykstantiems turistams, praneša „lentu.ru“.
REKLAMA
V.Matvijenko teigimu, surinktos lėšos būtų skiriamos miesto kultūros paminklų restauravimui.
„Tai palyginti mažas mokestis, o turistai, esu tikra, supras jo įvedimą. Sankt Peterburgas yra unikalus UNESCO saugomas miestas“, - sakė V.Matvijenko.
Sankt Peterburgo gubernatorė jau siūlė įvesti tokį mokestį 2009 m., tik tada jis siekė 2 eurus.
Investicijų ir strateginių projektų komiteto duomenimis, 2010 m. Sankt Peterburgą aplankė daugiau nei 5 mln. turistų.
2010 m. panašaus mokesčio įvedimas pradėtas svarstyti Venecijoje, Lisabonoje ir Barselonoje. Jau žinoma, kad nuo 2011 m. mokestis turistams bus įvestas Romoje.
Komentarai
Vardas
El. paštas
Komentaras (iki 3000 simbolių) Komentatoriaus atsakomybė
Verslas
2010-12-22 10:03
Oficialūs duomenys parodė, kad lapkritį, pirmą kartą per devynis mėnesius, dėl susilpnėjusios jenos paspartėjo Japonijos eksporto augimas, praneša BBC.

Dar kartą keičiamos „Trakcja Polska“ ir „Tiltra Group“ veiklos sujungimo sutarties sąlygos. Pakeitimai numato, jog Lenkijos geležinkelių infrastruktūros statybos bendrovė neišleis „Tiltra Group“ akcininkams akcijų pasirašymo teisių, taip pat padidinama bendra „Tiltra Group“ akcininkams „Trakcja Polska“ išleidžiamų obligacijų vertė.
2010-12-22 08:49
Likus kelioms dienoms iki gražiausių žiemos švenčių, draudikai ragina vairuotojus dovanų važiuoti neskubant ir atsargiai. Draudimo bendrovės „ERGO LIETUVA“ duomenimis, per Kalėdų karštinę automobilių stovėjimo aikštelėse avarijų kyla apytikriai penktadaliu daugiau nei įprastą dieną.

description.hltext_display: Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? ANP
TOKIO (AFN) - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje. Dat heeft Toshiba woensdag bekendgemaakt.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.hltext_display: Condenan a 18 meses de prisión a Ruth por el 'caso silicona'
description.content:
Tendrá que indemnizar a tres víctimas con 89.950, 65.800, y 900 euros por las lesiones ocasionadas.
El Juzgado de lo Penal número 4 de Las Palmas de Gran Canaria ha condenado al transexual grancanario Pedro Alfonso Socorro García, conocido como Ruth, a un total de un año y seis meses de cárcel y una multa aproximada de 1.080 euros por tres delitos de lesiones por imprudencia grave y un delito de intrusismo profesional, ya que se hacía pasar por médico para administrar inyecciones de aceite de silicona en peluquerías y viviendas particulares en la capital grancanaria y en Arrecife (Lanzarote).
La sentencia condena a Pedro Socorro, Mónica Bastida Mariejes, María Dolores Merino Pérez y María Dolores de León Umpiérrez, como autores responsables de un delito intrusismo profesional, concurriendo la circunstancia atenuante por analogía de dilaciones indebidas, a la pena de tres meses de multa a razón de seis euros diarios.
Además, condena en concreto a Pedro Socorro como autor responsable de un delito de lesiones por imprudencia grave, concurriendo la circunstancia atenuante por analogía de dilaciones indebidas, a la pena de noventa días de multa a razón de seis euros diarios, y autor de tres delitos de lesiones por imprudencia grave, concurriendo la circunstancia atenuante por analogía de dilaciones indebidas, a la pena para cada uno de ellos, de seis meses de prisión.
Indemnizaciones
Asimismo, el principal acusado tendrá que indemnizar a una de sus víctimas en la cantidad de 89.950 euros, a otra, Carmen, con 65.800 euros, y a una tercera afectada con 900 euros por las lesiones ocasionadas a las mismas, siendo responsable civil subsidiara del pago de dichas cantidades María Dolores de León Umpiérrez.
Igualmente, Pedro Alfonso Socorro García habrá de indemnizar a una cuarta mujer en la cantidad que en ejecución de sentencia se determine previo informe médico forense de sanidad por las lesiones sufridas y secuelas, siendo responsable civil subsidiara del pago de dichas cantidades Mónica Bastida Mariejes, detalla la resolución, contra la que cabe recurso de apelación ante este Juzgado, en el plazo de diez días.
La magistrado-juez del Juzgado de Penal número 4, Ana Belén Montero, declara probado que el acusado Pedro Socorro, entre julio de 2001 y diciembre de 2002, "con absoluto desconocimiento de las técnicas médicas oportunas, despreciando las consecuencias altamente perjudiciales para la salud de su acción, sin poseer título ni habilitación alguna que le capacitara para ello, realizó actos de exclusiva competencia de clínicas especializadas en cirugía estética que precisan la dirección de un facultativo médico".
En este sentido, administraba anestesia e inyectaba "aceite de silicona, producto que compraba en cualquier farmacia dado que su venta no precisa receta médica y está destinada, según su ficha técnica, a uso industrial, cosmético y farmacéutico como antiflatulento por vía oral, excluyéndose el uso parenteral o inyectable, a las clientes de determinadas peluquerías".
Concretamente actuó en el establecimiento Bastida Rot en la capital grancanaria, cuya propietaria es la también acusada Mónica Bastida Mariajes; en la peluquería Bigudí en Arrecife (Lanzarote), propiedad de la acusada María Dolores Merino Pérez; y en Mariló Peluqueros, sita en la capital lanzaroteña, y propiedad de un hombre y regentada por su madre, la acusada María Dolores de León Umpiérrez
El acusado cobraba por ello distintas cantidades que se repartía con las propietarias y regentes de los citados establecimientos.
Decía que era inocuo para la salud
Las inyecciones las ponía directamente en la zona que quería modificar, llegando incluso a aplicar anestesia local en la parte del cuerpo a tratar, haciendo, así, infiltraciones en pechos, glúteos, labios y pómulos, según los gustos y requerimientos de las clientes, a las que aseguraba que "el tratamiento era inocuo para la salud y sus resultados altamente efectivos, sin tener que afrontar los altos precios que por tratamientos similares proporcionaban clínicas especializadas en belleza".
El ahora condenado les decía a sus clientes que había aprendido la técnica mientras trabajaba con un cirujano plástico en Barcelona y que él se había inyectado a sí mismo tal producto.
Dicha actividad la desarrolló en domicilios particulares, así como en las citadas peluquerías, en connivencia con las propietarias y regentes de las mismas, que le proporcionaban clientes que iban a sus negocios, concertándoles citas para efectuar las infiltraciones y recibiendo parte del precio por cada intervención.
Lesiones de diversa gravedad
A consecuencia de estos actos varias de las infiltradas sufrieron lesiones de diversa gravedad. Así, una de ellas, que se inyectó silicona líquida en los párpados en Mariló Peluqueros, sufrió lesiones consistentes en discreta deformidad de la región inferior de ambos párpados, habiendo precisado para su curación además de una primera asistencia facultativa tratamiento consistente en "exéresis quirúrgica" de papilomas de los párpados inferiores.
Otra de las perjudicadas acudió a la peluquería Bastida Rot donde Pedro Alfonso le inyectó en los pechos aceite de silicona, sufriendo lesiones consistentes en múltiples masas nodulares en ambas mamas y que, según informe del médico forense, las mismas precisarán de tratamiento quirúrgico para su extracción y reconstrucción secundaria.
Igualmente, una tercera víctima, que se inyectó dicha sustancia en los senos en Mariló Peluqueros, sufrió lesiones consistentes en alteraciones funcionales, deformidades y cicatrices secundarias.
Fue sometida a reiteradas intervenciones quirúrgicas con el objetivo de solucionar problemas médicos estéticos, consignando hasta cuatro intervenciones quirúrgicas en fechas 30 de enero de 2003, marzo de 2003, octubre de 2003 y 10 de marzo de 2004, estando 15 días hospitalizada, necesitando de 454 días para la estabilización de sus lesiones todos los cuales estuvo impedida para sus ocupaciones habituales, quedándole como secuelas: limitación de la abdución (elevación de ambos brazos) y pérdida de ambas glándulas mamarias con perjuicio estético muy importante.
A otra mujer, al igual que la anterior en Mariló Peluqueros, Pedro Alfonso le inyectó silicona líquida en los pechos, y sufrió lesiones que precisaron intervención quirúrgica.
Múltiples intervenciones quirúrgicas
Requirió, además de una primera cura, múltiples intervenciones quirúrgicas, seis intervenciones por especialistas en cirugía plástica, 15 días de hospitalización, 360 días de curación.
Le quedaron como secuelas la limitación a la elevación del brazo derecho, alteración en la sensibilidad de ambas manos, amputación de ambos pezones mamarios y como deformidad, asimetría mamaría, citratices múltiples, ausencia de aureolas mamarias, evaluable estéticamente como importante.
Asimismo, varias clientas de las citadas peluquerías que también se sometieron en dichas fechas a inyecciones de silicona líquida, no sufrieron resultado lesivo alguno o bien el mismo no precisó objetivamente de tratamiento médico para su curación o de asistencia facultativa.
El Juzgado admite que en la tramitación de la presente causa se ha producido un retraso injustificado desde el inicio del procedimiento el día 21 de febrero de 2002 hasta la celebración de la correspondiente vista oral los días 18 y 19 de octubre y 8 de noviembre de 2010.
El acusado Pedro Socorro ha estado privado de libertad por esta causa desde el 24 de enero al 14 de febrero de 2003, habiendo prestado en fase de instrucción 1.500 euros para hacer frente a las responsabilidades civiles en que pudiera haber incurrido.
Las restantes acusadas no han estado privadas de libertad ni han prestado cantidad alguna para garantizar las posibles responsabilidades pecuniarias que se pudieran derivar.

description.hltext_display: Pasirašytas memorandumas dėl integracijos į Šiaurės Europos elektros rinką (Verslas)
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Didžiausia pasaulyje elektros birža „Nord Pool Spot“, vienijanti Šiaurės Europos šalis, Lietuvos elektros energijos perdavimo sistemos operatorius „Litgrid“ ir Lietuvos elektros energijos birža „BaltPool“ pasirašė memorandumą, kad Lietuvos elektros birža taps Baltijos jūros regiono valstybių bendros elektros rinkos dalimi.
REKLAMA
Pasak „Baltpool“ generalinės direktorės Linos Skrabutėnaitės, memorandumas įtvirtina nuoseklias Lietuvos pastangas integruotis į Baltijos regiono elektros rinką, o tai suteikia kur kas didesnių galimybių pirkti ir parduoti elektros energiją geriausiomis tuo metu rinkoje esančiomis kainomis. „Tiek gamintojai, tiek prekiautojai veiks konkurencingesnėje aplinkoje, o konkurencija visuomet reiškia geresnes sąlygas vartotojui,“ - sakė L.Skrabutėnaitė.
Šiaurės regiono elektros biržoje „Nord Pool Spot“ elektra prekiauja 338 rinkos dalyviai, o per 2009 metus joje parduota 288 TWh elektros už daugiau kaip dešimt milijardų eurų.
Prieš nepilnus metus savo veiklą pradėjusioje Lietuvos elektros biržoje „BaltPool“ prekybos apimtys jau viršijo milijardą litų. Rinkos dalyvių skaičius padidėjo nuo 18 iki 26. Šiuo metu biržoje nuperkama maždaug 70 proc. Lietuvos poreikiams naudojamos elektros energijos.

description.hltext_display: Rumlar meydanı boş buldu
description.content:
Pınar Karşıyaka, Kıbrıs Rum Kesimi'nde Apoel ile oynadığı grup maçında Rum seyircilerin saldırısına uğradı. Maç bitiminde kafilemizin üzerine gaz bombaları atan taraftarlar soyunma odası koridorlarına kadar gelip, sopalarla oyuncularımızı dövdüler.
FIBA Erkekler EuroChallenge Kupası (G) Grubu'nda Kıbrıs Rum Kesimi'nde dün oynanan Apoel-Pınar Karşıyaka maçında Rumlar sporcularımıza saldırdı.
Apoel taraftarlarının karşılaşma öncesi organize olmasına rağmen Rum polisinin, maçın oynandığı salonda yeterli güvenlik önlemi almaması da dikkat çekti. Rum taraftarlar, salonun içerisine taş ve sopaların yanı sıra gaz ve ses bombalarıyla girerken, bazı taraftarların ise soyunma odasına giden koridorlara kadar indiği ifade edildi.
Pınar Karşıyaka Genel Menajeri Nihat Mala ile Selim Çınar da maç sonrası yaptığı açıklamada, karşılaşmanın ardından bir grup taraftarın sahaya inerek kendilerine saldırdığını ve bunun üzerine soyunma odasına kaçtıklarını ifade ettiler. Salondaki güvenliğin yetersizliğinden yakınan Mala ve Çınar, soyunma odasına giden koridorlarda ise maskeli bir grup taraftarın olduğunu ve ellerinde sopalarla kendilerine saldırıldıklarını söyledi.
Soyunma odası koridorlarında ellerinde sopalar bulunan bir grubun daha saldırısına uğrayan basketbolcularımız bu grupla yumruklaşarak soyunma odasına girmeyi başardı. Yaşanan arbede sırasında kafilede yaralanmaların olduğu, takım kondisyoneri Erdem Günak'ın da el parmağının kırıldığı bildirildi.
Gaz bombalarının, bıçak ve sopaların kullanıldığı saldırı sonrasında uzun süre soyunma odasında mahsur kalan Karşıyaka kafilesi, otele hareket etti ancak Rum Kesimi'nde kalmak istemedi. KKTC Dışişleri Bakanı Hüseyin Özgürgün'ün devreye girmesiyle Birleşmiş Milletler Gücü aracılığı ile ekibimizin Türk tarafına geçişinin sağlanacağı açıklandı. Ancak Rum Kesimi yetkililerinin, sadece Atina üzerinden geçiş izni vermesi üzerine kafile Rum Kesimi'nde kaldı.
Pınar Karşıyaka koçu Hakan Demir, çok zor şartlar altında mücadele ettiklerini belirtirken, "Maçı kaybettik ve aynı anda 1000 kişi sahaya girdi. Polis gücü yeterli değildi. Can güvenliğimiz tehlike altındaydı. Ağır bir atmosfer bekliyorduk ama bu kadarını düşünmemiştik" dedi.
CANIMIZI ZOR KURTARDIK
Karşıyaka'nın genç yıldızı Birkan Batuk da, yüzleri maskeli, ellerinde bıçak ve sopalar olan kalabalık bir grubun saldırısına uğradıklarını belirtirken, "Benim gördüğüm 10-15 kadar polis vardı ama onlar da tabii ki engel olamadı. Soyunma odasına kaçarak canımızı kurtarabildik" diye konuştu.
RUMLAR DAHA ÖNCE DE SALDIRMIŞTI
İzmir takımlarından Tuborg, 2004 yılında FIBA Erkekler Avrupa Kupası Güney Konferansı play-off turunda Kıbrıs Rum Kesimi'nden Pizza Express Apollon Limassol takımı ile eşleşmişti. Tuborg, Güney Kıbrıs Rum Kesimi'nde oynanan maçta Rum taraftarlar tarafından benzer olaylara maruz kalmıştı. İzmir ekibi, Pizza Express Apollon Limassol karşısında her iki maçı da kazanarak dörtlü finale yükselmişti.
