description.hltext_display: Pietų Korėja Japonijos jūroje pradeda trijų dienų karines pratybas (Pasaulis)
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Pietų Korėja trečiadienį pradeda trijų dienų karines pratybas Japonijos jūroje, už 100 kilometrų į pietus nuo ginčytinos pasienio teritorijos su Šiaurės Korėja, pranešė „RIA Novosti“.
Šiaurės Korėja nepripažįsta jūrų sienos, skiriančios šalis, ir tvirtina, kad teritoriniai vandenys aplink Jeonpjeongo salą priklauso jai. "Reuters"
REKLAMA
Pratybos rengiamos padidėjus įtampai tarp Seulo ir Pchenjano. Konfliktas tarp šalių ypač sustiprėjo, kai Šiaurės Korėja lapkričio 23 dieną artilerijos sviediniais apšaudė Pietų Korėjos Jeonpjeongo salą. Per incidentą žuvo keturi žmonės.
Šiose karinėse pratybose dalyvaus mažiausiai šeši kariniai laivai ir sraigtasparniai. Ekspertų teigimu, pratybomis Pietų Korėja nori parodyti, kad yra pasirengusi „atremti bet kokią Šiaurės Korėjos ataką“.
Šiaurės Korėja nepripažįsta jūrų sienos, skiriančios šalis, ir tvirtina, kad teritoriniai vandenys aplink Jeonpjeongo salą priklauso jai.

description.hltext_display: „BlackBerry“ pardavimai muša rekordus (IT)
description.content:
Išmaniųjų telefonų „BlackBerry“ gamintoja bendrovė „Research in Motion“ (RIM) per trečiąjį finansinių metų ketvirtį pardavė rekordinį kiekį – 14,2 mln. išmaniųjų telefonų – 40 proc. daugiau nei per tą patį laikotarpį pernai. Analitikai prognozuoja dar geresnius RIM rezultatus pasirodžius planšetiniam kompiuteriui „BlackBerry Playbook“.
REKLAMA
RIM pajamos per rugsėjį – lapkritį išaugo 40 proc. ir siekė 5,5 mlrd. JAV dolerių. Per šį laikotarpį naujais „BlackBerry“ paslaugų vartotojais tapo apie 5,1 mln. žmonių, o iš viso pasaulyje šiuo metu tokių vartotojų yra daugiau nei 55 milijonai.
„BlackBerry“ gamintojai per trečiąjį ketvirtį uždirbo 911,1 mln. JAV dolerių pelno, o vienos akcijos pelnas padidėjo 58 procentais. Bendrovė pastaruoju metu daugiausiai dėmesio skiria naujoms rinkoms – pardavimai JAV rinkoje sudarė tik trečdalį visų pardavimų.
„Lietuvoje augantį „BlackBerry“ populiarumą labiausiai lemia didėjantys pardavimai privačių klientų grupėje. Tokios sėkmės tikimės, kuomet atvešime planšetinius „BlackBerry Playbook“ kompiuterius“, – sakė „Bitės Lietuva“ marketingo vadovė Jūratė Puodžiukaitė.
„BlackBerry“ išmaniuosius telefonus ir paslaugas Lietuvoje teikiančios „Bitės Lietuva“ salonuose galima įsigyti 5 RIM gaminamų telefonų modelius. Tarp jų – „BlackBerry Torch“, kuris turi ir lietimui jautrų ekraną, ir visaženklę QWERTY klaviatūrą. Tuo tarpu „BlackBerry Playbook“, rimčiausiu „iPad“ konkurentu vadinamas įrenginys, „Bitės“ salonuose turėtų pasirodyti per pirmąjį kitų metų pusmetį.

description.hltext_display: 中國掌付股份合并及股本削減
description.content: 股份合并及股本削減董事建議進行(a)股份合并，方式為將本公司已發行股本中每五(5)股每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一(1)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份；及(b)股本削減，方式為透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元。股份合并及股本削減須待股東於股東特別大會上通過特別決議案後，方可作實。預期時間表載於本公布下文。一般事項本公司將於實際可行情況下盡快向股東寄發通函，當中載有（其中包括）股份合并及股本削減以及授權之進一步資料以及股東特別大會通告。-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------股份合并及股本削減董事建議按下列方式重組本公司股本︰(a)將本公司已發行股本中每五(5)股每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一(1)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份；及(b)透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元。股本削減所產生之進賬款項為107,449,565.72港元，將計入本公司之繳入盈余賬內。根據百慕達法例，繳入盈余賬之進賬款項為可供分派儲備，而本公司可以公司法及本公司細則許可之任何方式運用繳入盈余。董事會亦建議尋求股東批準授權，即授權董事以彼等認為合適之方式運用本公司繳入盈余賬內之全部進賬款項，包括但不限於抵銷本公司不時之累計虧損。於本公布日期，本公司之法定股本為200,000,000港元，拆分為4,000,000,000股股份，當中2,686,239,143股股份經已發行及繳足或入賬列作繳足股款。假設本公司已發行股本自本公布日期起至股份合并及股本削減生效當日止并無變動，本公司之股本架構將如下︰緊接股份合并及緊隨股份合并及股本削減前股本削減後法定股本200,000,000港元200,000,000港元面值每股股份0.05港元每股新股份0.05港元法定股份數目4,000,000,000股股份4,000,000,000股新股份已發行股本金額134,311,957.15港元26,862,391.43港元已發行股份數目2,686,239,143股股份537,247,828股新股份未發行股本金額65,688,042.85港元173,137,608.57港元未發行股份數目1,313,760,857股股份3,462,752,171股新股份股份合并及股本削減之條件股份合并及股本削減須待下列所有條件達成後，方告完成︰(a)股東於本公司股東特別大會上通過必要特別決議案批準股份合并及股本削減；(b)進行股份合并及股本削減時遵守百慕達法例及創業板上市規則之相關程序及規定；及(c)聯交所創業板上市委員會批準因股份合并及股本削減而產生之新股份上市及買賣。進行股份合并及股本削減之理由及對本公司及股東之影響股份合并及股本削減旨在令本公司日後在進行集資時享有更大靈活性。股本削減所產生之進賬款項將計入本公司之繳入盈余賬內，有利董事於日後認為合適時派發股息。董事（包括獨立非執行董事）認為，股份合并及股本削減不會對本集團之財務狀況構成重大財務影響。除就股份合并及股本削減產生之開支外，實行股份合并及股本削減不會改變本公司之相關資產、業務營運、管理或財務狀況，亦不會改變股東之權益或權利。新股份上市申請本公司將向聯交所申請批準因股份合并及股本削減而產生之新股份上市及買賣，并將辦理一切所需安排，令新股份獲準納入由香港中央結算有限公司設立及營運之中央結算及交收系統。預期時間表二零一零年寄發有關股份合并及股本削減之通函......................一月五日刊發股東特別大會通告...........................一月五日遞交股東特別大會代表委任表格之最後限期.............一月二十六日上午十一時正股東特別大會........................一月二十八日上午十一時正公布股東特別大會之結果........................一月二十八日下列事項須待實行股份合并及股本削減之條件達成後方可作實，故所列日期僅屬暫時性質：股份合并及股本削減之生效日期................一月三十一日上午九時三十分新股份開始買賣............................一月三十一日以每手5,000股股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣股份之原有柜位關閉...............一月三十一日上午九時三十分以每手1,000股新股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之臨時柜位開放..............一月三十一日上午九時三十分以現有股票免費換領新股票首日.....................一月三十一日碎股買賣安排運作首日.........................二月十六日以每手5,000股新股份（以新股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之原有柜位重開..............二月十六日上午九時三十分并行買賣并行買賣新股份（以新股票及現有股票形式）開始.....................二月十六日上午九時三十分以每手1,000股新股份（以現有股票形式）為買賣單位買賣新股份之臨時柜位關閉.................三月八日下午四時正并行買賣新股份（以新股票及現有股票形式）結束............三月八日下午四時正碎股買賣安排運作之最後日期.......................三月八日以現有股票免費換領新股票之最後日期...............三月十日下午四時正本公布內所有均指香港本地日期及時間。上述預期時間表所示之日期或限期取決於股東特別大會之結果，故僅屬參考性質。預期時間表如有任何變動，本公司將適時刊發公布。換領股票待股份合并及股本削減預期於二零一一年一月三十一日（星期一）生效後，現有股票於二零一一年三月八日（星期二）下午四時後將不再有效作買賣用途。股東可於二零一一年一月三十一日（星期一）起直至二零一一年三月十日（星期四）止期間（首尾兩日包括在內），將名下現有股票（黃色）呈交股份過戶登記分處卓佳登捷時有限公司（地址為香港灣仔皇后大道東28號金鐘匯中心26樓），以換領新股票（基準為每五(5)股股份換一(1)股合并股份），費用由本公司承擔。預期合并股份之新股票（綠色）將於向股份過戶登記分處遞交現有股票作換領後10個營業日內可供領取。其後，現有股票仍為法定所有權之有效憑證，但換領新股票時，須按每份已發出或注銷之股票（以涉及數目較高者為準）支付2.5港元（或聯交所不時允許之其他較高金額），方獲受理，費用由股東支付予股份過戶登記分處。將予發行之新股票為綠色，有別於黃色之現有股票。碎股買賣安排為方便買賣零碎新股份（如有），本公司將委聘一家證券公司，以盡最大努力基準，為欲購入零碎新股份以湊合完整買賣單位，或欲出售所持零碎新股份之股東提供對盤服務。碎股對盤安排之詳情將載入就股份合并及股本削減而寄發予股東之通函。警告股東及有意投資者務須注意，股份合并及股本削減須待「股份合并及股本削減」一節「股份合并及股本削減之條件」一段所載先決條件達成後，方可作實。因此，股份合并及股本削減未必會進行。股東及有意投資者於買賣股份時務請審慎行事，倘對彼等之狀況有任何疑問，應諮詢彼等之專業顧問。一般事項本公司將舉行股東特別大會，以考慮及酌情批準有關股份合并及股本削減以及授權之特別決議案。據董事經作出一切合理查詢後所知、所悉及所信，概無股東須就股東特別大會上提呈之決議案放棄投票。本公司將於實際可行情況下盡快向股東寄發通函，當中載有（其中包括）股份合并及股本削減以及授權之進一步資料以及股東特別大會通告。釋義除文義另有所指外，本公布內所用詞匯具有以下涵義：「授權」指建議授權董事不時以彼等認為合適之方式運用本公司繳入盈余賬內之全部進賬款項，包括但不限於抵銷本公司不時之累計虧損「百慕達注冊處處長」指百慕達公司注冊處處長「董事會」指本公司不時之董事會「股本削減」指建議透過注銷本公司實繳股本削減本公司之已發行股本，方法為每股已發行合并股份注銷0.20港元，致使每股已發行合并股份之面值由0.25港元減至0.05港元「公司法」指百慕達一九八一年公司法「本公司」指中國掌付（集團）有限公司，一間於百慕達注冊成立之有限公司，其股份於創業板上市「合并股份」指股份合并生效後本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之股份「董事」指本公司不時之董事「現有股份」指本公司每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份「現有股票」指現有股份之黃色股票「創業板」指聯交所創業板「創業板上市規則」指聯交所創業板證券上市規則「法律顧問」指Conyers,Dill&Pearman，本公司就百慕達法例之法律顧問「新股份」指股份合并及股本削減生效後本公司股本中每股面值0.05港元之股份「新股票」指新股份之綠色股票「股東特別大會」指本公司即將舉行之股東特別大會，以考慮及酌情批準股份合并及股本削減以及授權「股份」指本公司股本中每股面值0.05港元之現有股份「股份合并」指建議將每五(5)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.05港元之已發行股份合并為一(1)股本公司已發行股本中每股面值0.25港元之合并股份「股東」指股份持有人「聯交所」指香港聯合交易所有限公司「港元」指港元，中華人民共和國香港特別行政區法定貨幣

description.hltext_display: Rolex Watches: Melrose Jewelers Announces Its Last Chance Christmas Sale on Select Rolex Watches
description.content:
Melrose Jewelers (MelroseJewelers.com), USA's #1 online Rolex watch retailer, today announced its Last Chance Christmas Sale on select Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers is offering up to $200 off select Rolex Datejust watches, and up to $500 off select Rolex President watches in honor of the yearly holiday. The Christmas sale is going on now at http://www.melrosejewelers.com.
Since their inception, Rolex watches have been designed to last forever. In fact, it is quality and timelessness that have been and will be the hallmark of Rolex for years to come. In keeping with the Rolex tradition, there are few better ways to show your appreciation for a loved one than to bestow upon them a gift that will truly last forever.
In fact, AskMen.com ranks wristwatches #1 on their Top 10 List for the best Christmas gift ideas. Since a Rolex is the best watch available, and a wristwatch is the best Christmas gift idea, then buying a Rolex for that special friend or family member is a no-brainer. Furthermore, Melrose Jewelers makes this purchase affordable by selling completely authentic and fully restored pre-owned Rolex watches with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and a full authentication and appraisal by the Associated International Gemological Laboratory.
The Top Five Best Selling Melrose Jewelers on sale watch models are the: (Simply visit MelroseJewelers.com and enter the 3 digit code below into the search box)
1) Men's Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust Super President (923)
2) Men's Champagne Dial Rolex Day Date President (292)
3) Men's Stainless Steel Black Dial Fluted Bezel Rolex Datejust (322)
4) Ladies Champagne Dial Rolex Super President (404)
5) Ladies' Stainless Steel Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust (601)
The Christmas promotions on the Men's and Ladies Rolex watches include special discounts on the Men's and Ladies Stainless Steel Rolex Datejust and Two-Tone Rolex Datejust watches as well as the Men's Rolex Day Date President and Mens Rolex Day Date Super President watches. The sale is exclusive to Christmas and will only last for a limited time. Purchasing a watch from Melrose Jewelers also entitles you to free overnight shipping via FedEx to ensure that you have the watch in time for Christmas. Purchase a Rolex today in order to give a gift that will last a lifetime.
About Melrose Jewelers
Melrose Jewelers is the nation's leading online retailer of Rolex wrist watches including mens watches and ladies luxury watches and its associates have, collectively, over 220 years of experience in importing, restoring, and retailing Rolex watches and other luxury watches. Melrose Jewelers was founded with one simple premise: Buying Rolex watches or other luxury watches shouldn't be mysterious or complicated. Similar to the innovative yet simple business models of Progressive Insurance, CarMax, or Blue Nile, Melrose Jewelers provides customers with low, no-haggle pricing, luxury Rolex watches that are either new and unworn or pre owned and restored to original factory specifications both inside and outside, and a comprehensive 2-year warranty. Melrose Jewelers also employs a staff of top university-educated Trained Experts that provide customer service that extends from your initial sales call until years after you've received your purchase. Melrose Jewelers is a proud member of the Jeweler's Vigilance Committee, the Manufacturers and Jewelers Association of America, the International Watch & Jewelry Guild, the National Association of Watch Collectors, and the California Sheriff's Association. Melrose Jewelers uses only Conflict-Free Diamonds and those imported through the Kimberley Process as signed into act by U.S. Congress in 2003. Melrose Jewelers is not an authorized agent or affiliated with Rolex Watches, Rolex USA, Rolex S.A., Rolex International, Breitling, or Patek Philippe luxury watches. Rolex Day Date, Rolex President, Rolex GMT Master, Rolex Daytona, Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust, Rolex PearlMaster, Rolex Masterpiece, Rolex Super President, Rolex Submariner, Rolex Yacht-Master, Rolex Explorer and Rolex Sea Dweller are all trademarks of Rolex S.A. Melrose Jewelers' watches contain custom, aftermarket diamonds which will void the warranty of new Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers warranties its watches directly and Rolex S.A. has no obligation to warranty any watches sold by Melrose Jewelers.
Melrose Jewelers, the leading online retailer of the , also hosts the Melrose Jewelers (MJ) Rolex Watch Blog. The MJ Rolex Watches Blog is the world's largest independent forum website about Rolex events and Rolex and other luxury watches in pop culture. With over 300 user-posted articles and new articles and commentary updated daily, the Melrose Jewelers Rolex watches blog contains articles about Rolex watches owned and popularized by Barack Obama, Warren Buffett, Steve Jobs, Cristiano Ronaldo, Sienna Miller, Sean Penn, Courtney Cox, Andy Roddick, LeBron James, Tara Reid, Danica Patrick, Matthew McConaughey, Steven Wynn, Calvin Klein, Jamie Lynn Sigler, Eva Longoria Parker, Tobey Maguire, Michael Dell, Ashton Kutcher, the Jonas Brothers, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, Colt McCoy, Sam Bradford, who is an avid fan of the Rolex Daytona Adriana Lima, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Bill Murray, Barry White, Anne Hathaway, Michael Jackson, Tony Soprano, Lindsay Lohan, Eddie Murphy, Anish Kapoor, Tom Selleck, Jennifer Garner, Donald Trump, Jennifer Lopez, Lance Armstrong, John Mayer, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Brad Pitt, Drew Barrymore, Matt Lauer, Sophie Marceau, Tim Tebow, Jay-Z, Zara Phillips, O.J. Simpson, Madonna, Ana Ivanovic, Jennifer Aniston, Paris Hilton, Orlando Bloom, Tupac Shakur, Cuba Gooding Jr, Lily Allen, & Wiley. Blog postings on the MJ Rolex Watch Blog are submitted by independent Rolex enthusiasts and not by Melrose Jewelers.

description.hltext_display: [経済]日産自、ＥＶ「日産リーフ」の国内第一号車を神奈川県に納車
description.content:
日産自動車株式会社 <7201> は22日、走行中にＣＯ2を全く排出しない100％ゼロ・エミッションの電気自動車（ＥＶ）「日産リーフ」を、神奈川県の公用車（6台）および同県が行う「ＥＶシェアリングモデル事業」に使用されるレンタカー（4台）として納車したと発表した。
今回の車両は、日本国内での「日産リーフ」納車第一号となる。
神奈川県はこれまで、県内3000台のＥＶ普及を達成するため、包括的で積極的な支援策を打ち出している。具体的には、国からの補助金に加え、県がさらにその1／2の額を上乗せする大規模な購入補助金制度を導入するとともに、急速充電器並びに普通充電設備といった充電インフラ整備の加速化などを図っている。
日産は、「かながわ電気自動車普及推進協議会」の一員としてこうした県の施策展開に協力している。また、「日産リーフ」による「かながわＥＶタクシープロジェクト」や、環境先進観光地を目指す「箱根ＥＶタウンプロジェクト」など、他地域に先駆けたＥＶの普及啓発事業にも積極的に参画している。
今回「日産リーフ」により開始される「ＥＶシェアリングモデル事業」は、平日の一部を神奈川県が業務で使用し、その他休日を一般利用者にレンタカーとして貸し出されるモデル事業で、広く一般県民がＥＶに触れる機会を提供するもの。
日産は、同社の関連会社である（株）日産カーレンタルソリューションと協力し、同社が運営する「日産レンタカー」本厚木駅前店（1台）、横須賀中央店（1台）、小田原新幹線口店（2台）において、2011年1月中に本事業を開始できるよう、神奈川県と連携して今後準備を進めていくこととしている。（編集担当：金田知子）
【関連記事・情報】
・日産自、新型「セレナ」が発売後約3週間で10091台を受注（2010/12/21）
・日産自動車、広州モーターショーで新型グローバルセダンを披露（2010/12/20）
・日産自と三菱自、軽自動車の商品企画などで協力関係を拡大（2010/12/14）
・日産自動車、ゼロ・エミッションのＥＶ車「日産リーフ」発売へ（2010/12/03）
・日産自動車は子供向け電気自動車啓発コンテンツを公開（2010/12/02）

description.hltext_display: Fiat dealers bracing for 'sad Christmas' seek help from Marchionne
[経済]ハイテクなど安く反落【本日の相場ポイント・概況】
description.content:
2．不動産や銀行が買われる
3．非鉄金属や鉄鋼も高い
4．ネット関連が軟調
5．ハイテクや自動車関連が売られる
■東京市場概況
前日の米国市場では、金融業界でのM&A(合併・買収)が活発化するとの見方が強まったことから銀行株などが買われ、ダウは3日ぶりに反発した。東京市場では軟調に始まったが、三井不 <8801> や菱地所 <8802> など不動産が大きく上昇。中国が欧州支援に乗り出すと伝わったことで欧州財政への懸念が和らいだほか、米金融株の上昇を背景にみずほＦＧ <8411> や三菱ＵＦＪ <8306> をはじめとする銀行が高く、野村 <8604> など証券も上昇した。上値の重さも目立ったが、日経平均はプラスで前場を終えた。
後場はアジアの株式市場は概ね堅調で、為替も安定して推移し、住友鉱 <5713> や東邦鉛 <5707> といった非鉄金属が買われた。ただ、パナソニック <6752> との株式交換でその交換比率を嫌気して三洋電 <6764> とパナ電工 <6991> が大きく下落。ソフトバンク <9984> など情報・通信業も軟調な値動きとなったほか、クボタ <6326> など機械も売られた。カカクコム <2371> やディーエヌエ <2432> といったネット関連企業も軟調だった。京セラ <6971> やソニー <6758> といったハイテクの下落も目立ち、日経平均はマイナスに転落。反落して引けた。
【大引け】
日経平均は前日比24.05円(0.23%)安の1万0346.48円。ＴＯＰＩＸ は前日比0.43(0.05%)安の905.78。出来高は概算で19億3225万株。値上がり銘柄数は504、値下がり銘柄数は1001となった。日経ジャスダック平均は1246.88円(0.88円安)。
（情報提供：チャートブック編集部＆ストックデータバンク）

description.hltext_display: Komşunun Kredi Notu Çöp Seviyesinde
description.content:
Uluslararası Derecelendirme Kuruluşu Fitch, Yunanistan'a ''BBB-'' seviyesindeki kredi notunu indirebileceği uyarısında bulundu.
Fitch'den yapılan açıklamada, Yunanistan ile ilgili gözden geçirmenin gelecek yıl ocak ayında tamamlanacağı, Yunanistan'ın ''BBB-'' olan kredi notunu ''junk'' (çöp) seviyesine indirilmesi olasılığının arttığı belirtildi. Yunanistan'ın ''BBB-'' olan kredi notunun ''junk''seviyesine indirilmesi, kredi notunun yatırım yapılabilir seviyenin altına indiği anlamına geliyor.
Derecelendirme kuruluşu Fitch'in Yunanistan için kredi notu yatırım yapılabilir seviyesini en düşüğü olan ''BBB-'' düzeyinde bulunuyor.
Uluslararası derecelendirme kuruluşları Moody's ve Standard & Poor's, daha önce Yunanistan'ın kredi notunu yatırım yapılabilir seviyenin altına indirilmişti.
Yunanistan'da bugün parlamentoda 2011 yılı bütçesi oylanacak.
Mayıs ayında iflasın eşiğine gelen Yunanistan, AB ve Uluslararası Para Fonunun (IMF) üç yıl süreli 110 milyar avroluk kurtarma paketini kabul etmişti. (Anadolu Ajansı) 38 dakika önce.. [2430027]

description.hltext_display: Niet bellen, maar zwijgen
description.content:
LEEN (35): woont in de (binnen-)stad ergens in de Randstad, samen met man (56) en haar twee kinderen: Bonne (6) en Nelson (8).
Ze is freelance-journalist. Tevens stiefmoeder van Gijs (25) en Neeltje (30) en stiefoma van Duncan (4).
Typisch vrouwelijk vindt ze het zesde zintuig, multitasken en beauty & brains.
JAN (43): is gescheiden, maar heeft een vriend. Woont óf met haar geliefde óf met haar kinderen Bo en Floris. Jan is salesmanager.
Wat vindt Jan typisch VROUW?
De perfecte moeder, minnares, carrièretijger en vriendin zijn. Vermoeiend en boeiend.
Ha Leen,
Ik zie tegenwoordig vaak stellen in een restaurant die elkaar tijdens een lunch of diner weinig meer te vertellen hebben. Of stellen waarbij de interesses zo uit elkaar liggen dat ze tijdens vakanties maar lekker hun eigen gang gaan.
Pee en ik zijn een week skiën, Bo en Floris een lang weekend met hun vader naar zijn vriendin in Berlijn. Zo leken mij de taken wel goed verdeeld ;-) Als we de eerste dag naar een chique oord skiën om even wat rijkdom op te snuiven, belanden we in een gezellige restaurant voor de lunch. Aan een tafel naast mij zit een ‘zwaar gezin’. Dat wil zeggen: moeder dik, vader dik, kinderen dik. Behalve sushi wordt er ook nog eens een flink stuk vlees met patat besteld.
Tijdens het wachten op deze bestelling zie ik binnen dit gezin een enorme verveling toeslaan. Vader en moeder zijn op hun 50ste volledig met elkaar uitgepraat. Sowieso wordt er binnen dit gezin helemaal niet meer met elkaar gecommuniceerd, behalve met hun mobiele apparaat. Er liggen drie iPhones op tafel. Om de haverklap kijkt pa of hij niet wat oproepen of berichten heeft gemist. Ook ma heeft zo’n ding en zit druk met haar vriendinnen te sms’en (een minnaar kan ik mij bij deze vrouw niet indenken). Binnen dit gezin zijn de iPhones in ieder geval de redding van een totaal uitgeblust huwelijk. Ze kunnen nog net eet smakelijk tegen elkaar zeggen als het vele eten wordt geserveerd.
Verderop in het restaurant zit aan twee verschillende grote tafels een Italiaanse moeder naar de overkant van de tafel te blèren. Ik vraag me af waarom en ineens zie ik het: aan de ene tafel zit de au pair met alle kinderen, aan de andere kant vader en moeder met vrienden en zes mobiele telefoons op tafel. Ook een leuke vorm om een huwelijk, gezin gezellig bij elkaar te houden!
Een wat oudere Nederlandse man in mijn skiklas meldt mij nog even dat hij Club Med de beste oplossing voor zijn huwelijk vindt! Een skiweek alleen met zijn vrouw in een chalet vraagt om ellende!
Wat een ongezellige stellen allemaal Leen! Of ben ik hopeloos ouderwets en is de mobiele telefoon tegenwoordig het medicijn binnen elke relatie?
Liefs van je zus
Ha zus,
Weet je zeker dat een mobieltje een redding is? Of misschien toch de aanstichter van een komende breuk? Ik kan me zo voorstellen dat moeders met haar yogaleraar aan het sms-en is (size does not really matter) en vaders nog even de laatste ‘kerstwensmail’ van de nieuwe afdelingssecretaresse checkt. En lord knows op welke website de kinderen surfen met hun mobieltje...
Bij zwijgende stellen in een horecagelegenheid krijg ik altijd een beetje een gevoel van plaatsvervangende schaamte. Maar misschien is dat wel volledig onterecht. Misschien vinden ze het allebei heerlijk om eindelijk eens niet te communiceren in woorden, zoals ze al dag in dag uit moeten met hun kinderen, hun collega’s, bazen, buurvrouwen en wie al niet meer. Persoonlijk zou ik willen dat ik af en toe eens mijn klep zou durven dichthouden.
Op vakantie zag ik eens in een restaurant een Nederlands echtpaar, hij met het Donald Duck vakantieboek van de kinderen, zij met een gezicht op onweer. (O, had ze maar haar iPhone in de buurt gehad.) Dat hebben ze mijn hele maaltijd volgehouden. Het zag er behoorlijk oenig uit en ik snapte maar niet waarom zij niet die Donald Duck eens uit zijn handen griste. Wellicht was het alternatief, namelijk een goed gesprek, toch ook niet zo’n aanlokkelijk vooruitzicht. Of liet ze, uit pure liefde, hem in alle vrijheid zijn gang gaan? Hij had toch ten slotte eindelijk vakantie.
Het is maar de vraag wie er beter af is: de mannen die het oeverloos geklets van hun vrouwen moeten aanhoren, hun vrouwen die eindeloos de niet begrijpende mannen onderwijzen in emoties, kinderperikelen en de nieuwste modetrends? Of toch dat echtpaar dat elkaar een beetje rust gunt na een vermoeiende dag?
Is een gezellige babbel het teken van een goed huwelijk? Ik begin het me steeds vaker af te vragen. Het Donald Duck-echtpaar ben ik later eens, stomtoevallig, in Nederland tegen het lijf gelopen bij een voorstelling. Hand in hand, allebei stralend.
Fijne vakantie,
Je zusje
Meer lezen? Kijk op www.theladiesclub.nl
MailPrint Vrouw Nieuwsbrief

description.hltext_display: [社会]新潟、子どもの臓器提供で、児相の虐待情報回答は妥当
description.content:
脳死下の子どもの臓器提供で義務付けられている虐待の有無の確認をめぐり、新潟県個人情報保護審査会は22日、児童相談所が医療機関からの虐待に関する照会に応じて回答することは妥当とし、県に答申した。新潟県によると、提供する情報は虐待通報・連絡の有無やその時期、対応の経緯など。家族が暴力を受けても、子どもは心理的に虐待されたことになるとして、きょうだいへの虐待やＤＶの有無も対象とした。
（情報提供：共同通信社）

description.hltext_display: Caparrós aapt incident tussen Guardiola en Ronaldo na
description.content:
BARCELONA - Het incident tussen trainer Josep Guardiola en vedette Cristiano Ronaldo tijdens FC Barcelona - Real Madrid (5-0) van vorige maand is duidelijk niet tussen de muren van Camp Nou gebleven. Oefenmeester Joaquín Caparrós van Athletic Bilbao kopieerde het voorval gisteren in het bekerduel in hetzelfde stadion.
Toen Dani Alves van Barça de bal wilde oprapen nadat deze over de zijlijn was gegaan hield Caparrós het leer twee keer achter zijn rug langs om vervolgens een klein zetje te krijgen van de Braziliaan. Dan kijkt Caparrós naar links om een knipoog te geven een Guardiola.Overigens hield Caparrós Barcelona knap als tweede team dit seizoen van het scoren. Het bleef 0-0, waardoor de beslissing in het bekertreffen zal vallen in de return in de tweede seizoenshelft.

description.hltext_display: Internet safety not a lost cause for parents
description.content:
CHICAGO -- Evenings at the Svanascini home in Palos Heights, Ill., Kathy, Mike and their two teenage sons are as likely to be huddled around their laptops as they are the television set.
With Mike running a family Web development company, the Internet is an inescapable presence in their lives, and Kathy worries, like most parents these days, about how to keep her kids safe while they're on it.
So there are rules. Kathy is "friends" with both Nick, 16, and Alex, 14, on their Facebook accounts, letting her see what they're up to - although "I'm not allowed to comment," she says, "and I'm not allowed to be friends with their friends."
The boys aren't supposed to use the in-home WiFi network in their rooms, and "when we want to look at their stuff" - chat histories, Web sites visited - "there's no argument," says Kathy.
By being proactive about Internet safety, the Svanascinis are in the forefront of modern families. Too many, experts say, worry about what their kids are up to and what might happen to them but feel they lack the expertise to do much about it.
With recent headlines about the potentially destructive effects of cyberbullying - and before that about online predators - those fears can take on an almost desperate edge. Forty-two percent of kids have been bullied online, and 30 percent have been threatened, according to i-SAFE, an Internet safety nonprofit.
But there are tools, from software to strategy to education, that can make the wild, wild Web a much safer place to visit and can give parents at least some peace of mind.
Monitoring software, some free, some paid, keeps tabs on kids and their digital lives, from the chat room to the cell phone. A step beyond that, spying software can do so surreptitiously, although not without risk to the parent-child relationship.
Basic Web management strategies - especially the longstanding one of keeping computer use out in the open - can be just as helpful, although they are challenged by the ever-growing capabilities and portability of the laptop and the mobile phone.
But probably the biggest single recommendation that comes through, in talking to experts, is a holdover from the offline world: Communicate.
"There is really nothing anyone can sell you that's an appropriate substitute for that," says Geoffrey Arone, whose start-up company, SafetyWeb, sells the ability to monitor your child's digital behavior.
Many parents still feel outpaced by ever-changing technology and by their children's relative ease with all of it.
"When we come to parents," Arone says, "there's this alarming sense of defeatism: 'I want to be a better parent, but I don't know where to begin.'"
What kids really need from their parents, says Sarah Migas, who conducts workshops on Internet safety in Illinois schools on behalf of the state Attorney General's Office, isn't a tutorial on how to cross-post between Facebook and Twitter. It's the same, big-picture, Golden Rule group of lessons that good parents have always tried to provide.
"They still need the life coaching and support," Migas says. "We don't have to create the wheel when talking about this stuff online."
What's tricky about adolescents and the Web, though, is that not only do they lack experience, but their brains are not yet wired for long-term thinking. That's exactly the opposite of how the Internet works.
"The struggle with kids is they're not always thinking of the consequences," says Lisa Madigan, Migas' boss. "We pound into kids' heads that everything you do on the Internet is public and it is permanent."

description.hltext_display: Kansas State at a loss against UNLV
description.content:
KANSAS CITY, Mo. - Tre'Von Willis scored 16 points and Oscar Bellfield hit a key 3-pointer in the final 70 seconds to lead UNLV to a 63-59 victory Tuesday over No. 11 Kansas State, whose two best players were suspended shortly before the game.
The NCAA, citing receipt of impermissible benefits, told point guard Jacob Pullen, a four-year starter and preseason All-American, to sit out three games. Curtis Kelly, the Wildcats' only other senior, also was told not to play. Kansas State officials said the extent of his punishment would be decided later.
Bellfield's 3-pointer gave the Runnin' Rebels (11-2) a 59-54 lead with 1:10 to go. Martavious Irving's running layup sliced the lead to 59-56, but Willis had two free throws and Bellfield hit one in the final seconds to seal the victory over the highest-ranked team the Rebels had played in the regular season in more than three years.
Nick Russell had 12 points for Kansas State (9-3). Rodney McGruder, who lost a tooth in the final minutes when he crashed to the floor, had 11.
Pullen, who had started 82 games in a row, is the only preseason All-American Kansas State has had. The four-year starter and three-time team captain leads the Wildcats in scoring with 16.5 points a game and has climbed to No. 4 all time in school history with 1,688 points.
The 6-9 Kelly, the only other senior on the squad, is averaging 10.3 points and four rebounds.
No. 2 Ohio State 96, UNC Asheville 49:
David Lighty scored 13 of the Buckeyes' first 16 points and sat out most of the second half while finishing with 29 points to lead host Ohio State (11-0).
No. 7 San Diego State 62, San Francisco 56: Kawhi Leonard scored 23 points and grabbed 14 rebounds as the Aztecs improved to 13-0 with the victory in the Las Vegas Holiday Hoops Classic. D.J. Gay had 14 points for San Diego State.
Michael Williams had 16 points for the Dons, while Angelo Caloiaro and Perris Blackwell each scored 14.
No. 14 Purdue 77, IPFW 52: JaJuan Johnson had 24 points and 13 rebounds to help the Boilermakers (11-1) win at home.
No. 23 BYU 72, Weber State 66: Jimmer Fredette scored 28 points, including a pair of free throws down the stretch, and the visiting Cougars (11-1) held on.
No. 25 Texas A&M 86, Wagner 51: David Loubeau scored 16 points as the host Aggies (11-1) won their eighth consecutive game.
Women's Top 25
No. 2 Baylor 77, Syracuse 43: Odyssey Sims scored 25 points and Brittney Griner added 15 as the Bears (12-1) won at the Sunsplash Shootout in Nassau, Bahamas. The Orange (8-1) lost for the first time in 30 regular-season nonconference games.
No. 3 Duke 46, No. 4 Xavier 45: Jasmine Thomas made the second of two free throws with 2.5 seconds to play, then blocked a layup at the buzzer to preserve the victory for the host Blue Devils (12-0). Thomas finished with 16 points. The Musketeers (10-1) got 22 points and 15 rebounds from Amber Harris.
No. 6 West Virginia 71, North Carolina Central 39: Liz Repella scored 17 points as the Mountaineers scored the game's first 20 points in Durham, N.C., en route to the first 12-0 start in the program's history.
No. 11 Kentucky 107, Arkansas-Pine Bluff 35: Keyla Snowden scored a career-high 28 points and the host Wildcats (9-1) forced the Golden Lions (0-8) into 41 turnovers.
No. 12 Michigan State 67, Vermont 33: Lykendra Johnson scored 14 points and the host Spartans (12-1) won their 10th in a row.
Arizona State 79, No. 16 DePaul 66: Tenaya Watson had 25 points, Dymond Simon had 24 points and seven assists and the host Sun Devils (8-2) knocked off the Blue Demons (13-2), who had won 10 games in a row.
Late Monday
No. 9 UCLA 81, East Carolina 67: Darxia Morris scored 16 points and Atonye Nyingifa added 15 for the Bruins (10-0) in the Rainbow Wahine Shootout at Hilo, Hawaii.

description.hltext_display: Un pequeño terremoto sacude el noroeste de Inglaterra
description.content:
Londres, 22 dic (EFE).- Un terremoto de 3,6 grados de magnitud en la escala abierta de Richter sacudió anoche Cumbria, en el noroeste de Inglaterra, si bien no ha causado víctimas, informó hoy el Servicio Geológico Británico (BGS, siglas en inglés).
El seísmo fue sentido por la población poco después de las 23.00 horas GMT en varios condados vecinos, como Yorkshire, Northumberland y el suroeste de Escocia, según la Policía, que ha precisado que el terremoto tampoco parece haber causado daños materiales.
El sismólogo David Galloway, del BGS, dijo a la BBC que en el país se registran algunos terremotos y "tal vez tenemos uno de esta magnitud cada 12 o 18 meses, pero es poco probable que cause daños".
Según los expertos, en la zona de Cumbria, fronteriza con Escocia, ha habido unos seis terremotos en los últimos cuarenta años, de los que dos han alcanzado una magnitud de 3,7 grados -uno de ellos en 1988 y otro en 2009. EFE

description.hltext_display: HTC Legend Deals- Legendary offers with O2 and Orange
description.content:
HTC Legend is one of the new releases of HTC which has many brilliant features. The handset is available in many interesting HTC Legend Deals which offer these mobile phones at very cheap and reasonable prices. The device is uploaded with many advanced features such as Sense UI, Multi-touch support, Proximity sensor which is used for auto turn-off, Optical trackpad and for Accelerometer sensor used in UI auto-rotation. Moreover, it has other functions like music, games, emails, internet browser, games, and many others.HTC Legend possesses a 5 MP camera along with autofocus, LED flash and geo-tagging features which gives crystal clear image quality. The handset has an internal memory of 384 MB RAM and 512 MB ROM that keeps data and information safely in the phones. Further, it has slot that support micro-SD card with an external memory up to 32 GB. Apart from this, the phone boasts an AMOLED capacitive touchscreen with a display of 3.2 inches.HTC Legend Deals offers these ultimate gadgets at very cheap prices. All the basic networking companies of UK such as Vodafone, Virgin, Orange, O2, T-mobile, Three and others are offering these fantastic gadgets at very cost effective prices. The deals includes contract phones, SIM free handsets and pay as you go offers. In contract handsets, T-mobile is providing this phone at a monthly rental of £17.22 along with a free talktime of 600 mints and free 9999 texts. Further, Vodafone is offering this handset at a fixed monthly rental of £20.83. moreover it is also providing a free talktime of 100 mints and free 500 texts.
Many free gifts can also be availed by these interesting HTC Legend Contract such as free laptops, mobile phones, DVDs, LCDs, games consoles, etc. you can also compare prices of these HTC Legend for different stores on various web portals and select the one that suits your requirements and budget. So, if you want to buy these handsets consider all the above mentioned offers.

description.hltext_display: Quand Lou Doillon joue les garçonnes dans une oeuvre stylée et érotique !
description.author: Purepeople.com
description.content:
Audacieuse, Lou Doillon l'est indiscutablement dans ses choix artistiques puisqu'elle n'a pas peur de poser entièrement nue pour un mystérieux film publicitaire. La fille de Jane Birkin et du réalisateur Jacques Doillon montre une nouvelle fois sa témérité avec le film Gigola dont la bande-annonce vient d'être dévoilée. Laure Charpentier a adapté son propre roman pour en faire un long métrage plein de style et d'érotisme et offre le rôle de George à Lou, une jeune prostituée qui s'autodétruit après le suicide de sa compagne dans le Paris des années 60. Lire la suite l'article
Photos/Vidéos liées Plus d'articles sur : Jane Birkin Pour Gigola, l'égérie de Vanessa Bruno adopte un look garçonne, les cheveux bien coiffés et la silhouette habillée par d'élégants costumes masculins. Comme nous l'avons vu lors du tournage, elle plonge avec délice dans l'univers que Laure Charpentier a créé pour son livre et désormais pour son film. Son roman datant de 1972 avait d'ailleurs fait sensation en raison de certaines scènes d'amour.
La distribution qui entoure Lou a aussi de quoi ravir également puisque la comédienne est entourée de Marisa Paredes (Talons Aiguilles), Rossy de Palma (Etreintes brisées), Thierry Lhermitte (Le Siffleur), Marisa Berenson (Amore) et Eduardo Noriega (El Lobo).
Gigola sera dans les salles dès le 19 janvier 2011.
Plus d'infos sur purepeople.com

description.hltext_display: 株洲城区中小学、幼儿园布局新规
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
建设住宅小区，开发商必须配套建设相应的学校和幼儿园。近日，株洲市出台《城市中小学幼儿园规划建设管理办法》，以确保城市中小学、幼儿园规划建设与城市发展、人口增长相适应。 该《办法》规定，在居住人口密集区每10万人口或住宅面积300万平方米左右区域内，应设一所有36个班级规模的高中阶段学校；在3-5万人口或住宅面积90万-150万平方米左右区域内，应配建一所24-26个班级规模的初级中学；建筑面积不足90万平方米的新建住宅小区，开发建设单位应与邻近住宅小区开发建设单位联合配套建设初中；每1万人口或住宅面积30万平方米左右的区域内，应配建一所1.8-36个班级规模的完全小学，建筑面积不足30万平方米的新建住宅小区，开发建设单位应与邻近住宅小区开发建设单位联合配套建设相应规模的小学；建设面积8万平方米以上的住宅小区，应规划建设相应规模的幼儿园，建筑面积不足8万平方米的新建住宅小区，开发建设单位应与邻近住宅小区开发建设单位联合配套建设相应规模的幼儿园，也可以根据小区人口规模单独配建。 《办法》还规定，在中小学、幼儿园周围50米范围内，禁止修建加油站、高压电网等设施；正门两侧各50米内，禁止修建垃圾站、机动车停车场，禁止设立集贸市场。
[稿源：株洲政府门户网]
[编辑：刘玉先]

description.hltext_display: Hyundai, Volkswagen earn most top safety picks
description.content: Corporate cousins Hyundai and Kia, not to mention Volkswagen and its luxury division Audi, won more top safety picks than any other brands in 2010, the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety says today.

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content:
Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne.
Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer.
"I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.
The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.
Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.
Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer.
"Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added.
"I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."
Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know.
"You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."

description.hltext_display: India, Russia strike deals during Medvedev visit
description.content:
, a poll shows. Full Article Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh (R) sits beside Russia's President Dmitry Medvedev during a joint news conference in New Delhi December 21, 2010.
Credit: Reuters/B Mathur
NEW DELHI
The deals announced were largely already known, and no financial figures were given, but the accords will go some way to satisfy those concerned about India too quickly cutting its close ties with its Cold War ally.
Following are details of some of the major agreements and memorandums of understanding signed:
FIFTH-GENERATION FIGHTER AIRCRAFT
India and Russia concluded an agreement for the design and development of what is expected to be 250-300 supersonic fighter aircraft over 10 years, reported to be worth up to $35 billion.
The agreement, which will see India's state-run Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd work alongside Russia's Rosoboronexport and Sukhoi, is expected to begin delivery of an Indian version of the Russian aircraft by 2017. The deal had first been discussed more than a year ago.
It is a boost for Indo-Russian defence ties, which date back to Soviet times but have waned recently. Russia now competes with companies from the United States, France and other European countries to win contracts for new aircraft in one of the world's biggest defence markets.
NUCLEAR POWER
The two countries signed a deal to expand a Russian-built nuclear power plant in Kudankalum in southern India, involving discussions on the construction of a third and fourth reactor.
Media reports say Russia declined to finalise a deal on two more reactors until they get clarification on a liabilities bill passed in India's parliament, which has worried foreign firms.
Russia is keen to continue supplying nuclear technology and expertise to India as the country plans to add 63,000 megawatts of nuclear power by 2032 to underpin its economic growth, but faces competition from French and U.S. suppliers.
State-run Rosatom said it was planning to build 18 reactors across three sites in India, the head of the Russian firm, Sergei Kiriyenko, said.
HYDROCARBONS

description.hltext_display: The Front row with Tim Dahlberg December 21, 2010
description.content:
Lee says $120 million was enough
Font Size:
To hear some people in baseball talk, they may have to hold a benefit to make sure Cliff Lee has enough left in his bank account for retirement.
Social Security only goes so far, you know, and now that Lee has left $30 million on the table to join the Philadelphia Phillies there surely has to be some concern about his financial future.
All right, so there isn't. Lee would have to spend money like Mike Tyson in his heyday to burn through the $120 million the Phillies will pay him over the next five years.
Still, the buzz seemed more about what he turned down from the New York Yankees than the contract with the Phillies that guarantees he will be incredibly rich for a long time to come.
"That's the most I've ever seen a player walk away from," former Mets general manager Omar Minaya said. "It's unprecedented."
The talk may be louder because the guy who just left the Phillies grabbed every dollar he could to join a losing team. Argue Jayson Werth's talents all you want, but there's no way he is worth $126 million, regardless of how ludicrous baseball contracts have gotten.
And ludicrous they are. The numbers are so staggering we might as well be talking about Monopoly money as the real thing.
And now Lee is being held up by some as a shining example of someone not motivated by greed. This, after signing his name to the bottom of a contract that will pay him an average of $24 million a year.
To throw a baseball. Ludicrous doesn't even begin to describe it.
Lee was in Philadelphia on Wednesday explaining what he plans to do for the Phillies for that kind of money. He wasn't specific, but here's hoping that Phillies fans get more than the 12 wins he managed to scratch together for two teams last year.
I was on the phone to the Save the Children charity in Connecticut, wondering what that kind of money could do for them. It is the giving season, of course, and 10,200 people have contributed to their current Gifts of Joy campaign.
They gave an average of $52, which doesn't sound like much in the Cliff Lee universe. But when $40 buys malaria tents for four and $50 pays for basic tools for health care workers in impoverished countries, it can go a long way.
"For $120 you can bring a community a bicycle," said Kathleen Loehr, vice president of resource development for Save the Children. "That's their ambulance, how they transport sick children from remote villages to health clinics."
So what could Cliff Lee's money do? Well, let's count the ways.
For what Lee will make to pitch one game, the charity - which is active in 120 countries - could help save the lives of 10,000 malnourished children by providing them with specially formulated peanut paste for eight weeks so they gain weight and get stronger.
But I'm also not going to nominate him for the Nobel Peace Prize for leaving behind a pile of money (much less than $30 million, actually, after agent fees and taxes). His salary is still so far out of whack with that of paying fans, even Lee had to acknowledge that much.
"It's plenty of money," he said. "When you hit a certain point, enough is enough."
On that, at least, we can agree.
Tim Dahlberg is a national sports columnist for The Associated Press. Write to him at tdahlberg(at)ap.org

description.hltext_display: Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."

description.hltext_display: Venezuela kiterjesztette a médiaszabályokat az internetre is
description.content:
A venezuelai törvényhozás a műsorszórásra vonatkozó szabályokhoz hasonló előírásokat vezetett be az interneten megjelenő tartalmakra, korlátozva bizonyos online üzenetek megjelenését.
Az ellenzék szerint a törvény veszélyezteti a szólásszabadságot, az internetes tartalmak korlátozását, cenzúra vagy öncenzúra megteremtését célozza.
A 167 tagú nemzetgyűlésben a Hugo Chávez államfő vezette Szocialista Párt képviselői második, egyben utolsó olvasatban megszavazták a társadalmi felelősségről szóló törvény módosítását, amellyel a televíziós és rádiós műsorszórásra vonatkozó szabályokat kiterjesztették az internetre.
A módosítások tiltják például az olyan üzenetek és képek megjelenítését a világhálón, amelyek tiszteletlenek a közhatalomhoz, gyűlöletet vagy bűncselekményeket szítanak és keltenek, nyugtalanságot váltanak ki a polgárok körében, vagy zavarják a közrendet.
A jogalkotó pénzbüntetés terhe alatt arra kötelezi az elektronikusmédia-szolgáltatókat, hogy vezessenek a kifogásolhatónak vélt tartalmakat azonnal korlátozó eljárásokat. Az egyelőre nem világos, hogy ez hogyan érvényesíthető.
A törvényhozás hétfőn módosította a műsorszórási törvényt is. A módosított jogszabály kiterjeszti a végrehajtó hatalom hatáskörét a média ellenőrzésére, valamint azt is kimondja, hogy a rádióknak és a televízióknak a "közszolgálatot és közérdeket " kell szolgálniuk.
A jogszabály 20-ról 15 évre csökkentette a műsorszórási engedélyek időtartalmát, és felhatalmazza a kormányt bármilyen rádió- vagy tévétársaság engedélyének megvonására, ha az többször megsértette a törvényt.
A műsorszórási törvény módosításával veszélybe kerülhet az ország utolsó, határozottan Chávez-ellenes tévétársasága, a Globovision működése, mivel már legalább hat eljárás folyik ellene.
Chávez ellenlábasai és a sajtószabadságot oltalmazó csoportok keményen bírálták a parlament által elfogadott törvényeket. Álláspontjuk szerint ezek tovább gyarapítják azon jogszabály-módosítások sorát, amelyek alkalmasak az alapszabadságok korlátozására. A venezuelai elektronikus kereskedelmi kamara elítélte az új szabályozást, mert szerinte az megnyitja az utat a
cenzúra és a honlapok letiltása előtt. Frank De Prada, a Notícias 24 nevű hírportál szerkesztője szerint az új jogszabály nemcsak a véleménynyilvánítás szabadságát, hanem az információkhoz való hozzáférés jogát is korlátozza.
Chávez vasárnap védelmébe vette az internetre vonatkozó törvényt, mondván, az a polgárok védelmét szolgálja az "online bűnözéssel" szemben, és nem számolja fel vagy cenzúrázza az internetet. Példaként olyan internetes üzenetekre hívta fel a figyelmet, amelyek kábítószer-fogyasztásra, prostitúcióra és más bűncselekmények elkövetésére sarkallják a felhasználókat. Chávez szerint a kormány kötelessége, hogy útját állja ennek.

description.hltext_display: Osnivač "Vikiliksa": Nisam promiskuitetan, samo zaista volim žene
description.content:
Džulijan Asanž o svojoj Ahilovoj peti
Blic online | 22. 12. 2010. - 09:48h | Komentara: 0
Džulijen Asanž, osnivač "Vikiliksa", odlučio je da o svom seksualnom životu i sam progovori za vodeće britanske medije. Na to ga je navela odluka londonskog “Gardijana”, njegovog dosadašnji saveznika u objavljivanju onoga što je trebalo da ostane skriveno, da objavi zapisnike švedske policije u kojima se, između ostalog, navodi i da se jedna od njegovih ljubavnica koje ga terete za “silovanje”, izvesna gospođica A, prijateljici požalila da je seks sa Asanžom bio “ne samo najgori na svetu, već i nasilan”.
“Nisam promiskuitetan, samo zaista volim žene”, izjavio je Asanž u intervjuu za “Tajms”, braneći se od optužbi da je seksualni predator nastranih sklonosti i skromnih kapaciteta, kakvim ga zapisnici švedske policije prikazuju.
U ovim zapisnicima, za koje Asanžove pristalice veruju da ih je neko planski dostavio “Gardijanu” kako bi ga zadržali u zatvoru, može se pročitati i da je nestašni Džulijan gospođicu A. “udarao po nogama” i da joj je strgao donji veš, koji je navodno pokušala ponovo da obuče, samo da bi joj ga on ponovo strgao, kao i da je “s kondomom uradio nešto da bi pukao”.
Nasuprot tome, njegova druga ljubavnica se žali da je tokom seksa sa njim “praktično spavala”.
Odluku “Gardijana” da ovakve navode objavi, Asanž opisuje kao “degutantnu” i insistira da su takve izjave žena sa kojima je bio u Stokholmu delom motivisane željom za osvetom i novcem, a delom proizvod “sluđenosti” zbog pritiska policije.
Da li Asanž ima pravo na privatnost?
Njegovo pozivanje na privatnost navelo je, međutim, londonski “Dejli mejl” da u današnjem broju svojim čitaocima postavi zaista zanimljivo pitanje: da li Džulijen Asanž, čovek koji je svoju kontroverznu karijeru izgradio na otkrivanju tuđih tajni i koji je zauvek izmenio značenje reči “poverljivo”, ima pravo na vlastitu privatnsot?
Na pitanje da li je zaista seksualni napasnik koji žene prisiljava da sa njim spavaju bez kondoma, šef "Vikiliksa" odgovorio je “naravno da ne, to je smešno”, napominjući u razgovoru i to da sa ženama nikad ranije nije imao problema, već su mu uvek “pomagale i bile velikodušne”.
Na pitanje novinara “Tajmsa” sa koliko žena je zapravo spavao, Asanž je odgovorio:
“To je privatna stvar. Džentlmen ne samo da ne priča i ne voli da priča o svom privatnom životu, već džentlmen zaista i ne broji”.
Kao pravi džentlmen, Asanž nije spreman ni da žene, sa kojima je bio, optuži da su ga namerno namamile u klopku kako bi ga izložile krivičnom gonjenju, kao što njegov advokat tvrdi, već je pre sklon da veruje da su se nakon nazaštičenog seksa sa njim ”unervozile”, a da se kasnije zbog sticaja okolnosti stvar otrgla kontroli.

description.hltext_display: CATANIA: PERCEPIVA PENSIONE DELLA MADRE DECEDUTA NEL 2004, DENUNCIATO
description.content: CATANIA (ITALPRESS) - La Guardia di Finanza di Catania ha denunciato all'autorita' giudiziaria un sessantenne di Messina per truffa ai danni dello Stato. L'uomo avrebbe continuato a percepire dal 2004 ad oggi la pensione della madre deceduta. La scoperta e' avvenuta nel corso dei controlli che le Fiamme Gialle del Comando provinciale hanno in corso su centinaia di situazioni dubbie. L'indagato in sei anni avrebbe percepito indebitamente 140 mila euro. La procura ha disposto il sequestro delle somme depositate sui conti correnti intestati al sessantenne. (ITALPRESS). abr/com 22-Dic-10 09:32 NNNN

佳訊控股股東周年大會通告
description.content: 茲通告佳訊（控股）有限公司（「本公司」）謹定於二零一一年一月二十一日（星期五）上午十時正假座香港九龍紅磡都會道7號都會海逸酒店7樓宴會廳1召開股東周年大會，藉以處理下列業務：1.省覽及采納截至二零一零年三月三十一日止財政年度之經審核賬目及本公司董事（「董事」）之報告；2.重選退任董事；3.授權董事會（「董事會」）厘定董事酬金；4.續聘信永中和（香港）會計師事務所有限公司為本公司核數師及授權董事會厘定其酬金；5.作為特別事項，考慮并酌情通過（不論是否經過修訂）下列決議案作為普通決議案：「動議：a)在下文（c）段之限制下，根據香港聯合交易所有限公司證券上市規則，一般及無條件批準本公司董事於有關期間（定義見下文）內，根據適用法律，行使本公司一切權力，以配發、發行及處理本公司股本中每股面值0.01港元之股份（「股份」），并發行、配發或授出可轉換為股份之證券或購股權、認購權證或認購本公司任何股份之類似權利或該等可換股證券及作出或授予可能須行使該等權力之收購建議、協議及購股權；b）上文（a）段所賦予之批準授權董事會於有關期間內作出或授予或須於有關期間屆滿後行使該等權力之售股建議、協議及認購股權；c)本公司董事根據上文(a)段之批準配發或同意有條件或無條件配發（不論是否根據購股權或其他方式配發）及發行之本公司股本面值總額不得超過於本決議案獲通過當日之本公司股本面值總額之20%，惟根據(i)供股權（定義見下文），或(ii)根據本公司發行之任何認股權證或本公司任何可換股證券之條款，行使認購權或兌換權，或(iii)根據任何當時已采納可授予或發行股份或購買本公司股份之權利予本公司及╱或其任何附屬公司高級職員及╱或雇員之雇員購股權計劃或類似安排，及(iv)不時根據本公司細則實行任何以股代息計劃或類似安排規定配發股份代替本公司股份之全部或部份股息者除外，而(a)段之批準亦須受此數額限制；d)(a)段之批準乃外加於在任何時間給予董事可配發及發行本公司股本中額外股份之授權；及e)就本決議案而言：「有關期間」指由本決議案獲通過之日至下列三者中之較早日期止之期間：i.本公司下屆股東周年大會結束之日；ii.依照任何適用之百慕達法例或本公司之公司細則，規定本公司須召開下屆股東周年大會之期限屆滿之日；及iii.本決議案所述之授權經本公司股東於股東大會上以普通決議案予以撤銷或更改之日。「供股」乃指董事於所定期間內根據於某一指定記錄日期名列本公司股東名冊之股份持有人於該日持有股份之比例向彼等提出發售股份之建議（惟董事可就零碎股權或香港或香港以外區域之任何法律限制或責任或任何認可監管機構或任何證券交易所之規定，作出其認為必須或權宜之豁免或其他安排）。6.作為特別事項，考慮并酌情通過（不論是否經過修訂）下列決議案作為普通決議案：「動議：a)授予董事一項無條件一般授權以便購回本公司股本中之股份，及在下列各項條件規限下，一般及無條件批準董事根據一切適用法例、規則及條例并在其規限下行使本公司一切權力購回股份：i.該項授權不得跨越有關期間；ii.該項授權將授權董事促使本公司按董事酌情厘定之價格購回股份；iii.本公司於有關期間內根據本決議案購回之股份面值總額，不得超過本決議案獲通過之日本公司已發行股本面值總額之10%；及b)就本決議案而言，「有關期間」指由本決議案獲通過之日至下列三者中之較早日期止之期間：i.本公司下屆股東周年大會結束之日；及ii.依照任何適用之百慕達法例或本公司之公司細則，規定本公司須召開下屆股東周年大會之期限屆滿之日；及iii.本決議案所述之授權經本公司股東於股東大會上以普通決議案予以撤銷或更改之日。」7.作為特別事項，考慮并酌情通過（不論是否經過修訂）下列決議案作為普通決議案：「動議：待通過本會議通告所載第5及6項決議案後，將本公司根據第6項決議案所購回之股份面值總額，加入董事根據第5項決議案可予配發或同意有條件或無條件予以配發之股份面值總額。」附注：1.凡有權出席以通告召開之大會及投票之股東，均有權委派一位或多位代表代其出席及投票。受委代表無須為本公司之股東。2.代表委任表格連同授權簽署該表格之授權書或其他授權文件或由公證人簽署證明之該等授權書或授權文件之副本，最遲須於大會或其任何續會規定舉行時間48小時前送達本公司之香港股份過戶登記處香港中央證券登記有限公司（地址為香港灣仔皇后大道東183號合和中心17M樓），方為有效。3.現謹建議股東閱覽載述有關本通告提呈決議案之資料之本公司通函。

description.hltext_display: NFL and Big Ten Network added to Cogeco on demand in Ontario
description.author: digitalhome
description.content:
Cogeco Cable, the country?s fourth largest cable television provider, today announced the addition of NFL Network and Big Ten Network programming to its Video On Demand line-up in Ontario.
Video on Demand (VOD) is a generic term typically used to define a pay-per-view television service in which a viewer can order a television program from a menu and have it delivered instantly to the television set, typically with the ability to pause, stop, rewind and fast forward programming.
The NFL Network On Demand (channel 657) and Big Ten Network On Demand (channel 658) will offer about 25 hours of VOD content which will be available at no extra charge to Cogeco customers who subscribe to the NFL Network, Big Ten Network and to Cogeco On Demand.
Discuss the new additions and more in Digital Home?s .

description.hltext_display: La Bolsa de Milán sube un ligero 0,06 por ciento en la apertura
description.content:
Roma, 22 dic (EFE).- La Bolsa de Milán abrió hoy prácticamente invariable, con el índice selectivo FTSE MIB que tras los primeros intercambios subía un ligero 0,06 por ciento y se colocaba en los 20.749 puntos.
El índice general FTSE Italia All-Share abrió en la misma línea: +0,05 por ciento, a 21.448 puntos. EFE

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.
I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision.

description.hltext_display: Boise State regroups to take on Utah
description.content:
LAS VEGAS - Austin Pettis and his teammates say all the right things, if only because they have no other choice. No need to disrespect Utah or the early bowl game in this gambling city, even if they would rather be smelling roses somewhere else.
What might have been for Boise State ended with two missed field goals against Nevada that cost the Broncos an expected bid to the Rose Bowl. Now they must overcome crushed expectations and perform like a BCS team against the No. 20 Utes to try and set the stage for another magical run next season.
"It's not like we didn't try or didn't try and go out there to win the game," Pettis said of the 34-31 overtime loss to Nevada. "Everyone played their best and sometimes it doesn't work out the way we wanted to. It's not like we're in a bad situation. We still have a nice bowl game."
Nice, perhaps. But playing in the desert before Christmas isn't the same as playing in the Rose Bowl on New Year's Day no matter how Boise's players and coaches try to spin it.
Still, there's next year to think about. And a big win over Utah (10-2), which has won nine consecutive bowl games, could go a long way toward retaining the national respect Boise State has built up and set the Broncos up for a higher ranking entering the 2011 season.
"I do feel pressure to finish this season off with a win," Boise State coach Chris Petersen said. "I think it's really important to finish this season off like we want to."
That's exactly what the Broncos did last year, when they beat Texas Christian 17-10 in the Fiesta Bowl to cap an undefeated season. With this year's loss to Nevada, though, TCU got the spot in the Rose Bowl and Boise State was shut out of the BCS.
At least the Broncos got a top 25 opponent tonight in Utah, although oddsmakers still make Boise State (11-1) a 17-point favorite to win the MAACO Bowl Las Vegas.
"Going out and still proving we're a top team in the nation," Pettis said of Boise State's goal. "We've had one slip up. We're a couple points away from still being in that top-five teams and this opportunity for us as this team to play together one more time is big.
I know this senior class the past four years have done a lot of things. The seniors themselves and the other guys want to make sure we all go out with a bang."
Going out with a bang would be appropriate for a BCS-busting school that has lost only one game over the last two years and is 50-2 since Pettis, their star receiver, started playing as a freshman. No one would like to go out with a bigger bang than kicker Kyle Brotzman, who at 431 career points is just two points shy of tying the NCAA's all-time leader in points.
It was Brotzman, of course, who missed the field goal that would have won the Nevada game in regulation, then missed another in overtime that cost the Broncos dearly.
"He's going to make some big kicks in this game," quarterback Kellen Moore said. "And if we're down by two and the game is on the line, we're going to send him out there and he'll make it. He's fine. He's in good spirits."
Utah, like Boise State, has something to prove in the game, too. The Utes were riding high before losses to TCU and Notre Dame dropped them down in the poll and would like to finish on a high note before leaving the Mountain West Conference for the Pac-12 next season.
Boise State also is relocating next season. The MAACO Bowl will be the Broncos' last game as a member of the Western Athletic Conference. Next season, they'll be in the Mountain West.
At one time during the season the Broncos and Utes were ranked No. 2 and No. 6, respectively.
"It is an intriguing matchup," Utah coach Kyle Whittingham said. "I read where other than the national championship this is the next best game according to a lot of people."

event_or_fact.property: He's going to make some big kicks in this game
It is an intriguing matchup; I read where other than the national championship this is the next best game according to a lot of people.

It's not like we didn't try or didn't try and go out there to win the game; Everyone played their best and sometimes it doesn't work out the way we wanted to. It's not like we're in a bad situation. We still have a nice bowl game.
I do feel pressure to finish this season off with a win; I think it's really important to finish this season off like we want to.

description.hltext_display: 常德今年60万人享受社会救助
description.author: news@rednet.cn
description.content:
截至年底，常德今年近60万人享受了各种社会救助。其中，全市城市低保月均保障12.9万人，月人均补助水平为163元；农村低保月均保障17.6万人，月人均补助水平为66元；五保供养对象49466人，其中集中供养对象12002人，年集中供养标准为2400元，分散供养对象37464人，年供养标准为1200元；医疗救助20.8万人次；临时生活救助对象1.35万人。 今年来，常德市财政局、民政局、社会救助局联手打造新型社会救助体系，让公共财政资金向民生倾斜。他们采取抓制度建设、抓动态管理、抓阳光操作、抓满意救助落实市委、市政府的惠民政策。2005年，常德就开始探索建立农村低保制度，并出台了《常德市农村居民最低生活保障制度实施办法》，2009年，全面建立了临时生活救助制度，使社会救助工作实现了由低保对象、五保对象等特困群体救助向覆盖全体困难群众的转变。今年，常德市政府出台了农村敬老院建设与管理办法，对农村敬老院实行了定性、定编、定法人、定经费、定职责的“五定”工作。使我市基本建立了以城乡低保救助、自然灾害救助、五保供养救助为基础，以临时救助和社会帮扶为补充，以教育、医疗、住房、司法等专项救助相配套，以各项优惠政策相衔接的新型社会救助体系。
[稿源：常德市政府网]
[编辑：刘玉先]

description.hltext_display: Elhalasztják az ukrán állami távközlési cég privatizációját
description.content:
Elhalasztják az ukrán állami távközlési cég, az UkrTelecom 92,79 százalékos tulajdonrészének a magánosítását, miután csupán egyetlen ajánlat érkezett - közölte az ukrán vagyonügynökség kedden.
A hányadot versenytárgyaláson kívánták értékesítik december 28-án. A kezdő ár 10,5 milliárd hrivnya (1,3 milliárd dollár).
A vagyonügynökség keddi közlése szerint azonban egyetlen érdeklődő jelezte részvételi szándékát a versenytárgyaláson, egy Ausztriában bejegyzett befektetési vállalat, az Epic.
A magánosítás elhalasztására az UkrTelecom árfolyama közel 9 százalékkal esett kedden a kijevi értéktőzsdén.
A részvételi feltételek között szerepelt, hogy a lehetséges befektető nem lehet olyan vállalat, amely Ukrajnában, vagy bármely más országban több mint 25 százalékos részesedéssel rendelkezik állami cégben. Egy másik feltétel szerint pedig azok a cégek sem indulhatnak a tenderen, amelyekben több mint 25 százalékos állami részesedéssel rendelkező vállalat a társtulajdonos.
Elemzők azzal számolta, hogy a privatizációs folyamatban részt vesz egyebek között az SCM, amelynek a tulajdonosa Rinat Ahmetov, a leggazdagabb ukrán, akinek a vagyonát 9,6 milliárd dollárra becsülik. A szakértők biztosra vették tovább a Sistema orosz konglomerátum részvételét is.
Az ukrán kormánynak állami vagyonokat kell eladnia költségvetési hiányának a mérséklése céljából, és azért, hogy finanszírozhassa reformprogramjait.
Az UkrTelecom ellenőrzi az ukrán vonalastelefon-piac mintegy 80 százalékát. A cég első félévi nyeresége 6,1 millió dollárral egyenértékű volt az egy évvel korábbi 16 millió dollár veszteség után.

description.hltext_display: U Izraelu opet rastu cene nekretnina
description.content:
Reporter „Blica“ sa investitorima gradnje u Tel Avivu i Jerusalimu
Izrael je jedina zemlja razvijenog dela sveta gde cene nekretnina uprkos krizi rastu. Posle prvog udarnog talasa i pada cena za oko 25 odsto, tržište nekretnina se oporavilo, pa je prosečna cena kvadrata na nivou zemlje oko 2.000, u Tel Avivu u proseku 3.500 dolara, a najskuplje lokacije dostižu preko 10.000 dolara u Tel Avivu i Jerusalimu.
Dva su osnovna razloga zbog kojih je tržište nekretnina jače od krize. Prvi leži u poslovičnoj mudrosti tamošnjeg življa da se novac štedi u vreme prosperiteta i plasira baš onda kad kriza obori cene. Drugi je svakako u činjenici da su mnogi Jevreji širom sveta odustali od rizičnih bankarskih plasmana i novac plasirali u kvadrate u matičnoj zemlji.
Gradilišta se mogu videti na sve strane. Uslovi gradnje nekada su vrlo strogi, kao na primer u Jerusalimu.
S Gilijem Dekelom, direktorom jedne od najvećih kompanija „Afrika-Izrael rezidensiz“ obišli smo gradilište, odnosno projekat „Rav Kuk“ u samom srcu starog gradskog dela Jerusalima.
Ovo naselje nadomak čuvene pešačke zone je od posebnog interesa za grad koji se trudi da sačuva autentičan izgled, ali i omogući napredak i gradnju na mestima gde je to moguće. Jerusalim je zato veoma zahtevan zalogaj za investitora, ovo je jedan od retkih gradova u svetu koji je uspeo da čak boju zgrada pretvori u brend - naime u gradu su moguće samo fasade od belog kamena.
- Stanovi su, obzirom na visoku cenu, namenjeni zahtevnijoj klijenteli koja želi da stanuje u samom centru i koja traži pored udobnosti i lepote stanovanja dodatne sadržaje, izuzetan kvalitet gradnje i materijala. Ali to nije dovoljno, ovde se nudi i nešto više, a to je koncept savremenog stanovanja. To nešto više i drugačije što ste u stanju da ponudite na veoma zahtevnom tržištu i čini razliku između uspešnih i manje uspešnih projekata - kaže Gili Dekel za „Blic Nekretnine“.
Inače, kompanija „Afrika-Izrael“ je u Beogradu prisutna kao glavni investitor poslovnog centra „Erport siti“.
- Ono što je ponuđeno u beogradskom projektu na određeni način je sledilo istu logiku u nekretninama - pružiti nešto više klijentu - i u Beogradu je to takođe specifičan koncept što taj poslovni prostor čini posebno interesantnim na tržištu - kazao je za „Blic Nekretnine“ direktor „Erport sitija” Adir Elal.
Reporter „Blica“ je imao priliku da prisustvuje i mini sajmu stanova u Tel Avivu. Stanovi koje kompanija „Tidhar“ gradi u mestu Javne ponuđeni su pod posebnim uslovima članovima organizacija „Hever“, koja je neka vrsta kluba potrošača i okuplja članove iz redova vojske, policijskih službenika i penzionisanih pripadnika bezbednosnih struktura. „Hever“ zastupa interese svojih članova ispred različitih firmi i pažljivim pregovorima s obzirom na brojnost članstva odnosno veličinu tržišta koju pokrivaju mogu da se izbore za najbolje uslove kupovine. Kada su u pitanju stanovi, njihovo posredovanje je omogućilo značajan popust za članove, ali i sigurnost u poslu za investitore.
- Za nas kao investitora to je značilo sigurnu prodaju, što nam je umanjilo troškove marketinga i posredovanja u prodaji. Članovi udruženja su dobili na mobilni telefon brojeve koji su izvučeni na licu mesta i time se plasirali na listu onih koji mogu da izaberu stan. Veća je potražnja od ponude, tako da će oni koji su bili srećnije ruke sigurno moći da izaberu baš željeni stan, a ostali će po rang-listi konkurisati za ono što je raspoloživo - objašnjava za „Blic Nekretnine“ Arie Bahar, suvlasnik kompanije „Tidhar“ koja je investirala u već pomenuti beogradski centar „Erport siti“.
Mini-sajam trajao tri sata
Od mini-sajma korist imaju svi.
- Za investitore ovo je odlična prilika da za tri sata, koliko je sve trajalo, obezbede prodaju 500 stanova, a za članove organizacije to znači da će dobiti oko 15 odsto nižu cenu stanova koje ćemo mi sutra prodavati po punoj tržišnoj ceni od 1.700 do 2.700 dolara - navodi Arie Bahar.

Sdílet
Společnost Software602 oznámila dostupnost nové verze svého formulářového prohlížeče Form Filler.
Hlavní novinkou – při použití verze Portable Edition – je možnost práce s formuláři z flash disku na libovolném počítači. Přenosné médium zároveň slouží jako bezpečné elektronické úložiště všech certifikátů.
Aplikace se na bezpečné paměťové médium instaluje spolu s Firefox Portable Edition. Ten je provozován v anonymním módu, nezanechává tudíž „stopy“ v podobě cookies, historie, hesel, atd..
Další novinky Software602 Form Filler 4 zahrnují nové uživatelské rozhraní, integraci nového nástroje pro převod do formátu PDF, podporu časového razítka, přímou podporu pro zobrazení faktur ve formátu ISDOC a EDI, rozšířenou bezpečnost a další.
Nástroj je ke stažení zdarma, a to ve verzích pro Windows, Linux i Mac OS.

description.hltext_display: Programa mundial de Alimentos compra 13.000 toneladas de trigo en Afganistán
description.content:
Kabul, 22 dic (EFE).- El Programa Mundial de Alimentos (PMA) de la ONU anunció hoy su mayor compra de trigo en Afganistán, un total de 13.000 toneladas, con vistas a aliviar una potencial escasez aguda de este cereal entre la población.
La cantidad serviría para alimentar a más de 500.000 personas durante tres meses, anunció en un comunicado el PMA, que precisó que ha comprado el trigo al Ministerio afgano de Agricultura con fondos proporcionados por la agencia estadounidense de desarrollo, USAID.
El PMA afirmó además que adquirirá cereal también directamente de manos de organizaciones campesinas y de los propios agricultores, con vistas a desarrollar los mercados agrícolas en el país, que vive golpeado por la guerra y es uno de los más pobres del mundo.
"Estamos entusiasmados y aliviados de que esas compras nos permitan seguir proporcionando ayuda a las familias más necesitadas de Afganistán", expresó en la nota de prensa el representante de la organización en el país, Louis Imbleau.
Según la organización, la adquisición permitirá una distribución más rápida del cereal, por lo que se reducirá el posible impacto de la escasez de trigo, que amenazó la ayuda invernal para un millón de afganos tras las inundaciones sufridas por el país vecino, Pakistán.
Las operaciones del PMA en Afganistán se vieron afectadas seriamente por las inundaciones paquistaníes, porque muchos de los suministros hacia tierras afganas quedaron bloqueados mientras eran transportados al país desde Pakistán.
El Programa Mundial de Alimentos pretende además comprar 24.000 toneladas de trigo a Pakistán con ayuda de otros donantes, como Japón, aunque la organización recordó que sufre una importante escasez de fondos.
Se requiere una donación total de 132 millones de dólares hasta finales de julio de 2011 para mantener las operaciones, estimó el PMA, que se ha fijado como objetivo proporcionar alimentación a 7,3 millones de afganos el año que viene. EFE

description.hltext_display: The Oldest But Amazing Handset Of HD Series
description.content:
Its one of the best and most popular handset is HTC HD2. It is existing in this family from past many months and till date it has attracted lots of users with its classy looks and high end features. There are several web portals from where you can easily buy various HTC HD2 deals. It is available on many top networks like Vodafone, virgin, O2, orange etc. its advanced features can entertain you as well as its business features will help you to access various tasks.
This is a beautiful creation of HTC family and it weighs 157 g which is little heavy but users can carry it easily. It has a wide 4.3 inches TFT capacitive touchscreen in which you can easily view pictures and videos with great clarity. For high speed internet access and for data transfer one can use EDGE, GPRS, 3G, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. This handset works on Microsoft Windows Mobile 6.5 Professional operating system and includes Qualcomm Snapdragon QSD8250 1 GHz processor which helps the applications to run fast and it also supports both 2 G and 3 G network. If photography is always on your mind then this camera will be a good option for you as it has inbuilt camera of 5 MP with high resolution of 2592 x 1944 pixels. After clicking various pictures, you need not to worry where to store it because it has a huge internal memory capacity of 448 MB RAM with 512 MB ROM and it also can be raised upto 32 GB through the help of memory card. In that space you can also store songs and videos. It supports different formats of audio and video. Some more attractive features are HTC Peep, HTC Footprints, Pocket Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, PDF viewer) etc.
Various HTC HD2 deals comes in formats of contract deals, pay as you go deals, sim free deals. Through these deals you can also avail benefits along with the handset. Contract deals offer free gifts like TV, laptop, free text, free talk time etc with this mobile phone.

description.hltext_display: وردة: لا جديد حول انعقاد مجلس الوزراء لكن المساعي مستمرة
PALERMO: SEQUESTRATI CENTINAIA DI CHILI DI CARNE E FRATTAGLIE, 4 DENUNCE
description.content: PALERMO (ITALPRESS) - Rifornivano numerosi chioschi per la vendita delle "stigghiole" e del pane con la milza sparsi a Palermo, ma la carne veniva conservata nella sporcizia ed in violazione delle piu' elementari norme igienico-sanitarie. Per questo motivo e' scattato il sequestro dei Carabinieri del Nucleo Radiomobile. Il blitz ha riguardato un'area recintata in via Buonpensiero, al cui interno ci sono diversi locali e stalle. Dentro questi spazi i militari hanno scoperto centinaia di chili di carne e di frattaglie, solo in parte congelate, tenute in condizioni igieniche pessime, nonostante fossero destinate alla distribuzione per uso alimentare. I carabinieri hanno trovato nelle stalle anche una trentina di suini, sette bovini, tre cavalli privi di microchip e numerosi volatili da cortile. Il provvedimento riguarda numerose attrezzature per la bollitura della carne, un congelatore, centinaia di chili tra frattaglie (polmoni, milze, intestini) e teste di bovino. I proprietari dei locali non hanno saputo giustificarne la provenienza e non sono stati in grado di mostrare la documentazione sanitaria. Gli intestini dei bovini sono stati messi fuori legge dalle misure anti-bse, in quanto considerati pericolosi per la salute pubblica. Ritrovati infine una trentina di cardellini di specie protetta, chiusi all'interno di una gabbia. Denunciate quattro persone, tra le quali un 75enne che deve rispondere anche di furto di energia elettrica. (ITALPRESS). abr/com 22-Dic-10 09:18 NNNN

description.hltext_display: Japan trade surplus down 55%, first decline in 3 months
description.content:
Japan's trade surplus shrank 55.4 percent in November from a year earlier, marking the first decline in three months.
According to the country's finance ministry, the overall surplus stood at 162.8 billion yen, much smaller than the market expectations of around 450 billion yen.
Meanwhile, exports for the month rose 9.1 percent to 5.44 trillion yen, the 12th straight monthly increase.
The ministry says the better showing came from strong foreign demand particularly for Japanese steel and metal working machinery.
While imports also expanded 14.2 percent to 5.28 trillion yen, up for the 11th consecutive month.
It is driven up by demand for iron ore as well as audio and visual devices.

description.hltext_display: 英国王室双喜临门 女王外孙女将嫁橄榄球健将(图)
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载)
来源：中国新闻网
英国橄榄球星廷道尔（Mike Tindall）2007年11月28日荣获英国女王伊莉莎白二世颁赠“MBE勋章”后，与女友――女王孙女莎拉-菲利浦斯（Zara Phillips）合照。英国白金汉宫21日宣布莎拉与廷道尔订婚的消息。
继威廉王子后，英国皇室再传喜讯。据台湾《中国时报》报道，白金汉宫21日宣布，英国女王伊莉莎白二世外孙女莎拉-菲利浦斯(Zara Phillips )将下嫁31岁的英国橄榄球健将麦克-廷道尔(Mike Tindall)。女王伉俪闻讯后，“欣喜不已”。
莎拉虽为排名第12顺位王位继承人，但不具皇室头衔，这在英国王室非常罕见。然而，这也使得外形亮丽的她比其它皇室成员更自由，更有选择空间。
莎拉是第一位拍摄商业广告的英国皇室成员，也是第一位公开与男友同居的英国新一代皇室成员，她与麦克-廷道尔交往近7年，同居5年。
廷道尔是英国家喻户晓的英式橄榄球健将，2003年英格兰获得橄榄球世界杯冠军时，廷道尔即为英格兰队成员。热爱运动的莎拉前往澳洲为英格兰加油观赛时，结识廷道尔。
在此之前，莎拉与英国马术好手理查强森(Richard Johnson)交往四年，两人并赁屋同居，但这段感情最后因涉及家庭暴力，不欢而散。
莎拉和麦克-廷道尔尚未宣布确切婚期，但一般相信，应不会与威廉和凯蒂4月29日的大喜之日过于接近。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Herkes gazeteci olunca gerçek gazeteci nasıl anlaşılır?
description.content:
Ekonomik ve tasarruflu kelimelerinin getiği bir otomobil haberi grnce aklımıza az yakıt yakan otomobil geliyor. Ama yle değil... Haberdeki mahkeme kararının tam aksi bir tekzip metnini, haberi servis eden ajansa sorduk cevap alamadık.
Habere konu olan kişi yalan sylerse. Gerek er ge ortaya ıkar. Yeni arkadaşlar, yeni yapılanma, yenilikler İmla hataları ve kafası karışık arkadaş YA O NUMARA SİZİNKİ OLSAYDI? Geen haftanın can sıkan konularından biri Fuhuş mekanında bir bardak su 75 TL başlıklı haberde kullanılan fotoğraftı. Haberle ne tr bir ilgisi olduğunu zemediğim bir fotoğraf kullanılmıştı. Gazete ilanı ile yzlerini kapatmış kadınların bir arada kolajlandığı fotoğraf muhtemelen bir arşiv fotoğrafı ve başka bir habere ait. nk haberde telefon numaraları ve gazete ilanına ilişkin bir bilgi yok.
Eğer arşiv fotoğrafı değilse haberde bu konuda bir bilgi yok. Aslında vahim olan ilandaki iki cep telefonu numarasının aık bir biimde grnmesiydi. Gerekli dzeltmeyi yaptık. Editr arkadaşların bu konularda daha dikkatli olacağını umut ediyorum.
İnternet gazeteciliği etiği kursunda blog etiği blmnde yer alan şu ilkeyi hatırlatmakta fayda var: Fotoğrafların ieriğiyle asla oynamayın. Grnty geliştirme-değiştirme, ancak teknik berraklık aısından kabul edilebilirdir. Montajları ve fotoğraf ilstrasyonlarını dikkatle kullanın ve ne olduğunu belirtin. Bağcılarda dzenlenen Uluslararası Medya Sempozyumunun sonu bildirgesinde, sosyal medyanın herkesi gazeteci haline getirdiği, belirtilerek şu ifadelere yer verildi: Herkesin gazeteci olduğu bir dnyada gerek gazeteci medya etiği ile ayrışacaktır. Yeni medya dzeni iinde gazetecilik yapan arkadaşların bu cmleyi akıllarına kazımaları gerekiyor. Ben de bu cmleyi sık sık hatırlatacağım.
'TASARRUF' BİRAZ FAZLA OLMUŞ Akaryakıt fiyatlarına gelen zamlar, benzin fiyatlarının 4 liraya kadar ykselmesi, tasarruflu otomobil seimini daha n plana ıkardı. Benzinli aralara gre daha avantajlı dizellere rağbet arttı. İşte tasarruflu 22 oto! Yukarıdaki başlık ve spotla sunulan haberde, algı az yakıt yakan otomobillerle ilgili bir haber sunuluyormuş gibi oluşturulmuş. Haber 7nin en byk sermayesi kendisine duyulan gven. Bu sermayeyi harcarken ok dikkatli olmamız gerektiğini hatırlatmakta fayda var. Gven kolay kazanılmıyor.
İŞ ORTAKLARIMIZDAN DA HASSASİYET BEKLİYORUZ Tuncay zkan, Erdoğan'a 10 bin TL deyecek başlığıyla bir haber yayınladık. Haber abone olduğumuz ajanslardan CİHANın haberiydi. Haberin yayınından sonra Tuncay zkanın avukatından bir aıklama geldi. Aıklamada ilgili mahkeme kararının tam aksi ynde olduğu ve haberin gerek olmadığı belirtiliyordu. Biz de doğal olarak CİHAN Haber Ajansına ulaşarak haberde bir yanlışlık olup olmadığını sorduk. Ajanstan bu konuda bilgi istememize rağmen herhangi bir aıklama gelmeyince tekzibi girdik ve haberi ıkardık. CİHAN Haber Ajansının daha duyarlı davranmasını beklerdim. İlgili aıklamaya buradan ulaşabilirsiniz
YA TEKZİP YALANSA! Sitemizde başlığıyla bir haber yayınlandı. Manisada motosikletin arkasında oturan bir şahıs bacak bacak stne atmıştı. Haberin başlığı olayın otoyolda getiğini sylyor. Detayda yolun Manisadaki E-96 karayolu olduğu belirtilmiş. Eleştirel bir dille yazılan haberdeki bir diğer kayda değer bilgi ise motosikletin 60 km hızla gittiği. Buradan da olayın yeni yaşandığını muhabirin olaya şahit olduğunu ya da olaya şahit olan birinden duyduğunu anlıyoruz.
Fakat haberin objesi olan şahıs telefonla ulaşarak, olayın birka yıl nce gerekleştiğini, fotoğrafı ekilen yerin ky yolu olduğunu, ok dşk bir hızla gittiklerini, fotoğrafı Facebook profilinde paylaştığını belirtti. Facebook profilinde paylaşılan bir fotoğrafın bu şekilde haberleştirilmesini de uygun bulmadığını syledi. Bu itirazlar zerine haberi yayından kaldırarak konuyu araştırdık. Haberi hazırlayan muhabir arkadaşımız konu hakkında şunları syledi; Olay dn meydana geldi, ky yolu değil otoyol, fotoğrafı ben ektim ve motosiklet olduka hızlıydı. Muhabir arkadaşımız zhan Haluk Satır haberinin arkasında duruyor ve doğru olduğunu sylyor. Burada tekzip hakkını kt niyetle kullananımı sz konusu. Ben şunu iyi biliyorum ki, gnderilen her tekzip doğru olmayabilir. Tekzipler de haber kadar nemlidir ve araştırılmalıdır. Muhabirimizin haberi savunmasıyla haberi tekrar yayına aldık. MEDYADA YNETİCİ OLMAK Habercilik zor iştir. Bir haberden birilerin memnunsa o oranda memnun olmayanlar da vardır. Habercilikten zor olan ise medya kuruluşunda ynetici olmaktır. Medyada ynetici olmak bir şeyi sevmesen de istemesen de o şeye katlanmak gerekliliği ykler kişiye. Duygularını bir kenara bırakmak zorundadır ynetici. Yasaklamak, grmezden gelmek zm değildir. Habercilikte sınırlar evrensel etik ilkeleri ile hukuk kuralları ve yerel ahlaki değerlerle izilebilir. Sınırları genişletmek de, daraltmak da sorun demektir. Haber 7de ynetimin değiştiğini duyurmuştuk Yeni arkadaşların Allah yardımcısı olsun HABER 7DE DEĞİŞİKLİKLER Haber 7de yeni bir yapılanmaya gidildi. Ekotrent.com ve Tumspor.com Haber 7nin ekonomi ve spor sayfaları olacak. Artık daha gl ve geniş bir kadroyla yayınımıza devam edeceğiz. Eğer teknik blmmz knyede gerekli gncellemeyi yaparsa bu değişiklikleri sizler de grebileceksiniz. Yine daha nce bahsettiğimiz yeni site, mobil uygulamalar konusunda nemli gelişmeler olduğunu syleyebilirim. Şimdilik bu kadar.
İMLA HATASINDAN BİRAZ FAZLASI
Her hafta olduğu gibi bu hafta da imla hatalarını takip ettik ve sıraladık. İlk defa greceğiniz bazı isimlerin yanı sıra, burada adı yer almayan editr arkadaşlarımız da var. Bu hafta Hakan Gksel ve Bilge zbek hata yapmayan arkadaşlarımız.
İmla hatasını sıralamadan nce kafa karışıklığı, dalgınlık artık ne derseniz iki hatayı en başa koymak istiyorum. Bu iki hatayı yapan da aynı arkadaşımız, adı bizde kalsın Eskişehir'de servis devrildi: 19 l Panik yok 19 kişi lmedi, yaralandı. Ama kafası karışık arkadaş l yazmış. İkincisi: Almanya'da 400 tren yolda mahsur kaldı Yolda kalan 400 tren değil, yolda kalan trendeki 400 yolcu. Arkadaşın kafası karışık demiştim sanırım 15-22 ARALIK İMLA HATALARI

description.hltext_display: 美国一名持枪妇女闯入电视台 节目信号被迫中断
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据外电报道，一名手持枪支的妇女21日闯进美国北卡罗莱纳州一家电视台，迫使该台节目中断播出。
随后，反恐特警小组包围电视台，经过短暂僵持之后，这名妇女被拘留。 (博讯 boxun.com) 报道称，这名妇女闯进电视台后掏出一把手枪，并将枪口对准了自己的脑袋，后来警方发现枪里并没有装子弹。
在持枪妇女闯入之后，电视台在下午5点左右被迫中断了电视信号，1小时之后重新恢复播出。
在整个事件中，没有人员受伤。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: 美国情报称“基地”恐怖分子密谋在餐馆投毒
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据外媒报道，美国情报消息透露，“基地”组织恐怖分子正在谋划在美国的餐厅和旅馆中投放致命毒药。
恐怖分子会选择一个周末将蓖麻毒素(ricin)或氰化物(cyanide)投放在几处餐厅的食物里来制造恐慌。吃到有毒食物的人将会病倒，几天之内死亡。 (博讯 boxun.com) 据美国国土安全部人士指出，这次袭击的目标基本上是在美国。安全防卫人员已经提高了警惕。
据猜测，这次投毒威胁的背后谋划者是阿拉伯半岛“基地”组织。他们曾制造了“墨盒”炸弹袭击货机，其中包括10月份英国东密德兰机场(East Midlands Airport)的一起爆炸事件。 (博讯 boxun.com)
