description.hltext_display: 韩国口蹄疫疫情蔓延至首都圈 政府考虑使用疫苗
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国新闻网 韩国《中央日报》网站22日报道称，口蹄疫疫情迅速蔓延至韩国首都地区，甚至威胁到了江原道地区。据此，韩国政府开始慎重考虑是否使用疫苗。
韩国农林水产食品部21日称，对从京畿加平郡下面新下里的养牛农场里接收的出现疑似口蹄疫症状的牛进行了精密诊断，结果显示，该牛确已感染了口蹄疫。防疫当局决定对该农户饲养的55头牛和半径500米内的家畜都实施宰杀处理。 (博讯 boxun.com) 至此，韩国口蹄疫感染地区增加到2个道的12个市、郡，共42起。另外，感染了口蹄疫、或者为了预防需要而宰杀的家畜数量也达到约22万头。这大大超过了韩国史上最严重的2002年的16万头。
报道指出，口蹄疫疫情目前没有一点被控制的迹象。当天证实口蹄疫疫情的加平农场距14日在京畿道首次发生口蹄疫疫情的杨州猪养殖农场33公里远。防疫当局据此判断，京畿北部地区的防疫网事实上已经被突破了。
加平地区与江原道接壤，而在江原道地区，有很多类似平昌和?M城等的优秀“韩牛”品牌，再加上冬季前去滑雪的流动人口很多，移动管制并非易事，防疫当局为此已进入紧急状态。
事实上，21日下午，江原道平昌、华川郡的养牛农场都报告了牛的牙龈上出现水泡等口蹄疫疑似症状。另外，京畿道抱川的养牛农场和忠南天安的养鹿农场也举报了类似症状。如果这些地区都被判定为阳性，韩国政府将把口蹄疫危机应对级别提高至最高的“严重”。
韩国农林水产食品部部长刘正福表示，“随着口蹄疫疫情的蔓延速度加快，政府也在探讨是否使用疫苗”， “是否真的会使用疫苗，要在22日精密检查结果出来之后再作判断”。据悉，如果使用疫苗，不仅要增加大约600―700亿韩元的费用，也需要相当长的时间来恢复韩国作为“口蹄疫清净国”的地位。
报道称，口蹄疫并非人兽共患传染病，因此基本上不会传染给人类。过去，在韩国的口蹄疫疫情发生地区，接触过感染口蹄疫家畜的人中没有发现口蹄疫患者。韩国国立兽医科学检疫院的研究官朴钟现(音)表示：“口蹄疫病毒能够被50度以上的温度破坏，因此在烹饪肉类或者对牛奶进行杀菌的过程中可以被全部杀灭”，“现在市场上流通的肉类和乳制品中没有口蹄疫病毒”。口蹄疫病毒在56度的温度下30分钟即可被杀灭，在76度的温度下仅需7秒即可被杀灭。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: 奥巴马或今天前往夏威夷 开始“迟到的”假期
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据美国媒体报道，美国联邦官员已经在夏威夷安排部署，准备迎接总统奥巴马的到来。预计，奥巴马最早将可能于当地时间本周三到达，开始其“迟到的”假期。
美国联邦航空局周二低调发表公告称，夏威夷火奴鲁鲁市(即“檀香山”)当地时间周三下午5：15―7:15将在方圆10海里的范围内设置禁飞区。禁飞区设置将从周三晚上开始，持续到明年1月2号。 (博讯 boxun.com) 据报道，周二清早美国海岸警卫队已经在夏威夷凯卢阿湾(Kailua Bay)布置临时安全区了。奥巴马及“第一夫人”还有他们的两个女儿将在这里度过假期。穿越临时禁区的人将面临高达32000美元的罚款或25年的牢狱监禁。
由于夏威夷和美国东岸时间有5个小时的时差，这使得奥巴马可以周三清早在华盛顿举行废除“不问不说”军内同性恋禁令的签字仪式，或许还会在下午早些时候举行一个新闻发布会。
美国白宫官员既没确认也没否认奥巴马周三前往夏威夷度假的消息。由于美国国会还处在“跛脚会期”，奥巴马的休假得等到他出发的那一刻才能最终确定。
预计，“第一家庭”将于明年1月1日返回华盛顿。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: "عكاظ" عن مصادر ديبلوماسية: حديث خامنئي انتكاسة لمساعي التهدئة
description.content:
نقلت صحيفة "عكاظ" السعودية عن مصادر ديبلوماسية غربية في بيروت تأكيدها أن "تصريحات مرشد الجمهورية الاسلامية في إيران السيد علي خامنئي بشأن المحكمة الدولية الخاصة بلبنان ستؤثر سلباً على المساعي العربية والدولية الهادفة لضمان الاستقرار في لبنان".
وأضافت المصادر "أن موقف خامنئي جاء عكس أجواء الحوار التي كانت سائدة بين طهران وعدد من العواصم العربية والأوروبية ويشكل انتكاسة كبرى لقنوات الحوار هذه وستكون له تداعيات كبرى"، مشيرة إلى أن "هناك قناعة في الدوائر الديبلوماسية أن في إيران مسارين متناقضين في التعاطي على صعيد الشؤون الخارجية".

description.hltext_display: 美国:对恢复六方会谈不抱太大希望(图)
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：BBC中文网 白宫星期二（21日）表示，对在近期恢复为解决朝核危机的六方会谈不抱太大的希望，除非朝鲜停止挑衅行为，并实现其去核诺言。
美国特使理查森刚刚结束了他的朝鲜之行。他说，朝鲜承诺将允许国际核查人员检查其核设施， 以确认它并没有提炼浓缩铀。
白宫发言人吉布斯则说，现在的关键在于朝鲜是否能够将其言辞付诸于行动。
自朝鲜半岛爆发危机以来，中国一直敦促韩国、美国、俄罗斯以及日本重新与朝鲜进行六方会谈。
然而，中国的提议并没有得到有关各方的积极响应。韩国说，除非朝鲜坚决承诺放弃核武器，否则拒绝恢复核谈。
吉布斯也表示，只有在朝鲜表现出愿意改变其行为的诚意后，才将恢复六方会谈，否则将没有什么实质意义。
他还说，根据朝鲜在过去几个星期的表现，没有人会对朝鲜已经做好了恢复和谈的准备抱有信心。
中国表态
中国驻联合国副代表王民星期二表示，特别是在过去的两天，朝韩两国之间的敌意“几乎接近战争的边缘”。
他还说，中国以及所有联合国安理会的成员国都希望朝韩之间的紧张关系能够得到和平的解决。
上个月，朝鲜炮轰延坪岛，打死4名韩国人，导致两国紧张关系升级。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Conselho premia entidades que beneficiam as crianças
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 DIREITOS - ORM receberam congratulação por projetos do Instituto Criança Vida O Conselho Municipal dos Direitos da Criança e do Adolescente (Comdac) realizou ontem à noite, em Belém, uma cerimônia para lançar o Projeto Milhão e também homenagear com o título "Amigos da Criança" 15 personalidades e instituições que se destacam por realizar ações em favor da infância. As Organizações Romulo Maiorana (ORM) receberam o diploma da homenagem por suas importantes ações e projetos do Instituto Criança Vida. O instituto das ORM desenvolve os projetos Educar, com instalação de bibliotecas em 6 escolas municipais de Belém; O LIBERAL na Escola em mais de 3 mil escolas municipais e estaduais; o Amigos da Escola; Ação Global junto com o Sesi e o sistema S; o Projeto Igarité, com cursos e oficinas para jovens e adultos; e as organizações ainda participam da transmissão e de todas as ações do Criança Esperança, da Rede Globo, através de sua afiliada, TV Liberal. Quem recebeu a premiação pelas ORM foi a gerente executiva do Instituto Criança Vida, Cibelly Almeida. O Projeto Milhão pretende arrecadar de pessoas físicas e jurídicas recursos do Imposto de Renda para o Fundo para a Infância e Adolescência (FIA). As pessoas físicas podem contribuir com 6% do Imposto de Renda Devido e as jurídicas com 1%. O valor é deduzido do imposto. As doações e aplicações no FIA também podem ser em forma de bens. "O objetivo é fortalecer o FIA para que, através dele, seja possível ajudar ainda mais as entidades, para que as crianças e adolescentes tenham mais dignidade. Essa homenagem é para mostrar à sociedade, para que as pessoas tenham mais consciência e possam contribuir, porque é muito bom ajudar, vale a pena", declarou Marcelo Bastos. O título "Amigo da Criança" também foi entregue ao governador eleito, Simão Jatene. Isabela Jatene, filha dele, recebeu o diploma em nome do pai. O Condac concedeu o título ainda ao prefeito Duciomar Costa, ao arcebispo de Belém, dom Alberto Taveira, à diretora do Centro de Estudos Objetivo, Maria Augusta Rodrigues Bastos, e à ex-presidente da Funpapa, Maria Costa. Leia Mais Natal ecológico é presente de Benevides HC recusa pacientes renais crônicos Morador de rua é ignorado pelo Samu Sesma intensifica combate à dengue CTBel estuda instalar novos radares Projeto levará bibliotecas às 144 cidades do Estado Dom Vicente Zico é homenageado com selo Paraense alimenta sonhos com a Mega-Sena da virada Email: redacao@orm.com.br

description.hltext_display: 伯南克:失业率及财政赤字是美国经济面临的主要问题
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：FX168 美联储(FED)主席伯南克(Ben Bernanke)表示，失业率和财政赤字高企是美国经济面临的主要问题。
在《时代》(Time)杂志网站上周五(12月17日)发布的伯南克答读者提问中，伯南克称，虽然美联储采取了宽松的货币政策，但美国仍有大批失业人群，这种情况"没有快速解决之道"。 伯南克强调，长期预算赤字是国会需要解决的关键问题，他已经在过去一年中反复强调这一点。他警告称如果不能解决这一问题，将会阻碍经济增长，并增加金融危机的风险。 (博讯 boxun.com) 尽管美国经济在差不多18个月前重新开始增长，但经济此次从深度衰退中的复苏过于缓慢以至于无法降低失业率，目前美国失业率处在9.8%。上周四(12月16日)美国国会通过减税法案，这将有助于提振经济复苏，但也将促使预算赤字进一步上升。
伯南克表示，国会努力在长期内实现一个更好的均衡是非常重要的。
虽然问题重重，但伯南克对美国经济表示乐观，称他相信在可预见的未来美元仍将是主导的储备货币。还称，美国的优势在于拥有颇具深度且流动性较强的金融市场。
伯南克还称，中国将在全球经济发展中扮演关键角色，同时中国终将允许人民币升值，人民币价值终将接近市场价值。
有读者问伯南克是否认为美国拥有最好的经济体系，伯南克回答："从为人类创造财富的角度来看，我们的基于受到一定监管指引的自由市场的经济体系被证明是历史上最成功的。"
伯南克是前普林斯顿大学教授，他曾在2009年12月当选时代杂志年度人物。 _(博讯自由发稿区发稿) (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Paraense alimenta sonhos com a Mega-Sena da virada
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 RECORDE - Prêmio deve chegar a R$ 150 milhões, o maior já pago até hoje pela Caixa Quem gosta de apostar em loterias vai passar mais um ano novo de olho na Mega da Virada 2010, que pode pagar o maior prêmio das loterias no Brasil. A previsão é de R$ 150 milhões para quem acertar as seis dezenas do último concurso do ano. De hoje até o fim do mês, os apostadores da Caixa Econômica Federal também podem concorrer a mais uma série de sorteios e prêmios especiais oferecidos pela instituição. Na véspera de Natal, haverá ainda o sorteiro da Loteria Federal Especial de Natal, com o prêmio principal de R$ 3,9 milhões nas três séries. O concurso 1242 da Mega-Sena, realizado ontem, acumulou. Para o próximo sorteio, o prêmio será de R$ 29 milhões. Serão realizadas mais duas extrações da Mega-Sena ainda neste ano, amanhã e sexta-feira (24). Também no dia 31 de dezembro tem sorteio da Milionária Federal de Ano Novo, com prêmio de R$ 1 milhão. Já a semana que antecede o Ano Novo também será a reta final da Mega da Virada 2010, que pode pagar o maior prêmio das loterias no Brasil. A previsão é de R$ 150 milhões para que quem acertar as seis dezenas do último concurso do ano. Na semana do Ano Novo não haverá sorteios regulares da Mega-Sena, apenas a Mega da Virada. description.hltext_display: El DAX se mantiene en los 7.078 puntos y sube apenas un 0,05 %
description.content:
Berlín, 22 dic (EFE).- La bolsa de Fráncfort abrió hoy con leve tendencia al alza y en la apertura el índice de referencia DAX 30 subía un 0,05 por ciento hasta situarse en 7.080 enteros. EFE

description.hltext_display: 華潤燃氣於二零一零年十二月二十二日舉行的股東特別大會的投票結果
description.content: 本公司宣布，於二零一零年十二月二十二日舉行的股東特別大會上提呈的普通決議案未獲通過，原因是投票贊成普通決議案的票數不足。------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------茲提述本公司於二零一零年十二月六日刊發的通函（「該通函」）。除文義另有所指外，本公告所用詞匯與該通函所界定者具相同涵義。董事會宣布，股東特別大會通告所載的普通決議案并未獲本公司獨立股東於股東特別大會上通過，原因是投票贊成該普通決議案的票數不足。於股東特別大會上提呈的普通決議案的投票結果詳情如下：－已投票的股份數目普通決議案（百分比）投票總數贊成反對批準貸款總協議（定義見本公司的86,191,904 117,560,466 203,752,370通函）及本公司及其附屬公司根據(42.30%)(57.70%)貸款總協議於任何時間可貸出的年度上限最高總額。於股東特別大會舉行日期，本公司已發行合共1,831,094,933股本公司股份。就有關普通決議案而言，誠如該通函所述，華潤集團公司作為本公司控股股東持有本公司1,250,186,206股股份，相當於股東特別大會舉行日期本公司已發行股本總額約68.28%，連同其聯系人於股東特別大會上已就普通決議案放棄投票。因此，股東有權出席股東特別大會并於會上表決贊成或反對普通決議案的股份總數為580,908,727股股份，相當於股東特別大會舉行日期本公司已發行股本總額約31.72%。概無任何股份僅賦權股東出席股東特別大會但僅可就會上提出的普通決議案投反對票。本公司的股份過戶登記分處卓佳秘書商務有限公司獲委任於股東特別大會上就點票一事擔任監票人。

description.hltext_display: S&P 500 companies more than double 3rd quarter buybacks
description.content:
BOSTON - Companies are using extra cash built up during the recession to repurchase stock, moves that are likely to please investors who see the value of their shares rise.
But the buyback surge may not please President Obama, who is urging companies to instead use surplus cash to hire more workers, hoping to generate jobs to sustain the economic recovery.
Standard & Poor's reported Monday that stock repurchases by S&P 500 companies more than doubled to $79.6 billion in the July-to-September period from $34.9 billion in last year's third quarter.
It was the fifth consecutive quarter of increasing buyback activity among the 500 largest publicly traded companies, many of them with substantial cash holdings built up during and after the recession that officially ended in mid-2009.
Stock buybacks indicate companies have enough cash to take their shares off the market, which increases the value of investors' remaining shares, and boosts per-share earnings results.
Buyback growth in the latest quarter "marks the full return of corporate participation in the equity markets," S&P analyst Howard Silverblatt said. "While we do not expect a return to the 2005-2007 buyback bonanza, we do see this as a strong, positive sign for the overall health of the market."
However, stock repurchases aren't rebounding as rapidly as they were earlier. The latest quarter's buyback figure is up just 3 percent from the second quarter's total of $77.6 billion. That's a significant slowdown from double-digit percentage increases in each of the preceding four quarter-to-quarter comparisons.
Obama met at the White House last week with 20 CEOs, urging corporate America to shake loose $1.9 trillion in untapped cash and create more jobs by hiring and investing in their businesses. Obama is trying to cut a national unemployment rate that rose to 9.8 percent in November and is slowing the broader economic recovery.
But many companies are reluctant to take cash off the sidelines, fearing consumer demand for the goods and services they provide is still too meager to support more hiring or capital spending. Companies also are reluctant to spend until the outlook for new government regulations becomes more clear. The latter worry could ease because of last week's congressional agreement to keep in place Bush era tax rates.
When companies build up cash from rising profits, their options include hiring more workers, investing in capital spending or acquisitions, buying back stock, and raising dividends paid to shareholders.
Many companies have been opting for the latter two, which please shareholders.
Much of the recent buyback surge has been driven by technology companies, which fared better than most corporations through the recession because they entered it with relatively little debt, and have seen demand for their products hold up. In the latest quarter, information technology companies, including Microsoft Corp., Hewlett-Packard Co. and IBM Corp., made up nearly 29 percent of all buybacks, up from 27 percent in the second quarter.
Wal-Mart Stores Inc. and Exxon Mobil Corp. were among the other names making large buybacks in the latest quarter.
Health care companies repurchased less stock, with their share of buybacks slipping to 13 percent in the third quarter from 19 percent in the second.
Silverblatt expects a slight overall increase in buybacks in the fourth quarter. For the first part of next year, he expects companies will continue to be cautious and refrain from purchasing an excessive amount of shares.
Dividend payouts by U.S. corporations also are expected to rise this year. Third-quarter dividend payouts totaled $51.3 billion for S&P 500 companies, and are nearly back to their first-quarter 2009 level of $51.7 billion.
But Silverblatt said last week that payouts likely won't return to 2008 levels until 2013.

description.hltext_display: 韩国从22日起在东海岸举行为期3天海军射击演习
description.content:
请看博讯热点：朝鲜半岛局势
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据韩联社报道，韩国方面表示，计划从本周三(12月22日)至周五(12月24日)举行海军射击演习，出动海军舰艇及反潜直升机。
报道称，韩国国防部表示，目前仍在西海岸维持高度警戒态势，以应对未来可能的“朝鲜出其不意的挑衅”。 (博讯 boxun.com) 韩国军方同时表示，计划从12月22日开始在东海岸举行为期3天的海军射击演习。据称，此次演习将出动6艘海军舰艇，进行发炮演习，并出动山猫式(Lynx)反潜直升机。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Dom Vicente Zico é homenageado com selo
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 Aniversário - Edição especial foi lançada ontem pelos Correios, na Presidente Vargas O arcebispo emérito de Belém, Dom Vicente Zico, é uma das personalidades que deverá se perpetuar na memória dos paraenses. Ele foi homenageado pela Empresa Brasileira de Correios e Telégrafo, por meio da diretoria regional do Pará, com o lançamento de um selo em comemoração aos 60 anos de seu sacerdócio, ontem à tarde, na auditório da sede dos Correios, na avenida Presidente Vargas, na Campina. A homenagem aconteceu durante missa celebrada pelo arcebispo de Belém, Dom Alberto Taveira, e pelo diácono Marvaz, da igreja de Nossa Senhora das Mercês. Segundo Antônio Castro, diretor regional adjunto dos Correios, que realizou o lançamento do selo personalizado, a homenagem é feita a quem tem mais destaque para a sociedade paraense. "Os Correios sempre pertuaram, por meio da emissão de selos e postais, as datas comemorativas e os eventos relevantes no contexto das instituições nacionais. Cada selo passa a fazer parte do acervo iconográfico, bibliográfico e histórico dos Correios, além de compor coleções de filatelistas de todo o mundo, perpetuando para as futuras gerações os fatos merecedores de registro histórico", afirma. Como forma de retribuir, Dom Vicente Zico afirma expressar sentimentos que vêm do coração. "É uma maravilha celebrar tanto tempo de vida como padre. Sou muito feliz pela vocação que tenho e mais ainda pela missão que Deus me confiou. Nesse tempo, me volto para a população do Pará e da Arquidiocese de Belém, que sempre me trataram com muito carinho em especial nos 60 anos. Devo dizer que amo muito o povo de Belém. O selo marca uma presença e a minha mensagem é no sentido de solicitar que todos queiram que eu seja, cada vez mais, digno daquele (Deus) a quem estou servindo e seja para todos também o que é o selo de Deus em nossa vida: o Espírito Santo em nós". Dom Alberto Taveira também agradeceu ao arcebispo emérito de Belém pelos 60 anos de seu sacerdócio. "A arquidiocese se alegra com a presença dele e posso dizer que dom Vicente é um tesouro na nossa comunidade. Tenho o coração muito agradecido pela sua presença. Essa homenagem é também uma forma de dizer o que a igreja representa para a população". O selo de Dom Vicente Zico poderá circular por todo o País. Para o lançamento a tiragem foi de 600 selos. A arte do selo fica nos Correios e quem quiser reproduzir basta procurar a agência dos Correios na avenida Presidente Vargas. description.hltext_display: Projeto levará bibliotecas às 144 cidades do Estado
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 Sistema - Até março de 2011, a meta já deverá ter sido finalizada, diz diretor do SEBP Até março de 2011, todos os 144 municípios paraenses vão ter bibliotecas públicas em funcionamento. Foi o que anunciou, ontem pela manhã, o diretor do Sistema Estadual de Bibliotecas do Pará (SEBP), Sérgio Massoud. O SEBP é mantido pela Fundação Cultural "Tancredo Neves". O anúncio foi feito durante a apresentação do relatório de atividades deste ano às entidades parceiras do SEBP. Representantes de associações de municípios, Instituto Criança Vida e Organizações Romulo Maiorana (ORM) participaram do encontro. Todos os 144 municípios paraenses serão contemplados com os kits do Ministério da Cultura (MinC), que oferece suporte material para a instalação de bibliotecas municipais. De acordo com o Massoud, as prefeituras já receberam ou vão receber do governo federal mais de dois mil livros, mobiliário, computadores e acesso à internet. O Estado, por meio da Fundação Cultural "Tancredo Neves", fez o assessoramento técnico que verificou o número de municípios que ainda não haviam instalado bibliotecas públicas e também as condições estruturais das que já estão em funcionamento. Mas os técnicos do SEBP também vão treinar os funcionários quando as bibliotecas forem, de fato, instaladas. "Essa parceria entre as três esferas de governo foi importante porque mostrou que podemos contribuir para a difusão da cultura. Até março do ano que vem, todas as cidades do Pará terão bibliotecas municipais", frisou Massoud. description.hltext_display: Delta To Build Board Gate At KIA
description.content:
A leading US carrier, Delta Airlines, has begun the construction of a boarding gate at the Kotoka International Airport (KIA) to facilitate the operations of the carrier to and from Accra.
Mr Ned Walker, Senior Vice President and Chief Communications Officer of Delta, told a group of journalist at the airline headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia that when completed, the gate would enhance the operations of the carrier from Accra to New York and Atlanta.
Delta operates three times weekly non-stop services from Accra to Atlanta and five times weekly non-stop services to New York.
Mr Walker said Delta was collaborating with Ghanaian Aviation authorities such as the Ghana Airport Company and the Ghana Civil Aviation Authority(GCAA) in the construction of the boarding gate which he said could be made available for use by other airlines in due course.
He expressed the hope that the additional gate at KIA would boost the operations of the airline as well as the airport which had become a major hub on the African continent.
Mr Walker announced that Delta would add its eight African destination with services between Atlanta and Luanda, Angola effective January 20, 2011, adding that the flight would operate three times weekly via Dakar, Senegal and would be the only direct link between Angola and the United States.
Dakar thus joins Accra as the second African city with non-stop services to two of Delta’s hub in the United States.
Mr Walker also told journalists that Delta had plans to serve up to 10 African destinations from the United States, with aircraft ready to begin service pending US and foreign government approvals.
The airline intends to serve Malabo,Equitorial Guinea and Niarobi,Kenya once government approval is received.
He indicated that passengers flying Delta’s non-stop services from Africa benefit from time savings of up to six hours compared to flying via European hub.
According to Mr Walker,Delta’s African services offered greater convenience to cargo shippers and freight forwarder providing numerous wide-body shipments to major US cities via Atlanta and New York.
He said Africa would remain a strategic partner in the airlines operations for now and in the future.
Delta launched its first African Services in December 2006 with routes to Dakar, Johannesburg and Accra.
The airline is expanding international terminals at its largest gateways in New York and Atlanta. Delta has begun a project to expand and enhance Terminal 4 at JFK to create a modern facility to enhance the customer experience of passengers by mid 2013 while a new international concourse will open in Atlanta in mid 2012.
Mr Walker said when all these projects are completed, the airline would introduce full flat-bed seats in Business Elite,in-seat entertainment for both business and economy class customers on all trans-oceanic wide-body flights.
Since 2006 Delta has transported 322,457 passengers to and from Ghana.

description.hltext_display: 维基解密:巴以曾合作“分享几乎所有情报”
description.content:
请看博讯热点：维基解密
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据新加坡《联合早报》22日报道，维基解密网站最新披露的美国外交电文显示，巴勒斯坦激进组织“哈马斯”在2007年接管加沙后，效忠于巴勒斯坦总统阿巴斯的部队曾与以色列合作，包括与以色列“分享几乎所有情报”。
以色列已经承认，曾和效忠阿巴斯的巴勒斯坦当局安全部队一道工作，但是外泄电文称双方属于合作，这肯定会引来阿巴斯对手的批评。 (博讯 boxun.com) 根据这份2007年的电文，以色列内安局局长迪斯金说，巴勒斯坦当局保安部队跟以色列分享了“几乎所有他们收集到的情报”。
他还称赞他的机构与阿巴斯的保安部队有“非常好的工作关系”。
电文说：“他们知道在约旦河西岸与哈马斯的斗争中，以色列的安全是他们生存的关键。”
这份2007年13日的电报是从美国驻特拉维夫大使馆发出的，当时哈马斯已经接管加沙地带，阿巴斯只能控制以色列占领的西岸地区。
电文引述迪斯金的话称，阿巴斯的保安部队是“绝望、组织混乱和士气低落的”。迪斯金还说“法塔赫”部分党员甚至要求以色列攻打哈马斯。他告诉美国官员：“他们接近于零和状况，要求我们去攻击哈马斯。这是最新的发展，以前我们从未遇到过，他们不顾一切了。” (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: CTBel estuda instalar novos radares
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 Em 2011 - Belém tem somente 11 aparelhos, que registraram mais de 38 mil infrações Apesar de poucos, os 11 radares de trânsito da Companhia de Transportes do Município de Belém (CTBel) já registraram 38.560 infrações das mais de 139 mil multas aplicadas de janeiro a novembro deste ano. Entre elas avanço de sinal, excesso de velocidade e paradas sobre as faixas de pedestres. Diferente da fiscalização humana, não há como contestar quando uma multa chega à casa do condutor e nem possibilidades de corrupção. Com 165 agentes de trânsito (65 da CTBel e mais 100 da Guarda Municipal de Belém), média de autuação de um agente é de 2,7 multas por dia, com um total de 445 no período citado. Há uma estimativa de 13% de falhas, o que num cálculo bruto resultaria em torno de 380 por dia e 11.600 por mês. Cada radar aplica em média 10 multas por dia. A média diária da fiscalização eletrônica é superior a 110 flagrantes, chegando a marca de 3.500 por mês. Com um quantitativo de menos de um décimo do total de agentes, os radares conseguem alcançar 30% do total de autuações dos guardas. O diretor de Trânsito da CTBel, Elias Jardim, garante que se houvessem mais radares, certamente a fiscalização e o respeito dos condutores pelo trânsito seria maior. Ele afirma que Belém tem uma quantidade pequena de radares comparada a outras capitais. "Fortaleza, por exemplo, possui 250 radares. Brasília tem mais de 400. Por isso estamos pensando em aumentar esse número de radares no ano que vem. Estamos pensando em estabelecer mais 20 ou 30 pontos", diz. description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:国际在线 英国外交大臣黑格21日证实，英国和俄罗斯互相驱逐了一名外交官。
黑格当天在一份向议会提交的声明中说，本月10日，由于俄罗斯驻英使馆的一名外交官从事间谍活动，损害了英国利益。英方做出回应，要求俄方撤回这名外交官。而俄方在16日也要求一名英国驻俄外交官离境。英国对此表示反对。黑格证实，这两名外交官都已经分别返回了自己的国家。黑格说，在俄罗斯尊重英国法律的基础上，英国愿意与之保持更具活力的关系。 (博讯 boxun.com) 英俄两国关系在2007年曾遭重创。当时，因俄罗斯前特工利特维年科在伦敦遇害，英国和俄罗斯互相驱逐了数名外交官。2008年，俄罗斯以从事不合法为由，关闭了英国文化处在其境内开设的数个办公机构。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Michaël Youn bientôt papa
description.author: web@soirmag.be (Avec les rédactions du Soir Magazine, d’
description.content: Michaël Youn sera bientôt papa. Selon ?Le Parisien?, Isabelle Funaro, la compagne de l?acteur, attend un enfant. La belle serait enceinte de trois mois et demi. Le couple devrait accueillir une petite fille. Ce sera le premier enfant de Michaël Youn. Sa compagne est déjà maman d?un petit Sean, onze ans, né de sa relation avec Pascal Obispo.

description.hltext_display: "Little Fockers" set to unseat "Tron" at box office
description.author: Pamela McClintock
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Hollywood Reporter) Exactly six years after "Meet the Fockers" launched its successful run, "Little Fockers" opens in theaters on Wednesday with every chance of winning the Christmas holiday box office derby.
Universal insiders expect the latest sequel to "Meet the Parents" sequel to gross about $60 million during the five-day Wednesday-to-Sunday frame. "Meet the Fockers," by contrast, grossed $70.5 million in the same period, and ended up with about $280 million domestically. Critics hated the new film more than they did the previous one.
Still, the latest entry in the broad-comedy series should unseat Disney's reigning champ "Tron: Legacy," which is playing more narrowly than expected. The sci-fi saga opened to a three-day haul of about $44 million last weekend.
Starring franchise players Ben Stiller and Robert De Niro, "Little Fockers" also sees the return of Barbra Streisand and Dustin Hoffman. Hoffman's last-minute return to the cast required reshoots.
Universal, Relativity Media and Paramount Pictures are equal partners in "Fockers," which cost $100 million to make. Paramount is distributing overseas.
Also opening Wednesday is the Coen Brothers' Western remake "True Grit." Paramount is looking for a five-day haul of about $20 million, but rival studio executives say it could do more. The $38 million awards-season contender is tracking best among men. Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon and Josh Brolin star.
Originally, Fox was going to open its 3D family film "Gulliver's Travels." At the 11th hour, the studio decided to push back the release to Christmas Day to allow more time for marketing and to distance it from other 3D titles.
Opening Wednesday on the specialty side is Sofia Coppola's "Somewhere," a father-daughter story starring Stephen Dorff and Elle Fanning. The Focus Features release debuts in seven theaters in New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Chicago, Boston and Washington.
Screen Gems opens the Gwyneth Paltrow-Garrett Hudlund Nashville vehicle "Country Strong" in two theaters in New York and Los Angeles for an awards-qualifying run. It opens nationwide January 7.

description.hltext_display: Sesma intensifica combate à dengue
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 PREVENÇÃO - Agentes visitam áreas de risco de proliferação do Aedes aegypti Agentes da Secretaria Municipal de Saúde (Sesma) visitaram ontem as residências da travessa Pirajá, no bairro da Pedreira, considerada uma área de risco de foco de dengue, devido à falta de saneamento básico no canal. Durante as visitas, os agentes conscientizavam os moradores sobre a importância de se manter a higiene da casa. "O morador tem que observar a existência de água parada no quintal ou em qualquer outro local que pode servir de criadouro para o mosquito. Em caso de febre alta é aconselhável procurar um posto de saúde", explicou a agente de saúde Carla Jaqueline Vieira, enquanto vistoriava o quintal de um imóvel do bairro. De janeiro a novembro deste ano, foram detectados 1.544 casos em Belém, quase 200 casos a mais do que no mesmo período do ano anterior, quando foram registrados 1.105. A casa da autônoma Valdomira Guedes, de 42 anos, foi uma das visitadas pelos agentes. Ela tem o costume de verificar se a água da chuva não ficou empoçada nos recipientes, o que pode facilitar a proliferação do Aedes aegypti, mosquito transmissor da dengue. "Já tive casos da doença em casa, por isso fico muito preocupada só de imaginar que o mosquito pode estar se proliferando em minha casa. A primeira coisa que faço ao acordar é verificar os vasos, pois em dia de chuva a atenção tem de ser redobrada", comentou. As residências em área com grande incidência da doença foram os principais alvos das visitas. "Acho importante este tipo de abordagem, pois nesta época do ano a atenção tem que ser redobrada. Meu marido já teve dengue há três anos e sofreu bastante com a doença", afirmou a dona-de-casa Leonéia Alves Campos. Enquanto recebia a visita dos agentes de combate à dengue, ela enumerava os cuidados que toma para proteger a família da doença. "Limpo o quintal, seco os vasos de plantas e ainda verifico a questão do lixo. São cuidados necessários e que todo morador deveria ter para se proteger. Ninguém está livre da contaminação do mosquito, pois não temos acesso às casas vizinhas, mas procuro fazer a minha parte", comentou a moradora, enquanto recebia orientações dos agentes. De acordo com Inete Ribeiro, coordenadora de controle da dengue, a falta de conscientização dos moradores é o principal problema enfrentado no combate da doença. "Os técnicos estão nas ruas todos os dias, mas a população tem que fazer a sua parte. É uma questão de educação, pois não adianta receber orientação de saúde e depois não colocar em prática. O morador tem que ser o maior agente da saúde. Temos caso de imóvel onde foi detectada a incidência do mosquito e que, mesmo assim, o morador não melhorou o ambiente. Infelizmente, os avanços são mínimos, pois o morador precisa fazer a parte dele", declarou a coordenadora do programa. description.hltext_display: Sim free mobile phones- Choose your network with the freedom of choosing the mobile
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 22, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Getting the mobile phone can be helped through various deals formats. Mostly offered deals come in a package format that includes the sim connection and a mobile phone of either of the brand. The sim connection is a kind of compulsion that comes with the mobile phone through these deals. But the solutions of these have come out in the form of the sim free mobile phones. The Sim free phones deals offer a mobile phone only regardless of the networking connection. The deals offer the customers the benefit of using the old sim connection even with the new mobile phone. The customers may also proceed for the new sim connection through sim only deals.They may get the sim connection of the networks like the Vodafone, 3, Virgin Media, O2, Orange, T-Mobile, etc.The sim free deals offer the customers the freedom to go for the new mobile phone at any point of time without scaring from the breaching of the contract. The customers have the full freedom to change either their mobile numbers or even their mobile handset at any point of time irrespective of the contract terms.
The sim free phones deals also have the edge over the other types of formats with the benefit of providing the customers with the cheap prices of the deals. The deals come for the very low costs as it does not involve any of the networks. However, if you want to go for the network connection along with the mobile phone you may select the pay as you go mobile phones deals. These sorts of deals have also been providing the customers with the cheap communication facilities. The deals come with the freedom for the customers as these allow the customers to go for the top-up of their own wish and helps them avoid the hefty monthly bills.Finding either of the deals can be best done with the help of internet. Many online price comparison portals are providing the customers with the facility of comparing the deals for the best of the benefits.

description.hltext_display: 泰国8个月紧急状态法终解除 百余红衫军或保释
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据新加坡《联合早报》网站报道，12月22日，泰国正式解除在曼谷和周边三府实施了8个月的紧急状态令。总理阿披实此前说，内阁已下令当局考虑让被控较轻罪名的104名红衫军成员保释的问题，但刑事法院仍旧有最后决定权。
红衫军代主席提达欢迎这一保释行动，指出政府也应让被控恐怖罪名的红衫军领袖获得保释。 (博讯 boxun.com) 提达是被关押的红衫军领袖文?多集拉甘的妻子。报道称，阿披实五天前同她举行首次会谈，讨论让红衫军被拘禁领袖和这104人保释的问题。
政府副发言人苏帕猜稍后说：“内阁评估了当前局势，发现示威者的活动比较温和。”但他警告，如果政府预见到暴力活动死灰复燃，将引用内部安全法令。内安令授权政府实施宵禁和禁止集会等措施，但必须取得法院令状才可关押反对派人士。
政府发言人巴尼探也警告说，如果“内阁认为内安令无法应对局势，将再次动用特别(紧急状态)法令”。
今年3月起，红衫军占据曼谷商业区和国会大厦场地，进行反政府游行示威活动，迫使政府4月7日在曼谷和23府实施紧急状态令。军队接着在5月19日开始镇压曼谷的示威活动。这场泰国最严重的政治动乱，最终导致91人死亡，1800多人受伤。
红衫军方面和多个人权组织指责泰国政府利用紧急状态法令侵犯人权，以及对付反对派和扼杀自由言论。
据悉，这项法令授予军警广泛的权力，可以不需法院令状就逮捕、搜查和监视反对派人士，也可不需控状就拘禁反对派人士30天，以及审查传媒的新闻报道。法令也不准举行规模超过五人的集会。不过，从5月至今，红衫军已多次举行和平集会，最近集会于19日在曼谷举行，吸引1万多人参加。
针对红衫军宣称今后将在每月10日和19日举行集会示威的问题，泰国主管安全事务的副总理素贴表示，安全人员必须更加努力地工作，以应对紧急状态令解除后可能出现的越来越多的集会示威活动。
他说，他并不过分担心红衫军的集会会扩大到其它府，虽然红衫军声称要加强抗议示威力度，但政府仍考虑用内安法令来规范、处理示威者的不法行为。
陆军参谋长巴育表示，军方注意到红衫军明年定期集会示威的计划。他说，如果情况演变成暴力冲突，紧急状态令还可恢复，军队也将随时准备履行自己的职责。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Morador de rua é ignorado pelo Samu
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 CANUDOS - Homem passou mal na calçada e teve atendimento negado pelo 192 Os moradores do bairro de Canudos, em Belém, fizeram, ontem pela manhã, denúncia contra uma equipe do Serviço de Atendimento Móvel de Urgência (Samu). De acordo com eles, a equipe do Samu teria se recusado a prestar atendimento a um morador de rua, que passava mal sentado numa calçada de uma empresa de cigarros localizada à avenida Cipriano Santos, na esquina com a rua Teófilo Conduru. De acordo com funcionários da empresa, o morador de rua começou a passar mal no início da manhã. "Vimos que ele começou a se tremer e parecia que estava tendo um ataque de epilepsia. Uma moradora da área telefonou para o Samu e ficamos aqui, esperando a chegada do atendimento", disse o funcionário Chardia Góes. "Ele estava sentado no mesmo local desde a última sexta-feira, debaixo de sol e chuva. Talvez por isso tenha passado mal", complementou o funcionário Luís Kimura. A filha da dona-de-casa Dionélia Vasconcelos foi quem telefonou para o número do Samu. "Minha filha avisou o 192 e a ambulância chegou bem rápido. Mas, como ele é morador de rua e ninguém sabe o nome ou se ele tem família, os atendentes do Samu disseram que não poderiam se responsabilizar por ele, já que não havia um acompanhante. Isso é um absurdo!", protestou. description.hltext_display: 英警方称恐怖分子策划袭击英国会大厦与购物中心
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源:中国新闻网 据外电报道，英国安保官员21日透露称，恐怖分子正在策划对英国地标性建筑与公共场所发动大规模的恐怖袭击。20日，警方逮捕了12名恐怖嫌疑人，正在对他们进行审问。
20日，英国警方发动了近2年来最大规模的反恐搜捕行动，抓获了12名涉嫌策划发动恐怖袭击的嫌疑人。12人均为男性，年龄介于17到28岁之间，其中至少5人为孟加拉裔。 (博讯 boxun.com) 英国政府反恐部门主管卡利勒(Lord Carlile)21日表示，这个恐袭阴谋看起来规模很大，涉及好几个英国城市，但他没有透露具体的恐袭目标。警方最多有28天时间来决定对12名男子加以起诉或释放。
由于调查仍在进行之中，不愿透露姓名的安保官员说，恐怖分子计划袭击伦敦国会大厦与英国各地的购物中心。
但安保官员说，这个袭击计划与今年秋天安保部门破获的恐怖分子准备在欧洲发动类似孟买爆炸的案件无关。
20日的抓捕行动，也与上星期在瑞典发生的自杀式爆炸袭击无关。12名嫌疑人策划发动的这次袭击看起来也不像是准备在圣诞节期间发动。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: HC recusa pacientes renais crônicos
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 ENTRAVE - Leitos são ocupados por pacientes que já deveriam ter tido alta há seis meses O Hospital de Clínicas (HC) está recusando pacientes renais crônicos. Há 31 pacientes internados, sendo que 21 estão em condições de receber alta há seis meses, mas os leitos não são disponibilizados porque a Secretaria Municipal de Saúde (Sesma) ainda não liberou o encaminhamento dessas pessoas. Enquanto isso, a lista de espera para a instituição tem pelo menos 31 doentes. Alguns estão esperando desde junho. Uma das razões para que isso esteja acontecendo é que um recurso de R$ 4 milhões para média e alta complexidade ainda não foi repassado pela Sesma aos hospitais, desde agosto deste ano. Por enquanto, somente pacientes da capital estão sendo aceitos. A diretora da Associação dos Renais Crônicos e Transplantados do Estado do Pará (ARCT-PA), Belina Soares, afirma que há pacientes esperando há mais de seis meses por leitos ocupados por pessoas com alta. Ela critica a Sesma por não respeitar o fluxo de pacientes. Assim que um paciente pode ser liberado, deve ser encaminhado a outro hospital da rede conveniada e liberar o leito para doentes com maior urgência. Enquanto persistem os problemas com repasse de recursos, a população é penalizada com falta de leitos e atendimentos. A lista de espera por hemodiálise em Belém chega a ter 180 pessoas. A lista de quem espera por um transplante é de 800 nomes. "Essa fila não anda. A Sociedade Brasileira de Nefrologia (SBN) aponta que o número de pacientes renais crônicos aumenta 10% a cada ano, enquanto que o número de profissionais para estas pessoas sobe no máximo 3% ao ano. Na região Norte tudo é mais precário. Temos somente sete serviços de diálise. Falta humanização, mais atenção da Sesma e vontade política de resolver esses problemas e não deixar a população sofrer", comenta Belina. Uma assistente social da clínica médica do HC, que preferiu não revelar o próprio nome, diz que o problema tem sido cada vez pior. Há pacientes renais crônicos de municípios do interior que não recebem atendimento. Mesmo os pacientes cadastrados para fazer hemodiálise não conseguem. As vagas que estão sendo procuradas deveriam estar disponíveis. "Tenho uma lista de 21 pacientes que poderiam ter alta e liberar os leitos para quem precisa. Mas com a falta desse recurso de R$ 4 milhões, começam a ocorrer problemas como esses, de recusar pacientes porque não há como atender. E não há vagas nos outros municípios com atendimento, como Ananindeua, Marituba e Castanhal. Nesse caso, Belém deveria ser obrigada a receber essas pessoas", critica. A Secretaria Municipal de Saúde (Sesma) garantiu, em nota, que o repasse dos recursos vem sendo feito aos hospitais prestadores de serviços, mas não no valor integral das faturas apresentadas por esses hospitais. A Secretaria discorda dos valores apresentados nas faturas. Por essa razão, a secretaria está realizando uma auditoria nesses valorese só depois vai negociar o repasse das diferenças. Porém, não comentou o problema da liberação de leitos e dificuldade em liberar os encaminhamentos. Enquanto isso, os pacientes continuam na fila, com a saúde ameaçada pela inércia das autoridades competentes. description.hltext_display: 西班牙通过最严禁烟令 室内外公共场所一律禁烟
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：国际在线 据英国广播公司、《蒙特利尔公报》12月22日消息，西班牙议会下院21日正式投票通过了新的禁烟条例，从明年1月2日开始，包括酒吧、餐馆、赌场在内的所有室内公共场所，以及学校操场、医院等室外公共场所，一律禁烟。这一新的禁烟令被认为是西班牙史上最严格的禁烟条例，也使西班牙跻身欧洲禁烟最严格的国家行列。
这项新的禁烟议案是由西班牙首相萨帕特罗及其领导的工人社会党(简称工社党)于今年10月提出的，21日在议会下院以189票赞成、154票反对顺利通过。从2011年1月2日起，西班牙所有室内公共场合，比如酒吧、餐厅、咖啡厅等，将全部禁烟，不再单设吸烟区；电视台、医院附近、学校操场等室外场合也全面禁烟。当天，议会下院还驳回了给赌场开绿灯，允许赌场吸烟的请求。 (博讯 boxun.com) 新禁烟令同时规定，违反禁烟令的私营企业，最高将被处以近60万欧元(523万人民币)的罚金。
新的禁烟令遭到西班牙酒吧、咖啡厅营业者的强烈反对，称这一做法会严重影响他们的生意；不过医生却普遍称赞政府的决定，认为新的禁烟令将有助于强迫“烟鬼”戒烟。据悉，西班牙每天都有160人死于直接吸烟引发的疾病，或被动吸烟造成的慢性伤害。
西班牙卫生部长莱尔(Leire Pajin)呼吁公众理解政府的做法，为新禁烟令的执行分担更多的责任。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Natal ecológico é presente de Benevides
description.content: Edição de 21/12/2010 Decoração - Ruas da cidade estão enfeitadas com mais de um milhão de garrafas de plástico Com cerca de um milhão de garrafas pet recicladas, o clima natalino tomou conta do município de Benevides. Com o tema 'Um Presente para Você', as principais ruas da cidade foram decoradas com a ajuda da comunidade e de 15 mil estudantes. O Natal ecologicamente correto contou com enfeitos produzidos a partir de materiais reaproveitados do lixo para a confecção de árvores, bolas, velas, guirlandas, sino dos ventos e luminárias, criando um universo de folhas e flores. O Natal de Benevides se estenderá até o dia 6 de janeiro. Na Igreja de Nossa Senhora do Carmo, a atração principal foi um presépio montado em tamanho real. Os adornos, que decoram o prédio da prefeitura e das secretarias do município, localizados no centro da cidade, foram estendidos ao píer e à praça principal de Benfica, distrito de Benevides. Para a confecção dos objetos natalinos, há sete meses, 150 pessoas contratadas pela prefeitura local participam de oficinas, ministradas pela proprietária da empresa que produz a decoração natalina de Gramado (RS). A decoração urbana chamou a atenção de turistas, além da população local. A roraimense Jezany Sintra, de 35 anos, professora, mora em Benevides há um ano e ficou encantada com os enfeites reciclados como meio de educação ambiental. 'Há riqueza nos detalhe, é arte mesmo. Cada lugarzinho tem um detalhe. Fico feliz de morar em uma cidade tão bonita. Dá orgulho de ver. A reutilização dos materiais virou um espetáculo para a cidade. Souberam canalizar o que era do lixo para virar arte', afirmou. Para o africano, da cidade de Benin, Marcel Obossa, de 26 anos, o evento é uma inovação turística. 'Já vi coisas assim em Madri, na Espanha. Mas é uma inovação muito boa; é um ponto positivo para o turismo. Essa beleza atrai pessoas que tiram fotos desde a entrada de Benevides', observou. description.hltext_display: قنبلة على محل لبيع المشروبات الروحية في القاسمية ومصرع عاملين سوريين في الضنية
description.content:
ذكرت "الوكالة الوطنية للاعلام"، أن مجهولين اقدموا فجر اليوم، على القاء قنبلة يدوية انفجرت امام محل الفلسطيني احمد عبدالله العلي المعد لبيع المشروبات الروحية في محلة القاسمية، وأن الاضرار جاءت مادية.
وفي الشمال وعلى طريق عام البياض، في الضنية، سقط مصعد كهربائي على العاملين السوريين جمال الطيبي وبدر حسين الدبس، ما ادى إلى مصرعهما على الفور .

description.hltext_display: New York lawsuit's effect on local Ernst & Young offices unclear
description.content:
Andrew Cuomo, New York's attorney general, filed a civil suit Tuesday against the accounting firm of Ernst & Young LLP alleging fraud.
It's not yet clear if there are any effects from the lawsuit that impact Detroit operations.
The lawsuit alleges fraud in the temporary removal of $50 billion in highly leveraged assets from the balance sheet of Lehman Bros. Holdings Inc., prior to its collapse its 2008.
In a 32-page complaint, Cuomo, who will become governor of New York in the new year, asked that the firm be ordered to pay the state of New York the $150 million in fees it was paid by Lehman from 2001-2008.
Civil and criminal lawsuits against the accounting firm of Arthur Andersen over its part in the collapse of Enron led to Andersen's demise, but nothing so drastic is expected in this case, according to various financial publications, websites and blog posts.
Ernst & Young didn't return requests made by Crain's Monday or Tuesday for comment.
Jeff Bergeron, managing partner of the Detroit office, said Tuesday that he couldn't comment on the record on any possible impact to local operations and referred a reporter to New York.
Cuomo alleged that a series of bookkeeping moves, known as Repo 105 transactions, allowed Lehman to temporarily remove billions of dollars of highly liquid fixed-income securities from its books by selling them for brief periods to European banks and then buying them back.
The brief said that such moves amounted to "massive accounting fraud" that "defrauded the investing public."
Cuomo alleged that Ernst & Young knew that "at no time did Lehman disclose, either in its financial statements or otherwise, that it was transferring tens of billions of dollars in fixed-income securities to foreign banks on a temporary basis, often at the very end of Lehman's fiscal quarters, with the obligation to quickly repurchase the securities."
The brief alleged the transactions had no independent business purpose and that a number of Lehman's senior executives warned their superiors that the transactions were improper.
"E&Y directly facilitated a major accounting fraud and helped Lehman mislead the public as to its true financial condition," said Cuomo.
Lehman Bros. collapsed in September 2008.

description.hltext_display: Rise in annual income
description.content:
KISH -– The Iranian minister of economy and finance stated that the implementation of the subsidy reform plan has resulted in a clarity of prices and due to deposits in registered accounts Iranian citizen’s monthly income has increased by 445,000 rials ($43). The Mehr News Agency quoted Shamseddin Hosseni as saying that the absolute poverty line in the world is one dollar (1,050 rials) a day which adds to about 315,000 rials ($30) a month.
He explained that the subsidy cash payment 445,000 rials is more than the absolute poverty line of 315,000 rials and based on this one can say that people’s monthly income has gone up.
The minister pointed out that the subsidy reform plan has increased the income of the majority of the population in the country and thus enhanced their purchase power

description.hltext_display: 内塔尼亚胡将正式请求奥巴马释放以色列间谍
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国新闻网 据外电报道，以色列总理办公室21日称，内塔尼亚胡将正式请求美国总统奥巴马释放以色列间谍乔纳森?波拉德。
内塔尼亚胡的办公室称，内塔尼亚胡已经决定“同意乔纳森?波拉德的个人请求和意愿，在未来数天内，将正式和公开地请求美国总统巴拉克-奥巴马考虑将波拉德释放。” (博讯 boxun.com) 波拉德是犹太人，出生在美国，曾在1984年5月至1985年11月出任美国海军高级情报分析员期间为以色列提供数千份美国在阿拉伯世界间谍活动的机密文件，25年前在美国被判终身监禁。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Katich eyes fifth Test
description.content:
Injured Australia opener Simon Katich has revealed he is set to make a shock return in time for the fifth Ashes Test, increasing the pressure on Phillip Hughes to find form in the Boxing Day meeting in Melbourne.
Katich damaged his Achilles tendon during the second Test defeat to England in Adelaide and was initially expected to miss the rest of the summer.
"I'm doing all the rehab and pulling up well from the strength work so the physio's pretty happy with where I'm at and actually thinks I'm ahead of schedule," Katich said.
The veteran left-hander has revealed that his comeback plans are ahead of schedule and he may be fit for the Sydney Test, starting January 3.
Hughes replaced Katich for the third Test in Perth but failed twice as Australia pulled off a series-saving win over England.
Knowing Katich is looking over his shoulder will place further heat on the out-of-form Hughes in the biggest Test of the summer.
"Normally it takes a couple of months to settle down but it's settling down pretty quickly," he added.
"I've been having treatment on it every day for the last few weeks and it's all going really well."
Asked if he'd be fit in time for Sydney, Katich replied: "I'm a long shot but you never know.
"You can't really put a date on it because with tendon injuries you never know until you fully test them, but if I test it next week and pull up well then who knows."

description.hltext_display: No. 89: UConn tops UCLA, beats Florida St 93-62
description.content:
UConn women's basketball coach Geno Auriemma, never at a loss for words, was close Tuesday night.
"It's pretty amazing. It really is," he said.
« Prev1 of 15 photos Next »
Slideshow
AP Photo - Connecticut forward Maya Moore, right, reacts with teammate Tiffany Hayes (3) after scoring against Florida State in the first half of an NCAA basketball game in Hartford, Conn., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Heading into the game, Connecticut needed one win to set the NCAA record for consecutive wins.
No exaggeration there.
His No. 1-ranked Huskies topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62. Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark - and would have made Wooden proud - UConn blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2 1/2 years.
"I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone," Auriemma said. "I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut and that's good enough."
Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn - Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up "89" signs and "89" balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs" - a play on Wooden's nickname, "The Wizard of Westwood."
After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. As fans roared, the players bounced around at center court before posing for photos.
It is one more chapter of history for UConn, and perhaps the grandest.
Asked what he would recall from the incredible run, Auriemma mentioned a pair of experienced stars on this team: "I'll probably remember Maya Moore and Tiffany Hayes. And how incredibly difficult it is to play that many games in a row and win 'em all."
Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women's game, the benchmark by which all others are measured. The Huskies already own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
The streak, though, takes it to another level, certainly raising the profile of women's basketball and maybe all of women's athletics.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game.
"My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level - and it wasn't by the men."
John Wooden was 99 when he died on June 4.
There was a festive atmosphere throughout the city, where building lights gleamed blue and white, and it was as electric as any Final Four inside the arena. Charles and UConn men's star Kemba Walker sat behind the Huskies' bench, and football coach Randy Edsall was there, too. Former NFL star Warrick Dunn, meanwhile, was cheering for his alma mater, Florida State.
With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-American had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore's fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.
UConn ripped off the next 16 points, capped by consecutive 3-pointers from Hartley and a pull-up by Moore. Auriemma gave Hartley a kiss at the next timeout, and the tough-to-please coach was still grinning at halftime.
"She doesn't feel any of this," Auriemma said as he left the court. "She's kind of immune to all of this as a freshman. I love kids like that."

event_or_fact.property: I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone; I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut and that's good enough.
It's pretty amazing.; It really is
a pair of experienced stars on this team: "I'll probably remember Maya Moore and Tiffany Hayes
She doesn't feel any of this; She's kind of immune to all of this as a freshman. I love kids like that.

description.hltext_display: 美国参议院通过美俄削减进攻性战略武器条约
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：国际在线 据美联社12月22日报道，美国参议院今天进行了《削减和限制进攻性战略武器条约》的投票，其中有11位共和党人投了赞同票，从而使得该条约以67比28的投票结果在参议院得以通过。 奥巴马政府一直把关于限制武器的谈判视为重建美俄关系的核心步骤，而该条约在建立两国友好关系上具有举足轻重的地位。
共和党田纳西州参议员亚历山大表示，这项新条约会使美国“拥有足够的核弹头来抵御任何国家的攻击，我相信这项新条约的签订会使美国比以往更安全”。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: SPNB TO DO AWAY WITH RETENTION MONEY
description.author: Bernama
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- Syarikat Perumahan Nasional Bhd (SPNB) plans to do away with the RM2,500 retention money imposed on contractors involved in future Rumah Mesra Rakyat (RMR) projects.
SPNB Chairman Datuk Ir Idris Haron said the move would help contractors achieve higher profit margins.
"Our projects involve a small cost of about RM70,000 only. Retention money will only affect their profit margin which is already small," he told reporters after the handing over of job indents to RMR programme contractors here today.
"With the construction industry in a pressing situation, their profit is only around RM5,000 to RM10,000. With retention money, their profit will decrease and this will eventually affect construction quality," he said.
Retention money is a sum held back by SPNB from progress payments to contractors as security against defects. It is released at the end of the defect warranty period, which is usually one year after the completion of projects.
At the function, 203 Bumiputera contractors were awarded job indents for RMR projects in Terengganu, Kelantan, Kedah, Penang and Johor.
"SPNB has received 43,859 applications for RMR projects nationwide and from the total, 17,971 applications with allocations worth RM1.1 billion have been approved," Idris said.
Over the past 10 years, SPNB has completed 15,017 RMR units worth RM840 million.
-- BERNAMA KAMY AHM JR

description.hltext_display: 伊朗第一副总统涉嫌挪用公款 将出庭受审
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：国际在线 据以色列《国土报》12月20日消息，伊朗总检察长格拉姆・侯赛因・穆赫塞尼・艾扎伊(Gholam Hossein Mohseni Ejeie)20日宣布，伊朗第一副总统拉希米因涉嫌挪用公款等腐败行为，将出庭受审，这是近期伊朗政府中出现问题的职位最高的官员。
伊朗学生通讯社(ISNA)在报道中引述了格拉姆的原话：“第一副总统受到挪用公款罪名的指控，我们正在跟进此案。他将受审，不过罪名还没有核实。”据悉，此案最初是由一家网站披露的，并很快得到两名律师的证实，他们称掌握了确切证据证实拉希米涉嫌挪用公款。 (博讯 boxun.com) 伊朗总统内贾德共有12位副手，61岁的拉希米排名第一。此前他也曾卷入一系列腐败罪名的指控，但均予以否认。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: WATCH: Janice Dickinson Experiences a Panic Attack on 'Celebrity Rehab'
description.content:
Can Dr. Drew Pinsky ease Janice Dickinson's worried mind as she reels from a panic attack while in the grips of withdrawal? Find out in our sneak peek of the new "Celebrity Rehab" episode.
"Janice is having the second peak of benzodiazepine withdrawal," Dr. Drew explains. "I warned her a week ago that on day 9 [or] 10 she would begin to have more withdrawal. It snuck up on her. She began having severe panic."
For more drama, catch "Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew" Wednesday at 10 p.m. on VH1.

event_or_fact.property: Janice is having the second peak of benzodiazepine withdrawal

description.hltext_display: 沙特国王术后离开纽约的医院转入康复治疗
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国新闻网 据外电报道，沙特阿拉伯皇室22日称，阿卜杜拉国王已经离开纽约的医院转入康复治疗。一个月前，阿卜杜拉在纽约接受了背部外科手术。
阿卜杜拉21日晚离开医院后前往他在纽约的住处，他将在那里接受物理治疗并度过康复期。 (博讯 boxun.com) 86岁的沙特国王是上个月22号飞抵纽约，治疗腰椎骨突出，由于国王的腰椎四周有血块堆积，因此手术相当复杂。
目前沙特是由王储苏尔坦亲王暂代治理。现年80岁的苏尔坦亲王是阿卜杜拉国王的弟弟，健康状况也不是很好。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.content: 本公布乃本公司根據上市規則第13.09條而發出。董事會謹此知會本公司股東及有意投資者，預期相比本集團於二零零九年同期之溢利，本集團截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月之溢利可能大幅倒退，甚至錄得虧損，乃由於去年同期已將部分出售聯營公司無線收費電視控股有限公司之一次性收益約165,900,000港元入賬，而截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月并無此項目所致。本公司股東及有意投資者於買賣本公司股份時務請審慎行事。--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------本公布乃漢傳媒集團有限公司（「本公司」，連同其附屬公司統稱「本集團」）根據香港聯合交易所有限公司證券上市規則（「上市規則」）第13.09條而發出。本公司董事（「董事」）會（「董事會」）謹此知會本公司股東及有意投資者，根據對本集團最近期管理賬目之初步評估及本公司現時可得資料，預期相比本集團於二零零九年同期之溢利，本集團截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月之溢利可能大幅倒退，甚至錄得虧損。有關倒退主要由於去年同期已將部分出售聯營公司無線收費電視控股有限公司之一次性收益約165,900,000港元入賬，而截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月并無此項目所致。本集團將於上述期間結束後落實其截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月之未經審核財務業績。本公布所載資料僅為董事會根據本集團最近期管理賬目及本公司現時可得資料作出之初步評估，尚未經本公司核數師審核或審閱。本集團將按照上市規則公布截至二零一零年十二月三十一日止六個月之未經審核財務業績詳情。本公司股東及有意投資者於買賣本公司股份時務請審慎行事。

description.hltext_display: Review: Anella
description.author: SAM SIFTON P
description.content:
ANELLA is an intimate little art house of a restaurant on a block in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, that might be a rough part of Paris or an old part of Boston, some forgotten corner of a city that can reach back into the 19th century for building stock and scale. The wind whips in off the East River there sharp as razors, and old women squabble in Polish on the street. You will need your adventure boots to get there, perhaps. But the narrow bar and dining room are warm as candlelight, decorated in that nice urban variation on farmhouse chic that is common to restaurants in north Brooklyn, all brick and reclaimed hardwood, with Edison bulbs hanging from the tin ceiling that cast shadows over pockmarked plaster and ancient paint. (Beards and cardigans abound at the tables, as well as vintage dresses, heavy clogs.) Service is easygoing, nice.
And the food is a wonder: a tight and focused menu of simple, seasonally appropriate food from Joseph Ogrodnek, a talented chef who has been in the kitchen for almost a year.
It is by no means a formal restaurant. There is a worn A.T.M. in the back. Drafts circulate in the winters chill, and the U-shape of the bar and dining room can lead to what traffic engineers call flow issues. Those Edison lights are so dim, it can be hard to read the brief menu.
Still, for those amenable to a New Years resolution to travel the city more, to move beyond old familiar haunts to taste the new and delicious, Anella is a decent place to discover the nexus of geography and emotion.
We are all in this maze together. Parts of it have really good restaurants.
A flowerpot of bread will start your meal, the loaf served vertically within it in the manner of a cartoon mushroom, warm and cut into four wedges, with soft salted butter. It tastes of care and eccentricity combined, the work of a hippie mom in advance of a performance of madrigals: rich and white and plump. It calls for mulled wine; a wicked Manhattan does the trick as well, poured over plump little cherries steeped in brandy. (Wine can follow, off a reasonable list that runs at the Old World more than the New.)
Mr. Ogrodnek is a skilled practitioner of the vegetable arts. Like Midas, who turned everything he touched into gold (and like Dave Pasternack at Esca in Midtown, who achieves similar results with fish), he elevates the simplest greens and tubers into realms more celestial than those we are generally used to in wintertime in New York City. Roasted broccoli, reads his menu. Watercress, parmesan, lemon. Well, yes. It has the flavor of everything good that can happen on a farm, with a pure vegetal sweetness enhanced in great measure by the peppery cress, the salty cheese, the acidic zing of citrus.
A roasted beet salad achieves similar heights, with walnuts and baby greens, and little dabs of the mild, almost sweet blue cheese called gorgonzola dolce. So does a peppery green salad with apples, pecans and bits of sharp, nutty, English-style Cabot Cheddar, and another of sunchokes shaved thin, then served with orange segments, pebbles of pistachio and a few sheets of pecorino.
This is dirt wizard food of high caliber, cooking that leads people to join community-supported agriculture programs and fill their homes with parsnips and kale.
But Mr. Ogrodnek does not ignore the pleasures of the flesh. He put in time with Alain Ducasse at the Essex House, then at Gramercy Tavern, followed by a turn with Jean-Georges Vongerichten at the Mark. He can cook with the confident sneer of a Frenchman.
His steak tartare is a robust and flavorful thing, served beside crisp-cooked artichokes and a soft mound of oil-slicked herbs. His golden leg of duck confit with a pool of smoky, bacon-studded lentils happily straddles the crisp-soft divide. He takes sweet Chatham cod and pairs it with zucchini, broccoli, basil and a hint of chili fire, cooking the fish to beautiful flakiness, so that it slides apart under the least pressure from a fork.
A fat pork chop, teamed with yams, maple syrup and pecans, nods to an America we all wish we lived in, where the pigs are fat and healthy instead of lean and terrifying, and yams taste of the earth and the sky, not marshmallows and despair. It may profile on the menu as too sweet because of the vegetable and the syrup. But there is harmony among all flavors, and it makes a marvelous dish. 1 2

description.hltext_display: El aeropuerto de Bruselas vuelve a la normalidad tras reponer anticongelante
description.content:
Bruselas, 22 dic (EFE).- El aeropuerto de Bruselas puede volver a operar con normalidad esta mañana tras reponer sus reservas de líquido anticongelante, aunque persisten algunos retrasos y anulaciones en vuelos hacia al centro y norte de Europa por las condiciones meteorológicas en estos destinos.
El aeropuerto de la capital belga anunció ayer que volvía "a las operaciones normales de invierno", después de que la escasez de anticongelante, utilizado para evitar que los alerones y la cola de los aviones queden bloqueados por la presencia de hielo, obligara a cancelar la mayoría de las salidas desde el lunes por la tarde.
La compañía gestora asegura que ya existen reservas suficientes para cubrir la demanda de todas las aerolíneas que operan vuelos desde la capital belga.
No obstante, recomienda a los viajeros que comprueben los detalles de su vuelo en la página web (www.brusselsairport.be), ya que se producen retrasos y cancelaciones de vuelos hacia ciudades como Amsterdam, Zurich, Fráncfort, Dublín, Viena o Copenhague, a causa de las condiciones meteorológicas en dichos destinos.
La misma situación se da en el aeropuerto de Amsterdam-Schipol, que avisa en su web de las posibles alteraciones del tráfico aéreo a causa de la nieve, aunque la mayoría de los vuelos operan con normalidad.
También operan con normalidad el aeropuerto de Charleroi, ubicado a 55 kilómetros al sur de Bruselas y desde el que vuelan compañías de bajo coste como Ryanair o Jetairfly.
Las previsiones meteorológicos anuncian bajas temperaturas para el resto de la semana y nevadas en gran parte de Bélgica. EFE

description.hltext_display: 德意志银行同意向美支付5亿美元 了结欺诈诉讼案
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载)
来源：国际在线
据德国《商报》22日报道，德国德意志银行承认该行通过帮助客户“隐藏”数十亿资金，参与了欺骗性避税行为，目前同意为此向美国支付5.536亿美元的罚金了结此项诈欺诉讼案。
德意志银行表示，已经同美国联邦检察院和联邦税务局达成一致，联邦检察院撤销对德意志银行于1996年到2002年间参与多项帮助客户逃税业务的起诉。 (博讯 boxun.com)
德意志银行表示对这一结果感到满意，并表示支付这笔罚金将不会影响该行的利润，而美国联邦检察院也证实了此消息。去年美国检察官也对瑞银集团提起了诉讼，称该行因帮助客户将其约200亿美元的资产“隐藏”在该行的账户之下，导致这些资产“避开”美国国内税务局而成功实现逃税，最后瑞士银行被判支付7.8亿美元的罚金。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Satisfakce pro Michálka: podle dohody koalice se má vrátit do čela fondu
description.content: Libor Michálek, který svými nahrávkami rozpoutal aféru, která stála post ministra životního prostředí a otřásla základy vládní koalice, by se mohl vrátit na post ve Státním fondu životního prostředí (SFŽP). I to je podle všeho jeden z výsledků dohody, kterou koaliční představitelé uzavřely na schůzce u prezidenta.

description.hltext_display: Top business stories for 2010
description.content:
In this Sept. 21, 2010 photo, demonstrators hold signs in front of Bank of America in San Jose, Calif., during a rally protesting thousands of bank foreclosures in San Jose. (AP Photo/Paul Sakuma)
WASHINGTON -- The struggling economy was voted the top business story of the year by U.S. newspaper editors surveyed by The Associated Press. The following is the list in order of top business stories:
• ECONOMY STRUGGLES:
As the year closes, the economy makes broad gains. Factories produce more. Consumers -- the backbone of the economy -- return to the malls. Congress passes $858 billion in tax cuts and aid to the long-term unemployed. Yet more than 15 million Americans are still unemployed.
• GULF OIL SPILL: An explosion at a rig used by BP kills 11 workers and sends crude oil gushing into the Gulf of Mexico. The spill devastates the fishing and tourism industries along the Gulf Coast and causes environmental damage that may last for decades.
• CHINA'S RISE: China passes Japan as the world's second-biggest economy. The World Bank says it could surpass the United States by 2020. China's gross domestic product is spread out over 1.3 billion people -- amounting to about $3,600 per person. That compares with GDP in the U.S. of about $42,000 per person. In Japan, it's about $38,000 per person. China's thirst for raw materials and other products helps the rest of the world recover from the recession. Still, the U.S. and Europe complain that China gives its exporters an unfair competitive edge by keeping its currency artificially low.
• REAL ESTATE CRISIS: Housing remains depressed despite super-low mortgage rates. The average rate on a 30-year fixed mortgage dips to 4.17 percent in November, the lowest in decades. But home sales and prices sink further. Nearly one in four homeowners owe more on their mortgages than their homes are worth, making it all but impossible for them to sell their home and buy another.
An estimated 1 million households lose their homes to foreclosure, even though the pace slows after evidence that lenders mishandled foreclosure documents.
• TOYOTA'S RECALL: Toyota's reputation for making high-quality cars is tarnished after the Japanese automaker recalls 10 million vehicles for sudden acceleration and other problems. Toyota faces hundreds of lawsuits alleging that some models can speed up suddenly, causing crashes, injuries and deaths. Toyota blames driver error, faulty floor mats and sticky accelerator pedals for the unintended acceleration. The uproar damages its business. Toyota's U.S. sales rise just 0.2 percent through November in a year when the industry's overall sales climb more than 11 percent.
• GM'S COMEBACK: General Motors stock begins trading again. It signals the rebirth of a corporate icon that fell into bankruptcy and required a $50 billion bailout from taxpayers. GM uses some proceeds from its November initial public offering to repay a portion of its bailout. GM's recovery helps rejuvenate the industry.
• FINANCIAL OVERHAUL: Congress passes the biggest rewrite of financial rules since the 1930s. The law targets the risky banking practices and lax oversight that led to the 2008 financial crisis. The law creates an agency to protect consumers from predatory loans and other abuses, empowers regulators to shut down big firms that threaten the entire system and shines more light into markets that have eluded oversight.
• EUROPEAN BAILOUTS: Greece and Ireland require emergency bailouts, raising fears that debt problems will spread and destabilize global markets. European governments and the International Monetary Fund agree to a $145 billion rescue of Greece in May and a $90 billion bailout of Ireland in November. The bailouts require both countries to slash spending, triggering protests by workers. Investors fear that debt troubles will spread to Spain, Portugal and other countries, weaken the European Union and threaten the future of the euro as its common currency.
• 500 MILLION FACEBOOK USERS: Facebook tops the 500-million-user mark. It expands its dominance of social media and further transforms how the world communicates. If it were a country, Facebook would be the world's third-largest. Founder Mark Zuckerberg is named Time magazine's "Person of the Year" and is the subject of a high-profile movie about Facebook's creation.
• iPAD MANIA: Apple Inc. unveils the iPad, bringing "tablet" computing into the mainstream and eroding laptop sales. Apple is expected to sell more than 13 million iPads this year. The iPads sell about twice as fast as iPhones did after their 2007 introduction. The price of Apple stock rockets more than 50 percent in 2010.

description.hltext_display: 俄罗斯未来5年对华煤炭供应将增加25%
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国新闻网 据俄罗斯当地媒体报道，俄罗斯驻华大使谢尔盖・拉佐夫21日在北京表示，未来5年俄罗斯向中国的煤炭供应量将增长25%，达到每年1500万吨。
拉佐夫说：“计划未来5年每年至少供应1500万吨煤炭，接下来20年每年不少于2000万吨。” (博讯 boxun.com) 他表示，目前俄罗斯对华煤炭供应量为每年1200万吨。
今年11月和12月份中国多个地区遭遇煤炭短缺。专家估计，这是煤价上涨而电力仍保持低价导致的。
拉佐夫说道：“我们在能源领域的合作前景十分广阔。”他指出，2011年上半年将开始“建设田湾核电站三号、四号发电机组”。
拉佐夫在俄新社北京分社组织的新闻发布会上透露：“双方联系有所加强，在经管道对华供应天然气的领域取得了进展，双方商定，将做出一切必要努力，以在明年上半年签署天然气供应的商业合同。”
他进一步指出，目前“俄罗斯与中国公司在开发俄罗斯境内，特别是萨哈林与东西伯利亚油气田方面的合作也在积极发展”。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: Where to Get the Best Discount Carpet, Laminate Flooring Installers, and Hardwood Flooring in Burnaby
description.content: Burnaby, BC – Looking for flooring materials can be a big hassle. Although there are so many different kinds to choose from - carpeting, hardwood, or laminate, Burnaby boasts one of the best flooring and installation companies in the area: Mike's Carpet and Flooring. Mike's brings it all together for customers seeking top brand names in laminate Burnaby, tile, hardwood, bamboo, cork or carpeting. Getting a new floor is a very stressful time as daily routines are interrupted from floors that are ripped up making the area uninhabitable for a while. At Mike's, a carpeting and tile store in Burnaby, experienced staff members can help by walking customers through each step of the flooring process, beginning with the selection of the floor material itself. Each home has it own identity and every home owner has their own unique requirements for making their perfect floor. For high traffic areas vinyl, certain carpeting and linoleum are often used due to their lower cost and high durability. For a more elegant look, customers often choose stone, fine hardwood or a patterned tile. Burnaby, because of its reputation for being a diverse community, prides itself with homes that have a variety of styles and looks. Within a single community you may find a house with stylish dark hardwood floors and next to it a cozy bungalow sporting exotic bamboo flooring in the kitchen. To each their own which is why Mike's Carpet and Flooring has the choices you need for the floor that meets your tastes, home style and budget. For those seeking a nice warm feeling on their feet, we recommend carpet. Burnaby is a great place to install this type of wall to wall covering since the weather during the winter can be on the nippy side. Mike's Carpet and Flooring is one of the best discount carpet stores in Burnaby and with its vast selection of residential and office carpets will satisfy all kinds of tastes, preferences, and budgets. Another flooring idea is cork which has the great advantages of being more environmentally friendly, has a low cost and is a great sound buffer. This makes it ideal for recreation rooms, children's bedrooms and even the garage. The cork can be left natural or coated to add water resistance and greater durability. Whatever your flooring choice may be, Mike's Carpet and Flooring is the place to go for all your flooring needs. Regardless of what you need - tile, carpet, vinyl, or hardwood - Burnaby is just a short distance to drive to, from wherever you are in the Vancouver area. With everything you need from flooring materials, expert installation and a knowledgeable, experienced staff just waiting to assist you, there really is no better place to go. Installing laminate flooring in Nort Vancouver, West Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, or wherever in the lower mainland it's something that can easily be taken care of with Mike's Carpet & Flooring. You can see all the different flooring brands on their website at www.1mikesflooring.ca.

description.hltext_display: 荷兰银行被黑客盗取500余万欧元
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：国际在线专稿 一群网络黑客从荷兰银行中盗取了500余万欧元。虽然有部分款项已被追回，但迄今仍有300多万欧元去向不明。
据新华社报道，荷兰媒体21日说，荷兰警方在今年3月抓捕了13名犯罪嫌疑人，指控他们进行网络盗窃等犯罪行为。最初的调查并未发现这些嫌疑人的犯罪活动与荷兰银行有关，不过，后来警方通过对相关赃款的回溯调查最终发现，这些嫌疑人通过操纵银行系统而窃取了500余万欧元。 (博讯 boxun.com) 荷兰银行协会表示，通常情况下，如果没有内部人协助，黑客几乎不可能侵入银行系统实施盗窃，但这起案件中“似乎没有荷兰银行工作人员参与”。目前，荷兰警方和荷兰银行拒绝就此透露更多信息。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: 欧委会炮轰成员国机场 称混乱如同"第三世界"
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国新闻网 再过几天就是圣诞节，欧洲天气却并未好转，21日还下起了另一轮大雪，使得本就混乱的交通系统陷入瘫痪。数以万计的旅客被迫继续在机场、火车站滞留。据新加坡《联合早报》22日报道，欧洲委员会21日称属下成员国机场因大雪乱成一团的情况“不可接受”，声称已召见各机场负责人进行解释，并研究如何对症下药，以免重蹈覆?H。
遭到这一轮风雪袭击后，在欧洲最繁忙的伦敦希思罗机场，目前只能恢复三分之一航班，使机场运营商BAA受到乘客和各界猛烈抨击。 (博讯 boxun.com) 不过，伦敦第二大机场盖特威克已在格林尼治标准时间21日6点开放，但航班延误和取消还是有可能发生。
英国首相卡梅伦21日提议调派军队到希思罗机场，协助当局解决数万名乘客滞留的问题。他说，交通部长哈蒙德正在同BAA深入磋商，以使机场恢复全面运作。
他表示，希思罗机场短暂关闭是能够理解的，但关闭了这么久，还是无法改善，让人气馁。
英国机场管理局总裁马修斯被指责未能妥善处理航班因风雪延误的问题。在接受英国独立电视新闻(ITV)访问时，他呼吁旅客从希思罗机场网站查看乘搭的班机是否会起飞。
目前，希思罗机场航站楼变成了临时营地，机场?壤?圾处处，疲惫的旅客一个个席地而睡，有人自18日降大雪时已滞留在这里。由于人太多，警方采取人流管制，当局更在晚上关掉暖气。有些人主动打开行李箱，将多出的衣物分发给有需要的人。
报道称，不少滞留旅客的金钱和耐心都即将耗尽，情绪由失望转为愤怒，痛斥机场当局没派食物饮料，也不公布最新消息。工会人士形容，机场混乱犹如“第三世界”。
在机场滞留了3天的莫斯科人波尔科瓦说：“整个情况糟透了。我们很生气。人人粗鲁地睡在地上，婴儿也睡在地上，没有通告，没有帮助，也没有钱睡酒店。”
大雪也影响了英国陆上交通。在连接英法的“欧洲之星”列车英国站排队的旅客，排队超过一公里。前往巴黎的美国学生高恩说：“有生以来，我第一次站在这么长的人龙当中。”
一名法国妇女玛丽说：“我在伦敦住了三年，像这种可笑的事年年都在上演。其实情况是越来越糟糕，至少去年他们还给我们一些牛角酥。”
“欧洲之星”的管理方表示，火车服务受到限制，预订圣诞节前出发的火车票的旅客，如果行程非必要，可以退票换回现金。
幸运的是，在英国西北部的克罗斯比，气温已降到摄氏零下17.6度，而伦敦是零度左右，还稍微暖和一些。
欧洲其他地区的交通也受到大雪影响。20日，德国最大的法兰克福机场取消了数百趟航班。
21日，法国当局允许巴黎戴高乐和奥利两大机场24小时营运，让滞留的旅客可以尽快前往目的地。当局20日晚调派100名民防人员到戴高乐机场，为滞留的旅客送来300张床和2500条棉被。
法航荷航集团首席营运长戈庚透露，两个星期前寒潮袭击，加上这几天恶劣的天气，已使公司蒙受2500万至3500万欧元的损失。 (博讯 boxun.com)

description.hltext_display: 73.684: segon número cantat a la Loteria de Nadal
description.author: Europa Press
description.content:
Els bombos que contenen els números han començat a girar per a la sort. Foto: Efe.
Els ciutadans de les Balears aspiren a superar en el Sorteig Extraordinari de la Loteria de Nadal els 4,65 milions d'euros que van tocar l'any passat a Mallorca, després de vendre's un cinquè premi a l'Administració número 15 de Palma i a l'Administració número 2 de Marratxí i un altre cinquè premi a les Administracions número 2 i 36 de la capital balear. Així, el passat any la gran afortunada va ser l'Administració de Loteria número 15 de Palma, ubicada en el carrer Francesc Barceló i Combis, que va repartir 4,5 milions d'euros després de vendre 900 dècims (90 sèries), dels quals prop de 2 milions van anar a parar al Club de Vela del Port d'Andratx, després que una treballadora compràs entre 25 i 30 sèries, que les va repartir entre els seus companys.
Entre els afortunats, es trobava l'exbatle d'Andratx, Eugenio Hidalgo, que es troba a la presó, i el seu germà, Carlos Hidalgo, que van comprar diversos dècims en aquesta Administració, on ambdós compren loteria des de fa molts anys. D'aquesta manera, l'any passat va ser molt més afortunat que el 2008, quan únicament va tocar un pessic de 50.000 euros a Mallorca, després de vendre's una sèrie d'un dels vuit cinquens premis a l'Administració número 7 de Palma, ubicada a l'Avinguda Argentina número 10. Malgrat que Balears ha estada agraciada en set ocasions amb la grossa, l'última el 2003 a Capdepera, torna a ser aquest any la Comunitat en la qual menys diners es juga en el Sorteig de Nadal, amb 39,76 euros per habitant, amb dades a data de 25 d'octubre, la qual cosa suposa dos euros menys que el 2009, quan cada ciutadà va gastar 41,89 euros, segons dades de Loteries i Apostes de l'Estat, que revelen que la mitjana nacional se situa en 68,68 euros.
Concretament, la grossa ha tocat a Palma en cinc ocasions (1843, 1872, 1886, 1902 i 1995), mentre que els municipis mallorquins de Capdepera i Santa Maria del Camí van resultar agraciats amb el primer premi del Sorteig de Nadal el 2003 i el 1986, respectivament. Amb dades de consignació a data de 25 d'octubre, les illes jugaran 43,5 milions d'euros, després de consignar-se 217.749 bitllets.
A l'estat
Respecte a la compra de Loteria de Nadal, La Rioja és al capdavant, amb una consignació de 101,24 euros, seguida de Castella i Lleó (97,74 euros), Astúries (91,73 euros), Aragó (85,78 euros), Madrid (82,58 euros), País Basc (81,65 euros), País Valencià (78,32 euros), Cantàbria (72,46 euros) i Castella la Manxa (72,34 euros).
Mentre, els que menys es gastaran aquest any són els habitants de les Balears (39,76 euros), les Canàries (41,70 euros), Andalusia (47,35 euros), Extremadura (55,08 euros), Navarra (56,66 euros), Galícia (66,75 euros), Catalunya (67,23 euros) i Múrcia (71,05 euros).
3.315 milions d'euros
El Sorteig Extraordinari de Nadal repartirà 2.320,5 milions d'euros en premis. Com cada any, els al·lots de San Ildefonso extrauran dels dos bombos, durant al voltant de tres hores i mitja, els números i els premis i els cantaran davant de l'atenta mirada del públic. Com principal novetat d'aquest any, destaca que el sorteig ja no es durà a terme al saló de Loteries del carrer Guzmán el Bueno, tal com ha succeït durant més de 40 anys, sinó al Palau de Congressos i Exposicions de Madrid, ubicat al Passeig de la Castellana. El nou edifici té capacitat per a 2.000 persones, mentre que l'anterior només podia allotjar a 500.
Una altra de les novetats consisteix que aquest any, els participants del sorteig amb números premiats amb més de 3.000 euros (coneguts com els 'premis grans') podran cobrar-los l'endemà per primera vegada des de la celebració d'aquest esdeveniment. Fins ara, aquests 'premis grans' únicament podien cobrar-se nou dies després de la celebració del sorteig. Igual com el passat any, hi ha 195 sèries, que consten al seu torn de 85.000 bitllets. De l'emissió total de 3.315 milions d'euros, es destina a premis el 70 per cent (2.320,5 milions) quedant el 30 per cent restant per al pagament de comissions als punts de venda, despeses d'administració i tresor públic.
L'anhelada grossa està dotada amb 3 milions d'euros per sèrie, la qual cosa suposa 300.000 euros a cada dècim, de manera que el número premiat repartirà 540 milions d'euros. Per la seva part, el segon premi està dotat amb 1 milió d'euros a la sèrie i el tercer amb 500.000 euros. A més, hi haurà dos quarts premis de 200.000 euros cada un i vuit cinquens premis de 50.000 euros cada un. En total, es repartiran 26 milions de premis, això sí, amb quantitats que en gaires casos amb prou feines recompensaran els 68 euros de mitjana que es gastarà cada ciutadà espanyol.
Com en anys anteriors, cada dècim ha costat 20 euros i en aquesta ocasió, està il·lustrat amb una imatge nadalenca del segle XV, titulada 'Nadal' Adoració dels Pastors i es tracta d'una obra de l'Escola flamenca, pertanyent al retaule de San Juan Bautista de la Parròquia del Santíssim Salvador de Valladolid. El preu d'un número complet és de 39.000 euros i el de cada bitllet de 200 euros, dividit en dècims de 20 euros. En total, hi haurà 26.001.300 dècims premiats d'entre els 85.000 números que es ficaran al bombo.
L'any 1812
Els orígens del Sorteig de Nadal se situen en el celebrat el dia 18 de desembre de 1812, més per l'entusiasme, sentir popular i proximitat a aquestes dates que per la denominació en si mateix, ja que el títol com a tal, 'Sorteig de Nadal', no va arribar fins a 1892. En aquell primer sorteig, el preu del bitllet va ser de 40 reals i la grossa estava dotada de 8.000 pesos forts. Es realitza pel sistema tradicional, un bombo per a números i un altre per a premis i té una durada aproximada de tres hores i mitja.
Dels 199 Sorteigs de Nadal celebrats, el primer premi conegut popularment com 'La Grossa', ha correspost en seixanta-dues ocasions a un número comprès entre el 0 i el 10.000; en setanta-dues ocasions a un número entre el 10.001 i el 30.000 i en seixanta-sis ocasions a números compresos entre el 30.001 i el 85.000.
Com a xifra final, el 5 ha estat el número que més vegades va resultar premiat, concretament, en 32 ocasions, seguit del 4, amb 27 vegades; el 6 amb 26 aparicions i el 3 i el 8, ambdós amb 20. Al contrari, la xifra final menys repetida ha estat l'1, que només ha aparegut en vuit ocasions, seguit del 2 i el 9.

description.hltext_display: 伊拉克通过新一届政府名单马利基留任总理
description.content:
(博讯北京时间2010年12月22日 转载) 来源：中国广播网 据中国之声《全球华语广播网》报道，伊拉克国民议会21号表决通过了马利基提交的新一届政府名单，并批准马利基继续担任政府总理。新政府终于在各方的博弈中宣布就职，这是否意味着伊拉克政局将重归正轨？中国国际广播电台驻中东记者申旭报道：
记者：在当地时间21号下午，伊拉克国民议会举行了投票表决，通过了马利基提交的新政府成员名单，随后由马利基任总理的伊拉克新政府，集体正式宣誓就职，从而宣告自今年3月份伊拉克大选之后，持续了近九个月的组阁危机告一乱落。
连任总理职务的马利基表示说，新政府将致力于实现国家的稳定和民族和解，努力将伊拉克建设成为一个独立、民主、团结、公正和法制的国家。另外马利基还表示说，新一届伊拉克政府还将进一步加强政府的机构建设和国家的法制建设，使新政府成为伊拉克全民的政府，而不是代表某一个党派的政府。 (博讯 boxun.com) 获得议会通过的这份内阁名单包括42个政府职务，其中包括3名副总理，上一届政府的副总理库尔德人沙维斯继续担任副总理的职务，兹巴里继续担任新政府的外交部长，前副总理逊尼派人士伊萨维是担任财政部长，新政府基本上实现了各政治派别的权力分享。 (博讯 boxun.com)
