description.hltext_display: UC Davis defeats Southern Utah 74-65
description.content:
DAVIS, Calif. --
Eddie Miller scored 20 points and Ryan Sypkens added 16 as UC Davis shot 55 percent in the second half to pull away from Southern Utah and record a 74-65 victory on Tuesday night.
Miller connected on 9 of 14 shots and Sypkens made 6 of 7 for the Aggies (5-7), who made 22 of 42 field-goal attempts (52 percent). UC Davis was 11-for-20 from the field in the second half.
Joe Harden scored 15 points and Mark Payne had 12 for the Aggies, who led 36-33 at the half. Payne, who made 10 of 12 free-throw attempts, moved into 13th place on UC Davis' all-time scoring list with 1,117 points, surpassing Jason Robedeaux (1983-88, 1,112) and Alan Steed (1967-70, 1,107). Payne, a senior guard who missed eight games last season due to injury, is second among the school's career assists leaders with 395.

event_or_fact.property: 16 as UC Davis shot 55 percent in the second half to pull away from Southern Utah and record a 74-65 victory on Tuesday night

description.hltext_display: Searching Through Backup Tapes? No Sweat
description.content:
Tom O'Connor
The National Law Journal
del.icio.us
Digg
Reddit
Facebook
Google Bookmarks
Newsvine
LinkedIn
Mixx
Stumbleupon
Twitter
Comstock,
Related Items
Backup tapes have been used for decades in the corporate environment for business continuity or disaster recovery. Individual tapes typically contained a snapshot of the company's documents and e-mails for a particular day that gave information technology departments peace of mind in knowing that their data were available in the event of a natural or man-made disaster. But over time, older tapes simply accumulated in storage and were all but forgotten until needed for an audit or, more recently, litigation.
At that point, when the tapes became part of the discovery process, they struck fear into the hearts of legal professionals. Who could know what was on the tape, since it was truly "everything," without a comprehensive search capability? And information technology personnel were equally fearful about restoring tapes, especially those created with older backup systems, which would require a simulation of the legacy tape environment that had probably been replaced long ago. For these reasons, backup tapes acquired the reputation for being somewhat of a Pandora's box when it came to discovery -- nobody wanted to open them for fear of what might be inside.
Difficulties in retrieving large amounts of data from tapes when large amounts of data are involved, ranging from the relatively high costs to the often laborious data-restoration process, historically have made this popular storage medium a less than ideal choice for the long-term archiving and retrieval of business-critical information. Slow deduplicating and short lifespan of backup formats have also contributed to the perception of tape being undesirable and very expensive for discovery purposes.
These factors contributed to widespread acceptance of the inaccessibility of tape. Cases such as Consolidated Aluminum Corp. v. Alcoa Inc., No. 03-1055-C-M2, 2006 WL 2583308 (M.D. La. July 19, 2006) held that backup tapes were presumptively inaccessible so that, by the time the first electronic discovery changes to the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure came about in 2006, backup tapes were presumed to be not reasonably accessible. However, the Committee Note to Rule 26 specifically declared that backup tapes are subject to legal hold and may be discoverable.
The test that had arisen for defining inaccessibility for e-discovery purposes was whether the tapes were regularly used for active information retrieval as set forth by Judge Shira Scheindlin in Zubulake v. UBS Warburg LLC, 220 F.R.D. 212, 218, (S.D.N.Y. 2003). A later case, Quinby v. WESTLB A.G., No. 04 Civ. 7406 (WHP)(HBP), 2006 WL 2597900, at *7 (S.D.N.Y. Sept. 5, 2006) cited Zubulake and held that data that are accessible are "stored in a readily usable format that does not need to be restored or otherwise manipulated to be usable. Conversely, data that is inaccessible is not readily useable and must be restored to an accessible state before the data is usable. Backup tapes are considered an inaccessible format."
Backups were never designed for e-discovery purposes and, until recently, the tools and techniques available to find and produce data from tapes were either nonexistent or rudimentary at best. However, things have changed.
TAPE DISCOVERY TECHNOLOGY EMERGES
Seeing this problem and understanding the challenges counsel face, the e-discovery vendor community has been hard at work to create solutions to these issues. Recent advances have altered the landscape for tape discovery. Software now exists to automate the process of searching and extracting data from tapes through tools that index tape data before any copying or restoration occurs. These tools now allow attorneys to retrieve relevant data from backup tapes in a manner that is defensible, reliable, forensically sound, and cost effective.
Backup tapes in today's technology world are not only a reliable and affordable medium for e-discovery, but also are a solid method of information management that allows control of both active and legacy data. New direct indexing technology renders data on offline backup tapes easily accessible. First, tapes typically are dated automatically, so manual indexes are not needed to locate specific tapes. The tapes are then automatically scanned and indexed, so that tape data are accessible via simple query terms. And the original backup software and environment are no longer required.
On Nov. 23, The Wall Street Journal mentioned a company called Index Engines, which sells appliances that can access all common tape formats without requiring access to the legacy backup application or even a recovery environment for databases and e-mail servers. Nathan Koppel, "Using Software to Sift Digital Evidence," Wall St. J., Nov. 23, 2010 at B6. The appliance directly indexes data on the tape, making all the data searchable. When relevant information is found, the appliance can extract it to another medium for further review. Many e-discovery service providers and consultancies across North America employ Index Engines' direct tape indexing technology. Integreon Managed Solutions and D4 have publicized their services powered by this new direct-indexing approach to discover legacy tape data.
The benefit of direct-indexing technology is that clients can now rely on automated systems that avoid inadvertent data spoliation; the appropriate vendor can testify on behalf of clients as to a repeatable defensible process for the collection of data from backup tapes.
Any solution to the tape-discovery dilemma must have two components: The first is technology, but equally important is the establishment of company policies and practices surrounding document retention and preservation.
Document retention and e-discovery policies regarding legacy data archived to tape must begin with a dialogue among the legal, IT, human resources, and records-management departments to properly identify the most relevant information to be preserved and in what manner. It often is necessary to start with a broad policy or policies in order to get the most information under control in the shortest time. More detailed policies can come later, but the perfect shouldn't be made an enemy of the good.
Guidelines for creating a backup tape policy include:
• Don't save everything. Keep documents that need to be retained for business or legal reasons but, to reduce the size of potential productions, avoid overstoring.
• Index everything the company keeps. Backup tapes traditionally have been synonymous with the phrase "unduly burdensome," but new indexing technology eliminates this objection. Because tapes contain a defensible point-in-time copy of the data, indexing makes tape discovery quick, affordable, and reliable.
• Keep an audit trail. Record everything the company does and keep multiple copies.
Courts have become much less tolerant of excuses during the discovery process that result from improper information management and collection processes. Even though backup tapes were not initially designed for e-discovery purposes, many organizations still rely upon them for information retrieval and need an efficient, inexpensive way to retrieve the data they contain. A partnership must be forged between internal counsel, who know the legal requirements of a litigation hold, and IT, who know the technological capabilities of their systems. This collaboration is the only way to ensure that a court can be reasonably satisfied that a repeatable defensible process, defined by legal and executed by IT, is being offered as an explanation for the production or the failure to produce relevant data.
Now improvements in technology have made the management and access to tape data the best solution for that partnership to promote. Tape retrieval is easy to accomplish without the problems of duplication and data loss or the time-consuming waits for processing and exorbitant costs, all of which reduce, if not eliminate, the issue of inaccessibility. How is this possible? Here are several immediate results of how these changes in technology make backup tape usage in the e-discovery process far more manageable:
• Tapes have become a useful tool for information management. The ability to index and catalog all tape data makes the legacy archival process not only more manageable but more meaningful, as IT staff can quickly and easily view and categorize all the data on their tapes systems.
• Tapes have become a useful tool in the litigation-hold process. Tape users can use indexing technology to quickly locate specific data on tape and begin the preservation process necessary to meet litigation-hold requirements.
• Tapes can reduce collection costs. If data are indexed on tape, there is no need for expensive searching and collecting efforts to support the litigation-hold process. A search of the tape indexes will quickly find all relevant information and allow cost-effective collection directly from the tapes.
The overall result? Newly available tape-discovery products automate collection of tape content, eliminating the duplicate data and system files and make the content searchable in order to find and extract data as needed.
Tape data that were once considered inaccessible can now be easily accessed if the proper technology is deployed. The turnaround time to produce relevant data from tape is reduced to hours instead of weeks or even months -- and the cost decreases proportionally, as well. The result is that attorneys will have a hard time arguing that tape data are not reasonably accessible and need to be aware that the window for making this argument is rapidly closing.
Tom O'Connoris an attorney, consultant, speaker, and writer in the area of computerized litigation support systems and e-discovery. He serves as the director of the Gulf Coast Legal Technology Center in New Orleans. He has worked on many high-profile litigation matters including tobacco litigation on behalf of the attorney general of Texas and various phases of the Enron litigation.

description.hltext_display: Boston United joint-manager Rob Scott linked with job at Sheffield United
description.content:
​ROB SCOTT admits he is flattered to be linked with the manager's job at former club Sheffield United.
Boston United's joint-manager is thought to be a contender for the vacant hotseat at Bramall Lane, according to media sources in South Yorkshire.
The Championship strugglers are on the lookout for a new boss following Gary Speed's departure for the Wales international post.
Scott has strong links with the Blades, the club which launched his playing career.
Scott and fellow joint-manager Paul Hurst were linked to the Lincoln City job earlier this season and have made no secret of the fact they would listen to offers from Football League clubs.
But with a host of household names also in the frame for the Blades post, Scott is not expecting an approach.
"I'm flattered to be linked with a club where I started my career and have a lot of affection for," said Scott.
"We must be doing something right for me to be linked to such a prestigious post, but at the moment it's all media talk.
"I won't be holding my breath on this one."
Doncaster Rovers boss Sean O'Driscoll, Port Vale chief Micky Adams, Phil Brown and Scott's brother Andy, the Brentford manager, are also thought to be in contention.
A managerial partnership between the Scott brothers has even been mooted.
The Blades, currently being led by caretaker boss John Carver, do not plan to unveil the new man until after Christmas.
"We've spoken to or are aware of about 12 people who are keen on the idea of coming here," said Blades PLC chairman Kevin McCabe.
"In terms of the nitty gritty we are talking of about four.
"That's four candidates from outside the club.
"If John (Carver) does well then of course it would be foolish to rule him out.
"If John was appointed it wouldn't be for economic reasons."

event_or_fact.property: I'm flattered to be linked with a club where I started my career and have a lot of affection for
We've spoken to or are aware of about 12 people who are keen on the idea of coming here
I won't be holding my breath on this one.
he is flattered to be linked with the manager's job at former club Sheffield United

description.hltext_display: 黄金小幅震荡上涨等待消息面指引
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
上海期金主力1106合约周三（12月22日）以302.7元/克高开，收盘在302.33元/克，较12月21日结算价上涨0.39元或0.13%，最高303.09元/克，最低302.01元/克，成交量13418手，持仓量为71726手。
现货金22日亚洲时段继早盘小幅走高后午盘趋于稳定，有关欧元区陷入债务问题国家的评级可能遭继续下调的担忧继续提升市场人气。国内期金Au1106合约22日震荡收阴，全天价格保持平稳，但市场交投意愿不强，期金位于302元水平反复震荡。主力合约持仓较上日减少2438手。总体看，金价维持震荡行情，多空双方力量比较均衡，目前只有耐心等待消息面的进一步明朗才能打破当前的僵持局面。
评级机构穆迪(Moody"s)周二将葡萄牙A1长期评级和 Prime-1短期政府债评级列入可能下调观察名单，下调幅度可能为1-2级。惠誉(Fitch)也将希腊"BBB-"长期外币及本币发行人违约评级列入负面观察名单。不断出现的利空评级消息持续削弱市场对欧元的信心，同时也使得黄金的避险价值得到充分的彰显。
国际货币基金组织(IMF)周二宣布，其已经完成一年前开始的403.3吨黄金储备出售计划，表明来自公共部门的数十年的黄金出售将可能渐近尾声。但黄金市场对该消息反应并不明显。周三晚间将迎来美国第三季度国内生产总值(GDP)数据，预计将会为金价走势带来一些指引。美国商务部(DOC)将于北京时间21:30公布第三季度实际GDP终值，分析人士预计年化季率增长2.8%，高于上季度的2.5%。
全球最大的黄金上市交易基金(ETF)SPDR Gold Trust表示，其黄金持仓量截至12月21日降至1,298.029吨，12月17日止为1,298.940吨。其持仓量曾在6月29日触及纪录高位1,320.436吨。（永安期货贾天杰）

description.hltext_display: SINGAPORE TO HOLD BIOFUELS CONFERENCE IN MARCH
description.author: Bernama
description.content:
SINGAPORE, Dec 22 (Bernama) – International academia, scientists and experts on biofuels will meet here in March to identify promising avenues to a viable biofuels future.
The experts will discuss economic and environmental considerations of biofuel technologies and the integration of biofuels into the existing energy infrastructure, while the academia, government and the private sector will discuss and comment on research and policy.
The six-day conference to begin on March 1 is being organised by a United States-based non-profit organisation, Keystone Symposia on Molecular and Cellular Biology, and Singapore''s Agency for Science Technology and Research (A*STAR).
In a statement today, A*STAR said the conference titled "Biofuels" will discuss the options of biofuels for an economic and sustainable future, sustainability of cellulosic ethanol (biofuel produced from non-food biomass), algae biofuels (deriving fuel from algae), development of new biomass feedstocks and potential of biomass production in Southeast Asia.
Among the internationally renowned speakers at the conference includes Dr Adam Brown of the International Energy Agency, Professor Timothy Donohue of the University of Wisconsin-Madison/ Great Lakes Bioenergy, Dr Arthur Grossman of Solazyme Inc and Professor Lonnie Ingram of the University of Florida.
One of the conference''s scientific organiser Professor Stephen P. Mayfield of the University of California said one of the greatest challenges that mankind faced today was to develop efficient, sustainable and scalable processes for converting sunlight energy into the food and fuel the world needs.
"No single renewable-energy strategy will be able to provide a total solution but a combination of strategies that can be coordinated and integrated effectively has the potential to significantly decrease our dependence on fossil fuel," he said.
He added that at this critical time in mapping a new global energy strategy, this symposium would address the potential of cellulosic and algal produced bioenergy as part of a sustainable future for the world.
Keystone Symposia held its first meeting on biofuels last year in US.
More information on the conference can be found at www.keystonesymposia.org/biofuels.

description.hltext_display: Fed extends Europe debt crisis program
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Federal Reserve extended a program set up earlier this year to ease strains from the European debt crisis.
The program, which was set to expire in January, will now run through Aug. 1, the Fed announced on Tuesday.
The Fed is lending dollars to other central banks in exchange for their currencies. The central banks can lend those dollars out to banks in their home countries to ease financial turmoil.
The Fed's "swap" program was set up in May as fears rose that Greece's debt crisis could engulf other European countries. European banks need dollars to lend to companies across the continent. European companies that have operations in the U.S. pay their employees in dollars and buy raw materials with the U.S. currency.
The Bank of Canada, the Bank of England, the European Central Bank, the Bank of Japan, and the Swiss National Bank all have swap arrangements with the Fed.
"The reality is Europe isn't out of the woods yet. This extends a tool to central banks if they need it," said Nariman Behravesh, chief economist at IHS Global Insight.
Use of the program peaked in May, shortly after the swap arrangements were set up. The Fed had lent the European Central Bank $9.2 billion, and was repaid.
In June, the Fed had lent $6.64 billion through the program. Most of the money went to the European Central Bank, and was repaid. Use of the program has since waned. As of early December, the Fed lent only $60 million to the European Central Bank.
However, the debt crisis has spread from Greece to engulf Ireland, which required a $90 billion bailout in late November from the European Union and International Monetary Fund. The crisis threatens other European countries, including Spain and Portugal.

description.hltext_display: Teatrul Naţional de Operetă anunţă dispariţia basului Nicolae Măgureanu.
description.author: redactia@romanialibera.ro (Dana Ilie
description.content:
Teatrul Naţional de Operetă anunţă dispariţia basului Nicolae Măgureanu Teatrul Naţional de Operetă anunţă dispariţia basului Nicolae Măgureanu.
E-MAIL PRINT RSS MĂRIME TEXT
de DANA ILIE
127 VIZUALIZARI | COMENTARII 1
Nicolae Măgureanu s-a născut în Giurgiu pe 2 aprilie 1954 şi a absolvit Liceul Teoretic "Ion Marinescu", din localitatea natală, în 1973.
A urmat apoi Facultatea de Drept şi mai târziu Institutul de Agronomie din Bucureşti, desfăşurându-şi, în acelaşi timp, activitatea că membru al corului în Ansamblul "Doina" al Armatei.
Din 1979 a fost angajat la Teatrul Naţional de Operetă. Nicolae Măgureanu s-a impus repede atenţiei publicului în roluri de un comic savuros precum Ali Hachim din "Oklahoma", Egon din "Logodnicul din Luna", Miska din "Silvia", Pah-Şi-Fu din "Secretul lui Marco Polo" , Des Aubrais din ,,Suzana" sau Alfred P. Doolittle din "My fair Lady".

description.hltext_display: It all adds up
description.content:
COEUR d'ALENE - In 2006 Brian Tenney moved back to Coeur d'Alene and began doing tax returns for family and a few friends.
In July of 2009, Tenney was out of town at a training class when two different business clients called him on his cell phone in a panic.
Their outside bookkeepers had caused some problems with the IRS, and then quit responding to their voicemails and e-mails. They both asked Tenney to take over the payroll and bookkeeping for their businesses, and get them "straightened out."
He did, and so launched his business, "CORE Accounting and Consulting," from primarily tax return preparation into a full-service accounting firm. It turned out to be a great move for both Tenney and his clients. His customer base has grown in leaps and bounds each year since and there's no end in sight.
Tenney graduated from the University of Idaho in 1998 with a degree in accounting. He started his career by working for the Spokane office of Price Waterhouse Coopers, the largest accounting firm in the world, where he primarily worked on audits of large publicly traded companies.
In 2000, he moved back to Moscow to work for a regional firm, Presnell Gage Accounting & Consulting. There he specialized in small business accounting, tax and consulting. In 2006 he moved to Coeur d'Alene and worked as assistant controller of Great Floors, a locally owned retail chain.
That was when he started his own CPA practice as a side business, which has since grown into a full-time endeavor with four part-time employees.
Tenney said that starting a business from scratch is not for the faint of heart. It's a multi-year investment of time, effort and money, and you most likely will not reap the rewards for several years.
Keeping your eye on the long-term goal will help you overcome the day-to-day frustrations and disappointments.
Working alone, Tenney had kept everything he needed to remember in his head. Unfortunately, employees aren't great mind-readers, which makes communication and training very important.
"Unfortunately, we accountants too often focus on the numbers and not enough on the people we are serving," he said. "I've worked hard to overcome that in my business. I have a great relationship with all my clients."
Tenney attended classes at the Idaho Small Business Development Center looking for guidance on his business strategy, growth strategy, and to learn how to run a business more effectively. He learned how to identify which types of services he should focus his attention on developing and growing the most aggressively.
CORE Accounting and Consulting is at 105 S. Sixth St., Coeur d'Alene, 83814, (208) 676-8900, www.corecpa.net.

description.hltext_display: 勤+緣媒體服務截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度末期股息及暫停辦理股份登記手續
description.content: 茲參照勤+緣媒體服務有限公司（「本公司」）日期為二零一零年十一月二十九日有關（其中包括）建議派付截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度以股代息之末期股息之公布（「該公布」）。除另有界定外，本公布所用之專有詞匯具有該公布所界定之相同涵義。如該公布所披露，董事議決議派付截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度以股代息之末期股息股1.28港仙，合共10,500,000港元，并尋求本公布股東「（股東）」批準，該以股代之末期股息建議派付予於二零一一年三月二十一日（星期一）名列本公司股東名冊之股東。本公司將於二零一一年三月十六日（星期三）至二零一一年三月二十一日（星期一）（包括首屬兩天）暫停辦理股份過戶登記手續。為符合收取建議以股代息之末期股息及有權出席股東周年大會并投票的資格，所有填妥之股份過戶表格連同有關股票，最遲須於二零一一年三月十五（星期二）下午四時前，交回本公司之股份過戶登記處香港分處，聯合證券登記有限公司，地址為香港灣仔皇駱克道33號中央廣場福利商業中心18樓。

description.hltext_display: Kulda har kommet for alvor!
description.author: Espen Torgersen
description.content:
Jeg kjørte gjennom et lokalt kuldehøl i Trøgstad, og der var helt nede i 37 grader, forteller en bilist til NRK.no.
For NRK-reporter Ole Martin Nilsson og friluftsmannen Tommy Gundersen viste kvikksølvet derimot beskjedne 17 kuldegrader. De er i Halden og tester fiskelykken på Rokkevannet. Men det er vindstille, så det er ikke så kaldt, sier Nilsson.
Hvor kaldt er det der du er nå? Send oss en epost på ostfold@nrk.no - legg gjerne med et bilde.
Fiskelykken for gutta i Halden har derimot ikke slått til ennå. Det er litt for mørkt ennå, men vi satser på at fisken biter etterhvert, sier Nilsson på telefon rundt klokken 7.45.
LYD: Hør gutta på isfiske
LES OGSÅ:
Våre lesere har lagt inn flere grader på vår Facebook-side. Her er en kjapp oversikt:
Noen kaldere? Send inn din temperatur til ostfold@nrk.no eller post temperaturen på vår facebook-side. Du kan også benytte kommentarfeltet under.

description.hltext_display: India's SRDSIL Seeking Govt Support for Rough Diamond Sourcing
description.content:
An Indian diamond polisher. Surat's supply of rough diamonds is reportedly running short
"We want the Gujarat government to help the diamond industry in Surat… realize the dream of direct sourcing of diamonds," a founding member of the Surat Rough Diamond Sourcing India Ltd (SRDSIL) consortium told the Times of India.
A short supply of rough stones is reportedly making things tough for Surat's diamantaires. A founding SRDSIL member told the Times that there is a "huge gap in the demand-supply ratio" and noted that one of the main reasons SRDSIL formed was to ensure that smaller-scale diamond dealers and manufacturers could have a secure supply of raw material.
SRDSIL, which was unveiled at the Mines to Market diamond trade exposition in October, had signed a $1.2 billion deal with the Zimbabwe government for a direct supply of rough diamonds in exchange for members of India's diamond industry training young Zimbabweans as diamond cutters and polishers. The deal hit a snag after the Kimberley Process reiterated the ban against export of Zimbabwe's diamonds and India's government consequently stated that it would not allow Surat to import rough diamonds from Zimbabwe.

entity.property: Surat Rough Diamond Sourcing India Ltd

description.hltext_display: Erbakan, Trabzon da Seçim Meydanlarına İniyor
description.content:
Saadet Partisi Genel Başkanı Necmettin Erbakan, 26 Aralık'ta Trabzon'da seçim meydanlarına iniyor.
Edinilen bilgiye göre, partisinin yeniden iktidar olması için seçmenlerden oy isteyen Erbakan, 26 Aralık'ta Trabzon'da, partisinin il kongresine katılacak ve burada yeni dönemin ilk seçim konuşmasını yapacak. Erbakan, daha sonra 20'ye yakın şehirde partisi tarafından düzenlenen mitinglere katılacak.
Numan Kurtulmuş'un ayrılması ile Atatürk Spor Salonu'nda yapılan son kongrede, parti kurmaylarının yoğun isteği sonucunda genel başkanlık görevini kabul etmek zorunda kaldığını açıklayan Erbakan, Milli Görüş fikrini yeniden iktidar yapmak için ''Bismillah'' diyerek yola çıkacaklarını ifade etmişti.
Erbakan, kendisine örnek aldığı Eyüb Sultan'ın (Eyüp El Ensari) türbesini ziyaret etmiş, burada Cuma namazını kılarak, seçim startını vermişti.
-EYÜP EL-ENSARİ-
Ebu Eyyüp Halid Bin Zeyd veya Ebu Eyyüp El-Ensari (576-645) Türkçe'de zaman zaman Eyüp Sultan olarak anılan Sahabe'den bir Müslüman. El-Ensari, Hz. Muhammed'i Mekke'den Medine'ye göç ettiği zaman evinde ilk misafir eden sahabedir. Bu sebeple kendisine bu olaydan sonra ''mihmandar-ı nebevÃ®''de dendiği olmuştur.
El-Ensari, 80'li yaşlarında İstanbul kuşatması sırasında şehit oldu. Vasiyeti üzerine İstanbul surlarının dibine gömüldüğüne dair bir rivayet vardır. Rivayete göre daha sonra Akşemsettin manevi keşif yoluyla mezarını bulur.
Bugün adına bir türbe, kendi adı ile anılan Eyüp semtinde ise Eyüp Sultan Camisi bulunuyor. (Anadolu Ajansı) 2 dakika önce.. [2430138]

description.hltext_display: 盘中股市跳水沪铜震荡回调
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
上海期货交易所期铜12月22日高开低走。主力1103合约开盘报69900元/吨，收盘至68700元/吨，下跌270元/吨，成交量190,700手，持仓量196,534手。隔夜伦铜升至纪录高位提振国内市场高开，但国内市场加息预期犹存、现货消费疲软及午后股市盘中跳水拖累了期价走势。走势来看，沪铜仍继续高位震荡格局，盘中触碰到70000整数点位，但市场明显缺乏继续拉升意愿，外强内弱格局也仍将延续。
伦敦金属交易所（LME）3个月期铜22日亚洲电子盘早盘看到一些温和获利回吐，但仅距21日触及又一历史高点相差52美元。期铜21日上涨，明显受到中国11月积极铜进口数据以及智利Collahuasi铜矿遭遇不可抗力的支撑。不过，交易商表示，市场更多的充斥一般看涨情绪。根据一份Triland报告，尽管工业用户不愿买入合约，但没有任何理由认为看涨势头不能继续，因进入2011年，投资需求可能将强劲。该机构表示，“只有意外的外部事件似乎才能够扭转这一趋势。”
周二，欧债危机再添隐忧，穆迪(Moody"s)宣布，由于葡萄牙经济增长前景疲软且担忧该国举债成本偏高，将葡萄牙的A1/P-1评级置于可能调降的观察名单，穆迪指出，葡萄牙出台紧缩措施后经济成长面临的不确定性，是对葡萄牙进行评估的原因之一；并且当前对葡萄牙以可持续价格从市场融资的能力存有疑虑。
冶炼行业官员周二称，中国铜冶炼企业的生产料不会因智利Collahuasi铜矿短期中断船货供应而受到影响，因冶炼企业的铜精矿库存充足。智利Patache港口的一个装船设施周末倒塌，该装船设施是装运Collahuasi铜矿的铜精矿。因此，Collahuasi对铜精矿销售宣布遭遇不可抗力。Collahuasi是全球第三大铜矿，每年产出逾535,000吨，或占全球采矿的3.3%。
中国统计局昨日公布了11月中国基本金属进口分项数据，中国11月进口铜232298吨，同比增加18.5%，相较10月169897吨，环比大幅增加36.7%。今年下半年比值持续下降，进口亏损加大的情况下，中国铜进口依然强劲，重新点燃了海外市场对中国需求的期待。(科创信息 马爽)

description.hltext_display: Wuppertal: Über 250.000 Gäste sorgten für Besucherrekord im Von der Heydt-Museum
description.content:
Wie jetzt Museumsdirektor Gerhard Finckh mitteilte, wurde das Haus im zurückliegenden Jahr, seit Gründung des Museums vor 100 Jahren, noch nie so gut besucht wie 2010.
Insgesamt wurden über 250.000 Gäste gezählt, die eine der vielen Ausstellungen im Von der Heydt-Museum besuchten.
Momentan wird die Schau "Bonnard - Magier der Farbe" gezeigt. Diese wurde von Kunstkritikern zur besten Exposition im Jahr 2010 für das Land Nordrhein-Westfalen gewählt. Die Ausstellung mit Exponaten des französischen Expressionisten Pierre Bonnard kann bis Ende Januar 2010 besichtigt werden.

description.hltext_display: Toronto-Dominion Bank to buy Chrysler Financial for $6.3B
description.content:
Canada's Toronto-Dominion Bank plans to buy Farmington Hills-based Chrysler Financial in a $6.3 billion deal.
Chrysler Financial announced today that the TD Bank Group (TSX and NYSE: TD), the holding company for Toronto-Dominion Bank, will buy the company from the private equity firm of New York- based Cerberus Capital Management LP, making Canada's second largest bank one of the top five bank-owned auto lenders in North America.
The deal will involve $5.9 billion in cash and $400 million in goodwill and is expected to close in the second quarter of 2011.
Chrysler Financial will retain current CEO Tom Gilman and be headquartered in Toronto. It is expected to be renamed under the Toronto-Dominion brand by next spring.
Chrysler Financial, which began as Chrysler Credit Corp. 45 years ago, has about 1,850 employees in the U.S. and Canada.
"Under Cerberus' ownership, Chrysler Financial has preserved its technology platform, retained top talent and maintained key capabilities," said Gilman in a press release. "This transaction positions us for future growth with the financial strength of TD, one of the soundest, best capitalized and best managed banks in the world."
Canadian banks generally avoided the excesses that befell their U. S. counterparts and have emerged from the recession in a buying spree for U.S. assets. TD said it will not need to issue stock to conclude the transaction.
"This transaction represents a unique opportunity to purchase a great organic-growth platform at an attractive price," said Ed Clark, TD's CEO, in a press release. "Chrysler Financial is a well-run business with the capacity for significantly higher returns over the next several years. This acquisition will allow us to leverage our lending expertise and financial strength to expand our presence in a large North American market with tremendous potential upside."
The bank said the addition of Chrysler Financial dealer clients, who serve about one million customers, could generate a return on invested capital of about 20 percent in three to four years.
TD Bank, an American subsidiary co-headquartered in New Jersey and Oregon, will oversee U.S. operations.
Cerberus bought Chrysler in 2007 but lost control of the automaker during its restructuring. It held onto Chrysler Financial. Detroit-based Ally Financial Inc., the lender formerly known as GMAC, became the preferred lender for Chrysler during the restructuring.

description.hltext_display: Oil prices above $90/bbl as crude, gasoline stocks drop
description.content:
, a poll shows. Full Article An attendant holds a petrol nozzle at a petrol pump in of Siliguri August 5, 2008.
Credit: Reuters/Rupak De Chowdhuri/Files U.S. crude for February climbed 22 cents to $90.04 a barrel by 0750 GMT. ICE Brent crude rose 25 cents to $93.45.
American Petroleum Institute data released late on Tuesday in the U.S. showed a large 5.8 million barrel decline in weekly crude stocks, surpassing analyst expectations.
"Big drops in crude oil and gasoline inventories in the API data pushed the oil market to the up. But buying interest around this level, around $90 a barrel, is not so large," said Ken Hasegawa, a commodity derivatives manager at Japan's Newedge brokerage.
API data also showed an unexpected 2.9 million barrel fall in gasoline inventories.
The U.S. Energy Information Service will release its inventory data at 1530 GMT on Wednesday.
Oil prices were also supported by chilly weather in northern Europe and the United States, which has increased heating fuel demand. U.S. heating oil demand was expected to average 4.6 percent above normal this week.
AccuWeather.com expects temperatures in the U.S. northeast to average mostly below normal for the next week, with slightly milder readings late this month.
Thin trading volumes lent further support to oil prices.
"Ahead of the long Christmas holiday, there are relatively fewer participants. Therefore, it is possible to extend gains through the night on thin volumes, but I don't think the market is that bullish," Hasegawa said.
The U.S. dollar fell to a two-month low against the Swiss franc on Wednesday. It fell to as low as 0.9533 franc , lowest since Oct. 15.
A weaker greenback supports dollar-denominated commodities such as oil, making it cheaper for those holding other currencies.
(Additional reporting by Seng Li Peng in Singapore)

description.content:
were impounded when a surveillance team of the unit reported that the trucks had diverted their course and were unloading the cylinders at Kasoa-Amanfrom.
Three trucks, with registration numbers AS 9989 P, GT 6057 C and GT 3984 B, carrying the cylinders, which are banned in Ghana, have also been impounded.
The goods, which had been at the Tema Port for two weeks, had attracted the attention of the SOU since transit goods spend less time at the port.
Narrating events leading to the confiscation of the goods to the Daily Graphic, the Co-ordinator of the SOU, Mr Abudu Nelson, said the unit received a tip-off from an informant at the port that some goods had been loaded onto some trucks deep in the night.
He said the SOU then placed its surveillance team on the alert to follow the three trucks when they departed the Tema Port at 5.30 p.m. on Saturday.
“As soon as the trucks reached the Tema Motorway an hour later, the surveillance team reported that the drivers had yanked off the tracking devices meant to monitor their movement until they reached their destination in Burkina Faso,” he stated.
He said the team then called for back-up and the trucks were followed until Kasoa where they diverted about four kilometres into Amanfrom where the contents of one of the vehicles were unloaded into an uncompleted building.
Mr Nelson said when the drivers of the trucks, Abdul Razak Hussein, Abubakr Sadique and Hamza, were questioned, they said they had carried cocoa from Kumasi to Tema and had been contracted to carry the cylinders to Burkina Faso by an agent, who is now at large.
According to the drivers, when they reached the Tema Motorway, the agent told them the goods were no longer heading to Burkina Faso but would be unloaded at Kasoa.
Mr Nelson said even though the unit had made some arrest in the past, “this is the biggest catch we have ever made”.
He appealed to the management of CEPS to deal ruthlessly with the culprits to serve as a deterrent to others who were engaged in such activities which cost the country a lot in revenue.
Some time last year the Finance Minister, Dr Kwabena Duffuor, set up the SOU to combat the increasing rate of revenue leakage as a result of malfeasance at CEPS, including that involving transit goods, running into millions of cedis annually.
Since then, there have been many arrests of smugglers, smuggled goods, as well as transit goods, which have saved the nation a lot of money which, otherwise, would have gone into private pockets.

GBP/USD Technical Analysis 22 December 2010
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: GBP/USD Open 1.5463 High 1.5569 Low 1.5434 Close 1.5464
On Tuesday Pound/Dollar decreased with around 130 pips, in line with the negative Interbank sentiment at nearly -5%. The Cable depreciated from 1.5569 to 1.5434 yesterday, closing the day at 1.5464. Today the British Pound is slightly adjusting, and it's still moving within yesterday's range. On the 1 hour chart the range trading is breaking downwards, while on the 3 hour chart the downward channel has renewed. First resistance is yesterday's peak at 1.5569. Break above it should extend the bullish movement further towards the 1.5690. The nearest support is yesterday's bottom at 1.5434. Going bellow it should extend British Pound's reduction further down towards next downward objective 1.5312. Today are UK BoE meeting minutes, GDP and Current account, all at 9:30 GMT. Quotes are moving in line with the 20 and bellow the 50 EMA on the 1 hour chart, indicating short term neutral and medium term bearish pressure. The value of the RSI indicator is positive and inclining upwards, MACD is negative and tranquil, while CCI is close with the 100 line on the 1 hour chart, giving overall neutral signals.

description.hltext_display: Nokia N900: Fantastic Nokia Phones Available In Best Offers
description.content:
Nokia is the most popular mobile phone manufacturer that has sustained over a large period of time. This company is engaged in continuous manufacturing of all the advanced handsets that are equipped with many rich features. There are many other brands that are existing in the market and are giving tough competition to each other. But Nokia is remained on its firm position. Now this company has come up with a very unique smart phone that possesses several advanced features and latest applications.
This awesome Nokia N900 is available in many exciting and cheap offers that can be availed by the leading networking companies such as Vodafone, O2, Orange, Three, Virgin, T-mobile and others.These Nokia N900 deals include contract phones, pay as you go handsets and SIM free phones. In contract phones the user has to a fixed rental every month to the networking company. T-mobile is offering these gadgets at a rental of £26.61 which is to be paid every month. The customers will also get benefit of free talktime of 100 mints along with free 9999 texts. Further, Vodafone is offering these handsets at a monthly rental of £29.17 along with a free talktime of 100 mints and 500 free texts.
Apart from this, these ultimate gadgets are also offered through pay as you go deals. In this kind of offer, the handset is given at very cost effective prices to the users. These handsets are prepaid devices, so there is no need to give any monthly rental. O2 is offering these gadgets at a very cheap cost of £279.9 to £429.9 along with a free years warranty. Further, Vodafone is offering this device at a very low price of £345. It is also offering free years warranty. The third deal is SIM free phones. In this offer the user id not bound to use a particular network and the user is also not bound in the contract with these service providers. Hence, it gives a freedom of choice to its customers. Many free gifts and incentives are provided with these advanced handsets. These gifts can be a mobile phone, laptop, LCD, etc.

description.hltext_display: UC Davis defeats Southern Utah 74-65
description.content:
DAVIS, Calif. --
Eddie Miller scored 20 points and Ryan Sypkens added 16 as UC Davis shot 55 percent in the second half to pull away from Southern Utah and record a 74-65 victory on Tuesday night.
Miller connected on 9 of 14 shots and Sypkens made 6 of 7 for the Aggies (5-7), who made 22 of 42 field-goal attempts (52 percent). UC Davis was 11-for-20 from the field in the second half.
Joe Harden scored 15 points and Mark Payne had 12 for the Aggies, who led 36-33 at the half. Payne, who made 10 of 12 free-throw attempts, moved into 13th place on UC Davis' all-time scoring list with 1,117 points, surpassing Jason Robedeaux (1983-88, 1,112) and Alan Steed (1967-70, 1,107). Payne, a senior guard who missed eight games last season due to injury, is second among the school's career assists leaders with 395.

event_or_fact.property: 16 as UC Davis shot 55 percent in the second half to pull away from Southern Utah and record a 74-65 victory on Tuesday night

description.hltext_display: 电石疲软拖累连PVC高开回调
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
大连PVC期货22日高开回调，主力合约1105报收于8275点，下跌55点；原油维持高位及亚洲乙烯持稳支撑，但受国内宏观面政策的不确定性、电石价格下滑及基本面节能减排政策即将结束、需求淡季来临等利空因素影响。不过交通运输不畅带来区域性货源供应紧张问题也将给市场提供一定的支撑。预计PVC期价近期仍将维持在8200―8500元的区间振荡。
纽约商业交易所(NYMEX)原油期货在22日亚洲电子盘扩大涨幅，升至每桶90美元上方，数据显示美国原油库存意外大幅下跌提供支撑。截止北京时间15:00左右，NYMEX 2月原油期货涨报每桶90.02美元，上涨0.22美元，稍早一度高见90.09水平。美国石油学会21日公布的数据显示，美国12月18日当周原油库存减少580万桶。石油市场参与人士把注意力转向22日美国能源部能源库存报告。德国商业银行分析师Eugen Weinberg称，寒冷天气成为投资者推升油价的最佳借口。预期机构投资者将会持有更多的多头仓位。
21日，亚洲乙烯市场，价格收涨5美元/吨，CFR东北亚收于1170.5-1172.5美元/吨，CFR东南亚收于1090.5-1091.5美元/吨。
电石出厂价格继续下跌，内蒙乌海、陕西地区电石主流出厂价3600-3700元/吨。市场看空，基于对产量增加及需求增加有限的预期。山东接收价4200-4450元/吨，天津河北3950-4300元/吨，河南4100-4300元/吨，江浙4400-4550元/吨，山西3800-3900元/吨。
现货方面，今日PVC企业主流趋稳，山东信发仍有下调50元/吨报至7800元/吨省内现汇，现电石法各地五型料出厂价在7800-8100元/吨省内，西部地区在7500-7600元/吨，高端维持稳定，乙烯料成交价多在8100-8400元/吨，目前企业多观望，价格上变动不多。
下游方面，今年11月塑料型材（包括板片材）的产量为35.9万吨，比10月份减少了1.9万吨；塑料管及其附件的产量为73万吨，较10月减少了2.1万吨。进入12月份以后，随着全国大范围的降温，建筑市场进入淡季，市场对塑料制品的需求也呈现出萎缩的态势。北方地区制品企业开工负荷大幅降低，南方地区制品企业也出现了明显的下降。（永安期货 孙汝涛）

description.hltext_display: "Försäljningen har inte levt upp till våra förväntningar"
description.author: Mikael Lundström
description.content:
Kappahls senaste kvartalsrapport präglas av svag försäljning och ett sämre resultat. Vi är besvikna på vår prestation, säger Kappahls vd Christian W Jansson i en kommentar till rapporten.
Kappahls nettoomsättning under det första kvartalet i verksamhetsåret (september-november) uppgick till 1 341 miljoner kronor, vilket är en minskning med 0,2 procent.
I jämförbara butiker minskade försäljningen med 3,1 procent. Försäljningen i jämförbara butiker har inte levt upp till våra förväntningar i Norden. I Polen är utvecklingen annorlunda med en klart positiv försäljningsutveckling på jämförbara enheter, samtidigt som resultatet fortfarande tyngs av en hög andel nya butiker, säger Christian W Jansson i rapporten.
Rörelseresultatet för perioden backade från 207 till 146 miljoner kronor. Vi är besvikna på vår prestation i en svag marknad. Vi kan väsentligt bättre och vi förbereder åtgärder för att återta vår position på modemarknaden, kommenterar Christan W Jansson.
I slutet av november hade Kappahl 360 butiker. Bolaget behåller sitt mål att växa med 20-25 butiker per år.

description.hltext_display: Thanks for all the boxes, says charity
description.content:
OPERATION Christmas Child has thanked people in North Somerset after the charity received more than 17,900 boxes this year.
Operation Christmas Child is one of the UK's leading annual children's charity projects, which involves filling a shoebox full of gifts for children less fortunate.
All the boxes are sent to vulnerable children in a dozen overseas countries.
This year residents from Weston-super-Mare, Clevedon, Portishead, the Gordano Valley, Chipping Sodbury and Kingswood, sent in more than 17,900 boxes, which are being sent to Belarus and Romania.
Area coordinator Jenny Lippiatt said: "This is the 20th year of Operation Christmas Child and we continue to be bowled over by people's kindness, so I would like to send a big thank you."

event_or_fact.property: This is the 20th year of Operation Christmas Child and we continue to be bowled over by people's kindness, so I would like to send a big thank you.

description.hltext_display: Greeley council lops $25 off of traffic fines
description.content:
Greeley traffic tickets will put less of a financial strain on violators next year.
The Greeley City Council voted 5-2 Tuesday to eliminate the $25 fee that’s been added to traffic tickets of three points or more since 2003.
The council opted to repeal the city’s traffic-calming fee after a study showed Greeley’s fees were higher than neighboring communities.
Council members John Gates and Donna Sapienza, as well as two residents at the public hearing, sought to keep the surcharge as is.
“The drastic decline in injury and fatal accident rates does not revolve around sheer luck,” Gates said. “Simply, if you don’t get a ticket, you don’t have to pay.”
Gates offered an alternative to deny the repeal, but it failed 4-3, with Council members Charles Archibeque, Sandi Elder, Maria Secrest and Mike Finn voting against it.
Finn was a proponent of the repeal because he said the money collected was being diverted to police, away from its intended use as a public works tool to build crosswalks, speed humps and mobile radar devices.
“The surcharge needs to be used for the purpose it was set up for,” Finn said. “If the city feels they need more income from fines, they should raise the fines to meet the requirement to meet police needs for revenues.”
The surcharge has helped fund speed bumps and other devices designed to reduce speeds in residential areas, as well as bought equipment for the Greeley Police Department’s traffic unit, such as radar guns and radios.
The police and the city’s public works department shared the revenue generated by the surcharge to pay for items related to traffic calming. Last year, the surcharge generated $274,770, which was down 7.5 percent from the six-year high in 2008.
From 2005-09, traffic violations have increased in Greeley 69 percent, while there were 35 percent fewer traffic crashes and 80 percent fewer injury crashes, according to city documents.
By eliminating the traffic surcharge, the city will no longer build speed bumps or raised crosswalks.
“It won’t change what we do,” said Greeley Police Chief Jerry Garner after the vote. “We’ll just have to find the money someplace else.”

event_or_fact.property: the money collected was being diverted to police, away from its intended use as a public works tool to build crosswalks, speed humps and mobile radar devices
the repeal, but it failed 4-3, with Council members Charles Archibeque, Sandi Elder, Maria Secrest and Mike Finn voting against it

description.hltext_display: Hot 97 DJ suspended indefinitely after Haiti HIV crack
description.author: Christina Boyle DAILY NEWS STAFF WRITER
description.content:
Hot 97� radio bosses� indefinitely suspended DJ Cipha Sounds Tuesday as dozens of Haitian community leaders stepped up their calls for his resignation.
Activists and elected officials gathered outside the radio station on Hudson St. to voice their anger at the DJ's on-air claim he is HIV-negative because he does not "mess with Haitian girls."
Cipha Sounds later apologized to listeners, calling it a "tasteless joke," and the station said he will begin sensitivity training focused on the Haitian community.
"Cipha made an immediate public apology and recognizes his insensitivity and the negative impact his comments have on all Haitians," said Alex Cameron, SVP/Market Manager of Emmis-New York.
Haitian-Americans said an apology was not enough.
He "said it was a joke. That was not a joke, that was a serious insult," said Haitian-born City Councilman Mathieu Eugene.

event_or_fact.property: Cipha made an immediate public apology and recognizes his insensitivity and the negative impact his comments have on all Haitians
said it was a joke.; That was not a joke, that was a serious insult

description.hltext_display: 勤+緣媒體服務截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度末期股息及暫停辦理股份登記手續
description.content: 茲參照勤+緣媒體服務有限公司（「本公司」）日期為二零一零年十一月二十九日有關（其中包括）建議派付截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度以股代息之末期股息之公布（「該公布」）。除另有界定外，本公布所用之專有詞匯具有該公布所界定之相同涵義。如該公布所披露，董事議決議派付截至二零一零年九月三十日止年度以股代息之末期股息股1.28港仙，合共10,500,000港元，并尋求本公布股東「（股東）」批準，該以股代之末期股息建議派付予於二零一一年三月二十一日（星期一）名列本公司股東名冊之股東。本公司將於二零一一年三月十六日（星期三）至二零一一年三月二十一日（星期一）（包括首屬兩天）暫停辦理股份過戶登記手續。為符合收取建議以股代息之末期股息及有權出席股東周年大會并投票的資格，所有填妥之股份過戶表格連同有關股票，最遲須於二零一一年三月十五（星期二）下午四時前，交回本公司之股份過戶登記處香港分處，聯合證券登記有限公司，地址為香港灣仔皇駱克道33號中央廣場福利商業中心18樓。

description.hltext_display: "Éste es un trabajo muy agradable porque sólo das buenas noticias"
description.content:
"Éste es un trabajo muy agradable porque sólo das buenas noticias"
Antonio Manfredi, director de Medios Interactivos de la RTVA, vuelve a transmitir un año más la Lotería de Navidad.
Lleva quince años ininterrumpidos como el conductor de la suerte navideña para los espectadores andaluces. Antonio Manfredi, director de Medios Interactivos de la RTVA, vuelve a ponerse en el micrófono para retransmitir la Lotería de Navidad. Sin estridencias, con la emoción justa y aportando los datos con la inmediatez necesaria.
-El sorteo es el pórtico de la Navidad. Es una satisfacción personal. Este es un trabajo divertido, muy agradable, porque sólo das buenas noticias.
-En esta edición todo es nuevo, con el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, dentro de la tradición.
-Es un escenario más grande, con un aforo de dos mil personas y tal vez pierda el calor del local de Guzmán el Bueno. Le hará perder tal vez el sabor de antaño, pero el sorteo en sí mantiene toda su espectacularidad. Vamos a tener una cabina por medio, así que trabajaremos bien, sin interferirnos las voces.
-Para un narrador ¿qué es lo más importante en esta mañana?
-La urgencia de saber dónde tocan los premios. Hace cuatro años los medios llegamos a un acuerdo con el organismo de Loterías para que se facilitara esta información lo mejor y más rápido posible. Manejo un listado de teléfonos de administraciones para que los de Andalucía Directo tengan de inmediato el contacto.
-De estos años se queda...
-La lluvia de millones del Gordo en Granada en 2004. Pero cualquier premio en Andalucía me satisface.

description.hltext_display: John Kettley predicts snow for Port Vale clash - if League Two fixture goes ahead
description.content:
WEATHER guru John Kettley predicts Lincoln City's Boxing Day clash at Port Vale could be hampered by snow if the festive fixture gets the go-ahead.
The Imps are due to play their first game for 30 days against Micky Adams' high-flying Valiants in Staffordshire, but with minimum temperatures of -10C predicted for Christmas Day the game is already in doubt.
Lincolnshire-based BBC weather man Kettley said that Boxing Day will be the turning point in terms of temperatures increasing, but revealed the milder weather was likely to bring new snow showers, followed by rain.
"At the moment, severe frosts are likely to last right through to Christmas Day morning," said the 58-year-old.
"Although it is likely to become milder in the west on Boxing Day, that change could bring heavy snow before it turns back to rain.
"There could be snow during the Port Vale game and that could threaten the fixture, along with other games that are scheduled to be played."
Two days after their game with Vale, Steve Tilson's men are scheduled to host Graham Turner's promotion-chasing Shrewsbury side.
The frozen surface at Sincil Bank is currently blanketed with frost covers that work in temperatures of up to -5C.
Kettley revealed the pitch could begin to thaw out ahead of the fixture with the Shrews.
"On the 28th it should be milder in the west and colder in the east of the country," he said.
"I don't think there will be a frost on the Tuesday morning but there will be wind and cold outbreaks of rain.
"Some of the frost on the pitch will have thawed but it will be a cold, raw day, right to the west (of England)."
Lincoln's penultimate game of the festive period sees Bradford City come to Sincil Bank on New Year's Day.
"In the New Year there is an increasing chance of more games going ahead," Kettley added.
Lincoln's FA Cup Second Round replay with Hereford, which has already been postponed three times due to the inclement weather, will now be played on January 8 – the weekend of the FA Cup Third Round.
The winners will travel to Wycombe Wanderers in the third round on Tuesday January 11 (7.45pm).
The Imps will play their re-arranged League Two game at Cheltenham on January 25 (7.45pm).
Meanwhile, City have terminated the contract of Reunion Island midfielder Adifane Noussoura.

event_or_fact.property: On the 28th it should be milder in the west and colder in the east of the country
In the New Year there is an increasing chance of more games going ahead
Some of the frost on the pitch will have thawed but it will be a cold, raw day, right to the west (of England).
Boxing Day will be the turning point in terms of temperatures increasing, but revealed the milder weather was likely to bring new snow showers, followed by rain.

description.hltext_display: 延续震荡走势连豆粕高开收低
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
大连豆粕期货22日高开回落，盘终收低，主力合约1109报收于3347点，下跌9点；阿根廷干旱天气继续推高美豆，隔夜CBOT豆类期货又创近期新高，受此影响，国内豆类早盘高开，且中国国内春节前豆类消费预期仍对期价形成支撑，但国家的收紧政策及物价调控措施对其形成一定利空，因此预计豆粕期货短期内将维持震荡走势。
据荷兰合作银行表示，2011年全球农产品价格将继续上涨，大豆价格将受到强劲需求的支撑。虽然大豆价格可能达不到2007/08年度的高点，但是飙升时间可能持续很久。全球供应仍会受到政府干预以保护国内粮食供应的影响。
总部位于德国汉堡的油籽分析机构油世界周二称，中国大豆进口料在近几个月的活跃势头过后放缓，但该国2010年大豆进口仍可能达到创纪录水平。油世界表示：“2010年9月-11月，中国从美国、阿根廷及巴西进口的大豆数量创纪录水平，而12月大豆进口量料大幅减少。”“这已经反映在美国最近一周向中国的大豆出口销售量上。”
国内方面，近期豆粕市场在小幅反弹后出现盘整局势，市场依旧保持震荡格局，因市场上涨乏力动力。目前南美大豆在关键的生长期，产量对市场影响较为大。但国内市场因政策压力较重，港口大豆库存较高，虽前期油厂报价停机支持豆粕现货价格回落空间，但近期陆续开机后，豆粕现货价格将受到一定抑制。
消息面上，据中华油脂网12月22日消息，受黑龙江省储备粮管理有限公司委托，哈尔滨国家粮食交易中心将于2010年12月24日组织“2010年黑龙江省省级储备大豆竞价销售交易会”，此次交易共上市2008年黑龙江省产大豆19.1万吨。
现货方面，江苏连云港(601008,股吧)工厂43%蛋白豆粕报价提高至3400元/吨，较昨日的报价涨20元/吨，成交暂未确定，昨天成交3310元/吨。山东济宁地区有油厂43％蛋白豆粕报价3220元/吨，较昨日上调20元/吨。辽宁大连有油厂43％蛋白豆粕报价3210元/吨，较昨日持平。（永安期货 孙汝涛）

description.hltext_display: 贝尼特斯前路充满疑云
Weld childrens wellness project earns $3.1 million grant
description.content:
The Northern Colorado Health Alliance recently received a $3.1 million grant to improve wellness among youth in Weld County.
It’s one of only six grantees in the nation to receive the five-year grant from the federal Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration. The grant helps fund the alliance’s work on its Project LAUNCH (Linking Actions for Unmet Needs in Children’s Health).
The priority of the project, according to young child wellness coordinator Noelle Hause, is to integrate social, emotional and behavioral health with medical health.
“We’re serving the whole child across systems, so that in any door that they come, it’s a kind of no-wrong door,” Hause said. “Any door they come into, they will get the necessary screenings for their overall health.”
The grant will help the alliance provide work force development in the areas of early childhood development.
“And it will bring in about eight new positions that are focused particularly in early mental health and social-emotional development,” Hause said. It also will help maternal mental health “and a new service of system navigation, which will help families cross systems in an effort to access the services they need.”
Weld County was the second-fastest growing county in the nation from 2000-06, according to census data. According to the Colorado Children’s Campaign’s KidsCount survey in 2009, there are 67,144 children in the county, almost one-third of whom are under the age of 5. Weld County has faced challenges in addressing the needs of its diverse young families, especially with the growing number of parents with substance abuse issues, mental issues or emotional disturbances, according to the Northern Colorado Health Alliance.
“Our selection for this competitive project rewards our community partners in Weld County who have invested time and resources in developing a coordinated, integrated network of services focused on the health and human service needs for some of our community’s most vulnerable populations,” Mike Bloom, the alliance’s executive director, said in a statement. “Our model of care is recognized nationally for cost-effectiveness, integrated services and its focus on engaging individuals and families in improving their health outcomes.”
Within the next five years, Project LAUNCH plans to train 117 professionals to administer program services and serve more than 9,300 families.

entity.property: federal Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration

description.hltext_display: 公告 - 中科礦業宣布Lady Annie 生產首1,000 噸電解銅(摘要)
description.content: 中科礦業集團有限公司（「中科礦業」或「本公司」）欣然宣布，其於Lady Annie之營運在二零一零年十二月二十一日已生產首1,000噸電解銅，標志著Lady Annie向年產目標達25,000至30,000噸電解銅邁開重要一步。Lady Annie生產的首1,000噸電解銅。關於中科礦業集團有限公司中科礦業集團有限公司（前稱China Sci-Tech Holdings Limited中國科技集團有限公司）為亞太區最新銅礦公司。總部設在香港的中科礦業集團有限公司在香港聯交所上市，在澳洲昆士蘭省全資擁有的Lady Annie營運，以及擁有70%於秘魯MinaJusta項目。請瀏覽www.cstmining.com了解其他資料。關於Lady Annie Lady Annie為位於澳洲昆士蘭省Mount Isa區西北部約120公里的銅礦和溶劑萃取╱電解加工設施。中科礦業集團有限公司全資擁有Lady Annie，并已於二零一零年十一月開始生產電解銅。自此以後，Lady Annie一直生產倫敦金屬交易所A品位銅，其銅產量在二零一零年十二月二十一日已達到首1,000噸的里程碑。LadyAnnie亦與MM Kembla訂立協議，在二零一一年年內向其出售15,000噸電解銅，相當於Lady Annie在二零一一年的產量約60%。項目可年產25,000-30,000噸電解銅。截至二零零九年十二月三十一日，儲量為11,200,000噸含1.10%銅，而截至二零一零年十一月三十日，總資源量為65,200,000噸含0.71%銅。Lady Annie位於MountIsa Inlier內，其中包括多個世界級的基礎金屬和貴金屬礦藏。在現有和附近的礦藏以及中科礦業高度預期的探礦區域內，資源量和儲量上升潛力巨大。

description.hltext_display: South Korea army to hold huge drill, North silent
description.content:
South Korea announced land and sea military exercises on Wednesday including its largest-ever live-fire drill near North Korea just as tension on the peninsula was beginning to ease after Pyongyang's attack on a southern island.
A North Korean soldier stands guard on the banks of Yalu River near the North Korean town of Sinuiju, opposite the Chinese border city of Dandong, December 20, 2010.
The land drill, involving artillery, fighter jets and the largest number of personnel in a peace-time exercise, will take place on Thursday, after the South's live-fire artillery exercise on Monday on the island of Yeonpyeong, and is bound to infuriate the North.
"We'll be sure to deal a punishing blow if the North tries to repeat the kind of situation like the artillery shelling of Yeonpyeong," Brigadier General Ju Eun-shik said in a statement.
There was no immediate reaction from Pyongyang, with the local KCNA agency running stories about leader Kim Jong-il's visit to a power station.
South Korea is also holding three days of live-firing naval drills off the peninsula's east coast starting on Wednesday, a media official at the Defence Ministry said.
He would not provide details. Yonhap news agency said the drills were taking place 100 km (60 miles) south of the maritime border with North Korea and involved at least six naval boats.
North Korea this week offered to re-admit U.N. inspectors concerned about its nuclear-weapon programme, leading to speculation of a resumption of six-party disarmament talks and
a general sigh of relief around the world that the crisis had passed.
"Yes, it will be a show of force against that," an army officer said when asked if the shelling of Yeonpyeong last month was a factor in the land drill's planning.
He said similar drills had been staged previously on more than 50 occasions, but the scale this time was unprecedented.
"The scale of mechanised assets taking place is enormous. When we would normally have 6 K-9 mechanised artillery, we'll have 36. We'll have the F-15 jets firing. We'll have choppers. You can say most of the mechanised assets taking part will be firing live ammunition."
It will take place in Pocheon region, less than 50 km (30 miles) north of downtown Seoul.
The latest crisis peaked when North Korea shelled Yeonpyeong, just south of the disputed maritime border, killing four people -- including two civilians -- in the worst attack on South Korean territory since the end of the civil war in 1953.
South Korean President Lee Myung-bak has suffered widespread domestic criticism for his response to North Korean attacks, with critics saying he was indecisive and failed to keep the public informed.
The South carried out live-fire drills on Yeonpyeong on Monday, which provoked only a verbal reaction from the North. It had vowed to strike back if the South went ahead with the drills, prompting fears of all-out war.
China, North Korea's only major ally, has urged dialogue to resolve the crisis and urged Pyongyang to follow through on its offer to allow U.N. inspectors into the country.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry had no immediate comment on the planned drill.
FAMILY RULE
Analysts say the North is unlikely to undertake another act of aggression like this year's attack on South Korea's Cheonan warship, blamed on the North by the United States and the South, and the Yeonpyeong shelling, at least not in the near term.
Its most likely next move would be to conduct live-fire artillery drills or possibly a short-range missile test into its waters off the west coast.
Analysts have said its recent militaristic acts have served to bolster family rule as ailing leader Kim Jong-il grooms his youngest son, Kim Jong-un, as his successor.
"North Korea likes to step towards the brink and then away from it again," said Brian Myers, an expert on the North at South Korea's Dongseo University.
"The news from Pyongyang in the past few days indicates that the Kim Jong-il regime is now in the backing-off part of its usual cycle."
He said the North probably did not expect the South to carry through with live-fire exercises on Monday.
"If it had, it would not have made such loud threats of reprisal in its domestic media. After the exercises took place, the Kim regime had to tell its own people that the South's 'provocation' was not worth responding to, a flip-flop it cannot afford to repeat in just a few days. I don't expect the North to be quite as vocal about the next round of exercises."
South Korean Finance Minister Yoon Jeung-hyun, speaking before the announcement of the drill, said domestic financial markets had weathered the crisis and the South Korean economy, Asia's fourth-largest, stayed on a growth track.
But he warned that the tension could still dent consumer spending with a key sentiment measure due on Friday.
South Korean markets were unaffected by the tensions with foreign investors buying into stocks and bond futures. Traders said earlier that the won currency was generally being affected more by concern over the euro zone.
Consumers and businesses in South Korea say they have lived with tension on the divided peninsula for years and markets do not always react although the recent crisis had rattled global markets and remained an underlying risk.

location.location_name: 50 km (30 miles) north of downtown Seoul

description.hltext_display: S.F. homeless vigil for souls lost to streets
description.author: David Paul Morris / Special To The Chronicle
description.content:
David Paul Morris / Special To The Chronicle
In front of San Francisco's City Hall, the Rev. Glenda Hope of the city's Network Ministries leads the annual public service for the homeless who died on the streets this year. As relatives and friends watched, about 100 names were read, each one followed by a gong.
Prayers were said and songs were sung at a candlelight vigil Tuesday evening in front of for the homeless who died on the streets this year, the 21st year that the often nameless, forgotten poor have been honored.
The multi-denominational vigil is an attempt to remind people that individuals die every year on San Francisco streets, said the Rev. Glenda Hope of San Francisco Network Ministries, who has led the ceremony for two decades.
"The idea is we have to tell the truth. We have to say it out loud. People are dying on our streets," Hope said. "One of the energizing things about it is we have different religious commitments and some people have no religious faith, but it doesn't matter. It's about finding that element that is common to all the religious traditions, and that is the element of compassion."
The somber vigil included songs, chants and the reading of about 100 names of the dead, each one followed by a gong, as a crowd of about 65 relatives, friends and homeless advocates watched. Several of the names were John and Jane Doe. Causes of death were also read - it was a drumbeat of tragedy, with many dying of overdoses, hypothermia, suicide and stabbings.
Prayers and sacred scriptures were read by a Catholic priest, Presbyterian minister, a Muslim imam, a Jewish rabbi and a Buddhist priest.
Rabbi Micah Hyman prayed for the souls of "those who have died in our streets, in our parks, on our doorsteps." Jana Drakka, a Zen Buddhist, led a chant urging "loving kindness."
A homeless choral group called Singers of the Street sang "By the Waters of Babylon," as some people in the crowd wept for the dead.
Near the end, the names of the dead were read by loved ones, including Susan Hansen, 60, who said she and her partner had been homeless until a man named Raymond Self came into her life before his death this year.
"He helped me and my family get off the streets," she said of Self, who had a drinking problem but nevertheless took time to help her. "I can't believe he's not here anymore. This ceremony means peace at last." This article appeared on page C - 1 of the

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content:
For a few weeks this month, Los Angeles' arugula-munching set confronted a threat that seemed as potent as any malicious insect, pathogen or pesticide-tainted produce.
Where would they get their lovingly grown, locally sourced fruits, vegetables and artisanal edibles if a parking dispute with an adjacent film school forced the Hollywood Farmers Market to move or close?
The Los Angeles Film School, which has held classes in its nine-story Sunset Boulevard building since 1999, had refused to sign off on a permit for the Sunday farmers market because it blocks an entryway into a lot where the school's growing number of students park.
At the root of the conflict were some of the city's sacred mainstays: deep agricultural ties, the entertainment business and a lack of parking in a town dominated by cars.
Even as a temporary accord last week put the threat on hold, the foodie furor offered a peek at how dependent some have become on the Hollywood market, among the largest in the region, and the smaller markets it supports in low-income communities.
While consumer demand has encouraged farmers markets to sprout like Portobello mushrooms across the U.S., the attachment to just-picked produce and those who grow it appears particularly intense in Los Angeles, seated in a county that less than a century ago was the nation's leading agricultural producer.
"When you're talking about growers and shoppers being able to complete the exchange directly, it has a lot of resonance," cookbook author and food writer Amelia Saltsman said.
The Los Angeles Film School recently added computer animation and video game production to its curricula of film and recording arts, more than doubling the size of its student body from 750 to 1,700, spokesman Antoine Ibrahim said.
The growing population has increased demand for parking spots on Sundays, when throngs of students flood the school's labs and studios, Ibrahim said. The school also plans to begin holding classes on Sundays to relieve increasing weekday class sizes, he said.
Ibrahim insisted that the school never meant for the market to be shut down. It just wanted the vendors blocking the lot to be shifted to another part of the market.
"We've always worked with them to compromise and coexist," Ibrahim said. "We don't want them to move."
But the nonprofit Sustainable Economic Enterprises of Los Angeles, which organizes the market, said the configuration being pushed by the school meant it would lose half of its 100 farmers because there wouldn't be enough space for their stalls.
Shoppers say that would diminish their experience and make them less likely to schlep from far-flung neighborhoods to the produce bazaar that draws some 10,000 customers each weekend.
"It's really sad if they were to have to close or reduce the size," said Vanessa Lee, 27, who journeys from her east Los Angeles home at least once a month to buy apples, peaches or persimmons _ depending on the season _ from the market. "I couldn't imagine losing any of the vendors. They're all great."
Shrinking the market would also hurt SEE-LA's ability to subsidize markets that provide fruits and vegetables to as many 2,200 people each week in poor areas such as Watts and south Los Angeles, manager Alexandra Agajanian said.
"The success of the Hollywood Farmers Market has made it possible for us to do that," SEE-LA chief executive Pompea Smith said. "It really is a well-loved institution."
SEE-LA learned in early November that it was losing its permit because it lacked the school's endorsement, although extensions have kept the market open since then.
As word spread that the market's days were numbered, the dispute drew concern even among those who couldn't see the Hollywood sign.
TV and radio news outlets aired stories. The Los Angeles Times editorialized that "the market must be saved." City Councilman Eric Garcetti, whose district includes the market, received e-mails, calls and office visits from concerned shoppers and constituents.
Word came Thursday evening that a meeting between the market, the school and Garcetti's office had yielded an agreement that would keep the market open until April 12 while its organizers and the film school seek a permanent solution to the parking problem.
The school will look at building another way into the lot. SEE-LA, meanwhile, will hire a planner to see if there's a way to move the stalls to create access into the lot and still fit in all the farmers.
"I think this is a fair approach," Smith said. "As long as it doesn't decrease the connectivity among the blocks of the market and doesn't decrease the number of farmers and doesn't decrease the safety of the market customers, I think it will be fine."

description.content: 保加利亚媒体周二报导，该国女子摔跤选手兹拉特娃在巴尔干年度最佳运动员的评选中击败塞尔维亚网球选手德约科维奇，荣膺本年度最佳。NBA奥兰多魔术的土耳其球星特科格鲁位列第三。兹拉特娃今年获得世锦赛和欧锦赛72公斤级金牌，还被世界摔跤协会评为年度最佳女子摔跤运动员。路透

description.hltext_display: 周边回调拖累郑糖涨势收窄
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
郑州白糖期货12月22日冲高回落，终盘收涨。1109合约量仓均增，收阳线。该合约开盘6,927元/吨，收盘6,991元/吨，较21日结算价上涨61元/吨，成交2,236,098手，持仓量515,684手。有分析人士指出，目前看国际食糖市场基本面的供给仍非常紧张，国内市场近期又受到霜冻影响，不排除价格进一步反弹。不过目前国内政策面调控措施并未放松，加大了糖价后期继续上涨的阻力，如果今日抛储最终价格再度令市场价快速高企，不排除引来政策更大的抑制风险。
据俄罗斯糖厂联盟在周二公布的声明中称，截至12月20日，俄罗斯已从甜菜中榨得白糖269万吨，较去年同期水平减少14.7%。该联盟预计，俄罗斯将从本年度收获的甜菜中榨得白糖270万吨，低于去年的320万吨，因受到了干旱影响。
另据国家糖业组织称，2010/11年度前八周，墨西哥糖产量为559,454吨，较上一年度同期增加了43%，因当时压榨工作开展的较晚。此外，10月末到12月18日期间的糖产量较该组织前期的预估高出11%。去年截至12月18日，墨西哥共生产白糖390,381吨。
国内方面，虽然国内市场已陆续开榨，市场供给量有所增加，政府又持续的抛储来缓解市场短缺，但连日来受巴西和印度两大产糖国的食糖供给量不足和国际流动性宽松的影响，近期国际糖价不断走高，外糖市场的持续高涨对国内糖价起到了较强支撑作用。
从近期商品期货整体走势来看，市场对于国家调控政策已有心理准备并且调控的利空在前期已得到一定消化，接下来如果物价继续走高或12月CPI仍居高不下，国家极有可能继续出台调控政策。因此在近期郑糖回暖之际，调控压力将打压多头投机炒作的势头，使糖价上行承压。
海关总署21日公布11月进口数据，其显示11月份我国食糖进口量为23,034吨，同比下降34%；1-11月食糖累计进口量已达164万吨，同比增长57%。对于本月进口量大幅下滑的原因，市场人士认为，主要是11月份我国已进入新榨季，糖厂陆续开榨，甘蔗的供应量有所提升所致。
现货方面，华南西部地区报价出现调整，成交清淡。广东：广州广西糖一级7050元/吨，报价不变，成交一般。福建：福州，广西糖码头报价7100元/吨，上涨50元。成交一般。云南：昆明：报价7100-7120元/吨，上调50元/吨，成交一般。成都：云南糖报价7420-7450元/吨，报价不变，成交清淡。 重庆：云南糖报价7300-7350元/吨，上调50元/吨，成交清淡。
中电投先融期货认为，国储今日竞卖20万吨白糖，但又出现了前几次同样情况，越抛越涨。由于本周南方又将迎来大幅降温，市场又炒作霜冻传统习惯。今日放量大涨，将11月12日留下第一个巨大缺口几乎全部回补。在今日国内商品市场总体走势疲弱情况下，白糖大幅上攻，有冲击前期高点7512的可能。投资者在这种加速上涨阶段，只需要不断上调止赢即可。

description.hltext_display: World Federation of Diamond Bourses to Offer @wfdb.com E-mail Addresses to Members
description.content:
WFDB e-mail addresses help members present themselves as part of "exclusive family," says WFDB secretary general
Members of the 29 diamond exchanges affiliated to the World Federation of Diamond Bourses will soon have the opportunity to receive their own, exclusive e-mail address - yourname@wfdb.com - and thus be recognized as one of the diamond industry's 12,000 diamantaires who hold bourse membership.
WFDB Secretary General and Executive Director Michael Vaughan explained that the WFDB encourages bourse members to enhance their prestige by presenting themselves as the members of a very exclusive "family" - the WFDB.
"By printing your e-mail address, yourname@wfdb.com, on your business card, stationery, in your digital signatures and on your website, you will further enhance your recognizability. Combine that with the WFDB Mark, and your status as a diamantaire in good standing will be part of all communications with your clients, suppliers, service providers and others," he explained.
The WFDB e-mail boxes will have a capacity of 100 MB, and will be made available to all members of WFDB affiliated bourses, provided they are holders of the WFDB Mark. Those bourse members who do not yet hold the WFDB Mark, but wish to receive a wfdb.com e-mail box, can apply via their bourse's secretariat. Once the Secretary General's office has received the application for the Mark, the email address will also be issued. The annual cost of a wfdb.com email box is $45 and is to be paid via the WFDB's Paypal account. Requests for the service can be made via email@wfdb.com. The email addresses will be functional by Monday, January 10.
With regard to the WFDB web site, Vaughan said that the web site of the federation would soon be undergoing a complete overhaul, which includes the introduction and operation of a secure, dedicated e-mail server that will host the WFDB e-mail boxes.

description.hltext_display: Из Toyota выжимают максимумToyota Motor Corp. выплатит американскому государству два новых штрафа на общую сумму $ 32 млн за «несвоевременное оповеще
description.content:
Власти США добились от компании Toyota согласия выплатить два новых штрафа. В общей сложности Toyota Motor Corp. готова выплатить $ 32,4 млн. Компании вменяется нарушение федеральных требований по безопасности, а именно несвоевременное оповещение властей и потребителей о проблемах в автомобилях Toyota. Первое расследование, приведшее к штрафу, касается отзыва автомобилей 2004–2005 гг. в связи с проблемами рулевого управления. Второе – самопроизвольного ускорения автомобилей.
Ранее в этом году Toyota уже рассталась с $ 16,4 млн. Таким образом, с начала года сумма уплаченных автогигантом штрафов достигла $ 48,8 млн.
Как отмечают власти, все три штрафа являются максимальными из предусмотренных за обнаруженные в действиях американских представителей Toyota нарушения. В сумме уплаченные в этом году Toyota штрафы перекрывают все, что были уплачены другими автопроизводителями за последние годы.
Несмотря на готовность платить, представители Toyota по условиям достигнутого соглашения не признают никаких нарушений в своих действиях и, таким образом, сохраняют лицо. Руководитель надзора по качеству североамериканского подразделения компании Стив Анджело заявил, что «Toyota очень рада разрешению споров» и «демонстрирует адекватное реагирование на любые проблемы».
Между тем, отмечают представители Национальной администрации безопасности дорожного движения, в разработке находится еще ряд расследований, касающихся японского гиганта. По словам одного из чиновников администрации, пожелавшего остаться неизвестным, начатое в феврале этого года расследование может прийти к выводу, что в Toyota действительно были осведомлены о случаях внезапного увеличения скорости их автомобилями и даже предполагали, что именно дефект электроники мог привести к этой неполадке.
Компания, по мнению следствия, скрывала информацию о дефектах педали газа и случаях «самопроизвольного ускорения» как минимум на протяжении четырех месяцев.
По закону, она была обязана известить о дефектах национальную администрацию безопасности дорожного движения в течение пяти дней.
Официальная позиция Toyota по-прежнему состоит в том, что все проблемы с ускорением автомобилей связаны с неудачной конструкцией ковриков, и отвергает какие-либо неполадки в электронной системе набора скорости.
В общей сложности с ноября прошлого года, когда проблемы автомобилей Toyota стали достоянием гласности, производитель отозвал 15,5 млн автомобилей по всему миру. Большая часть отзывов затронула США и Канаду. Автор: Виктор Мараховский
Газета.ru

description.hltext_display: Empty Stocking Fund: Independent Living Connnections like a big family
description.content:
» What: The Northern Colorado Empty Stocking Fund, a holiday fundraising campaign that seeks donations to help area nonprofits assist residents in need. For every $3 donated, the El Pomar Foundation will match $1. The United Way picks up the program’s administrative costs, so 100 percent of donations go to those in need.
» Who: The eight agencies that will receive funds through the Empty Stocking campaign are Catholic Charities of Larimer County, Catholic Charities of Weld County, Connections for Independent Living, Crossroads Ministry of Estes Park, Food Bank for Larimer County, Greeley Transitional House, House of Neighborly Service and the Weld Food Bank.
» To donate: Go to the Northern Colorado Empty Stocking Fund website, www.nocoemptystocking.org, or mail contributions to P.O. Box 588, Fort Collins, CO 80522 or P.O. Box 534, Greeley, CO 80632.

description.content: 本公布乃應香港聯合交易所有限公司(「聯交所」)之要求而作出。新洲印刷集團有限公司(「本公司」)董事會(「董事會」)已知悉最近本公司之股份價格及成交量上升，茲聲明，除本公司與獨立第三方就建議出售本集團一項物業之利益外，董事會不知悉導致價格及成交量上升之任何原因。股東及潛在投資者於買賣本公司股份時務請審慎行事。除上文所披露外，董事會謹確認，目前并無任何有關收購或變賣之商談或協議為根據聯交所證券上市規則(「上市規則」第13.23條規定須予披露者，董事會亦不知悉有任何足以或可能影響價格之事宜為根據上市規則第13.09條所規定之一般責任而須予披露者。上述聲明乃承董事會之命而作出，各董事愿就本聲明之準確性承擔個別及共同責任。

description.hltext_display: Why bereavement charities make all the difference
description.content:
WHEN Allan James lost his wife and daughter in the space of a few months he felt he had nowhere to turn.
Allan's daughter Kelly Hole, 26, died following a heart and lung infection, and his wife, Julie, died just months later, aged 48, with kidney cancer.
He then became the sole carer for Kelly's daughter Deanna, seven, while her son Harvey, four, lives in Halifax with his other grandparents.
Allan, 58, of Adelaide Street, Tredworth, said: "It was a difficult time for me and even now I still have difficult days. I felt like I had nowhere to get help."
But a chance meeting told him about Joy Through Tears, a bereavement support group in Tredworth which helped him come to terms with his loss.
Allan, who also lives with his son Simon, 23, said: "I went to my granddaughter's school at the time, for an information night about services available to us and was pointed in the direction of Judith.
"She told me about the service, and it went from there."
The group includes a six-week course, which helps people at different stages of their bereavement.
It used to meet at Kingfisher Church in Gloucester but a new group will be launched at Tredworth Community Suite, at Tredworth Junior School, next month.
Allan added: "I think it is a great help being able to talk about things and being in a position where you can talk about the issues you have with people that are in the same boat.
"As a man especially, I think it can be hard to talk to people about being upset. You can feel embarrassed if you let your guard down and get upset in front of friends and family when you are bereaved.
"But at the group you can talk to people who know what you are going through because they are going through it too or have been there before."
The group, run by counsellor Judith Bell, is open to everyone.
She said: "The course is suitable for people who are facing bereavement, recently bereaved, and for those whose bereavement may have occurred some time ago.
"The group is facilitated by people who understand what you are experiencing and want to offer you comfort and encouragement during this difficult time."
The group will meet on Friday mornings from 10am until 11.45am.
The first meeting is on January 7.
Call Judith on 07935 954062 or email judith@kingfisher.org.uk.
