description.hltext_display: [机构看盘]上海中期：油脂上突乏力，多单轻仓持有
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content: 文华财经(编辑 那娜）在圣诞长周末前，谨防外盘豆类受获利了结打压，高位回落风险，国内油脂跟涨谨慎。今日，油脂再次受到股市、金属等外围市场的影响，高开低走维持整理震荡。技术上，豆油上破10200点后，涨势放缓；棕榈油在9500点、菜油在10700点压力位下方震荡。油脂多单轻仓持有，暂且观望为主，有待压力位处企稳上行震荡，多单再次跟进。国际市场受阿根廷天气担忧支撑，隔夜美豆类延续小幅收高。美豆油受需求强劲及燃料乙醇加工前景改善支撑，主力3月期价创年内新高稳于56美分/磅上方震荡。不过，临近元旦长周末，美豆类涨势或难延续，仍有冲高回落震荡可能。因国际棕榈油价格上涨，印尼贸易官员称，印尼可能将1月毛棕榈油出口关税上调至17.5%-20.0%，目前为15%。这促使印尼贸易商自12月中旬起匆忙发货，以避免缴纳较高的关税。而后续国际棕榈油供应或将受限，及主要棕榈油产区的降雨影响，支撑BMD在3500点筑底反弹震荡。今日，BME基准3月毛棕榈油上涨32令吉至每吨3593令吉，若能有效稳于3600点，3700近期高点将成为上行阻力位。国内市场海关数据，中国11月大豆进口量为548万吨，较10月增加47%，较去年同期增加90%。1-11月大豆进口总量为4940万吨，较去年同期增加31%；中国11月进口豆油125,396吨，同比减少44.67%；目前，国内港口大豆库存量充裕，在压榨利润缩窄影响下，抑制了豆油进口需求。不过，成本支撑力量将逐渐显强，进而对油脂价位形成支撑。豆油：天津一级豆油9950元/吨，四级豆油9650元/吨；山东一级豆油9850元/吨，四级豆油9600元/吨；江苏一级豆油10000元/吨、四级豆油9750元/吨；广东一级豆油9950元/吨、四级豆油9700元/吨；进口毛豆油港口分销价9600-9750元/吨。棕榈油：24度精炼棕榈油天津9450元/吨、张家港9450-9500元/吨、日照9300-9350元/吨、广东9300-9380元/吨。棕榈油主要港口库存30万吨左右。海关数据，中国11月进口棕榈油528,624吨，同比增长2.03%。随着进口棕榈油量的回暖，国内港口棕榈油库存回升至30万吨左右的水平，但供需仍处于偏紧状态，而且进口成本将继续对棕榈油价位形成支撑。菜油：江苏四级菜油9800-10000元/吨、安徽9800-10000元/吨、湖北9800-10000元/吨、四川10200-10400元/吨，成交均可议价。海关数据，中国11月进口油菜籽59,714吨，同比减少80.73%；中国11月进口菜籽油74,677吨，同比增长289.7%。在进口菜籽成本高企的影响下，压榨利润缩窄，抑制了进口需求。在国储陆续抛售稳定包装油措施下，国内企业增加菜油的进口，用于满足需求，缩短成本周期，避免不确定风险。综上：市场对阿根廷大豆主产区天气的担忧，继续吸引大豆买盘的跟进。追随大豆涨势，美豆油受到需求前景改善提振创年度新高稳于56美元上方。BMD毛棕榈油在3500点寻获支撑，偏强震荡。这均给予国内油脂偏强震荡支撑。但在股市等外围市场高开低走带动下，油脂谨慎跟涨外盘，为规避圣诞假期前的获利了结打压。技术上，油脂压力位处上行显乏力，持仓减幅略有增加，市场观望氛围增强。操作上，豆油9950点、棕榈油9300点、菜油10300点有力支撑位上方，多单轻仓继续持有。有待上突压力位豆油10200、棕榈油点9550、菜油10700点后，多单再次跟进。（执笔：邓宁宁） 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: BoG Boss, No.1 Public Sector Leader
description.content:
Governance think tank, IMANI Ghana, yesterday rated the Governor of the Bank of Ghana as the most inspirational public sector leader in the country and placed the Ghana Police Service at the bottom of the inspiration ladder.
In its maiden ranking of the five most inspirational public sector leaders in Ghana and the five least inspirational for 2010, IMANI ranked the Chief Executive of the Accra Metropolitan Assembly (AMA), Mr Alfred Oko Vanderpuije, as the second most inspirational public leader.
It ranked the Chief Psychiatrist of the Accra Psychiatrist Hospital, Mr Akwasi Osei, as third, the commissioners of the Commission on Human Rights and Administrative Justice (CHRAJ) as fourth and the front-line staff of the National Disaster Management Organisation (NADMO) as fifth.
In the category of the five least inspirational institutions, the Ghana Statistical Service (GSS) came first; Brand Ghana, second; the Public Utilities Regulatory Commission (PURC), third; the National Communications Authority (NCA), fourth, and the police, fifth.
According to the think-tank, the Governor of the Bank of Ghana, , came up tops for his impressive conduct of the affairs of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) in particular.
Mr Vanderpuije came second for his “determination to “transform” city management in Ghana, while Mr Osei came third for his lone crusade for mental health policy reforms in the country.
The commissioners of CHRAJ came third for their “direction” in the human rights campaign, with the fifth rank going to the front-line staff of NADMO for their valiant efforts at responding to multiple incidents of flooding across the country.
The commendation of the five most inspirational figures also came with the concession of the challenges they faced in their efforts.
For the Governor of the Bank of Ghana, IMANI said he withstood pressure from political forces and unwaveringly went in the way of evidence.
“Diplomatically, he has rebuked the government to pay contractors and stop dithering, since this has an effect on non-performing loans in the system and by extension lending rates,” IMANI said.
It added that the governor’s attitude to his duties had helped stem the loss of investor confidence that marked the early months of 2009.
IMANI pointed at the unimpressive starts of the mayor of Accra, particularly on issues of decongestion and urban planning, noting, however, that he quickly learnt to “focus the energies of the assembly on the big picture”.
“He has refrained from involving himself in petty partisan squabbles and maintained a balanced posture with respect to Accra’s many chieftaincy and other sectarian fault-lines,” it said.
IMANI said while some faulted the Chief Psychiatrist, Mr Asare, for his lack of negotiation skills, “he more than makes up for it with relentless focus, determination and dedication.
His knowledge of psychiatric issues and the policy environment is encyclopaedic, even daunting,” it added.
It said despite CHRAJ’s limited resources and personnel, it remained undaunted over the challenge of human rights issues across the length and breadth of the country, noting that when “decongestion became” a lazy excuse for haphazard demolition activities, CHRAJ descended on municipal authorities.
“CHRAJ has never missed an opportunity this year to paint for all of us what a ‘decent and humane society’ looks like,” IMANI said.
For the front-line staff of NADMO, it said, “Lack of policy robustness notwithstanding, these underpaid personnel respond quite creditably to the tragedies across the length and breadth of our country.
Many risked their lives as they wrestled against the elements, working without the right equipment and protective gear. Their actions are the stuff of which genuine patriotism is made and not the bombastic rhetoric of the Accra elite.”
The GSS was shamed for “mucking a vital national exercise as the census”; the Brand Ghana Office “for raising hopes of a new era of strategic national image transformation and promptly dashing all of them” and the PURC for no clear regulatory decision making on improvement in the quality of service delivery for vital utilities. Continued

description.hltext_display: Fed extends swap deal until August
description.content:
The US Federal Reserve has extended until August an emergency tool for other central banks to access dollars.
This comes amid market jitters and high demand for the safe haven greenback.
The deal, which had been due to expire in January, allows the central banks of Britain, Japan, Canada and Switzerland, as well as the European Central Bank, to exchange local currency for dollars.
That agreement was sealed in May, but following a debt crisis and a slow economic recovery which put pressure on the euro, the Fed had said the facility would be extended.
Such so-called swap lines were set up during the 2008 financial crisis, as European and Japanese banks struggled to access dollars.
The Japanese and European banks will be able to borrow dollars up to an unlimited amount, while Canada's lending will be capped at US$30 billion.

description.hltext_display: [机构看盘]新湖期货：连豆市场冲高回落，延续外强内弱局面
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content: 文华财经(编辑 那娜）CBOT大豆期货21日收盘上涨，阿根廷的天气问题支持了大豆期货市场。CBOT 1月大豆期货收盘上涨11美分，或0.8个百分点，报收于13.26 1/4美元/蒲式耳，而交投最为活跃的CBOT 3月大豆期货收盘也上涨10 1/2美分，或0.8个百分点，报收于13.37 1/2美元/蒲式耳。大豆期货连续第二个交易日收盘位接近6周高点。面对特别强劲的全球大豆需求，阿根廷面临的大豆产量不断下降的威胁成为保持价格得到稳定支持的基本面力量。阿根廷是全球仅次于美国和巴西的第三大大豆种植国，在全球需求强劲的背景下，市场指望其能够缓解美国供给压力。交易商增加价格的风险溢价，因任何对全球产量前景造成威胁的因素都会吸引市场因产量的不确定性而买盘，同时也因供给无法跟上全球强劲的需求。今日连豆市场冲高回落，隔夜外盘上涨，但国内市场表现疲弱，资金流出期价上行乏力。国内外市场走势分化，国际农产品走势整体向好，虽然美元反弹，但商品市场关注自身的供给紧张问题，整体保持上升走势。阿根廷干旱推动油脂油料价格也保持上行趋势。明年作物种植面积之争激烈，种植面积减少的品种供给更加紧张，价格也会在新高的平台寻找供需均衡点。虽然市场长期走势看好，但存在短期风险，圣诞节及新年将至，基金面临清算可能获利离场。国内政府调控压力不减，年前以短线交易为主。从技术上看，A1109合约日K线图上均线走平，短期走势缺乏方向。（新湖期货 吴秋娟） 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: 中国力挺欧盟救市 欧元欧股上涨相迎
description.content:
----本文导读：----
中国国务院副总理王岐山21日在第三次中欧经贸高层对话开幕式上表示，中国支持欧盟和国际货币基金组织采取一揽子金融稳定措施。这也是中国高层领导人又一次在公开场合力挺深陷债务危机欧洲。受此鼓舞，欧元汇价周二盘中一度应声大涨0.5%，欧洲股市大幅高开。
21日对话是在《里斯本条约》生效后，中欧双方首次举行相关会议。此次对话议题涵盖宏观经济形势、贸易与投资、竞争、能源合作与低碳经济、创新、关税合作等多方面问题。
作为本次会议中方主持人，王岐山在致开幕词时表示，今年以来，中欧全面战略伙伴关系发展势头良好。中国已成为欧盟第二大出口市场，欧盟连续6年稳居中国第一大贸易伙伴。他指出，中国支持欧盟和IMF采取一揽子金融稳定措施，并以实际行动帮助欧盟一些国家应对主权债务危机。
欧元区目前仍受困于主权债务危机，爱尔兰上月被迫寻求高达850亿欧元外部援助，而葡萄牙、西班牙等其他国家财政状况也不容乐观。上周，欧盟领导人在今年最后一次峰会上决定，用一项长效危机救助计划取代将于2013年到期欧洲金融稳定基金，但这一消息并未明显缓解欧元区债市短期压力。 中国这番表态无疑是送给欧洲圣诞大礼。 周二亚洲盘中，欧元兑美元汇价一度大涨0.5%，至1.32附近。不过，随着葡萄牙可能遭穆迪降级消息传来，欧元涨幅在欧洲盘中收窄至0.2%左右。周二晚些时候开盘欧洲股市全线走高，英法德三大股指早盘涨幅在0.5%至0.7%不等。
分析人士注意到，在欧元区2009年底开始陷入债务危机后，中国一直以实际行动展现了一个负责任大国形象。温家宝总理今年以来多次向欧洲国家领导人表示，坚定支持欧盟和国际货币基金组织采取措施，不减持欧元债券，支持欧元保持稳定。 --股市360财经频道讯

description.hltext_display: 国王杯巴萨终止连胜
description.content: 西班牙国王杯1/8决赛首回合周二开始上演，西甲领头羊巴塞罗那主场被毕尔巴鄂竞技0-0逼平，停止了各项赛事10连胜的步伐。双方曾在2009年的国王杯决赛中相遇，巴萨当年以4-1的大比分胜利捧得国王杯，但瓜迪奥拉的球队在周二的比赛中未能撕开对方防线。路透

description.hltext_display: 非凡中國暫停股份買賣
Attorney for Widlak family remains convinced banker did not commit suicide
description.content:
Todd Flood, the attorney hired by the family of David Widlak to investigate his mysterious disappearance, said Tuesday that both he and the family are still convinced that the banker was a victim of homicide and did not commit suicide.
"The experts we have at this point in time opine that this looks more like homicide than suicide … This is a homicide until proven otherwise," said Flood, of the Royal Oak law firm of Flood, Lanctot, Connor & Stablein PLLC.
Flood said his team includes several former FBI agents, two former homicide investigators, a clinical psychiatrist specializing in suicidal patients, an x-ray technician and several former prosecutors with experience in homicide trials.
Flood said that Anne Widlak, the widow of the former president and CEO at Mt. Clemens-based Community Central Bank, remains convinced Widlak would not have killed himself.
After Widlak's disappearance on Sept. 19, Anne, a partner in the Detroit law firm of Nemeth Burwell PC, told Crain's that her husband was too family-focused to run off and that his disappearance could only be a result of foul play.
She said her husband would fly out of state for his grandchildren's births and, later, for their birthdays, and was planning an annual extended family Thanksgiving trip to the Bahamas when he went missing.
Widlak, 62, was discovered a month later by duck hunters floating in shallow water near a DNR boat launch on Lake St. Clair. The initial autopsy by Macomb County medical examiner pointed to drowning as a cause of death. A subsequent autopsy by Oakland County Medical Examiner Ljubisa Dragovic, who was hired by the family, discovered a bullet wound and it was determined the gunshot killed him.
In a letter to the family, Dragovic said Widlak was shot "execution style" but could not rule out suicide.
Flood said his team hoped to conclude its investigation early in the new year.
"We'll turn our information over to law enforcement when we finish," he said.
Flood was responding to a press conference Monday afternoon by Macomb County Sheriff Mark Hackel, who said the totality of evidence pointed to suicide, and that Dragovic, Spitz and David Balash, a retired firearms examiner with the Michigan State Police who was hired by Hackel, all agreed that the bullet wound in the right rear of Widlak's neck could have been self inflicted. (See previous coverage.)
Balash wrote in his report dated Dec. 7 that the wound, alone, wasn't enough to make a determination of suicide or homicide.
Spitz wrote in a supplemental report for a certificate of death on Dec. 12 that the official manner of death was indeterminate, but added that based on autopsy findings and the subsequent police investigation, "the evaluation of the totality of the evidence supports the conclusion that the death was the result of a self-inflicted wound."
Spitz wrote that the manner of death could be reviewed and amended if further information was forthcoming.
Hackel said the investigation would officially remain open but that he and his investigators believe suicide to be the best explanation.
An old revolver Widlak had owned for a long time was found near his body and was later determined to be the weapon that killed him.
Hackel said a piece of paper was clutched in Widlak's hand when he was found but had deteriorated from its time in the water to the point where the crime lab couldn't read it or determine if it was a suicide note.
Hackel said reasons pointing to a suicide: Widlak didn't wear his expensive watch the day he went missing, and that before he disappeared, he erased the memory unit for the GPS unit in his car and deleted many of the files from his personal iPad and his office computer.
Hackel said police believe Widlak walked the four miles from downtown Mt. Clemens to Lake St. Clair based on his cell phone history that night, the last call "pinging" off a tower in Harrison Township.
Widlak's bank was in financial difficulty when he disappeared and was about to receive an order from the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. to raise capital and improve its procedures. Widlak supposedly went to work the Sunday he went missing to work on a presentation to his board of directors.
The Wednesday before he went missing, Widlak was very upbeat in an interview with Crain's about his plans to sell $20 million worth of bank stock to regain the bank's status as well-capitalized and about the bank being one of the community banks that would survive the downturn and be poised to grow when the local economy improved.

description.hltext_display: Holiday Memories: Picking out a doll with careful consideration
description.content:
For The Tribune
Share on FacebookEmail Print Comment
Copyright 2010 The Greeley Publishing Co.. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. December, 22 2010 12:33 am My family moved from the hills of Pennsylvania to California when I was 3.
I heard it was like the “Grapes of Wrath,” with eight kids and my parents in an old Rambler pulling a small homemade trailer with all our possessions in it, including pots and pans my mother used to cook our meals along the road during the journey.
As you can imagine, we were far from rich when it came to material things, and I doubt my older siblings ever had a store-bought gift under the Christmas tree before we moved to California.
When I was about 6, there were only four of us kids left at home, and my parents both had jobs with the airlines, so things were looking up financially, but we still had only one gift under the tree that was a luxury — and not socks and underwear or other clothes, which kids don’t think of as a gift. That year my mother took me to the store and informed me she was going to buy a doll for a friend’s daughter, and she wanted me to pick it out since we were the same age. Well, the Green Monster reared its head, and I was so jealous and envious of this other little girl that I picked out the biggest, ugliest doll I had ever seen. That Christmas morning, I rushed to open my store-bought luxury gift, and you guessed it, it was that big, ugly doll. I think I cried in to the new year. It probably didn’t take long for my parents to figure out what I had done, and I’m sure I got a lecture or two or three about being such a spoiled brat. This was a lesson I will never forget.
Sandra Bassett lives in Greeley.

description.hltext_display: 全球海运贸易复苏仍需时日
description.content:
----本文导读：----
联合国贸易和发展会议20日在日内瓦说，尽管全球经济出现复苏迹象，但全球消费者信心仍不足，零售业疲软，投资乏力， 。
贸发会议当天发布一份全球海运贸易报告称，2009年全球海运货物总量为78.4亿吨，较2008年下降4.5个百分点。2009年全球海运贸易中散装大宗干货增长1.4个百分点，其中铁矿石运输量增长7.8%，铝矾土和磷酸盐则分别下降23.2%和38.7%。
贸发会议称，海运是国际贸易中最主要运输方式，约占国际贸易总运量80%，该组织自2002年以来每年发布全球海运贸易年度报告，旨在通过全球海运报告了解全球贸易发展状况。 --股市360财经频道讯

description.hltext_display: Freezing Weather: More Snow On The Way
description.content:
There is another bitterly cold day ahead with more heavy snow falling across central UK.
The snow will extend from north Wales, through Merseyside and Birmingham, and out to Cambridgeshire and East Anglia.
Up to 15cm could fall in some areas with the snow dying out from the West during the day, but not fading in the East until the night.
Further north, freezing fog will linger and temperatures will stay at -10C and below all day.
Devon and Cornwall are most at risk of icy roads, given the early sleet showers and surface temperatures at below freezing.
The South East will be cloudy and slightly milder at up to 3C.
Tomorrow should be drier for all, but it will feel harsh and bitter against strong northeasterly winds.

description.hltext_display: Viking Linen laivatilaus STX:ltä varmistui
description.author: nospam@nospam.org (Taloussanomat
description.content:
Varustamoyhtiö Viking Linen laivatilaus STX Finlandin Turun-telakalta on varmistunut. Osapuolten välinen sopimus astui voimaan tänään, kun sopimukselle asetetut ehdot täyttyivät.Yksi ehdoista koski ympäristötukea, joka myönnettiin tiistaina. Liikenne- ja viestintäministeriö antaa Viking Linelle 28 miljoonaa euroa ympäristötukea uuden matkustaja-aluksen rakentamiseen. Tuen maksaminen edellyttää vielä Euroopan unionin komission hyväksyntää.
Viking Line kertoi lokakuussa tilaavansa uuden laivan STX Finlandin Turun-telakalta. Aluksen hinta on noin 240 miljoonaa euroa. Se on tarkoitus luovuttaa yhtiön käyttöön vuonna 2013. 10:50Osake Viking Line 0,00 % 31,96 0,00 Uusi laiva käyttää polttoaineenaan nesteytettyä maakaasua.
Yritystietopalvelu

description.hltext_display: [机构看盘]苏物期货：年关淡季令PTA短暂承压
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content: 文华财经(编辑 黄丹)12月22日，郑州TA1105高开低走，跌破万点关口，收盘价下跌108点至9932元/吨，持仓减少17634手至20.4万手。现货市场气氛尚可，中纤PTA内盘价格指数上涨80元至9580元/吨。 PTA上游方面，今天NYMEX-2月原油电子盘运行于90美元/桶上方，预计短期内油价仍将维持总体偏强格局；MX、PX价格基本稳定，隔夜CFR中国/台湾LC30-45天PX现货价格下跌8美元至1360美元/吨，PTA生产成本大概在8300元/吨左右。当前PTA生产利润较高，下游终端需求步入年关淡季，短期内，PTA现货、期货价格或会感受到由生产动力带来的压制；但从中期来看，由于PX、PTA以及聚酯产能预期投放进度的不同，明年春节后PTA供需趋紧。 下游方面，今天江浙聚酯市场微幅提升，涤纶短纤指数上涨暂稳于12100元/吨。投资者对未来需保持清醒，面对人民币升值、劳动力成本上升以及东南亚等国家的竞争，国内纺织服装业的出口压力仍然没有减退。而且，12月-1月，PTA季节性需求趋弱。目前，江浙织机开工率已从10月上旬的78%下降到目前的62%左右。 总体来看，美国经济继续低速复苏，美国的量化宽松正在持续，但面对国内紧缩预期以及需求淡季，市场恐高情绪延续，短期内PTA依然承压；从长期来看，PTA的支撑因素来自于成本坚挺、明年春节后供需趋紧以及通胀预期。 操作上，紧盯央行动态、棉花价格以及生产装置动态；对于TA1105，前期多单适当减持，或以9800点设置止损；注意风险防范，做好资金管理。（苏物期货研发部 陆辉） 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: 醫衛協議 藥商：縮短臨床時程
description.content:
(中央社記者潘智義台北22日電)對「江陳會」簽署「兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，太景生物科技董事長兼執行長許明珠表示，可避免兩岸重複臨床試驗，有利於開發亞洲流行疾病新藥的藥商。
太景生技今天舉行記者會，許明珠特別看好「兩岸醫藥衛生協議」簽署後，可大幅縮短臨床試驗時程、節省成本所帶來的新藥商機。太景的新藥可望提早 5年，領先在台灣、大陸上市。
她說，江陳會簽署上述協議，要求新藥開發須以最嚴格標準進行，但大陸認可台灣已完成臨床試驗結果，兼顧安全與速度。中國是成長最快速的醫藥市場，太景早在2005年在當地設立子公司，並進行1.1類新藥、屬於非進口藥的1至3期臨床試驗。
另外，太景研發新藥奈諾沙星，可治療抗藥性黃金葡萄球菌，甚至糖尿病傷口發炎都能治療，並完成第 2期臨床試驗，再授權國際知名藥廠Warner Chilcott在歐美進行第3期臨床試驗，預計耗時2年，並在上述地區取得上市核可後，進行製造與銷售。
不過，奈諾沙星在台灣、中國大陸的 3期臨床試驗仍由太景進行，預計於2012年底在台灣與中國申請上市許可。991222

description.hltext_display: 欧美金融界年终分红大缩水 华尔街人士面临零奖金
description.content:
----本文导读：----
欧美金融机构发年终奖日子将近，但今年华尔街员工将面临0奖金事实，欧洲各银行收入表现欠佳，纷纷大幅削减年终奖，特别是英法最近还分别出招欲严控银行业薪酬。 华尔街将现零奖金族 据《纽约时报》报道，年关将近，又到华尔街分利之时。但与往年不同，一些金融业中高层人员今年谈可能不是数百万美元优渥报酬，而是一个新团体：零奖金族。 其实就某种程度来说，华尔街不该对没有红利太过惊讶。新华网援引《纽约时报》报道说，为弥补金融从业人员薪金损失，一些华尔街金融企业在2009年和2010年大幅调高员工基本工资。以美国高盛公司为例，运营主管基本年薪从30万美元上调至50万美元。摩根士丹利及瑞信薪资则由20万升至40万美元。但对华尔街员工而言，一年所获成功和声誉往往以年终奖多少来衡量，没有年终奖不啻一种精神打击。 另外，尽管会出现零奖金族，一部分人仍会获得高额奖金。 就盈利总额而言，华尔街今年表现良好，前三个季度实现盈利214亿美元。因此，一些企业高层人员仍可获得数百万美元奖金。
欧洲银行大幅压缩奖金
欧洲银行正面临越来越大奖金削减压力，据英国《金融时报》报道，英国和欧洲大陆逾10%银行家和交易员今年可能一分钱奖金都拿不到，特别是英国，政府已开始着手大幅削减支出。
欧洲猎头公司 ArmstrongInternational称，工作表现不佳者可能无法分享将于明年初发放总价值达数十亿英镑奖金。预计多数大型投行今年奖金将缩水20%-30%，而中层管理人员将是最大牺牲者，部分人奖金或被减达50%。
另外，英国财政大臣奥斯本和商业大臣凯布尔日前甚至与汇丰、渣打、苏皇、巴克莱和莱斯这五大银行行政总裁开会，要求银行业不要发放巨额红利，否则可能面对加税和接受更多规管。 法国出台限薪令 法国经济、财政和工业部长克里斯蒂娜防?拥伦罱?⒈硇挛殴?ㄋ担?ü???颜?焦?枷扌搅睿?越鹑谛幸敌匠昙喙茏鞒鼍咛骞娑ā！ ±?拥滤担?ü????罟娑ǎ?ü?鹑谝捣⒎沤苯鹬辽儆?0%必须分3年支付，奖金额度越大，延期支付比例越高，最高可达60%。政令还规定，法国金融行业50%薪酬将以股票或其他形式金融工具支付。
据法国媒体报道，为监督各金融机构遵守这些规则，法国政府还加强了法国银行和保险业监察局权力。如果银行和其他金融信贷机构薪酬政策不能保证良好风险管理和促进可持续增长，监察局有权要求实行强制修订。
拉加德还说，法国金融市场协会和法国银行联合会此前对金融行业薪酬制订了行业标准。这些标准如今被法国政府采纳，形成行政法规。新法规也是根据欧洲议会今年7月通过相关立法草案所作出相应调整。 --股市360财经频道讯

description.hltext_display: New Programme To Help Youth Unemployment
description.content:
Some 200,000 low-income youth in sub-Saharan Africa will benefit from a United Nations-backed initiative announced to increase access for them to financial services in a region where youth unemployment rates are two to three times that of adults.
co-sponsored by UN Capital Development Fund (UNCDF) and the MasterCard Foundation, which has made a four-year, $12 million contribution, is a competition-based programme that will identify and support up to 12 financial institutions to pilot and roll out sustainable financial services tailored to the youth.
'We are excited about the potential for YouthStart to accelerate the establishment of youth financial services in sub-Saharan Africa,' UNCDF Executive Secretary David Morrison said.
'Our strong expertise in ensuring that more households and small businesses gain access to credit, savings, insurance and other financial services that expand opportunities, combined with the Foundation's network and resources, presents another boost for reducing poverty and accelerating progress towards the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs),' he added, referring to UN targets to slash a host of social ills by 2015.
UNCDF will encourage collaboration among financial institutions and providers of non-financial services to spur innovation and influence policy decisions, enabling youth to participate in inclusive financial sectors.
Today, more than a quarter of the population of sub-Saharan Africa are between the ages of 12 and 24, making this group of youngsters the largest ever to be entering adulthood. Half of them remain illiterate, and young women in particular face a more challenging transition to the workplace and independent adulthood since they are more likely to fail to complete primary education and face increasing insecurity and discrimination in the labour market.
Early findings suggest that financial services aimed at youth can best promote asset-building and sustainable livelihoods when complemented with entrepreneurship and financial literacy training. However, less than five per cent of youth in the region have access to financial services. Few financial institutions have experience serving youth or working with youth support organisations to design and deliver youth-centric programmes.
Through the provision of technical assistance, market research and advice on how to partner with youth support organisations, YouthStart will help microfinance providers develop effective channels to deliver demand-driven services to youth.
'The MasterCard Foundation is committed to helping youth start out right,' said its President and CEO, Reeta Roy. 'Through YouthStart, The MasterCard Foundation is opening up pathways for 200,000 sub-Saharan African youth, half of whom will be girls and young women, to gain access to financial services.'
It provides seed capital - grants and loans - and technical support to help microfinance institutions reach more poor households and small businesses, and local governments finance the capital investments - water systems, feeder roads, schools, irrigation schemes - that will improve poor peoples' lives. UN News

description.hltext_display: CIA perusti Wikileaks-erikoisryhmän: WTF
description.author: nospam@nospam.org (Digitoday
description.content:
CIA on perustanut Wikileaks-vuotoihin erikoisryhmän, kertoo The Washington Post -sanomalehti.
Yhdysvaltojen tiedustelupalvelu CIA on perustanut Wikileaks-vuotoihin erikoistuneen tehoyksikön. Virallisesti yksikön nimi on Wikileaks TaskForce, mutta CIA:n sisällä se tunnetaan paremmin ytimekkäällä lyhenteellä WTF, . Suosittele Ei suosituksia Tulosta Pdf-versio Kuuntele Kommentoi Lähetä kaverille Wikileaks ei ole juuri aiheuttanut vahinkoa CIA:n toiminnalle. Vain muutama tiedustelupalveluun liittyvä dokumentti on vuotanut julki uusimmissa Cablegate-paljastuksissa.
Tiedustelupalvelu aikoo kuitenkin selvittää, millaisia sen tietoja on välitetty Yhdysvaltojen lähetystöjen välisessä tiedonvaihdossa, joista Wikileaks on julkaissut sähkeitä.
WTF:n tehtävänä on selvittää sähkeiden julkaisemisen välittömiä vaikutuksia.
CIA:ta on aiemmin arvosteltu salailusta, sillä tiedustelupalvelu ei ole kertonut kaikkia tietojaan muiden valtion viranomaisten kanssa. Joidenkin CIA-veteraanien mielestä Wikileaks-vuodot ovat osoittaneet käytännön oikeaksi.
CIA on käyttänyt viestintään omia järjestelmiään. Sen viestit eivät ole kulkeneet samoja kanavia pitkin kuin Yhdysvaltojen lähetystöjen väliset viestit, jotka vuotivat Wikileaks-palvelulle.

description.hltext_display: Kodak может объявить судебную войну Yahoo Flickr и Google Picasa
description.content:
По предположению независимых юристов, специализирующихся на патентном праве, компания Kodak в будущем наверняка развернет крупные судебные кампании против ряда ведущих интернет-порталов, после того, как компания подала в суд на фото-сайт Shutterfly по обвинению в том, что именно Kodak принадлежит патент на обработку и технику показа изображений в интернете.
По мнению экспертов, данный иск является своего рода пробой пера и в будущем Kodak наверняка попробует судиться с проектами вроде Yahoo Flickr или Google Picasa.
В случае с Shutterfly Kodak утверждает, что компания владеет фундаментальным правом на технологию встраивания и показа картинок в интернете. Несмотря на то, что сервис Shutterfly подал ответный иск на претензию Kodak, юристы называют претензию последней довольно опасной. "Впервые большая технологическая компания пытается отстоять свои права на такую фундаментальную технологию, как отображение графики в сети", - говорят в юридической компании Pinsent Masons.
Источники в крупных интернет-компаниях утверждают, что хотя их бренды в иске Kodak пока не фигурируют, они внимательно следят за ходом судебного процесса Shutterfly-Kodak и предполагают, что они могли бы противопоставить фундаментальному патенту известной фотокомпании. По словам Деборы Боулд, юриста Pincent Masons, дополнительная угроза заключается в том, что патент выдан Kodak с максимально широкой формулировкой и компания претендует как на право по локальным изображениям, так и по изображениям, загружаемым удаленно. Всего у Kodak сейчас насчитывается порядка 400 патентов, затрагивающих цифровые изображения.
В юридической компании Osborn Clarke говорят, что если Kodak будет отстаивать свои права на онлайн-изображения, то небольшие интернет-сервисы, скорее всего, согласятся заключить соглашение с компанией, тогда как гиганты будут судиться.
"Сейчас у Google и Yahoo довольно глубокие карманы и Kodak наверняка попытается отстаивать свои права, учитывая финансовые перспективы дела", - говорит Боулд.

description.hltext_display: 华尔街分析师预测美国100多城市明年将宣告破产
description.content:
----本文导读：----
金融危机爆发两年多来，美国经济复苏乏力，令美国民众忧心忡忡。如今又有坏消息传来，一名华尔街知名分析师日前预测，多达100多个美国城市有可能在明年宣告破产，不知道美国人在听到这个消息后会作何反应。
据美国媒体报道，华尔街知名分析师梅勒迪丝坊萏啬岽蟮ㄔげ猓?捎诿拦?髦莺痛蟪鞘凶芨赫?迅叽?万亿美元，明年美国可能有100多个城市要宣告破产，曾经让银行纷纷倒闭并且威胁国家金融债务危机，在不久将来可能会导致各地方政府崩盘。 梅勒迪丝坊萏啬岫匀?蛐糯?；?⑸???龀龉?既吩げ猓?馕环治鍪υ?9日号晚间哥伦比亚广播公司一档节目中表示，美国各州和地方政府巨额债务，是美国经济将面临最大难题，并有可能阻碍经济复苏。 惠特尼说，这是美国仅次于房市一个最重大问题，也确实是美国经济最大威胁。我们将会见到许多地方政府无力偿还债券，数量大概有50个到100个、甚至更多，这些市政府拖欠巨额债务，最后总额可能会高达数千亿元。 针对这一预测，新泽西州州长克利斯蒂则简短地阐述了问题产生症结所在，他说，我们每个名目支出太多，并且疯狂地借贷，让信用过度扩张。这就仿佛过去数十年来我们都在为自己挖掘一个巨大深坑，现在则必须从这个坑洞里爬出去，但却非常困难。 据报道，目前美国各州开支已比税收超出近5000亿美元，退休基金将面临1万亿美元资金缺口，许多地方政府被迫大幅削减预算。以底特律为例，包括警力、照明、道路维护和清洁等服务预算，纷纷遭到削减，有多达20%居民因此受到影响。伊利诺伊州州政府财政也同样捉襟见肘，该州目前开支为实际税收一倍，而且还款已经拖欠近六个月，仅伊利诺伊大学就负债4亿美元。伊利诺伊州违约不付债可能性高达21%，比其他任何州都要高。另外，佛罗里达州也可能陷入无力偿还债务困境。 其他网友关注新闻： 欧美股市360年终分红大缩水 华尔街人士面临零奖金 以华尔街为鉴 央行“提振”金融文化建设 美将再对华尔街高管限薪 以现金发奖金模式被叫停 美华尔街将现“零奖金族” 《商业周刊》封面文章：低调华尔街大佬 --股市360财经频道讯

description.hltext_display: 管制形虛設 診所非法賣管制藥
description.content:
（中央社記者吳哲豪彰化22日電）刑事警察局中部犯罪打擊中心今天查獲彰化縣花壇鄉1家診所涉嫌非法販賣管制藥品，彰化縣衛生局表示，診所沒有不良紀錄，將等到檢警偵查告一段落後，再作出行政處分。
刑事警察局中部打擊犯罪中心指出，彰化縣1家診所以解除毒癮為名，非法販賣第3級以及第4級管制藥品，診所會事先準備好藥品，購買者只要繳費就能領藥，讓藥品管制形同虛設。
涉嫌非法販賣藥品的診所今天上午大門緊閉，還有不知情的患者要去求診被擋在門外；據患者表示，這家診所醫術還不錯，醫師也熱心公益，聽到醫師非法販賣管制藥品，覺得很意外。
彰化縣衛生局局長葉彥伯說，出事診所沒有參加任何戒毒醫療計畫，也無不良違規紀錄，不過診所有藥師的話可以直接販賣管制藥品，他們將等到檢警調查告一段落後，再依藥師法及醫療法作出行政處分。991222

description.hltext_display: [机构看盘]北京中期：沪金维持整理态势关注1400美元阻力
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content: 文华财经（编辑 李伶晓）基本面上，从美国近期公布的经济数据来看，大都较为利好，加之近期美国10年期公债收益率 提升，已经从10月初的2.7%最高涨至约3.5%的水平，使得美元指数从11月的低点76下方一路反弹。虽然非农就业数据和失业率的大幅差于预期，曾令美元指数承压下跌，市场还甚至一度怀疑美国可能扩大其量化宽松政策的规模，不过，从上周美国公布的其他经济数据来看，已经基本可以排除QE3的可能。昨日，在穆迪宣布将葡萄牙调入"负面观察"不久，葡萄牙政府马上表示，将采取所有可能的措施来应对穆迪针对该国主权评级所提出的风险。尽管欧元区有多个国家被穆迪降低评级，但是穆迪对欧元区却很有信心，认为欧元区保持着良好的金融强度，并拥有应对主权债务危机所需的"资源、激励措施和政治凝聚力"。今日美国还将公布第三季度GDP终值在内的一系列的经济数据，如果这些经济数据能够延续近期的强势，则美元指数可能继续前期的上涨走势。评论：12月21日全球最大黄金ETF-SPDR Gold Shares黄金持有量为1298.029吨，比12月29日减仓0.911吨。在前段时间连续减仓后，SPDR最近开始增仓，显示其看好黄金后市的态度。12月1日至今，该基金共加仓11.427吨。该基金ETF自今年3月份开始大幅加仓，当月加仓即达22.83吨，4月份、5月份、6月份分别加仓29.18吨、108.93吨和52.51吨，而进入7月份，该基金连续减仓，当月减幅达38.16吨。到了8月份SPDR又重启加仓步伐，8月和9月共加仓22.5吨。考虑到美联储于11月3日召开的议息会议上讨论的量化宽松规模的不确定性，该基金10月份又减仓11.67吨。而在欧债危机波澜起伏的11月，该基金总共减仓6.426吨。今日沪金高开高位震荡小涨，国际评级机构重新审视欧洲债务问题国家，令市场避险情绪增强，金价仍处于上行通道之中，易涨难跌格局延续。（北京中期研发部 吴峥峥） 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: European Stocks, U.S. Futures Are Little Changed; ARM Advances
description.author: Adam Haigh
description.content:
Dec. 22 (Bloomberg) -- European stocks and U.S. futures were little changed after benchmark indexes yesterday recovered all the losses from the plunge that followed Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc.s 2008 collapse. Most Asian shares rose.
ARM Holdings Plc climbed 7.5 percent after Microsoft Corp. was said to be preparing to unveil a version of its Windows operating system that runs on ARMs technology. Hermes International SCA gained 2.2 percent as LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA raised its stake in the luxury-goods company. Adidas AG slid 1.9 percent after rival sportswear maker Nike Inc. reported orders that fell short of some analysts estimates. The benchmark Stoxx Europe 600 Index rose less than 0.1 percent to 281.29 at 8:23 a.m. in London. The gauge has rallied 11 percent in 2010 as companies reported higher earnings, the European Union bailed out Greece and Ireland and the Federal Reserve unveiled a $600 billion bond-purchase program to support the recovery. Standard & Poors 500 Index futures expiring in March slipped less than 0.1 percent today. The MSCI Asia Pacific Index added 0.2 percent.
The U.S. economy, the worlds largest, grew at a 2.8 percent annual rate in the third quarter, according to the median estimate of economists surveyed before a Commerce Department report due at 8:30 a.m. in Washington. Thats more than the 2.5 percent the government estimated last month. U.S. forecasters are revising up their GDP forecasts and some of them are even going for 4 percent next year, Geoff Lewis, Hong Kong-based head of investment services at JPMorgan Asset Management, said on Bloomberg Televisions On the Move Asia with Rishaad Salamat. That would make a serious dip in unemployment and as soon as that starts to come down consumer confidence would really hit the roof. Sales of existing U.S. homes probably rose in November as the industry that triggered the worst recession in seven decades struggled to recover, economists said before a National Association of Realtors report at 10 a.m. in Washington. ARM, a U.K. chip designer, surged 7.7 percent to 434.7 pence, the highest price since 2001. The new Microsoft product will debut at the Consumer Electronics Show in January, said two people, who asked not to be identified because the plans are confidential. The software would be tailored for battery-powered devices, such as tablet computers and other handhelds, the people said.
Hermes climbed 2.2 percent to 160.10 euros. LVMH now owns more than 20 percent of Hermes, up from the 17.1 percent it announced in October. LVMH bought the shares on the market, said Olivier Labesse, a company spokesman. The increase may boost speculation that LVMH Chairman Bernard Arnault is targeting a takeover of Hermes, even as the company said again it isnt seeking a board seat or control.
Northern Foods Plc gained 7.4 percent to 65 pence after saying it received a letter from Boporan Holdings Ltd. requesting access to information.
U.K. tycoon Ranjit Boparan is planning a hostile 300 million-pound ($464 million) bid for the food maker, disrupting an agreed all-stock merger that Northern Foods has agreed with Greencore Group Plc, the Daily Telegraph reported, without attribution. Northern Foods said it still recommends the Greencore deal.
Aker Solutions ASA, Norways largest engineering company, climbed 4.5 percent to 101.7 kroner after Jacobs Engineering Group Inc. agreed to buy some of the companys units for an estimated $675 million to expand its metals and mining business.
Adidas fell 1.9 percent to 50.42 euros after Nike, the worlds largest maker of athletic shoes, said orders for December to April rose 11 percent from a year ago, excluding currency fluctuations. That missed the 11.6 percent gain projected by an average of five analysts surveyed by Bloomberg.
Beni Stabili SpA, the Italian real-estate company controlled by Frances Fonciere des Regions SA, sank 2.4 percent to 64.4 euro cents as Delfin Sarl sells a 4.3 percent stake. Mediobanca SpA is managing the sale of 81.7 million shares in the company on behalf of Delfin Sarl. Delfin is Beni Stabilis third-biggest shareholder, according to Bloomberg data.
--With assistance from Rishaad Salamat in Hong Kong. Editors: Andrew Rummer, David Merritt.
To contact the reporter on this story: Adam Haigh in London at ahaigh1@bloomberg.net
To contact the editor responsible for this story: David Merritt at dmerritt1@bloomberg.net.

Sales Value Of Chain Stores Goods In September-November 2010
Substanslöst och magert när Ahlstedt berättar från logen
description.content:
Börje Ahlstedt ville avrunda sin snart 50-åriga karriär i Thalias tjänst med sina minnen, men hans manuskript var inte antagbart av Bonniers och den säkra stilisten Lena Katarina Swanberg, van vid litterära bearbetningsjobb, införskrevs för att sätta litet fason på hans anrättning.
Framställningsformen kunde hon påverka, men det innehåll som nu läggs fram är tämligen substanslöst och skäligen magert. Skådisar brukar han mustiga och levande historier att berätta, men när Ahlstedt sitter där på toppen i Dramatens finaste loge, som tidigare härbergerat stora stjärnor som Lars Hanson, Georg Rydeberg och Jarl Kulle, har han inga höjdare att berätta.
Lars Hanson
Det var i den här logen som Lars Hanson som 77-åring satt med ciruklationsrubbningar i vänster ben efter att ha plågat sig igenom en lysande föreställning. När teaterchefen Ingmar Bergman kom in i logen och tackade honom för en lysande prestation tittade han med kyligt förakt på sin chef:
- Du kan dra åt helvete med din djävla inställsamhet. Jag vet nog vad du går för.
"Jag vare ingalunda teaterns chef, som frambar min hyllning utan ett hycklande svin...som förvisat honom fråmn Stora scenen till Lilla.... Jag var skyldig till värken i den blå-svarta foten, det var jag som släppt fram Döden ur rekvisitaförrådet". skrev han.
Krossade servisen
Den klassen kommer inte Ahlstedt upp till, men hyfsad är dock historien om när Ingmar Bergman blev förgrymmad på sin hustru Käbi Laretei för att hon skulle ge en konsert i New York. Bergmans kvinnor skulle vara uppasserskor och änglar, inte ha något eget liv. Han var så svartsjuk att han gjorde det djävligaste han kunde hitta på. Han slog sönder hustruns käraste ägodel som var en äkta porslinservis som hon fått ärva av sin mamma. Det krossade också deras äktenskap.
Det är mycket Bergman i Ahlstedts bok och denne framställer honom som att de hade en speciell relation och förstod varandra och var verkliga vänner. Det är inte alls ovanligt att memoarförfattare framställer sig som särskilt nära vän till stora kändisar som avlidit. Men i Ahlstedts fall var det nog så, att Bergman såg i honom ett instrument för att förverkliga sina visioner. Vem finns inte hans roll som den excentriske Ekdahlbrodern Carl i "Fanny och Alexander"? Ahlstedt blev aldrig inbjuden till Bergmans residens på Fårö. Därmot var det en jämn flyt av kvinnor som inviterades dit.
Ett ormbo
Man får närmast intrycket att Dramatren befolkats av bred ström av överspända, egenkära och självcentrerade galenpannor som de framställs av Ahlstedt. Dramaten framstår som ett värsta sortens terrarium, ett ormbo, där man verkar beredd att slita strupen av varandra. Men det är kanske endast på det sättet som stor teater kan åstadkommas. En och annan beskrivs som rena psykopalen som Örjan Rahmberg med sina groteska dödshot. Boken blir mest en fragmentarisk kändiskavalkad, där han delar in skådespelarna i goda och onda, i posörer som Ernst-Hugo Järegård, Holger Löwenadler och Thommy Bergren och i verkliga vänner som Anita Wall, Lena Nyman och Thomas Pontén som bjuds in till hans loge och får sitta i Jarl Kulles gamla fåtölj som han fått låna av sterbhuset.
Sprängde sexvallarna
Det ska nog sägas att Börje Ahlstedt haft stora framgångar på Dramaten med över 100-talet av världsdramatikens största roller som Romeo i Romeo och Julia, Lear i Kung Lear, Peer i Peer Gynt, Jeppe i Jeppe på berget för att nämna några. Men han var också med om att tillsammans med Lena Nyman spränga sexvallarna i hudfärgade trikåer i "Jag är nyfiken"-filmerna.
Från början var det klart att de skulle få gager i procent på intäkterna, men när Sandrews insåg vad det skulle bli av Vilgot Sjömans film fastställdes gager på några tusenlappar till skådisarna. Hade den tidigare överenskommelsen fått gälla hade de blivit rika, eftersom filmerna spelade in tiotals miljoner. Det mest sympatiska draget hos Börje Ahlstedt är att hans väldiga ambitioner att gå in i sin roll kombineras med en starkt uttalad övertygelse att en framgångsrik föreställning bygger på att kollektivet på scenen är samspelat och att ingen enskild diva ägnar sig åt privata piruetter. Att döma av Ahlstedts rapport verkar det finnas gott om den senare sorters egotrippade neurotiker på den s k Nationalscenen.
Jan G Andersson
*Börje Ahlstedt
Lena Katarina Swanberg
Från min loge på Dramaten

description.hltext_display: Ghana To Avoid 'Oil Curse'-Says World Bank
description.content:
The World Bank says it believes Ghana can avoid the “Dutch disease” on account of established and well-managed mining and cocoa sectors as commercial oil began on December 15, 2010.
According to the Country Director of the World Bank for Ghana, Ishac Diwan, 'It's a bit of oil, not a whole lot, so it's not enough to give you the Dutch disease and a curse.'
Cocoa and Gold accounts for about 75 per cent of foreign exchange earning for the country. The current good prices of both commodities on the international market has been a repreive for economic managers.
Ghana joined the world oil cartel, the Organisation of Oil Producing Countries (OPEC) on December 2010, following the first flow of oil from the Jubilee field.
Ghana is expected to produce 120,000 barrels of oil per day after full swing oil operations of the Jubilee oil in the first quarter of 2011.
Pressntly, at the initial drilling, Ghana is expecting on average of 55,000 barrels of oil per day until about April 2011.
Analysts say unlike many other oil-producing African nations whose oil sectors dominate the economy making them central to conflict and corruption, Ghana's oil will be dwarfed by established cocoa and mining industries and be managed by one of the region's most stable governments.
'Oil is not so big that it could just shift this country into a different political path. It's not a tsunami,' Diwan was quoted as saying.
In an interview with Ruters, the World Bank Country Director referred to a Dutch discovery of gas in the 1960s and said that boosted the currency and undermined other exports.
Ghana expects to produce an average 120,000 barrels per day from its off-shore Jubilee field with reserves estimated at 1.5 billion barrels.
Production is expected to increase to 250,000 bpd after three years, about an eighth of what nearby Nigeria produces now.
Ghana is keen to avoid the problems oil has brought to Nigeria, where rebels in motorboats have repeatedly attacked pipelines and platforms in the Niger Delta over the years, saying they are fighting against the theft of the country's oil wealth.
In November, traditional chiefs of towns from Western Region demanded a 10 per cent share of oil revenues when crude started flowing just offshore from their homeland - a demand that was vehemently rejected by Parliament.
Mr Diwan said a militant insurgency was unlikely given Ghana's record for negotiation to reduce tensions.
'If a warrior emerges, I don't think this person would have a following because there are reasonable chiefs that have managed to voice reasonable demands,' he said.
'Institutions in Ghana are quite evolved and civil society is very vibrant and aware of the dangers,' Diwan said.
'I just can not see big corruption happening. Hidden bank accounts in Switzerland and lots of money disappearing, this is not Ghana. I'm broadly optimistic.'
Parliament is considering a Petroleum Revenue Management Bill aimed at ensuring the sector benefits ordinary Ghanaians over the long-term and at providing a strong regulatory framework as firms explore other blocks off Ghana's coast.
In its 2011 budget, Ghana forecast the estimated $586 million of oil proceeds next year would account for only six percent of all domestic government revenues.
He said government had a good system of checks and balances and that the private sector had reached an important critical mass. Continued

description.hltext_display: 经济学家：印度与中国攀比经济增速“非常愚蠢”
description.content:
----本文导读：----
据英国《金融时报》报道，世界知名学者、诺贝尔经济学奖获得者阿玛蒂亚飞??娉疲?《戎醋庞谧非蟪??泄??迷鏊伲?悠湮?饬抗?曳⒄贡曜迹?且患?浅Ｓ薮朗隆！ ∩?1日表示，对这两个新兴经济体进行这样比较，是一种危险错误观念。他建议印度领导人更加注重减少12亿国民中长期营养不良人数，而非追求越来越高增长目标。 森对新德里学生和年轻企业家们说：我对印度和中国竞赛问题、以及哪个国家经济增速会更高毫无兴趣。将8.5%与9.5%相比，并不是严肃问题。 报道指出，森言论针对是印度政策精英一味专注不断提升经济增速，这种专注常常忽视了经济活力提升能否转化为人类发展指标改善。
印度人营养不良情况在世界上处于最严重之列。全国约一半儿童发育不良。 森密友、印度总理曼莫汉沸粮裨げ猓?《染?迷鏊僭谥衅谀诨岽锏?0%，与中国不相上下。 上月发布数据显示，今年第三季度印度经济增速接近9%。商界领袖和政策制定者认为，印度还能以快得多速度增长。但他们承认，更快但不平衡增长可能对该国构成威胁。 孟买一位商界领袖形容印度目前增长为缺省增长率，一旦政府减少干预，便会轻松超标。 森表示，在社会正义、脱贫，并将更多公共资金投入医疗和教育大背景下，更高经济增速就是一件积极事情。 他建议，印度应更加关注在粮食价格高企当下，在满足国民温饱方面是否落后，以及印度可以向中国借鉴哪些社会改良经验。为何营养不良情况如此严重？他问道。 --股市360财经频道讯

description.hltext_display: Vandals win in last trip to Mac Court
description.content:
EUGENE, Ore. - Brandon Wiley scored 14 points for Idaho and the Vandals held off Oregon's second-half rally to win 69-65 on Tuesday night.
Landon Tatum added 11 points for Idaho (6-5), which won the last nonconference game on Oregon's McArthur Court. The Ducks will move into Matthew Knight Arena in two weeks.
"As a team, we thought we let a couple get away in Seattle U and Montana, but we got one back tonight," Idaho coach Don Verlin said. "I couldn't be happier to come here and beat a program like this at a storied venue. It was loud, and I thought our guys really held their composure."
Joevan Catron led all scorers with 18 points for Oregon (7-5), which made just 7 of 29 3-point attempts and was outshot 61-32 percent in the first half and 49-34 percent overall.
Catron scored 14 in the second half, including eight straight at one point and the first six points in a 10-2 run that gave the Ducks a 55-54 lead - their first of the second half - with 9:38 to play.
Idaho went 7 for 8 from the free-throw line and eventually reclaimed the lead, 57-55, after a pair of foul shots by Stephen Madison. Deremy Geiger's 3-pointer two minutes later put the Vandals ahead 62-55.
Armstead made 1 of 2 free throws with 1:34 to play to cut the Ducks deficit to a basket, 64-62, but Wiley answered with a score inside and Oregon missed its next four shots as the Vandals built a 69-62 advantage in the final minute before Armstead hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer.
Idaho returns to action Dec. 29 at home vs. New Mexico State in the Western Athletic Conference opener.
IDAHO (6-5)
Henderson 4-9 0-0 8, Wiley 5-10 4-7 14, Toledo 0-1 3-4 3, Ledbetter 3-6 0-0 8, Geiger 3-9 0-0 9, Tatum 3-6 5-8 11, Barone 4-4 0-0 8, Madison 1-2 5-6 8, Kammerer 0-0 0-0 0. Totals 23-47 17-25 69.
OREGON (7-5)
Singler 4-11 2-2 11, Catron 6-12 6-6 18, Jacob 3-8 0-0 6, Armstead 3-9 1-2 10, Strowbridge 2-7 1-1 5, Fearn 0-0 0-0 0, Sim 2-6 0-0 5, Loyd 2-8 0-0 6, Williams 1-6 0-0 2, Nared 0-1 2-2 2. Totals 23-68 12-13 65.
Halftime_Idaho 40-35. 3-Point Goals_Idaho 6-13 (Geiger 3-6, Ledbetter 2-4, Madison 1-2, Henderson 0-1), Oregon 7-29 (Armstead 3-6, Loyd 2-4, Sim 1-5, Singler 1-6, Catron 0-1, Williams 0-2, Strowbridge 0-5). Fouled Out_Loyd. Rebounds_Idaho 35 (Wiley 6), Oregon 34 (Catron, Jacob, Singler 6). Assists_Idaho 14 (Tatum 3), Oregon 15 (Armstead, Singler 3). Total Fouls_Idaho 17, Oregon 18. A_6,635.

description.hltext_display: £1,300 is raised for Ethiopians
description.content:
VILLAGERS have raised hundreds of pounds to help people in an Ethiopian community.
People living in Painswick, Edge and Cranham helped raise money for the community of Lideta, an area of the African country's capital Addis Ababa.
Efforts have raised more than £1,300 for the charity through a series of events.
The World Vision alternative Christmas card was signed by many at the weekend, and those adding their name gave a donation to the work being carried out.
In October, more than 90 people attended a harvest lunch in Painswick.
People gathered at the Painswick Centre and celebrated harvest with a beef and mutton stew by Ximena and Bruan from Olivas. During the talk John Longuett-Higgins talked about the work being done in Lideta.
In Edge, a talent show has helped raise £500 for the charity, and in Pitchcombe, churchgoers are planning to sponsor a young girl.
In Cranham, a Gospel choir, led by Penny Lyon and Kevin Washbrook has been out and about at various concerts and gigs around the Stroud area and on every outing have collected money to support Lideta.
Many people in the village contributed to the fund. Iris McCormick, who sponsors an Ethiopian child called Tsion, witnessed poverty there when she visited the shanty town in November 2009. She said women there were selling tea by the roadside to earn money.
World Vision is a Christian relief organisation which teaches people to create sustainable ways of supporting themselves.

description.hltext_display: GBP/USD Technical Analysis 22 December 2010
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: GBP/USD Open 1.5463 High 1.5569 Low 1.5434 Close 1.5464
On Tuesday Pound/Dollar decreased with around 130 pips, in line with the negative Interbank sentiment at nearly -5%. The Cable depreciated from 1.5569 to 1.5434 yesterday, closing the day at 1.5464. Today the British Pound is slightly adjusting, and it's still moving within yesterday's range. On the 1 hour chart the range trading is breaking downwards, while on the 3 hour chart the downward channel has renewed. First resistance is yesterday's peak at 1.5569. Break above it should extend the bullish movement further towards the 1.5690. The nearest support is yesterday's bottom at 1.5434. Going bellow it should extend British Pound's reduction further down towards next downward objective 1.5312. Today are UK BoE meeting minutes, GDP and Current account, all at 9:30 GMT. Quotes are moving in line with the 20 and bellow the 50 EMA on the 1 hour chart, indicating short term neutral and medium term bearish pressure. The value of the RSI indicator is positive and inclining upwards, MACD is negative and tranquil, while CCI is close with the 100 line on the 1 hour chart, giving overall neutral signals.
Technical resistance levels: 1.5569 1.5690 1.5800
Technical support levels: 1.5434 1.5312 1.5200

description.hltext_display: [机构看盘]上海中期：朝韩局势再度紧张，黄金或延续上涨格局
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
文华财经（编辑 李伶晓）行情回顾： 隔
隔夜伦敦金微涨0.32美元报收于1385美元。穆迪公司及惠誉评级公司分别将葡萄牙和希腊列入评级负面观察名单，令欧债危机再起波澜，黄金再次出现与美元同涨的格局。国内方面，今日沪金主力合约1106小幅高开后绕当日均线上下震荡，收于一根小阴线，至收盘时较上一交易日上涨0.39元，成交量与持仓量都有所下降。基本面分析：欧洲方面，穆迪周二将葡萄牙A1长期评级和 Prime-1短期政府债评级列入可能下调观察名单，下调幅度可能为1-2级。惠誉(Fitch)周二表示，将希腊"BBB-"长期外币及本币发行人违约评级列入负面观察名单，暗示希腊主权评级或将被调降至"垃圾级"。欧债危机的进一步发展令市场更为青睐黄金等避险资产，并为其提供支撑。中国方面，昨日晚间，国家发展改革委发出通知，决定今日零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，即零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油(全国平均)每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。提油价有利于炼油企业和新能源产业，不利于汽车等交运行业及高耗能行业，同时会加剧市场对成本推动型通胀膨胀的担忧，紧缩忧虑始终围绕在中国市场的周围。朝韩局势方面，硝烟再起，局势又趋于紧张，韩军再次进行海上射击及明日将举行陆地空中训练再度引发市场投资者担忧，黄金等避险品种可能将会受益。后市展望：穆迪公司及惠誉评级公司分别将葡萄牙和希腊列入评级负面观察名单，令欧债危机再起波澜，黄金再次出现与美元同涨的格局。总体来看，黄金依然处在上涨通道，但受制于美元的阶段性强势，可能会震荡上扬，建议多单仍可继续持有。（李宁） 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: Расширена линейка серверных продуктов Dr.Web
description.content:
Компания «Доктор Веб» сообщает о выпуске программного продукта Dr.Web для Novell Storage Services в рамках Dr.Web Server Security Suite. Новый продукт предназначен для обезвреживания вирусов в файловой системе Novell Storage Services (NSS) на базе платформы Novell Open Enterprise Server под управлением операционной системы SUSE Linux Enterprise Server (32- и 64-битные версии).
Как и другие программные продукты Dr.Web для защиты файловых серверов, Dr.Web для Novell Storage Services осуществляет многопоточную проверку c последующим лечением, перемещением в карантин или удалением любых типов вредоносных объектов. Программа предоставляет централизованную статистику своей работы, администратор своевременно оповещается обо всех вирусных событиях.
Несмотря на то, что большинство вирусов разрабатывается не для Unix-систем, через файловые серверы могут распространяться вирусы для всех ОС, в том числе и макровирусы для Word, Excel и других приложений Windows. Dr.Web для Novell Storage Services пресекает распространение этих и других вредоносных программ, причем возможность асинхронного сканирования позволяет делать это незаметно для пользователей — при обработке файлы не блокируются.
В составе Dr.Web Server Security Suite новый продукт доступен в виде базовой лицензии «Антивирус», лицензирование производится по числу защищаемых серверов.

description.hltext_display: 58697: el premio más madrugador
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. 58.697 es el número de un quinto premio, el más madrugador, que se ha cantado a las 9.33 de la mañana. Dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: Best SLR Camera Review - Canon EOS Rebel T1
description.content: Positive Aspects:This model has the best SLR camera design, the top ISO in its own category, excellent low- light capability without using a flash, provides brilliant photographs, is lightweight and is easy to carry around.Negative Aspects:I don't see any.Review:I found out that Canon employed a comparable sensor as that of the EOS 50D, which is regarded as a semi-pro camera. This particular camera has a good grip and is very lightweight. This camera might help you save some cash since the lens also fits on earlier Canon models.I have both the D5000 and also the T1i, and I can honestly say that the picture quality is equally outstanding in both models-like that of a pro. The AF functions in both cameras also work well.The 3-inch high resolution LCD screen makes reviewing shots far easier. Some sort of swivel display screen would be even better. Screen quality is a top priority to me and I prefer Canon EOS Rebel above the other available models.The Canon's viewfinder is better than the D5000 because it is bigger and it enables you to take pictures even with your shades on. Furthermore, we can focus its dioptric to the eye without having a lens as well. The Canon's 12800 ISO capability as well as its built-in flash work well for taking snapshots. It also enables one-handed adjustment easier while taking shots because the actual screen is left of center and also the main function buttons and the navigation control are on the right. In addition, the Canon layout and interface is simple to use even by a child.The Canon's kit lens appears to be comparable to that of the Nikon, since the two have plastic mounts and both have stable lenses. Even without the lens the special LCD screen as well as the ISO capability of the T1i made me realize that it is far better than the D5000. The Canon T1i is an excellent choice!

description.hltext_display: ビジネスマナーを音と動きで教える！これが社会人のための電子辞書 - ITライフハック
South Korea army to hold huge drill, North silent
description.content: South Korea announced land and sea military exercises on Wednesday including its largest-ever live-fire drill near North Korea just as tension on the peninsula was beginning to ease after Pyongyang's attack on a southern island.

description.hltext_display: Flere har alvorlige spilleproblemer
description.content:
Etter tre år med Norsk Tippings automatmonopol har antall nordmenn med alvorlige spilleproblemer økt med 70 prosent.
Søk i skattelistene
Søk på navn og/eller sted
Eksempel: Ola Nordmann Oslo
Se topplister i ditt postnr.
Eksempel: 2815
Se topplister i Kommuner
Flakstad Vestvågøy Vågan
Jeb J. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
hans M. Ø. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
yngve h. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
Inger M. om Ni av ti sier nei, Jens
hans M. Ø. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
edgar b. om – Oljepenger er ingen garanti
Tips en venn på e-post:
Din kommentar
Del på nettet:
Men det er blitt mindre spilleproblemer sett under ett.
87 prosent har ingen problemer, men det er de dårligst stilte som rammes hardest. Tallene fremkommer i en undersøkelse Synovate har gjort for Norsk Tipping om det norske folks spillevaner, skriver Aftenposten.
Synovate konkluderer med at graden av spilleproblemer sett under ett i befolkningen er blitt mindre siden 2005. Men det er bare en del av bildet siden det er blitt flere som har alvorlige problemer. Mens man i 2008 mente det var 48.000 eller 1,3 prosent som hadde alvorlige spillproblemer, er tallet i år vokst til 81.000, eller 2,1 prosent.
– Vi har sett en polarisering innenfor spilleavhengigheten. Flere har ingen problemer, mens flere har alvorlige problemer. Først og fremst skyldes dette utbredelsen av nettspill, men også andre spill som bingo og spilleautomater har økt omsetningen, sier Kristin Rogge Pran fra Synovate, forfatter av undersøkelsen Spillevaner og spilleproblemer i befolkningen 2010.
Styreformann Lars Sponheim i Norsk Tipping sier at veksten og problemene skyldes bingoautomater og utenlandske nettspill.
– Problemene oppstår i forbindelse med nett-, heste- og oddsspill. Jeg er fremdeles overbevist om at det er best å kanalisere spillingen inn under vår ansvarlighetslinje, sier Sponheim. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: 6位行业精英加盟盛大 运营游戏最高拿20%分成
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
腾讯科技讯（乐天）12月22日消息，据盛大网络最新发布的第三季度《员工发展报告》披露，在8月20日盛大游戏举办的第十届产品经理/总监招标会上，共有35名来自巨人以及海外同行业的、拥有丰富运营经验的候选人参加了招标会，最终签约6人。
盛大游戏产品经理/总监招标作为“20计划”的重要载体之一，至今已举办十届。它在为优秀游戏运营人才提供挑战梦想、自我飞跃机会的同时，还分享给游戏运营团队最高达20%的分成。产品经理/总监招标活动自举办以来，已为包括《龙之谷》在内的多款游戏大作吸引了几十位精英人才。
报告同时还披露，第11届产品经理/总监招标于12月20日举行。盛大游戏正在为包括《传奇3》等在内的游戏招募产品经理和运营团队成员。
据悉，盛大网络是互联网行业首个发布《员工发展报告》的企业，从2010年第二季度发布以来已获得良好的社会反响，该报告每个季度定期对外发布。
这份《员工发展报告》详细总结盛大每个阶段人才发展情况，从吸引人才、培育人才、留住人才、人尽其才等方面揭示盛大对企业软性环境的塑造，为外界全方位了解盛大的人才战略和人才培养提供了一个直观的窗口。

description.hltext_display: 晚盘评述：商品弱势下行郑棉放量暴跌
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
第1页:股市不稳拖累金属 第2页:化工缩量减仓 弱势下行 第3页:原糖屡创新高 郑糖量价齐升 和讯特约
【宏观政策】
国家发改委12月21日公布数据显示，11月份，规模以上工业增加值同比增长13.3%，增速比上月加快0.2个百分点。其中，轻工业增加值同比增长12.7%，比上月减缓0.2个百分点；重工业增加值增长13.6%，比上月加快0.4个百分点。
国家统计局数据显示，1-11月，全国商品房销售额为4.23万亿元，同比增长17.48%，接近去年全年4.4万亿元的销售水平。根据历史数据并结合目前销售形势推算，今年全国商品房销售额有望突破5万亿元，可能达5.3万亿元。
美国联邦储备委员会12月21日发表声明，决定延长与5家西方主要央行的临时性美元流动性互换协议。分析人士认为，此举旨在向海外金融机构提供所需的美元资金，以缓解欧洲债务危机带来的压力。
股市不稳拖累金属
【行业信息】
今日上海地区20mmHRB400螺纹钢均价4860元/吨，8mmQ235高线均价4750元/吨。
美国ETF黄金基金SPDR Gold Shares持仓1298.02874吨，较前日增仓0.91089吨.
【盘面概述】
今日金属市场高开低走，震荡下挫。国内股市的疲软是导致今日金属市场下跌的主要原因，市场处在震荡之中，并无明显方向，但外盘金属不断冲高说明近期的主导方向还是做多，只是做多时要留心A股的波动。
【操作建议】
有色短线做多思路为主；螺纹中线多单可继续持有；黄金可短线做多。
海风 豆类午后拉升 轻仓持多 【盘面概述】
今日豆类早盘震荡，午后在股市的带动下出现放量拉升，大豆1109合约增仓16746手。
【行业信息】
12月21日，美国2011年5月交货的大豆到中国港口的成本为4,456元/吨，升帖水为80美分/蒲式耳，国际运费为52.55美元。南美2011年5月交货的大豆到中国港口的成本为4,337元/吨，升帖水为38美分/蒲式耳，国际运费为48.61美元。
12月18日，美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）的报告显示，商品基金在芝加哥期货交易所（CBOT）大豆期货和期权部位上增持多头部位。截至上周二，商品基金在CBOT大豆期货及期权上持有172322手净多单，比一周前增加4262手。其 中多单数量为197,820手，比一周前增加2,931手，空单25,498手，比一周前减少1,332手，空盘量为955,765手。
据芝加哥12月17日消息，私人分析机构Informa Economics周五下调美国2011年玉米播种面积预估，并上调大豆播种面积预估。Informa Economics预估美国农户将在2011年播种7756.5万英亩大豆。Informa在11月预估2011年大豆播种面积为7580万英亩。
据温尼伯湖12月17日消息，加拿大油籽加工商协会(COPA)周五公布的周度压榨数据显示，截至12月15日当周，加拿大大豆压榨量为24,923吨，较前一周的26,421吨下降5.7%。2010/11年度迄今为止，大豆压榨量总计为510,906吨，高于去年同期的469,678吨。当周大豆压榨产能利用率为55.6%，年初迄今为61.0%，高于去年同期的56.1%。
【操作建议】
今日大豆午后出现放量增仓拉升行情，建议投资者轻仓持多。
油脂震荡走高 多单轻仓持有
【盘面概述】
今日油脂整体呈现震荡走高态势，其中豆油1109上涨0.93%，菜油1109上涨0.91%，棕榈油1109上涨0.7%。
【行业信息】
据国家粮油交易中心12月21日消息，经国家有关部门批准，定于12月21日在安徽粮食批发交易市场及其联网市场举行国家临时存储食用油竞价交易会，本次计划销售菜籽油9.97万吨，实际成交5.76万吨，成交率57.77%，成交均价9264元/吨。
据吉隆坡12月20日消息，船运调查机构ITS周一预估，马来西亚12月1-20日棕榈油出口量为776,910吨，较上月同期减少26%。ITS称亚洲-大西洋(600558,股吧)市场是最大的买家，之后是中东及印度次大陆。马来西亚向这些地区销售的棕榈油总量分别为156,539吨，150,990吨和141,230吨。
12月20日消息，目前，全国秋冬种工作基本结束，冬小麦陆续进入越冬期。总体来看，今年秋冬种生产继续保持平稳发展态势，小麦、油菜面积稳中略增。据农业部农情调度，今年全国冬小麦播种面积达3.4亿亩，比上年增加100万亩，冬油菜播栽面积达1.03亿亩，比上年增加100万亩左右。
马来西亚棕榈油局（MPOB）近期表示，因劳动力紧缺及季风天气令收割放缓并损及产量，马来西亚2010年毛棕榈油产量料低于此前预估的1750万吨。马来西亚是仅次于印尼的全球第二大棕榈油出产国。
【操作建议】
今日油脂震荡走高，目前仍然处于中期上涨趋势之中，建议投资者轻仓持多。
孙鹏
【独家稿件声明】凡注明 “和讯”来源之作品（文字、图片、图表）， 未经和讯网授权，任何媒体和个人不得全部或者部分转载。如需转载，请与 010-85650688联系；经许可后转载务必请注明出处，并添加源链接，违者本网将依法追究责任。

description.hltext_display: 【內地樓市】美聯(01200-HK)料內地明年首季將有調控，樓價再升逾10%
description.content:
財華社香港新聞中心。
美聯中國全國研究中心主管徐楓於記者會表示，預計明年內地宏觀調控持續嚴厲，料繼「國10條」、「國11條」後的第三輪措施將於明年首季出台；美聯集團執行董事兼中國行政總裁郭應龍稱，明年中央將採取加息並配合其他政策抑制樓價漲幅，其中他料年初將有新稅收政策出台。
郭應龍指，預測明年內地住宅樓價全年升幅為10至15%，其中一線城市漲勢放緩，而二線城市樓價跑贏大市。
被問及二線城市樓價跑贏大市的原因，徐楓指，投資者對二三線城市住宅物業更為熱衷，一線城市則更多向商業樓宇投資，她亦指出8成投資客擁有充裕的手頭現金，並較為偏好長三角、珠三角、重慶、成都等地的住宅物業;她更表示，明年二線城市樓價升幅有機會達25%。
更多精彩內容,請登陸財華中國網(http://www.caihuanet.com)或財華香港網(http://www.finet.hk)

description.hltext_display: Staffing in atlanta Having your own medical staffing company
description.content:
Falling in love of setting up your own medical recruitment agency? If yes, think a million thousand first. Deciding it is really a big decision that you can
't afford to commit mistake since it involves money. You
'd better expect it to be costly so you won
't be surprise if you will have financial difficulty that will happen in the first year of operation. It might be easy mistake to encounter but can be a big disaster of looking at medical recruitment agency job costs.
In starting over a recruitment agency, you have to consider few things. Things like the location of your agency, personnel who will undertake role of the admin or secretarial role and of course the salary that will keep them doing. The location that you will choose must be suitable to the type of your business. It must be spacious enough to cater all your activities as it grow.
Electric bills and phone bills must also be considered and most of all your business tax. You will be using computers and proper ventilations so it
's not the same with your normal household bill. Business must also be taken care of carefully as well as the telephone charges. Well if you plan to minimize telephone charges you can just use your own mobile phone that would be great use for your business. It will serve a non stop 24 hours available for your client.
Of course, you will not just always do all your business by phone and email. So be ready to travel and travel expenses. These are for business meetings and for lunches around the country. You must consider buying a new car for this.
For high speed process of your business you must not rely on second hand equipment. In this case, you may consider buying higher speed computers with greater capacity. You can ask help from a technical support for the maintenance; this will save time in the long run unless you have good experience in this area.
Internet security is of high importance too as well as your software licenses, also any serious medical recruitment agency, needs a proper medical staffing software to runs the business. Medical staffing software gives them the option to find the best employees and send the proper candidates to the best health jobs. The cost of websites with hosting and email hosting should not be taken for granted too. These are the factors for insurance and public liability. Postage costs can be high so if you have a lot of outgoing mail, you may even consider purchasing a franking machine.
For efficient work you must be sure that you will not run out of envelopes or your cartridge runs out of ink. You must have all office supply items in stock. Don
't underestimate your stationery costs, better to stock your office well from the start and have everything to hand. It
's very inconvenient if you suddenly run out of envelopes or your cartridge runs out of ink. Have all these items in stock and you will work more efficiently. Postage costs can be high so if you have a lot of outgoing mail, you may even consider purchasing a franking machine.
Don
't try to do everything by yourself to attempt cut costs since it rarely works. So leave it to a good and reliable accountant will save your time, money and energy. Also, pay yourself a decent salary from the start, it is completely unrealistic to try and save money by paying yourself too little. Finally, expect the unexpected so you won
't be shocked for disastrous event that might happen in setting up your recruiting agency costs.

description.hltext_display: 3カ国語対応の軽量スマートフォン「Libero 003Z」、12月24日発売 - アイティメディア
El premio más madrugador, el 75.869, un cinco premio
Nytt lekprogram för vinnarskallar
description.content:
Peter Settman är programledare för SVT:s nya familjeunderhållning Minuten. Foto: Mårten Levin/SVT
KULTUR/NÖJE
På annandagen är det premiär för Minuten, ett helt nytt lekprogram i SVT. Peter Settman, pingisbollar och 20 vinnarskallar är ingredienserna som ska få svenskarna att bänka sig i tv-soffan.
Minuten innehåller en hel del som känns igen från andra lek- och tävlingsprogram. En peppad publik, en pengastege med chans att ta hem storvinsten om du inte drar dig ur, och inte minst, Peter Settman som programledare.
- Den största skillnaden är att du kan göra alla tävlingsmomenten själv, med saker du har hemma, säger Peter Settman.
Minuten går ut på att deltagarna ska klara olika utmaningar på en minuts tid. Klarar man en, gå man vidare till nästa nivå, med chans att vinna upp till 250 000 kronor.
Grenarna kan verka enkla men blir en utmaning när de ska göras på tid. Det kan handla om att blåsa ner pingisbollar i ett glas fullt med vatten, skjuta ner läskburkar från ett bord med en gummisnodd eller att stapla tio muttrar ovanpå varandra med hjälp av en ätpinne.
Deltagarna har valts ut bland över 2 000 personer som skickade in en intresseanmälan till SVT. Många av dem är sportintresserade, har bra bollsinne och en känsla för precision. Men det är framförallt en sak som skiljer dem från vanliga svenssons.
- Du måste ha vinnarskalle för att göra det här, säger Settman.
Ingen kan automatiskt vara bra på alla de 75 grenar som kan dyka upp. Därför har deltagarna fått öva både under uttagningen och innan de kommer till programmet. Det gör att de är imponerande duktiga på udda saker som att studsa pingisbollar ner i en hink på huvudet.
- Annars hade det nog inte varit så kul, nu vet vi att de kan det här och ännu viktigare, de vet att de kan det när de kommer till programmet.
Minuten är en tävling där deltagarna imponerar med sitt fokus och sin talang. Men den som tror att man kan se snygg ut och samtidigt skaka ur pingisbollar ur en låda på rumpan har fel. Tävlingsmomenten är helt enkelt lite töntiga.
- Det är medvetet. Det är blandningen av glimten i ögat och fullt allvar som är grejen med Minuten, säger Peter Settman.

description.hltext_display: Let's Stop Being Partisan On Oil - Pastor Mensa Otabil
description.content:
The event was attended by leading politicians, members of the clergy, senior business executives, the Jubilee partners and many other Ghanaians.
of the International Central Gospel Church, who delivered the sermon on the theme; ‘Through Wisdom a house is built’, urged Ghanaians to stop partisanship and use the oil resources wisely.
Citing the recent debate on the Petroleum Revenue Management Bill, Pastor Otabil lamented ‘the partisan noise, but little clarity of facts.’
According to him, in Ghana neither the political majority nor the minority credits the other with anything. Politicians behave as if the most important considerations in life are whether the NDC or the NPP wins a debate. It was ‘awful listening to the entrenched but digressive opinions from political leaders with most MPs lacking clarity on the key issues at stake.’
Pastor Otabil said the media was ‘shallow in its analyses,’ stressing the importance of national conversation that is open to the possibility of expanding the options and alternatives available to Ghanaians.
According to him, this process demands openness, sincerity and respect for differing views with Ghanaians demanding for and holding accountable, a new leadership of conscience and vision to represent the interest of Ghanaians in transactions with its trade and economic partners.
He expressed the belief that political and religious leaders were uniquely positioned to directly confront Ghana’s state of underdevelopment. He said these two groups had the responsibility of challenging the nation to live up to its potential instead of its lowest common denominator.
In Pastor Otabil's view, although there was a reason to celebrate Ghana’s oil find, ‘the reality is that Ghana’s oil find is currently quite small’.
“The projected yield of what we’ve found so far is not sufficient by itself to create any dramatic change in our national economy. It is very obvious that the economic transformation we seek for will not come from oil. Oil is good but it is not the final answer to our challenges.
The future of Ghana will not be determined by our oil find. The future of Ghana will be determined by our foresight, wisdom and planning, ’ he stressed.
He, therefore, urged Ghanaians to think about the new responsibility they have been entrusted with and advised against ‘ingesting’ oil resources, championing that we rather invest our resources for profit.

description.hltext_display: Amity continues to impress (girls basketball)
description.content:
Chloe Brinton knocked down a three-pointer to open a fourth quarter that saw the Amity High girls basketball team dominate Jonathan Law in winning a 38-28 Southern Connecticut Conference interdivision game in Woodmont on Dec. 14. The victory marked the third straight for coach Michelle Martinek’s Lady Spartans. who showed off their defense to hand Law of Milford its third straight defeat.
“Defense was our focus from our first practice and they girls have been playing great,” Martinek said after Amity’s 2-3 zone gave the visiting Eagles no place to go.
“Law is a great 3-point shooting team, but we contested every shot.”
Eagle coach Heather Soucier concurred.
“Amity’s 2-3 defense was very strong and we weren’t able to get our transition game going,” Soulier said. “They played an excellent game.”
Balance has been the key for Amity, whether it is scoring points, grabbing rebounds, or denying opponents.
Jenn Post was the glue for Amity versus Law, as the senior scored off a give-and-go from Jess Malinconico to open the third quarter before going up strong with a rebound in a back-and-forth scoring period.
Malinconico scored 10 points overall and made all four free throws, including a brace in the fourth quarter, when her arching shot from the lane ran Law into a timeout trailing 35-25 with 3:36 remaining.
Mikaila Schmitt hit a turn-around jumper down the stretch and added two free throws to hold off Law.
The visitors took a 6-2 lead before Malinconico and Alyssa Mirmina both made two free throws and Sarah Tashea fed Malincinico inside for a bucket to tie things at 8-8 after one.
Brinton beat the Law press and fed Mirmina for a fastbreak basket to get Amity on the scoreboard in the the second quarter.
The freshman then made four straight free throws of to help offset Phoebe French’s 3-pointer for Law.
Down the stretch, Post took a pass from Schmitt and scored inside and left the ball for Mirmina in the lane for a half-closing layup and a 19-17 lead.
Post’s putback broke a 21-21 tie and Tabitha Brown split two defenders and pulled up for a sweet eight-footer in a point-challenged third period that closed with Amity ahead, 26-25.
The Lady Spartans made it four straight wins by defeating Foran High of Milford, 42-30, on Friday.
Amity took leads of 12-3 and 22-7 over the Lions (1-3).
Post scored 10 points to go with six rebounds and three assists.
Schmitt scored seven points, Amanda Vecchio six, and Brown had six rebounds, three assists and three steals.
Amity will host Sheehan today at 3 p.m. before taking part in the Bellows Fall (Vt.) Holiday Tournament on Tuesday and Wednesday.

description.hltext_display: 増加し続けるマルウェア——主な犯行の手口 - アイティメディア
Ford Argentina promueve el equipamiento en seguridad
description.content:
A partir del 1 de Enero de 2011 estará disponible, en toda la red de concesionarios Ford, un conjunto de elementos...
...que contribuirán a maximizar las condiciones de seguridad y el cumplimiento de la Ley Nacional de Tránsito (Ley. 2449). Reunidos en un conveniente bolso provisto de bandas de velcro que facilitan su sujeción a la alfombra del baúl, cada usuario contará con un chaleco fluorescente color amarillo con bandas retrorreflectivas transversales color gris, que destacarán su presencia y desplazamiento, en caso de tener que descender del vehículo. Adicionalmente, el bolso también contiene dos balizas triangulares retrorreflectantes rojas con borde interno fluorescente anaranjado, homologadas por el INTI con su correspondiente número de C.H.A.S. (Certificación de Homologación de Autopartes y/o elementos de Seguridad), cuyo pie metálico especialmente diseñado le permite soportar vientos de hasta 70 km/h. Un par de guantes de hilo tejido de algodón, que facilitan el trabajo al mismo tiempo que reducen la posibilidad de ensuciarse o lastimarse, por ejemplo, al remplazar un neumático, completan el práctico bolso. Dos elementos más completan el conjunto. Por un lado, el matafuego reglamentario con certificación IRAM. Por otro, un nuevo cubre alfombras dotado de un sistema de fijación antideslizante que asegura su sujeción al piso en virtud de la confección de punzonados troquelados que se sujetan con ganchos, a su vez, fijados al conjunto alfombra/anti-ruido. En la elaboración de estos cubre alfombras se aseguró que su forma se adapte perfectamente al perímetro del piso de cada modelo, manteniendo una distancia mínima de 25mm hasta el pedal del acelerador. Todos los elementos mencionados anteriormente componen el conjunto de elementos de seguridad que Ford ofrecerá desde comienzos del 2011 en todos sus concesionarios. Ford desea recordar a todos los conductores que es recomendable colocarse el chaleco ante la necesidad de descenso del vehículo en autopista o cualquier vía rápida, en caso de recambio de neumático o accidente, es por ello que, conjuntamente con el matafuego, es sumamente importante ubicar estos elementos dentro del habitáculo del vehículo de manera accesible. Fuente: Relaciones Institucionales

description.hltext_display: 加拿大一上市公司制造金矿骗局 事败蒸发逾亿加元
description.content:
----本文导读：----
加拿大一家上市公司在中国云南进行金矿钻探时，夸大所发现矿藏黄金含量，刺激该公司股价大升。事败后公司主席兼行政总裁辞职及承认含金报告不确，令该公司市值在一日内蒸发逾1.57亿加元。
此间21日出版《明报》在头版上以大半版篇幅报道了这一事件。
被告佩特森今年60岁，是一名地质学家，创立一家以温哥华为基地、在多伦多证交所挂牌采矿探测公司，并出任主席及行政总裁。
加拿大皇家骑警不列颠哥伦比亚总部联邦发言人麦克劳克林20日说，加拿大皇家骑警在中国和香港警方协助下，经3年半追查后查明，涉案男子于2003年5月8月至2007年2月21日期间，将该公司在中国云南勘矿计划中25份矿产含金量数据研究报告资料，先后向外界发布，令该公司股价一度显著上升。
涉案男子在2007年6月辞职离开该公司，在一个月后7月19日，该公司突然向外界公布，早前发出云南勘矿含金量数据报告资料有误，并撤回有关报告。 这令该公司仅在一个股票交易日，市值损失即超过1.57亿元，也令大批包括华裔在内投资者蒙受金钱损失。
据悉，该公司其后聘请顾问公司进行研究，并指该计划有关矿产含金量数据资料出现433处失误，包括在云南发现有显著黄金数据60多份报告，实际上是没有黄金。
被告佩特森共被控5项超过5000元诈骗、2项股票市场诈骗、1项公布虚假资料诱骗他人加入公司成为股份持有人和1项公布虚假资料骗取公司投资者等共9项罪名。
佩特森若被判罪名成立，将面对长达14年入狱刑期。
皇家骑警发言人麦克劳克林表示，受骗投资者逾1000名，包括来自多伦多及中国云南华人在内，在虚假报告揭发后，已向该公司提出集体诉讼。 该公司于2008年与当事人作出1550万元和解协议，令当事人得到一些赔偿。 涉案男子及他妻子，将名下所有物业抵押后，向当事人偿还350万元部分债项。 --股市360财经频道讯
